        <td id="LC365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there was a great shout in a very shrill accent, and after it ceased I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="366"></td>
        <td id="LC366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heard one of them cry aloud _Tolgo phonac_; when in an instant I felt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="367"></td>
        <td id="LC367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">above a hundred arrows discharged on my left hand, which, pricked me like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="368"></td>
        <td id="LC368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so many needles; and besides, they shot another flight into the air, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="369"></td>
        <td id="LC369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we do bombs in Europe, whereof many, I suppose, fell on my body, (though</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="370"></td>
        <td id="LC370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I felt them not), and some on my face, which I immediately covered with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="371"></td>
        <td id="LC371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my left hand.  When this shower of arrows was over, I fell a groaning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="372"></td>
        <td id="LC372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with grief and pain; and then striving again to get loose, they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="373"></td>
        <td id="LC373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discharged another volley larger than the first, and some of them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="374"></td>
        <td id="LC374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attempted with spears to stick me in the sides; but by good luck I had on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="375"></td>
        <td id="LC375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a buff jerkin, which they could not pierce.  I thought it the most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="376"></td>
        <td id="LC376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prudent method to lie still, and my design was to continue so till night,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="377"></td>
        <td id="LC377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when, my left hand being already loose, I could easily free myself: and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="378"></td>
        <td id="LC378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as for the inhabitants, I had reason to believe I might be a match for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="379"></td>
        <td id="LC379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the greatest army they could bring against me, if they were all of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="380"></td>
        <td id="LC380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">same size with him that I saw.  But fortune disposed otherwise of me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="381"></td>
        <td id="LC381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the people observed I was quiet, they discharged no more arrows;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="382"></td>
        <td id="LC382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but, by the noise I heard, I knew their numbers increased; and about four</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="383"></td>
        <td id="LC383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yards from me, over against my right ear, I heard a knocking for above an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="384"></td>
        <td id="LC384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hour, like that of people at work; when turning my head that way, as well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="385"></td>
        <td id="LC385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as the pegs and strings would permit me, I saw a stage erected about a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="386"></td>
        <td id="LC386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">foot and a half from the ground, capable of holding four of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="387"></td>
        <td id="LC387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inhabitants, with two or three ladders to mount it: from whence one of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="388"></td>
        <td id="LC388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, who seemed to be a person of quality, made me a long speech,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="389"></td>
        <td id="LC389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whereof I understood not one syllable.  But I should have mentioned, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="390"></td>
        <td id="LC390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before the principal person began his oration, he cried out three times,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="391"></td>
        <td id="LC391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Langro dehul san_ (these words and the former were afterwards repeated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="392"></td>
        <td id="LC392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and explained to me); whereupon, immediately, about fifty of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="393"></td>
        <td id="LC393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inhabitants came and cut the strings that fastened the left side of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="394"></td>
        <td id="LC394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">head, which gave me the liberty of turning it to the right, and of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="395"></td>
        <td id="LC395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">observing the person and gesture of him that was to speak.  He appeared</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="396"></td>
        <td id="LC396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be of a middle age, and taller than any of the other three who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="397"></td>
        <td id="LC397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attended him, whereof one was a page that held up his train, and seemed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="398"></td>
        <td id="LC398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be somewhat longer than my middle finger; the other two stood one on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="399"></td>
        <td id="LC399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">each side to support him.  He acted every part of an orator, and I could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="400"></td>
        <td id="LC400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">observe many periods of threatenings, and others of promises, pity, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="401"></td>
        <td id="LC401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kindness.  I answered in a few words, but in the most submissive manner,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="402"></td>
        <td id="LC402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lifting up my left hand, and both my eyes to the sun, as calling him for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="403"></td>
        <td id="LC403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a witness; and being almost famished with hunger, having not eaten a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="404"></td>
        <td id="LC404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morsel for some hours before I left the ship, I found the demands of</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="405"></td>
        <td id="LC405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nature so strong upon me, that I could not forbear showing my impatience</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="406"></td>
        <td id="LC406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(perhaps against the strict rules of decency) by putting my finger</td>

        <td id="L407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="407"></td>

        <td id="L409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="409"></td>

        <td id="L410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="410"></td>

        <td id="L413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="413"></td>

        <td id="LC414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flesh of several animals, but could not distinguish them by the taste.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="415"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="419"></td>
        <td id="LC419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">showing a thousand marks of wonder and astonishment at my bulk and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="420"></td>
        <td id="LC420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appetite.  I then made another sign, that I wanted drink.  They found by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="421"></td>
        <td id="LC421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my eating that a small quantity would not suffice me; and being a most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="422"></td>
        <td id="LC422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ingenious people, they slung up, with great dexterity, one of their</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="423"></td>
        <td id="LC423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">largest hogsheads, then rolled it towards my hand, and beat out the top;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="424"></td>
        <td id="LC424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I drank it off at a draught, which I might well do, for it did not hold</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manner, and made signs for more; but they had none to give me.  When I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="428"></td>
        <td id="LC428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had performed these wonders, they shouted for joy, and danced upon my</td>

        <td id="L429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="429"></td>
        <td id="LC429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breast, repeating several times as they did at first, _Hekinah degul_.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="430"></td>
        <td id="LC430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They made me a sign that I should throw down the two hogsheads, but first</td>

        <td id="L431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="431"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">while one of my hands was at liberty, without trembling at the very sight</td>

        <td id="L444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="444"></td>
        <td id="LC444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of so prodigious a creature as I must appear to them.  After some time,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="445"></td>
        <td id="LC445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when they observed that I made no more demands for meat, there appeared</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="446"></td>
        <td id="LC446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before me a person of high rank from his imperial majesty.  His</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="447"></td>

        <td id="L448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="448"></td>

        <td id="L454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="454"></td>
        <td id="LC454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conveyed.  I answered in few words, but to no purpose, and made a sign</td>

        <td id="L455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="455"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="462"></td>
        <td id="LC462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whereupon I once more thought of attempting to break my bonds; but again,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="463"></td>
        <td id="LC463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when I felt the smart of their arrows upon my face and hands, which were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="464"></td>
        <td id="LC464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all in blisters, and many of the darts still sticking in them, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="465"></td>
        <td id="LC465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">observing likewise that the number of my enemies increased, I gave tokens</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="466"></td>
        <td id="LC466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to let them know that they might do with me what they pleased.  Upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="467"></td>
        <td id="LC467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this, the _hurgo_ and his train withdrew, with much civility and cheerful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="468"></td>
        <td id="LC468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">countenances.  Soon after I heard a general shout, with frequent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="469"></td>
        <td id="LC469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">repetitions of the words _Peplom selan_; and I felt great numbers of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="470"></td>
        <td id="LC470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people on my left side relaxing the cords to such a degree, that I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="471"></td>
        <td id="LC471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">able to turn upon my right, and to ease myself with making water; which I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="472"></td>
        <td id="LC472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very plentifully did, to the great astonishment of the people; who,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="473"></td>
        <td id="LC473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conjecturing by my motion what I was going to do, immediately opened to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="474"></td>
        <td id="LC474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the right and left on that side, to avoid the torrent, which fell with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="475"></td>
        <td id="LC475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such noise and violence from me.  But before this, they had daubed my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="476"></td>
        <td id="LC476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face and both my hands with a sort of ointment, very pleasant to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="477"></td>
        <td id="LC477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smell, which, in a few minutes, removed all the smart of their arrows.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="478"></td>
        <td id="LC478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">These circumstances, added to the refreshment I had received by their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="479"></td>
        <td id="LC479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">victuals and drink, which were very nourishing, disposed me to sleep.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="480"></td>
        <td id="LC480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slept about eight hours, as I was afterwards assured; and it was no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="481"></td>
        <td id="LC481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wonder, for the physicians, by the emperor’s order, had mingled a sleepy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="482"></td>
        <td id="LC482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">potion in the hogsheads of wine.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="483"></td>
        <td id="LC483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="484"></td>
        <td id="LC484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It seems, that upon the first moment I was discovered sleeping on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="485"></td>
        <td id="LC485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ground, after my landing, the emperor had early notice of it by an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="486"></td>
        <td id="LC486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">express; and determined in council, that I should be tied in the manner I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="487"></td>
        <td id="LC487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have related, (which was done in the night while I slept;) that plenty of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="488"></td>
        <td id="LC488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meat and drink should be sent to me, and a machine prepared to carry me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="489"></td>
        <td id="LC489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the capital city.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="490"></td>
        <td id="LC490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="491"></td>
        <td id="LC491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This resolution perhaps may appear very bold and dangerous, and I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="492"></td>
        <td id="LC492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confident would not be imitated by any prince in Europe on the like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="493"></td>
        <td id="LC493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">occasion.  However, in my opinion, it was extremely prudent, as well as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="494"></td>
        <td id="LC494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">generous: for, supposing these people had endeavoured to kill me with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="495"></td>
        <td id="LC495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their spears and arrows, while I was asleep, I should certainly have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="496"></td>
        <td id="LC496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">awaked with the first sense of smart, which might so far have roused my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="497"></td>
        <td id="LC497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rage and strength, as to have enabled me to break the strings wherewith I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="498"></td>
        <td id="LC498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was tied; after which, as they were not able to make resistance, so they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="499"></td>
        <td id="LC499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could expect no mercy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="500"></td>
        <td id="LC500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="501"></td>
        <td id="LC501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">These people are most excellent mathematicians, and arrived to a great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="502"></td>
        <td id="LC502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perfection in mechanics, by the countenance and encouragement of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="503"></td>
        <td id="LC503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">emperor, who is a renowned patron of learning.  This prince has several</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="504"></td>
        <td id="LC504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">machines fixed on wheels, for the carriage of trees and other great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="505"></td>
        <td id="LC505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weights.  He often builds his largest men of war, whereof some are nine</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="506"></td>
        <td id="LC506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feet long, in the woods where the timber grows, and has them carried on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="507"></td>
        <td id="LC507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these engines three or four hundred yards to the sea.  Five hundred</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="508"></td>
        <td id="LC508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carpenters and engineers were immediately set at work to prepare the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="509"></td>
        <td id="LC509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greatest engine they had.  It was a frame of wood raised three inches</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="510"></td>
        <td id="LC510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the ground, about seven feet long, and four wide, moving upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="511"></td>
        <td id="LC511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">twenty-two wheels.  The shout I heard was upon the arrival of this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="512"></td>
        <td id="LC512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">engine, which, it seems, set out in four hours after my landing.  It was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="513"></td>
        <td id="LC513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brought parallel to me, as I lay.  But the principal difficulty was to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="514"></td>
        <td id="LC514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">raise and place me in this vehicle.  Eighty poles, each of one foot high,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="515"></td>
        <td id="LC515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were erected for this purpose, and very strong cords, of the bigness of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="516"></td>
        <td id="LC516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">packthread, were fastened by hooks to many bandages, which the workmen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="517"></td>
        <td id="LC517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had girt round my neck, my hands, my body, and my legs.  Nine hundred of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="518"></td>
        <td id="LC518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the strongest men were employed to draw up these cords, by many pulleys</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="519"></td>
        <td id="LC519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fastened on the poles; and thus, in less than three hours, I was raised</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="520"></td>
        <td id="LC520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and slung into the engine, and there tied fast.  All this I was told;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="521"></td>
        <td id="LC521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for, while the operation was performing, I lay in a profound sleep, by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="522"></td>
        <td id="LC522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the force of that soporiferous medicine infused into my liquor.  Fifteen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="523"></td>
        <td id="LC523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hundred of the emperor’s largest horses, each about four inches and a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="524"></td>
        <td id="LC524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half high, were employed to draw me towards the metropolis, which, as I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="525"></td>
        <td id="LC525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said, was half a mile distant.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="526"></td>
        <td id="LC526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="527"></td>
        <td id="LC527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">About four hours after we began our journey, I awaked by a very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="528"></td>
        <td id="LC528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ridiculous accident; for the carriage being stopped a while, to adjust</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="529"></td>
        <td id="LC529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something that was out of order, two or three of the young natives had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="530"></td>
        <td id="LC530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the curiosity to see how I looked when I was asleep; they climbed up into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="531"></td>
        <td id="LC531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the engine, and advancing very softly to my face, one of them, an officer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="532"></td>
        <td id="LC532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the guards, put the sharp end of his half-pike a good way up into my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="533"></td>
        <td id="LC533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">left nostril, which tickled my nose like a straw, and made me sneeze</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="534"></td>
        <td id="LC534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">violently; whereupon they stole off unperceived, and it was three weeks</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="535"></td>
        <td id="LC535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before I knew the cause of my waking so suddenly.  We made a long march</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="536"></td>
        <td id="LC536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the remaining part of the day, and, rested at night with five hundred</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="537"></td>
        <td id="LC537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guards on each side of me, half with torches, and half with bows and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="538"></td>
        <td id="LC538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arrows, ready to shoot me if I should offer to stir.  The next morning at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="539"></td>
        <td id="LC539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sun-rise we continued our march, and arrived within two hundred yards of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="540"></td>
        <td id="LC540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the city gates about noon.  The emperor, and all his court, came out to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="541"></td>
        <td id="LC541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meet us; but his great officers would by no means suffer his majesty to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="542"></td>
        <td id="LC542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">endanger his person by mounting on my body.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="543"></td>
        <td id="LC543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="544"></td>
        <td id="LC544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At the place where the carriage stopped there stood an ancient temple,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="545"></td>
        <td id="LC545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">esteemed to be the largest in the whole kingdom; which, having been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="546"></td>
        <td id="LC546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">polluted some years before by an unnatural murder, was, according to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="547"></td>
        <td id="LC547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">zeal of those people, looked upon as profane, and therefore had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="548"></td>
        <td id="LC548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">applied to common use, and all the ornaments and furniture carried away.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="549"></td>
        <td id="LC549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In this edifice it was determined I should lodge.  The great gate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="550"></td>
        <td id="LC550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fronting to the north was about four feet high, and almost two feet wide,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="551"></td>
        <td id="LC551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through which I could easily creep.  On each side of the gate was a small</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="552"></td>
        <td id="LC552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">window, not above six inches from the ground: into that on the left side,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="553"></td>
        <td id="LC553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the king’s smith conveyed fourscore and eleven chains, like those that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="554"></td>
        <td id="LC554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hang to a lady’s watch in Europe, and almost as large, which were locked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="555"></td>
        <td id="LC555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to my left leg with six-and-thirty padlocks.  Over against this temple,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="556"></td>
        <td id="LC556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the other side of the great highway, at twenty feet distance, there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="557"></td>
        <td id="LC557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a turret at least five feet high.  Here the emperor ascended, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="558"></td>
        <td id="LC558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many principal lords of his court, to have an opportunity of viewing me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="559"></td>
        <td id="LC559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as I was told, for I could not see them.  It was reckoned that above a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="560"></td>
        <td id="LC560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hundred thousand inhabitants came out of the town upon the same errand;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="561"></td>
        <td id="LC561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and, in spite of my guards, I believe there could not be fewer than ten</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="562"></td>
        <td id="LC562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thousand at several times, who mounted my body by the help of ladders.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="563"></td>
        <td id="LC563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But a proclamation was soon issued, to forbid it upon pain of death.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="564"></td>
        <td id="LC564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the workmen found it was impossible for me to break loose, they cut</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="565"></td>
        <td id="LC565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the strings that bound me; whereupon I rose up, with as melancholy a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="566"></td>
        <td id="LC566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disposition as ever I had in my life.  But the noise and astonishment of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="567"></td>
        <td id="LC567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the people, at seeing me rise and walk, are not to be expressed.  The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="568"></td>
        <td id="LC568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chains that held my left leg were about two yards long, and gave me not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="569"></td>
        <td id="LC569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only the liberty of walking backwards and forwards in a semicircle, but,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="570"></td>
        <td id="LC570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being fixed within four inches of the gate, allowed me to creep in, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="571"></td>
        <td id="LC571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lie at my full length in the temple.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="572"></td>
        <td id="LC572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="573"></td>
        <td id="LC573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="574"></td>
        <td id="LC574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="575"></td>
        <td id="LC575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER II.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="576"></td>
        <td id="LC576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="577"></td>
        <td id="LC577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="578"></td>
        <td id="LC578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The emperor of Lilliput, attended by several of the nobility, comes to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="579"></td>
        <td id="LC579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see the author in his confinement.  The emperor’s person and habit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="580"></td>
        <td id="LC580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">described.  Learned men appointed to teach the author their language.  He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="581"></td>
        <td id="LC581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gains favour by his mild disposition.  His pockets are searched, and his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="582"></td>
        <td id="LC582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sword and pistols taken from him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="583"></td>
        <td id="LC583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="584"></td>
        <td id="LC584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I found myself on my feet, I looked about me, and must confess I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="585"></td>
        <td id="LC585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never beheld a more entertaining prospect.  The country around appeared</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="586"></td>
        <td id="LC586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like a continued garden, and the enclosed fields, which were generally</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="587"></td>
        <td id="LC587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forty feet square, resembled so many beds of flowers.  These fields were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="588"></td>
        <td id="LC588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intermingled with woods of half a stang, {301} and the tallest trees, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="589"></td>
        <td id="LC589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I could judge, appeared to be seven feet high.  I viewed the town on my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="590"></td>
        <td id="LC590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">left hand, which looked like the painted scene of a city in a theatre.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="591"></td>
        <td id="LC591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="592"></td>
        <td id="LC592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had been for some hours extremely pressed by the necessities of nature;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="593"></td>
        <td id="LC593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which was no wonder, it being almost two days since I had last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="594"></td>
        <td id="LC594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disburdened myself.  I was under great difficulties between urgency and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="595"></td>
        <td id="LC595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shame.  The best expedient I could think of, was to creep into my house,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="596"></td>
        <td id="LC596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which I accordingly did; and shutting the gate after me, I went as far as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="597"></td>
        <td id="LC597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the length of my chain would suffer, and discharged my body of that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="598"></td>
        <td id="LC598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">uneasy load.  But this was the only time I was ever guilty of so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="599"></td>
        <td id="LC599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">uncleanly an action; for which I cannot but hope the candid reader will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="600"></td>
        <td id="LC600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">give some allowance, after he has maturely and impartially considered my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="601"></td>
        <td id="LC601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">case, and the distress I was in.  From this time my constant practice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="602"></td>
        <td id="LC602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was, as soon as I rose, to perform that business in open air, at the full</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="603"></td>
        <td id="LC603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extent of my chain; and due care was taken every morning before company</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="604"></td>
        <td id="LC604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came, that the offensive matter should be carried off in wheel-barrows,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="605"></td>
        <td id="LC605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by two servants appointed for that purpose.  I would not have dwelt so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="606"></td>
        <td id="LC606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long upon a circumstance that, perhaps, at first sight, may appear not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="607"></td>
        <td id="LC607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very momentous, if I had not thought it necessary to justify my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="608"></td>
        <td id="LC608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">character, in point of cleanliness, to the world; which, I am told, some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="609"></td>
        <td id="LC609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of my maligners have been pleased, upon this and other occasions, to call</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="610"></td>
        <td id="LC610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in question.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="611"></td>
        <td id="LC611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="612"></td>
        <td id="LC612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When this adventure was at an end, I came back out of my house, having</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="613"></td>
        <td id="LC613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">occasion for fresh air.  The emperor was already descended from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="614"></td>
        <td id="LC614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tower, and advancing on horseback towards me, which had like to have cost</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="615"></td>
        <td id="LC615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him dear; for the beast, though very well trained, yet wholly unused to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="616"></td>
        <td id="LC616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such a sight, which appeared as if a mountain moved before him, reared up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="617"></td>
        <td id="LC617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on its hinder feet: but that prince, who is an excellent horseman, kept</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="618"></td>
        <td id="LC618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his seat, till his attendants ran in, and held the bridle, while his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="619"></td>
        <td id="LC619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">majesty had time to dismount.  When he alighted, he surveyed me round</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="620"></td>
        <td id="LC620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with great admiration; but kept beyond the length of my chain.  He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="621"></td>
        <td id="LC621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ordered his cooks and butlers, who were already prepared, to give me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="622"></td>
        <td id="LC622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">victuals and drink, which they pushed forward in a sort of vehicles upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="623"></td>
        <td id="LC623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wheels, till I could reach them.  I took these vehicles and soon emptied</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="624"></td>
        <td id="LC624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them all; twenty of them were filled with meat, and ten with liquor; each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="625"></td>
        <td id="LC625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the former afforded me two or three good mouthfuls; and I emptied the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="626"></td>
        <td id="LC626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">liquor of ten vessels, which was contained in earthen vials, into one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="627"></td>
        <td id="LC627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vehicle, drinking it off at a draught; and so I did with the rest.  The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="628"></td>
        <td id="LC628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">empress, and young princes of the blood of both sexes, attended by many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="629"></td>
        <td id="LC629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ladies, sat at some distance in their chairs; but upon the accident that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="630"></td>
        <td id="LC630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happened to the emperor’s horse, they alighted, and came near his person,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="631"></td>
        <td id="LC631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which I am now going to describe.  He is taller by almost the breadth of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="632"></td>
        <td id="LC632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my nail, than any of his court; which alone is enough to strike an awe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="633"></td>
        <td id="LC633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into the beholders.  His features are strong and masculine, with an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="634"></td>
        <td id="LC634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Austrian lip and arched nose, his complexion olive, his countenance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="635"></td>
        <td id="LC635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">erect, his body and limbs well proportioned, all his motions graceful,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="636"></td>
        <td id="LC636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and his deportment majestic.  He was then past his prime, being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="637"></td>
        <td id="LC637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">twenty-eight years and three quarters old, of which he had reigned about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="638"></td>
        <td id="LC638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seven in great felicity, and generally victorious.  For the better</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="639"></td>
        <td id="LC639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">convenience of beholding him, I lay on my side, so that my face was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="640"></td>
        <td id="LC640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">parallel to his, and he stood but three yards off: however, I have had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="641"></td>
        <td id="LC641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him since many times in my hand, and therefore cannot be deceived in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="642"></td>
        <td id="LC642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">description.  His dress was very plain and simple, and the fashion of it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="643"></td>
        <td id="LC643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">between the Asiatic and the European; but he had on his head a light</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="644"></td>
        <td id="LC644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">helmet of gold, adorned with jewels, and a plume on the crest.  He held</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="645"></td>
        <td id="LC645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his sword drawn in his hand to defend himself, if I should happen to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="646"></td>
        <td id="LC646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">break loose; it was almost three inches long; the hilt and scabbard were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="647"></td>
        <td id="LC647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gold enriched with diamonds.  His voice was shrill, but very clear and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="648"></td>
        <td id="LC648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">articulate; and I could distinctly hear it when I stood up.  The ladies</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="649"></td>
        <td id="LC649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and courtiers were all most magnificently clad; so that the spot they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="650"></td>
        <td id="LC650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stood upon seemed to resemble a petticoat spread upon the ground,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="651"></td>
        <td id="LC651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">embroidered with figures of gold and silver.  His imperial majesty spoke</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="652"></td>
        <td id="LC652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">often to me, and I returned answers: but neither of us could understand a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="653"></td>
        <td id="LC653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">syllable.  There were several of his priests and lawyers present (as I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="654"></td>
        <td id="LC654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conjectured by their habits), who were commanded to address themselves to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="655"></td>
        <td id="LC655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me; and I spoke to them in as many languages as I had the least</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="656"></td>
        <td id="LC656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smattering of, which were High and Low Dutch, Latin, French, Spanish,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="657"></td>
        <td id="LC657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Italian, and Lingua Franca, but all to no purpose.  After about two hours</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="658"></td>
        <td id="LC658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the court retired, and I was left with a strong guard, to prevent the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="659"></td>
        <td id="LC659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impertinence, and probably the malice of the rabble, who were very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="660"></td>
        <td id="LC660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impatient to crowd about me as near as they durst; and some of them had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="661"></td>
        <td id="LC661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the impudence to shoot their arrows at me, as I sat on the ground by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="662"></td>
        <td id="LC662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">door of my house, whereof one very narrowly missed my left eye.  But the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="663"></td>
        <td id="LC663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">colonel ordered six of the ringleaders to be seized, and thought no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="664"></td>
        <td id="LC664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">punishment so proper as to deliver them bound into my hands; which some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="665"></td>
        <td id="LC665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of his soldiers accordingly did, pushing them forward with the butt-ends</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="666"></td>
        <td id="LC666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of their pikes into my reach.  I took them all in my right hand, put five</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="667"></td>
        <td id="LC667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of them into my coat-pocket; and as to the sixth, I made a countenance as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="668"></td>
        <td id="LC668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if I would eat him alive.  The poor man squalled terribly, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="669"></td>
        <td id="LC669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">colonel and his officers were in much pain, especially when they saw me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="670"></td>
        <td id="LC670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">take out my penknife: but I soon put them out of fear; for, looking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="671"></td>
        <td id="LC671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mildly, and immediately cutting the strings he was bound with, I set him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="672"></td>
        <td id="LC672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gently on the ground, and away he ran.  I treated the rest in the same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="673"></td>
        <td id="LC673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manner, taking them one by one out of my pocket; and I observed both the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="674"></td>
        <td id="LC674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soldiers and people were highly delighted at this mark of my clemency,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="675"></td>
        <td id="LC675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which was represented very much to my advantage at court.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="676"></td>
        <td id="LC676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="677"></td>
        <td id="LC677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Towards night I got with some difficulty into my house, where I lay on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="678"></td>
        <td id="LC678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the ground, and continued to do so about a fortnight; during which time,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="679"></td>
        <td id="LC679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the emperor gave orders to have a bed prepared for me.  Six hundred beds</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="680"></td>
        <td id="LC680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the common measure were brought in carriages, and worked up in my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="681"></td>
        <td id="LC681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house; a hundred and fifty of their beds, sewn together, made up the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="682"></td>
        <td id="LC682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breadth and length; and these were four double: which, however, kept me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="683"></td>
        <td id="LC683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but very indifferently from the hardness of the floor, that was of smooth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="684"></td>
        <td id="LC684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stone.  By the same computation, they provided me with sheets, blankets,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="685"></td>
        <td id="LC685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and coverlets, tolerable enough for one who had been so long inured to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="686"></td>
        <td id="LC686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hardships.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="687"></td>
        <td id="LC687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="688"></td>
        <td id="LC688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As the news of my arrival spread through the kingdom, it brought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="689"></td>
        <td id="LC689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prodigious numbers of rich, idle, and curious people to see me; so that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="690"></td>
        <td id="LC690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the villages were almost emptied; and great neglect of tillage and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="691"></td>
        <td id="LC691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">household affairs must have ensued, if his imperial majesty had not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="692"></td>
        <td id="LC692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">provided, by several proclamations and orders of state, against this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="693"></td>
        <td id="LC693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inconveniency.  He directed that those who had already beheld me should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="694"></td>
        <td id="LC694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">return home, and not presume to come within fifty yards of my house,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="695"></td>
        <td id="LC695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without license from the court; whereby the secretaries of state got</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="696"></td>
        <td id="LC696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">considerable fees.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="697"></td>
        <td id="LC697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="698"></td>
        <td id="LC698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the mean time the emperor held frequent councils, to debate what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="699"></td>
        <td id="LC699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">course should be taken with me; and I was afterwards assured by a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="700"></td>
        <td id="LC700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">particular friend, a person of great quality, who was as much in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="701"></td>
        <td id="LC701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">secret as any, that the court was under many difficulties concerning me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="702"></td>
        <td id="LC702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They apprehended my breaking loose; that my diet would be very expensive,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="703"></td>
        <td id="LC703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and might cause a famine.  Sometimes they determined to starve me; or at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="704"></td>
        <td id="LC704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">least to shoot me in the face and hands with poisoned arrows, which would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="705"></td>
        <td id="LC705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soon despatch me; but again they considered, that the stench of so large</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="706"></td>
        <td id="LC706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a carcass might produce a plague in the metropolis, and probably spread</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="707"></td>
        <td id="LC707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through the whole kingdom.  In the midst of these consultations, several</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="708"></td>
        <td id="LC708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">officers of the army went to the door of the great council-chamber, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="709"></td>
        <td id="LC709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two of them being admitted, gave an account of my behaviour to the six</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="710"></td>
        <td id="LC710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">criminals above-mentioned; which made so favourable an impression in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="711"></td>
        <td id="LC711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breast of his majesty and the whole board, in my behalf, that an imperial</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="712"></td>
        <td id="LC712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">commission was issued out, obliging all the villages, nine hundred yards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="713"></td>
        <td id="LC713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">round the city, to deliver in every morning six beeves, forty sheep, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="714"></td>
        <td id="LC714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other victuals for my sustenance; together with a proportionable quantity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="715"></td>
        <td id="LC715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of bread, and wine, and other liquors; for the due payment of which, his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="716"></td>
        <td id="LC716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">majesty gave assignments upon his treasury:—for this prince lives chiefly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="717"></td>
        <td id="LC717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon his own demesnes; seldom, except upon great occasions, raising any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="718"></td>
        <td id="LC718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subsidies upon his subjects, who are bound to attend him in his wars at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="719"></td>
        <td id="LC719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their own expense.  An establishment was also made of six hundred persons</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="720"></td>
        <td id="LC720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be my domestics, who had board-wages allowed for their maintenance,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="721"></td>
        <td id="LC721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and tents built for them very conveniently on each side of my door.  It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="722"></td>
        <td id="LC722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was likewise ordered, that three hundred tailors should make me a suit of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="723"></td>
        <td id="LC723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clothes, after the fashion of the country; that six of his majesty’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="724"></td>
        <td id="LC724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greatest scholars should be employed to instruct me in their language;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="725"></td>
