        <td id="LC725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and lastly, that the emperor’s horses, and those of the nobility and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="726"></td>
        <td id="LC726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">troops of guards, should be frequently exercised in my sight, to accustom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="727"></td>
        <td id="LC727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">themselves to me.  All these orders were duly put in execution; and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="728"></td>
        <td id="LC728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about three weeks I made a great progress in learning their language;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="729"></td>
        <td id="LC729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">during which time the emperor frequently honoured me with his visits, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="730"></td>
        <td id="LC730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was pleased to assist my masters in teaching me.  We began already to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="731"></td>
        <td id="LC731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">converse together in some sort; and the first words I learnt, were to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="732"></td>
        <td id="LC732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">express my desire “that he would please give me my liberty;” which I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="733"></td>
        <td id="LC733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every day repeated on my knees.  His answer, as I could comprehend it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="734"></td>
        <td id="LC734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was, “that this must be a work of time, not to be thought on without the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="735"></td>
        <td id="LC735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advice of his council, and that first I must _lumos kelmin pesso desmar</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="736"></td>
        <td id="LC736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lon emposo_;” that is, swear a peace with him and his kingdom.  However,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="737"></td>
        <td id="LC737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I should be used with all kindness.  And he advised me to “acquire,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="738"></td>
        <td id="LC738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by my patience and discreet behaviour, the good opinion of himself and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="739"></td>
        <td id="LC739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his subjects.”  He desired “I would not take it ill, if he gave orders to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="740"></td>
        <td id="LC740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certain proper officers to search me; for probably I might carry about me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="741"></td>
        <td id="LC741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several weapons, which must needs be dangerous things, if they answered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="742"></td>
        <td id="LC742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the bulk of so prodigious a person.”  I said, “His majesty should be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="743"></td>
        <td id="LC743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">satisfied; for I was ready to strip myself, and turn up my pockets before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="744"></td>
        <td id="LC744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him.”  This I delivered part in words, and part in signs.  He replied,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="745"></td>
        <td id="LC745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“that, by the laws of the kingdom, I must be searched by two of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="746"></td>
        <td id="LC746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">officers; that he knew this could not be done without my consent and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="747"></td>
        <td id="LC747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assistance; and he had so good an opinion of my generosity and justice,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="748"></td>
        <td id="LC748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as to trust their persons in my hands; that whatever they took from me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="749"></td>
        <td id="LC749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should be returned when I left the country, or paid for at the rate which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="750"></td>
        <td id="LC750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I would set upon them.”  I took up the two officers in my hands, put them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="751"></td>
        <td id="LC751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first into my coat-pockets, and then into every other pocket about me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="752"></td>
        <td id="LC752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">except my two fobs, and another secret pocket, which I had no mind should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="753"></td>
        <td id="LC753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be searched, wherein I had some little necessaries that were of no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="754"></td>
        <td id="LC754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consequence to any but myself.  In one of my fobs there was a silver</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="755"></td>
        <td id="LC755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">watch, and in the other a small quantity of gold in a purse.  These</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="756"></td>
        <td id="LC756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gentlemen, having pen, ink, and paper, about them, made an exact</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="757"></td>
        <td id="LC757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inventory of every thing they saw; and when they had done, desired I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="758"></td>
        <td id="LC758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would set them down, that they might deliver it to the emperor.  This</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="759"></td>
        <td id="LC759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inventory I afterwards translated into English, and is, word for word, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="760"></td>
        <td id="LC760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">follows:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="761"></td>
        <td id="LC761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="762"></td>
        <td id="LC762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    “_Imprimis_: In the right coat-pocket of the great man-mountain” (for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="763"></td>
        <td id="LC763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    so I interpret the words _quinbus flestrin_,) “after the strictest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="764"></td>
        <td id="LC764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    search, we found only one great piece of coarse-cloth, large enough</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="765"></td>
        <td id="LC765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    to be a foot-cloth for your majesty’s chief room of state.  In the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="766"></td>
        <td id="LC766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    left pocket we saw a huge silver chest, with a cover of the same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="767"></td>
        <td id="LC767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    metal, which we, the searchers, were not able to lift.  We desired it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="768"></td>
        <td id="LC768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    should be opened, and one of us stepping into it, found himself up to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="769"></td>
        <td id="LC769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    the mid leg in a sort of dust, some part whereof flying up to our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="770"></td>
        <td id="LC770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    faces set us both a sneezing for several times together.  In his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="771"></td>
        <td id="LC771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    right waistcoat-pocket we found a prodigious bundle of white thin</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="772"></td>
        <td id="LC772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    substances, folded one over another, about the bigness of three men,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="773"></td>
        <td id="LC773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    tied with a strong cable, and marked with black figures; which we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="774"></td>
        <td id="LC774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    humbly conceive to be writings, every letter almost half as large as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="775"></td>
        <td id="LC775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    the palm of our hands.  In the left there was a sort of engine, from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="776"></td>
        <td id="LC776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    the back of which were extended twenty long poles, resembling the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="777"></td>
        <td id="LC777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    pallisados before your majesty’s court: wherewith we conjecture the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="778"></td>
        <td id="LC778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    man-mountain combs his head; for we did not always trouble him with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="779"></td>
        <td id="LC779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    questions, because we found it a great difficulty to make him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="780"></td>
        <td id="LC780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    understand us.  In the large pocket, on the right side of his middle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="781"></td>
        <td id="LC781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    cover” (so I translate the word _ranfulo_, by which they meant my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="782"></td>
        <td id="LC782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    breeches,) “we saw a hollow pillar of iron, about the length of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="783"></td>
        <td id="LC783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    man, fastened to a strong piece of timber larger than the pillar; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="784"></td>
        <td id="LC784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    upon one side of the pillar, were huge pieces of iron sticking out,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="785"></td>
        <td id="LC785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    cut into strange figures, which we know not what to make of.  In the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="786"></td>
        <td id="LC786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    left pocket, another engine of the same kind.  In the smaller pocket</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="787"></td>
        <td id="LC787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    on the right side, were several round flat pieces of white and red</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="788"></td>
        <td id="LC788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    metal, of different bulk; some of the white, which seemed to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="789"></td>
        <td id="LC789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    silver, were so large and heavy, that my comrade and I could hardly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="790"></td>
        <td id="LC790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    lift them.  In the left pocket were two black pillars irregularly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="791"></td>
        <td id="LC791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    shaped: we could not, without difficulty, reach the top of them, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="792"></td>
        <td id="LC792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    we stood at the bottom of his pocket.  One of them was covered, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="793"></td>
        <td id="LC793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    seemed all of a piece: but at the upper end of the other there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="794"></td>
        <td id="LC794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    appeared a white round substance, about twice the bigness of our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="795"></td>
        <td id="LC795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    heads.  Within each of these was enclosed a prodigious plate of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="796"></td>
        <td id="LC796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    steel; which, by our orders, we obliged him to show us, because we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="797"></td>
        <td id="LC797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    apprehended they might be dangerous engines.  He took them out of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="798"></td>
        <td id="LC798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    their cases, and told us, that in his own country his practice was to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="799"></td>
        <td id="LC799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    shave his beard with one of these, and cut his meat with the other.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="800"></td>
        <td id="LC800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    There were two pockets which we could not enter: these he called his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="801"></td>
        <td id="LC801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    fobs; they were two large slits cut into the top of his middle cover,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="802"></td>
        <td id="LC802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    but squeezed close by the pressure of his belly.  Out of the right</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="803"></td>
        <td id="LC803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    fob hung a great silver chain, with a wonderful kind of engine at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="804"></td>
        <td id="LC804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    bottom.  We directed him to draw out whatever was at the end of that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="805"></td>
        <td id="LC805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    chain; which appeared to be a globe, half silver, and half of some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="806"></td>
        <td id="LC806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    transparent metal; for, on the transparent side, we saw certain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="807"></td>
        <td id="LC807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    strange figures circularly drawn, and thought we could touch them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="808"></td>
        <td id="LC808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    till we found our fingers stopped by the lucid substance.  He put</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="809"></td>
        <td id="LC809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    this engine into our ears, which made an incessant noise, like that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="810"></td>
        <td id="LC810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    of a water-mill: and we conjecture it is either some unknown animal,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="811"></td>
        <td id="LC811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    or the god that he worships; but we are more inclined to the latter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="812"></td>
        <td id="LC812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    opinion, because he assured us, (if we understood him right, for he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="813"></td>
        <td id="LC813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    expressed himself very imperfectly) that he seldom did any thing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="814"></td>
        <td id="LC814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    without consulting it.  He called it his oracle, and said, it pointed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="815"></td>
        <td id="LC815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    out the time for every action of his life.  From the left fob he took</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="816"></td>
        <td id="LC816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    out a net almost large enough for a fisherman, but contrived to open</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="817"></td>
        <td id="LC817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    and shut like a purse, and served him for the same use: we found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="818"></td>
        <td id="LC818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    therein several massy pieces of yellow metal, which, if they be real</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="819"></td>
        <td id="LC819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    gold, must be of immense value.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="820"></td>
        <td id="LC820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="821"></td>
        <td id="LC821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    “Having thus, in obedience to your majesty’s commands, diligently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="822"></td>
        <td id="LC822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    searched all his pockets, we observed a girdle about his waist made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="823"></td>
        <td id="LC823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    of the hide of some prodigious animal, from which, on the left side,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="824"></td>
        <td id="LC824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    hung a sword of the length of five men; and on the right, a bag or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="825"></td>
        <td id="LC825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    pouch divided into two cells, each cell capable of holding three of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="826"></td>
        <td id="LC826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    your majesty’s subjects.  In one of these cells were several globes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="827"></td>
        <td id="LC827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    or balls, of a most ponderous metal, about the bigness of our heads,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="828"></td>
        <td id="LC828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    and requiring a strong hand to lift them: the other cell contained a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="829"></td>
        <td id="LC829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    heap of certain black grains, but of no great bulk or weight, for we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="830"></td>
        <td id="LC830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    could hold above fifty of them in the palms of our hands.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="831"></td>
        <td id="LC831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="832"></td>
        <td id="LC832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    “This is an exact inventory of what we found about the body of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="833"></td>
        <td id="LC833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    man-mountain, who used us with great civility, and due respect to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="834"></td>
        <td id="LC834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    your majesty’s commission.  Signed and sealed on the fourth day of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="835"></td>
        <td id="LC835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    the eighty-ninth moon of your majesty’s auspicious reign.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="836"></td>
        <td id="LC836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="837"></td>
        <td id="LC837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                                          CLEFRIN FRELOCK, MARSI FRELOCK.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="838"></td>
        <td id="LC838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="839"></td>
        <td id="LC839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When this inventory was read over to the emperor, he directed me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="840"></td>
        <td id="LC840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">although in very gentle terms, to deliver up the several particulars.  He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="841"></td>
        <td id="LC841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first called for my scimitar, which I took out, scabbard and all.  In the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="842"></td>
        <td id="LC842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mean time he ordered three thousand of his choicest troops (who then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="843"></td>
        <td id="LC843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attended him) to surround me at a distance, with their bows and arrows</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="844"></td>
        <td id="LC844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just ready to discharge; but I did not observe it, for mine eyes were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="845"></td>
        <td id="LC845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wholly fixed upon his majesty.  He then desired me to draw my scimitar,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="846"></td>
        <td id="LC846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which, although it had got some rust by the sea water, was, in most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="847"></td>
        <td id="LC847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">parts, exceeding bright.  I did so, and immediately all the troops gave a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="848"></td>
        <td id="LC848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shout between terror and surprise; for the sun shone clear, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="849"></td>
        <td id="LC849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reflection dazzled their eyes, as I waved the scimitar to and fro in my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="850"></td>
        <td id="LC850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand.  His majesty, who is a most magnanimous prince, was less daunted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="851"></td>
        <td id="LC851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than I could expect: he ordered me to return it into the scabbard, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="852"></td>
        <td id="LC852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cast it on the ground as gently as I could, about six feet from the end</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="853"></td>
        <td id="LC853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of my chain.  The next thing he demanded was one of the hollow iron</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="854"></td>
        <td id="LC854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pillars; by which he meant my pocket pistols.  I drew it out, and at his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="855"></td>
        <td id="LC855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desire, as well as I could, expressed to him the use of it; and charging</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="856"></td>
        <td id="LC856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it only with powder, which, by the closeness of my pouch, happened to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="857"></td>
        <td id="LC857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">escape wetting in the sea (an inconvenience against which all prudent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="858"></td>
        <td id="LC858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mariners take special care to provide,) I first cautioned the emperor not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="859"></td>
        <td id="LC859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be afraid, and then I let it off in the air.  The astonishment here</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="860"></td>
        <td id="LC860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was much greater than at the sight of my scimitar.  Hundreds fell down as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="861"></td>
        <td id="LC861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if they had been struck dead; and even the emperor, although he stood his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="862"></td>
        <td id="LC862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ground, could not recover himself for some time.  I delivered up both my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="863"></td>
        <td id="LC863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pistols in the same manner as I had done my scimitar, and then my pouch</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="864"></td>
        <td id="LC864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of powder and bullets; begging him that the former might be kept from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="865"></td>
        <td id="LC865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fire, for it would kindle with the smallest spark, and blow up his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="866"></td>
        <td id="LC866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imperial palace into the air.  I likewise delivered up my watch, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="867"></td>
        <td id="LC867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the emperor was very curious to see, and commanded two of his tallest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="868"></td>
        <td id="LC868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yeomen of the guards to bear it on a pole upon their shoulders, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="869"></td>
        <td id="LC869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">draymen in England do a barrel of ale.  He was amazed at the continual</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="870"></td>
        <td id="LC870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">noise it made, and the motion of the minute-hand, which he could easily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="871"></td>
        <td id="LC871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discern; for their sight is much more acute than ours: he asked the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="872"></td>
        <td id="LC872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opinions of his learned men about it, which were various and remote, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="873"></td>
        <td id="LC873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the reader may well imagine without my repeating; although indeed I could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="874"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="875"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="876"></td>
        <td id="LC876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my knife and razor, my comb and silver snuff-box, my handkerchief and</td>

        <td id="L877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="877"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="878"></td>
        <td id="LC878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carriages to his majesty’s stores; but the rest of my goods were returned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="879"></td>
        <td id="LC879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="880"></td>
        <td id="LC880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="881"></td>
        <td id="LC881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had as I before observed, one private pocket, which escaped their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="882"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="884"></td>
        <td id="LC884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conveniences; which, being of no consequence to the emperor, I did not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="885"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="890"></td>
        <td id="LC890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER III.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="891"></td>
        <td id="LC891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="892"></td>
        <td id="LC892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="893"></td>
        <td id="LC893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author diverts the emperor, and his nobility of both sexes, in a very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="894"></td>
        <td id="LC894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">uncommon manner.  The diversions of the court of Lilliput described.  The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="895"></td>
        <td id="LC895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">author has his liberty granted him upon certain conditions.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="896"></td>
        <td id="LC896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="897"></td>
        <td id="LC897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My gentleness and good behaviour had gained so far on the emperor and his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="898"></td>
        <td id="LC898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">court, and indeed upon the army and people in general, that I began to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="899"></td>
        <td id="LC899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conceive hopes of getting my liberty in a short time.  I took all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="900"></td>
        <td id="LC900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possible methods to cultivate this favourable disposition.  The natives</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="901"></td>
        <td id="LC901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came, by degrees, to be less apprehensive of any danger from me.  I would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="902"></td>
        <td id="LC902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sometimes lie down, and let five or six of them dance on my hand; and at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="903"></td>
        <td id="LC903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last the boys and girls would venture to come and play at hide-and-seek</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="904"></td>
        <td id="LC904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in my hair.  I had now made a good progress in understanding and speaking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="905"></td>
        <td id="LC905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the language.  The emperor had a mind one day to entertain me with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="906"></td>
        <td id="LC906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several of the country shows, wherein they exceed all nations I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="907"></td>
        <td id="LC907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">known, both for dexterity and magnificence.  I was diverted with none so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="908"></td>
        <td id="LC908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much as that of the rope-dancers, performed upon a slender white thread,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="909"></td>
        <td id="LC909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extended about two feet, and twelve inches from the ground.  Upon which I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="910"></td>
        <td id="LC910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall desire liberty, with the reader’s patience, to enlarge a little.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="911"></td>
        <td id="LC911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="912"></td>
        <td id="LC912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This diversion is only practised by those persons who are candidates for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="913"></td>
        <td id="LC913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great employments, and high favour at court.  They are trained in this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="914"></td>
        <td id="LC914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">art from their youth, and are not always of noble birth, or liberal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="915"></td>
        <td id="LC915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">education.  When a great office is vacant, either by death or disgrace</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="916"></td>
        <td id="LC916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(which often happens,) five or six of those candidates petition the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="917"></td>
        <td id="LC917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">emperor to entertain his majesty and the court with a dance on the rope;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="918"></td>
        <td id="LC918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and whoever jumps the highest, without falling, succeeds in the office.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="919"></td>
        <td id="LC919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very often the chief ministers themselves are commanded to show their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="920"></td>
        <td id="LC920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">skill, and to convince the emperor that they have not lost their faculty.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="921"></td>
        <td id="LC921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Flimnap, the treasurer, is allowed to cut a caper on the straight rope,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="922"></td>
        <td id="LC922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at least an inch higher than any other lord in the whole empire.  I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="923"></td>
        <td id="LC923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seen him do the summerset several times together, upon a trencher fixed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="924"></td>
        <td id="LC924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on a rope which is no thicker than a common packthread in England.  My</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="925"></td>
        <td id="LC925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friend Reldresal, principal secretary for private affairs, is, in my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="926"></td>
        <td id="LC926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opinion, if I am not partial, the second after the treasurer; the rest of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="927"></td>
        <td id="LC927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the great officers are much upon a par.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="928"></td>
        <td id="LC928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="929"></td>
        <td id="LC929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">These diversions are often attended with fatal accidents, whereof great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="930"></td>
        <td id="LC930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">numbers are on record.  I myself have seen two or three candidates break</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="931"></td>
        <td id="LC931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a limb.  But the danger is much greater, when the ministers themselves</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="932"></td>
        <td id="LC932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are commanded to show their dexterity; for, by contending to excel</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="933"></td>
        <td id="LC933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">themselves and their fellows, they strain so far that there is hardly one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="934"></td>
        <td id="LC934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of them who has not received a fall, and some of them two or three.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="935"></td>
        <td id="LC935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was assured that, a year or two before my arrival, Flimnap would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="936"></td>
        <td id="LC936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">infallibly have broke his neck, if one of the king’s cushions, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="937"></td>

        <td id="L940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="940"></td>

        <td id="L945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="945"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="946"></td>
        <td id="LC946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">undergo a trial of dexterity very different from the former, and such as</td>

        <td id="L947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="947"></td>

        <td id="L1027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1027"></td>
        <td id="LC1027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mile; but, the ground in that country being extremely smooth and level,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1028"></td>
        <td id="LC1028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it received less damage than I expected.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1029"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1030"></td>
        <td id="LC1030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Two days after this adventure, the emperor, having ordered that part of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1031"></td>
        <td id="LC1031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his army which quarters in and about his metropolis, to be in readiness,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1032"></td>
        <td id="LC1032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">took a fancy of diverting himself in a very singular manner.  He desired</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1033"></td>
        <td id="LC1033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I would stand like a Colossus, with my legs as far asunder as I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1034"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1037"></td>

        <td id="LC1038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advanced.  This body consisted of three thousand foot, and a thousand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1039"></td>
        <td id="LC1039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horse.  His majesty gave orders, upon pain of death, that every soldier</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1117"></td>
        <td id="LC1117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1118"></td>
        <td id="LC1118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I swore and subscribed to these articles with great cheerfulness and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1119"></td>
        <td id="LC1119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">content, although some of them were not so honourable as I could have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1120"></td>
        <td id="LC1120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wished; which proceeded wholly from the malice of Skyresh Bolgolam, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1121"></td>
        <td id="LC1121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">high-admiral: whereupon my chains were immediately unlocked, and I was at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1122"></td>
        <td id="LC1122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">full liberty.  The emperor himself, in person, did me the honour to be by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1123"></td>
        <td id="LC1123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the whole ceremony.  I made my acknowledgements by prostrating myself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1124"></td>
        <td id="LC1124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at his majesty’s feet: but he commanded me to rise; and after many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1125"></td>
        <td id="LC1125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gracious expressions, which, to avoid the censure of vanity, I shall not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1126"></td>
        <td id="LC1126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">repeat, he added, “that he hoped I should prove a useful servant, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1127"></td>
        <td id="LC1127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well deserve all the favours he had already conferred upon me, or might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1128"></td>
        <td id="LC1128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do for the future.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1129"></td>
        <td id="LC1129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1130"></td>
        <td id="LC1130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The reader may please to observe, that, in the last article of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1131"></td>
        <td id="LC1131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recovery of my liberty, the emperor stipulates to allow me a quantity of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1132"></td>
        <td id="LC1132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meat and drink sufficient for the support of 1724 Lilliputians.  Some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1133"></td>
        <td id="LC1133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time after, asking a friend at court how they came to fix on that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1134"></td>
        <td id="LC1134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">determinate number, he told me that his majesty’s mathematicians, having</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1135"></td>
        <td id="LC1135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">taken the height of my body by the help of a quadrant, and finding it to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1136"></td>
        <td id="LC1136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exceed theirs in the proportion of twelve to one, they concluded from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1137"></td>
        <td id="LC1137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">similarity of their bodies, that mine must contain at least 1724 of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1138"></td>
        <td id="LC1138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">theirs, and consequently would require as much food as was necessary to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1139"></td>
        <td id="LC1139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">support that number of Lilliputians.  By which the reader may conceive an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1140"></td>
        <td id="LC1140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">idea of the ingenuity of that people, as well as the prudent and exact</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1141"></td>
        <td id="LC1141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">economy of so great a prince.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1142"></td>
        <td id="LC1142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1143"></td>
        <td id="LC1143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1144"></td>
        <td id="LC1144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1145"></td>
        <td id="LC1145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER IV.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1146"></td>
        <td id="LC1146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1147"></td>
        <td id="LC1147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1148"></td>
        <td id="LC1148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mildendo, the metropolis of Lilliput, described, together with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1149"></td>
        <td id="LC1149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">emperor’s palace.  A conversation between the author and a principal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1150"></td>
        <td id="LC1150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">secretary, concerning the affairs of that empire.  The author’s offers to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1151"></td>
        <td id="LC1151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">serve the emperor in his wars.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1152"></td>
        <td id="LC1152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1153"></td>
        <td id="LC1153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The first request I made, after I had obtained my liberty, was, that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1154"></td>
        <td id="LC1154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might have license to see Mildendo, the metropolis; which the emperor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1155"></td>
        <td id="LC1155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">easily granted me, but with a special charge to do no hurt either to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1156"></td>
        <td id="LC1156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inhabitants or their houses.  The people had notice, by proclamation, of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1157"></td>
        <td id="LC1157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my design to visit the town.  The wall which encompassed it is two feet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1158"></td>
        <td id="LC1158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a half high, and at least eleven inches broad, so that a coach and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1159"></td>
        <td id="LC1159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horses may be driven very safely round it; and it is flanked with strong</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1160"></td>
        <td id="LC1160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">towers at ten feet distance.  I stepped over the great western gate, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1161"></td>
        <td id="LC1161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passed very gently, and sidling, through the two principal streets, only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1162"></td>
        <td id="LC1162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in my short waistcoat, for fear of damaging the roofs and eaves of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1163"></td>
        <td id="LC1163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">houses with the skirts of my coat.  I walked with the utmost</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1164"></td>
        <td id="LC1164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">circumspection, to avoid treading on any stragglers who might remain in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1165"></td>
        <td id="LC1165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the streets, although the orders were very strict, that all people should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1166"></td>
        <td id="LC1166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">keep in their houses, at their own peril.  The garret windows and tops of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1167"></td>
        <td id="LC1167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">houses were so crowded with spectators, that I thought in all my travels</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1168"></td>
        <td id="LC1168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had not seen a more populous place.  The city is an exact square, each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1169"></td>
        <td id="LC1169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">side of the wall being five hundred feet long.  The two great streets,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1170"></td>
        <td id="LC1170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which run across and divide it into four quarters, are five feet wide.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1171"></td>
        <td id="LC1171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The lanes and alleys, which I could not enter, but only view them as I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1172"></td>
        <td id="LC1172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passed, are from twelve to eighteen inches.  The town is capable of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1173"></td>
        <td id="LC1173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">holding five hundred thousand souls: the houses are from three to five</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1174"></td>
        <td id="LC1174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stories: the shops and markets well provided.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1175"></td>
        <td id="LC1175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1176"></td>
        <td id="LC1176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The emperor’s palace is in the centre of the city where the two great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1177"></td>
        <td id="LC1177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">streets meet.  It is enclosed by a wall of two feet high, and twenty feet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1178"></td>
        <td id="LC1178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distance from the buildings.  I had his majesty’s permission to step over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1179"></td>
        <td id="LC1179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this wall; and, the space being so wide between that and the palace, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1180"></td>
        <td id="LC1180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could easily view it on every side.  The outward court is a square of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1181"></td>
        <td id="LC1181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forty feet, and includes two other courts: in the inmost are the royal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1182"></td>
        <td id="LC1182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">apartments, which I was very desirous to see, but found it extremely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1183"></td>
        <td id="LC1183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">difficult; for the great gates, from one square into another, were but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1184"></td>
        <td id="LC1184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eighteen inches high, and seven inches wide.  Now the buildings of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1185"></td>
        <td id="LC1185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">outer court were at least five feet high, and it was impossible for me to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1186"></td>
        <td id="LC1186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stride over them without infinite damage to the pile, though the walls</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1187"></td>
        <td id="LC1187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were strongly built of hewn stone, and four inches thick.  At the same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1188"></td>
        <td id="LC1188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time the emperor had a great desire that I should see the magnificence of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1189"></td>
        <td id="LC1189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his palace; but this I was not able to do till three days after, which I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1190"></td>
        <td id="LC1190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spent in cutting down with my knife some of the largest trees in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1191"></td>
        <td id="LC1191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">royal park, about a hundred yards distant from the city.  Of these trees</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1192"></td>
        <td id="LC1192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I made two stools, each about three feet high, and strong enough to bear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1193"></td>
        <td id="LC1193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my weight.  The people having received notice a second time, I went again</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1194"></td>
        <td id="LC1194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through the city to the palace with my two stools in my hands.  When I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1195"></td>
        <td id="LC1195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came to the side of the outer court, I stood upon one stool, and took the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1196"></td>
        <td id="LC1196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other in my hand; this I lifted over the roof, and gently set it down on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1197"></td>
        <td id="LC1197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the space between the first and second court, which was eight feet wide.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1198"></td>
        <td id="LC1198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I then stept over the building very conveniently from one stool to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1199"></td>
        <td id="LC1199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other, and drew up the first after me with a hooked stick.  By this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1200"></td>
        <td id="LC1200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contrivance I got into the inmost court; and, lying down upon my side, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1201"></td>
        <td id="LC1201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">applied my face to the windows of the middle stories, which were left</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1202"></td>
        <td id="LC1202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">open on purpose, and discovered the most splendid apartments that can be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1203"></td>
        <td id="LC1203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imagined.  There I saw the empress and the young princes, in their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1204"></td>
        <td id="LC1204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several lodgings, with their chief attendants about them.  Her imperial</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1205"></td>
        <td id="LC1205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">majesty was pleased to smile very graciously upon me, and gave me out of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1206"></td>
        <td id="LC1206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the window her hand to kiss.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1207"></td>
        <td id="LC1207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1208"></td>
        <td id="LC1208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But I shall not anticipate the reader with further descriptions of this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1209"></td>
        <td id="LC1209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kind, because I reserve them for a greater work, which is now almost</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1210"></td>
        <td id="LC1210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ready for the press; containing a general description of this empire,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1216"></td>
        <td id="LC1216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">public or to myself during a residence of about nine months in that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1217"></td>
        <td id="LC1217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">empire.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1218"></td>
        <td id="LC1218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1219"></td>
        <td id="LC1219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">One morning, about a fortnight after I had obtained my liberty,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1220"></td>
        <td id="LC1220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Reldresal, principal secretary (as they style him) for private affairs,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1221"></td>
        <td id="LC1221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came to my house attended only by one servant.  He ordered his coach to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1222"></td>
        <td id="LC1222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wait at a distance, and desired I would give him an hours audience; which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1223"></td>
        <td id="LC1223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I readily consented to, on account of his quality and personal merits, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1224"></td>
        <td id="LC1224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well as of the many good offices he had done me during my solicitations</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1225"></td>
        <td id="LC1225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at court.  I offered to lie down that he might the more conveniently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1226"></td>
        <td id="LC1226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reach my ear, but he chose rather to let me hold him in my hand during</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1227"></td>
        <td id="LC1227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our conversation.  He began with compliments on my liberty; said “he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1228"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1229"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1230"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC1231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as we may appear to be in to foreigners, we labour under two mighty</td>
