      <tr>
        <td id="L1232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1232"></td>
        <td id="LC1232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evils: a violent faction at home, and the danger of an invasion, by a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1233"></td>
        <td id="LC1233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">most potent enemy, from abroad.  As to the first, you are to understand,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1234"></td>
        <td id="LC1234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that for about seventy moons past there have been two struggling parties</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1235"></td>
        <td id="LC1235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in this empire, under the names of _Tramecksan_ and _Slamecksan_, from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1236"></td>
        <td id="LC1236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the high and low heels of their shoes, by which they distinguish</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1237"></td>
        <td id="LC1237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">themselves.  It is alleged, indeed, that the high heels are most</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1238"></td>
        <td id="LC1238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">agreeable to our ancient constitution; but, however this be, his majesty</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1239"></td>

        <td id="LC1240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">government, and all offices in the gift of the crown, as you cannot but</td>

        <td id="L1242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1242"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1243"></td>
        <td id="LC1243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fourteenth part of an inch).  The animosities between these two parties</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1244"></td>
        <td id="LC1244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">run so high, that they will neither eat, nor drink, nor talk with each</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC1246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">number; but the power is wholly on our side.  We apprehend his imperial</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1247"></td>
        <td id="LC1247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">highness, the heir to the crown, to have some tendency towards the high</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1248"></td>
        <td id="LC1248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heels; at least we can plainly discover that one of his heels is higher</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1249"></td>
        <td id="LC1249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than the other, which gives him a hobble in his gait.  Now, in the midst</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1250"></td>
        <td id="LC1250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of these intestine disquiets, we are threatened with an invasion from the</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1251"></td>
        <td id="LC1251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">island of Blefuscu, which is the other great empire of the universe,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1252"></td>
        <td id="LC1252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">almost as large and powerful as this of his majesty.  For as to what we</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1254"></td>
        <td id="LC1254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">world inhabited by human creatures as large as yourself, our philosophers</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1259"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1263"></td>
        <td id="LC1263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the primitive way of breaking eggs, before we eat them, was upon the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1264"></td>

        <td id="LC1265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">going to eat an egg, and breaking it according to the ancient practice,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1266"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1267"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1296"></td>
        <td id="LC1296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us; and his imperial majesty, placing great confidence in your valour and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1297"></td>
        <td id="LC1297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strength, has commanded me to lay this account of his affairs before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1298"></td>
        <td id="LC1298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1299"></td>
        <td id="LC1299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1300"></td>
        <td id="LC1300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I desired the secretary to present my humble duty to the emperor; and to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1301"></td>
        <td id="LC1301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">let him know, “that I thought it would not become me, who was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1302"></td>
        <td id="LC1302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">foreigner, to interfere with parties; but I was ready, with the hazard of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1303"></td>
        <td id="LC1303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my life, to defend his person and state against all invaders.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1304"></td>
        <td id="LC1304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1305"></td>
        <td id="LC1305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1306"></td>
        <td id="LC1306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1307"></td>
        <td id="LC1307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER V.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1308"></td>
        <td id="LC1308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1309"></td>
        <td id="LC1309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1310"></td>
        <td id="LC1310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author, by an extraordinary stratagem, prevents an invasion.  A high</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1311"></td>
        <td id="LC1311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">title of honour is conferred upon him.  Ambassadors arrive from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1312"></td>
        <td id="LC1312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">emperor of Blefuscu, and sue for peace.  The empress’s apartment on fire</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1313"></td>
        <td id="LC1313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by an accident; the author instrumental in saving the rest of the palace.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1314"></td>
        <td id="LC1314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1315"></td>
        <td id="LC1315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The empire of Blefuscu is an island situated to the north-east of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1316"></td>
        <td id="LC1316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lilliput, from which it is parted only by a channel of eight hundred</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1317"></td>
        <td id="LC1317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yards wide.  I had not yet seen it, and upon this notice of an intended</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1318"></td>
        <td id="LC1318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">invasion, I avoided appearing on that side of the coast, for fear of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1319"></td>
        <td id="LC1319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being discovered, by some of the enemy’s ships, who had received no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1320"></td>
        <td id="LC1320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intelligence of me; all intercourse between the two empires having been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1321"></td>
        <td id="LC1321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strictly forbidden during the war, upon pain of death, and an embargo</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1322"></td>
        <td id="LC1322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laid by our emperor upon all vessels whatsoever.  I communicated to his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1323"></td>
        <td id="LC1323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">majesty a project I had formed of seizing the enemy’s whole fleet; which,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1324"></td>
        <td id="LC1324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as our scouts assured us, lay at anchor in the harbour, ready to sail</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1325"></td>
        <td id="LC1325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the first fair wind.  I consulted the most experienced seamen upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1326"></td>
        <td id="LC1326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the depth of the channel, which they had often plumbed; who told me, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1327"></td>
        <td id="LC1327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the middle, at high-water, it was seventy _glumgluffs_ deep, which is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1328"></td>
        <td id="LC1328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about six feet of European measure; and the rest of it fifty _glumgluffs_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1329"></td>
        <td id="LC1329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at most.  I walked towards the north-east coast, over against Blefuscu,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1330"></td>
        <td id="LC1330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where, lying down behind a hillock, I took out my small perspective</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1331"></td>
        <td id="LC1331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">glass, and viewed the enemy’s fleet at anchor, consisting of about fifty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1332"></td>
        <td id="LC1332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men of war, and a great number of transports: I then came back to my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1333"></td>
        <td id="LC1333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house, and gave orders (for which I had a warrant) for a great quantity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1334"></td>
        <td id="LC1334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the strongest cable and bars of iron.  The cable was about as thick as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1335"></td>
        <td id="LC1335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">packthread and the bars of the length and size of a knitting-needle.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1336"></td>
        <td id="LC1336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trebled the cable to make it stronger, and for the same reason I twisted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1337"></td>
        <td id="LC1337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">three of the iron bars together, bending the extremities into a hook.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1338"></td>
        <td id="LC1338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Having thus fixed fifty hooks to as many cables, I went back to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1339"></td>
        <td id="LC1339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">north-east coast, and putting off my coat, shoes, and stockings, walked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1340"></td>
        <td id="LC1340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into the sea, in my leathern jerkin, about half an hour before high</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1341"></td>
        <td id="LC1341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">water.  I waded with what haste I could, and swam in the middle about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1342"></td>
        <td id="LC1342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thirty yards, till I felt ground.  I arrived at the fleet in less than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1343"></td>
        <td id="LC1343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half an hour.  The enemy was so frightened when they saw me, that they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1344"></td>
        <td id="LC1344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leaped out of their ships, and swam to shore, where there could not be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1345"></td>
        <td id="LC1345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fewer than thirty thousand souls.  I then took my tackling, and,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1346"></td>
        <td id="LC1346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fastening a hook to the hole at the prow of each, I tied all the cords</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1347"></td>
        <td id="LC1347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together at the end.  While I was thus employed, the enemy discharged</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1348"></td>
        <td id="LC1348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several thousand arrows, many of which stuck in my hands and face, and,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1349"></td>
        <td id="LC1349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beside the excessive smart, gave me much disturbance in my work.  My</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1350"></td>
        <td id="LC1350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greatest apprehension was for mine eyes, which I should have infallibly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1351"></td>
        <td id="LC1351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lost, if I had not suddenly thought of an expedient.  I kept, among other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1352"></td>
        <td id="LC1352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little necessaries, a pair of spectacles in a private pocket, which, as I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1353"></td>
        <td id="LC1353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">observed before, had escaped the emperor’s searchers.  These I took out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1354"></td>
        <td id="LC1354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and fastened as strongly as I could upon my nose, and thus armed, went on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1355"></td>
        <td id="LC1355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boldly with my work, in spite of the enemy’s arrows, many of which struck</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1356"></td>
        <td id="LC1356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against the glasses of my spectacles, but without any other effect,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1357"></td>
        <td id="LC1357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">further than a little to discompose them.  I had now fastened all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1358"></td>
        <td id="LC1358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hooks, and, taking the knot in my hand, began to pull; but not a ship</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1359"></td>
        <td id="LC1359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would stir, for they were all too fast held by their anchors, so that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1360"></td>
        <td id="LC1360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boldest part of my enterprise remained.  I therefore let go the cord, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1361"></td>
        <td id="LC1361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leaving the looks fixed to the ships, I resolutely cut with my knife the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1362"></td>
        <td id="LC1362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cables that fastened the anchors, receiving about two hundred shots in my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1363"></td>
        <td id="LC1363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face and hands; then I took up the knotted end of the cables, to which my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1364"></td>
        <td id="LC1364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hooks were tied, and with great ease drew fifty of the enemy’s largest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1365"></td>
        <td id="LC1365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men of war after me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1366"></td>
        <td id="LC1366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1367"></td>
        <td id="LC1367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Blefuscudians, who had not the least imagination of what I intended,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1368"></td>
        <td id="LC1368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were at first confounded with astonishment.  They had seen me cut the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1369"></td>
        <td id="LC1369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cables, and thought my design was only to let the ships run adrift or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1370"></td>
        <td id="LC1370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fall foul on each other: but when they perceived the whole fleet moving</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1371"></td>
        <td id="LC1371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in order, and saw me pulling at the end, they set up such a scream of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1372"></td>
        <td id="LC1372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grief and despair as it is almost impossible to describe or conceive.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1373"></td>
        <td id="LC1373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I had got out of danger, I stopped awhile to pick out the arrows</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1374"></td>
        <td id="LC1374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that stuck in my hands and face; and rubbed on some of the same ointment</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1375"></td>
        <td id="LC1375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that was given me at my first arrival, as I have formerly mentioned.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1376"></td>
        <td id="LC1376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then took off my spectacles, and waiting about an hour, till the tide was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1377"></td>
        <td id="LC1377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a little fallen, I waded through the middle with my cargo, and arrived</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1378"></td>
        <td id="LC1378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">safe at the royal port of Lilliput.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1379"></td>
        <td id="LC1379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1380"></td>
        <td id="LC1380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The emperor and his whole court stood on the shore, expecting the issue</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1381"></td>
        <td id="LC1381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of this great adventure.  They saw the ships move forward in a large</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1382"></td>
        <td id="LC1382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half-moon, but could not discern me, who was up to my breast in water.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1383"></td>
        <td id="LC1383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I advanced to the middle of the channel, they were yet more in pain,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1384"></td>
        <td id="LC1384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because I was under water to my neck.  The emperor concluded me to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1385"></td>
        <td id="LC1385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drowned, and that the enemy’s fleet was approaching in a hostile manner:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1386"></td>
        <td id="LC1386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but he was soon eased of his fears; for the channel growing shallower</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1387"></td>
        <td id="LC1387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every step I made, I came in a short time within hearing, and holding up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1388"></td>
        <td id="LC1388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the end of the cable, by which the fleet was fastened, I cried in a loud</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1389"></td>
        <td id="LC1389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">voice, “Long live the most puissant king of Lilliput!”  This great prince</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1390"></td>
        <td id="LC1390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">received me at my landing with all possible encomiums, and created me a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1391"></td>
        <td id="LC1391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_nardac_ upon the spot, which is the highest title of honour among them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1392"></td>
        <td id="LC1392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1393"></td>
        <td id="LC1393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His majesty desired I would take some other opportunity of bringing all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1394"></td>
        <td id="LC1394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the rest of his enemy’s ships into his ports.  And so unmeasureable is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1395"></td>
        <td id="LC1395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the ambition of princes, that he seemed to think of nothing less than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1396"></td>
        <td id="LC1396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reducing the whole empire of Blefuscu into a province, and governing it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1397"></td>
        <td id="LC1397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by a viceroy; of destroying the Big-endian exiles, and compelling that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1398"></td>
        <td id="LC1398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people to break the smaller end of their eggs, by which he would remain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1399"></td>
        <td id="LC1399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sole monarch of the whole world.  But I endeavoured to divert him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1400"></td>
        <td id="LC1400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from this design, by many arguments drawn from the topics of policy as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1401"></td>
        <td id="LC1401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well as justice; and I plainly protested, “that I would never be an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1402"></td>
        <td id="LC1402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instrument of bringing a free and brave people into slavery.”  And, when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1403"></td>
        <td id="LC1403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the matter was debated in council, the wisest part of the ministry were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1404"></td>
        <td id="LC1404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of my opinion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1405"></td>
        <td id="LC1405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1406"></td>
        <td id="LC1406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This open bold declaration of mine was so opposite to the schemes and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1407"></td>
        <td id="LC1407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">politics of his imperial majesty, that he could never forgive me.  He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1408"></td>
        <td id="LC1408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mentioned it in a very artful manner at council, where I was told that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1409"></td>
        <td id="LC1409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some of the wisest appeared, at least by their silence, to be of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1410"></td>
        <td id="LC1410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opinion; but others, who were my secret enemies, could not forbear some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1411"></td>
        <td id="LC1411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expressions which, by a side-wind, reflected on me.  And from this time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1412"></td>
        <td id="LC1412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">began an intrigue between his majesty and a junto of ministers,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1413"></td>
        <td id="LC1413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">maliciously bent against me, which broke out in less than two months, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1414"></td>
        <td id="LC1414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had like to have ended in my utter destruction.  Of so little weight are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1415"></td>
        <td id="LC1415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the greatest services to princes, when put into the balance with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1416"></td>
        <td id="LC1416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">refusal to gratify their passions.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1417"></td>
        <td id="LC1417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1418"></td>
        <td id="LC1418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">About three weeks after this exploit, there arrived a solemn embassy from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1419"></td>
        <td id="LC1419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Blefuscu, with humble offers of a peace, which was soon concluded, upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1420"></td>
        <td id="LC1420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conditions very advantageous to our emperor, wherewith I shall not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1421"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1422"></td>
        <td id="LC1422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">five hundred persons, and their entry was very magnificent, suitable to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1423"></td>
        <td id="LC1423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the grandeur of their master, and the importance of their business.  When</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1424"></td>
        <td id="LC1424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their treaty was finished, wherein I did them several good offices by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1425"></td>
        <td id="LC1425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">credit I now had, or at least appeared to have, at court, their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1426"></td>
        <td id="LC1426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">excellencies, who were privately told how much I had been their friend,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1427"></td>
        <td id="LC1427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made me a visit in form.  They began with many compliments upon my valour</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1428"></td>
        <td id="LC1428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and generosity, invited me to that kingdom in the emperor their master’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1429"></td>
        <td id="LC1429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">name, and desired me to show them some proofs of my prodigious strength,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1430"></td>
        <td id="LC1430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of which they had heard so many wonders; wherein I readily obliged them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1431"></td>
        <td id="LC1431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but shall not trouble the reader with the particulars.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1432"></td>
        <td id="LC1432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1433"></td>
        <td id="LC1433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I had for some time entertained their excellencies, to their</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1434"></td>
        <td id="LC1434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">infinite satisfaction and surprise, I desired they would do me the honour</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1435"></td>
        <td id="LC1435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to present my most humble respects to the emperor their master, the</td>

        <td id="LC1436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">renown of whose virtues had so justly filled the whole world with</td>

        <td id="LC1437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">admiration, and whose royal person I resolved to attend, before I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1438"></td>
        <td id="LC1438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">returned to my own country.  Accordingly, the next time I had the honour</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1439"></td>
        <td id="LC1439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to see our emperor, I desired his general license to wait on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1440"></td>
        <td id="LC1440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Blefuscudian monarch, which he was pleased to grant me, as I could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1441"></td>
        <td id="LC1441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perceive, in a very cold manner; but could not guess the reason, till I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1442"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1443"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1444"></td>
        <td id="LC1444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disaffection;” from which I am sure my heart was wholly free.  And this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1445"></td>
        <td id="LC1445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was the first time I began to conceive some imperfect idea of courts and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1446"></td>
        <td id="LC1446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ministers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1447"></td>
        <td id="LC1447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1448"></td>
        <td id="LC1448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is to be observed, that these ambassadors spoke to me, by an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1449"></td>
        <td id="LC1449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interpreter, the languages of both empires differing as much from each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1450"></td>
        <td id="LC1450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other as any two in Europe, and each nation priding itself upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1451"></td>
        <td id="LC1451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">antiquity, beauty, and energy of their own tongue, with an avowed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1452"></td>
        <td id="LC1452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contempt for that of their neighbour; yet our emperor, standing upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1453"></td>
        <td id="LC1453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advantage he had got by the seizure of their fleet, obliged them to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1454"></td>
        <td id="LC1454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deliver their credentials, and make their speech, in the Lilliputian</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1455"></td>
        <td id="LC1455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tongue.  And it must be confessed, that from the great intercourse of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1456"></td>
        <td id="LC1456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trade and commerce between both realms, from the continual reception of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1457"></td>
        <td id="LC1457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exiles which is mutual among them, and from the custom, in each empire,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1458"></td>
        <td id="LC1458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to send their young nobility and richer gentry to the other, in order to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1459"></td>
        <td id="LC1459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">polish themselves by seeing the world, and understanding men and manners;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1460"></td>
        <td id="LC1460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there are few persons of distinction, or merchants, or seamen, who dwell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1461"></td>
        <td id="LC1461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the maritime parts, but what can hold conversation in both tongues; as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1462"></td>
        <td id="LC1462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I found some weeks after, when I went to pay my respects to the emperor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1463"></td>
        <td id="LC1463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of Blefuscu, which, in the midst of great misfortunes, through the malice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1464"></td>
        <td id="LC1464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of my enemies, proved a very happy adventure to me, as I shall relate in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1465"></td>
        <td id="LC1465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">its proper place.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1466"></td>
        <td id="LC1466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1467"></td>
        <td id="LC1467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The reader may remember, that when I signed those articles upon which I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1468"></td>
        <td id="LC1468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recovered my liberty, there were some which I disliked, upon account of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1469"></td>
        <td id="LC1469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their being too servile; neither could anything but an extreme necessity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1470"></td>
        <td id="LC1470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have forced me to submit.  But being now a _nardac_ of the highest rank</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1471"></td>
        <td id="LC1471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in that empire, such offices were looked upon as below my dignity, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1472"></td>
        <td id="LC1472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the emperor (to do him justice), never once mentioned them to me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1473"></td>
        <td id="LC1473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">However, it was not long before I had an opportunity of doing his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1474"></td>
        <td id="LC1474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">majesty, at least as I then thought, a most signal service.  I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1475"></td>
        <td id="LC1475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alarmed at midnight with the cries of many hundred people at my door; by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1476"></td>
        <td id="LC1476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which, being suddenly awaked, I was in some kind of terror.  I heard the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1477"></td>
        <td id="LC1477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">word _Burglum_ repeated incessantly: several of the emperor’s court,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1478"></td>
        <td id="LC1478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">making their way through the crowd, entreated me to come immediately to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1479"></td>
        <td id="LC1479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the palace, where her imperial majesty’s apartment was on fire, by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1480"></td>
        <td id="LC1480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carelessness of a maid of honour, who fell asleep while she was reading a</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC1487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with them as fast as they could: but the flame was so violent that they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1488"></td>

        <td id="L1489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1489"></td>

        <td id="L1504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1504"></td>

        <td id="L1520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1520"></td>
        <td id="LC1520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER VI.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1521"></td>
        <td id="LC1521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1522"></td>
        <td id="LC1522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1523"></td>
        <td id="LC1523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of the inhabitants of Lilliput; their learning, laws, and customs; the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1524"></td>
        <td id="LC1524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manner of educating their children.  The author’s way of living in that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1525"></td>
        <td id="LC1525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">country.  His vindication of a great lady.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1526"></td>
        <td id="LC1526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1527"></td>
        <td id="LC1527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Although I intend to leave the description of this empire to a particular</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1528"></td>
        <td id="LC1528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">treatise, yet, in the mean time, I am content to gratify the curious</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1529"></td>
        <td id="LC1529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reader with some general ideas.  As the common size of the natives is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1530"></td>
        <td id="LC1530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">somewhat under six inches high, so there is an exact proportion in all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1531"></td>
        <td id="LC1531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other animals, as well as plants and trees: for instance, the tallest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1532"></td>
        <td id="LC1532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horses and oxen are between four and five inches in height, the sheep an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1533"></td>
        <td id="LC1533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inch and half, more or less: their geese about the bigness of a sparrow,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1534"></td>
        <td id="LC1534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and so the several gradations downwards till you come to the smallest,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1535"></td>
        <td id="LC1535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which to my sight, were almost invisible; but nature has adapted the eyes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1536"></td>
        <td id="LC1536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the Lilliputians to all objects proper for their view: they see with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1537"></td>
        <td id="LC1537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great exactness, but at no great distance.  And, to show the sharpness of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1538"></td>
        <td id="LC1538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their sight towards objects that are near, I have been much pleased with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1539"></td>
        <td id="LC1539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">observing a cook pulling a lark, which was not so large as a common fly;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1540"></td>
        <td id="LC1540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a young girl threading an invisible needle with invisible silk.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1541"></td>
        <td id="LC1541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Their tallest trees are about seven feet high: I mean some of those in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1542"></td>
        <td id="LC1542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the great royal park, the tops whereof I could but just reach with my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1543"></td>
        <td id="LC1543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fist clenched.  The other vegetables are in the same proportion; but this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1544"></td>
        <td id="LC1544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I leave to the reader’s imagination.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1545"></td>
        <td id="LC1545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1546"></td>
        <td id="LC1546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I shall say but little at present of their learning, which, for many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1547"></td>
        <td id="LC1547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ages, has flourished in all its branches among them: but their manner of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1548"></td>
        <td id="LC1548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">writing is very peculiar, being neither from the left to the right, like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1549"></td>
        <td id="LC1549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Europeans, nor from the right to the left, like the Arabians, nor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1550"></td>
        <td id="LC1550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from up to down, like the Chinese, but aslant, from one corner of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1551"></td>
        <td id="LC1551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">paper to the other, like ladies in England.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1552"></td>
        <td id="LC1552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1553"></td>
        <td id="LC1553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They bury their dead with their heads directly downward, because they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1554"></td>
        <td id="LC1554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hold an opinion, that in eleven thousand moons they are all to rise</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1555"></td>
        <td id="LC1555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again; in which period the earth (which they conceive to be flat) will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1556"></td>
        <td id="LC1556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turn upside down, and by this means they shall, at their resurrection, be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1557"></td>
        <td id="LC1557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found ready standing on their feet.  The learned among them confess the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1558"></td>
        <td id="LC1558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">absurdity of this doctrine; but the practice still continues, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1559"></td>
        <td id="LC1559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">compliance to the vulgar.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1560"></td>
        <td id="LC1560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1561"></td>
        <td id="LC1561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There are some laws and customs in this empire very peculiar; and if they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1562"></td>
        <td id="LC1562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were not so directly contrary to those of my own dear country, I should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1563"></td>
        <td id="LC1563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be tempted to say a little in their justification.  It is only to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1564"></td>
        <td id="LC1564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wished they were as well executed.  The first I shall mention, relates to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1565"></td>
        <td id="LC1565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">informers.  All crimes against the state, are punished here with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1566"></td>
        <td id="LC1566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">utmost severity; but, if the person accused makes his innocence plainly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1567"></td>
        <td id="LC1567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to appear upon his trial, the accuser is immediately put to an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1568"></td>
        <td id="LC1568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ignominious death; and out of his goods or lands the innocent person is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1751"></td>
        <td id="LC1751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">linen for my bed and table, all of the strongest and coarsest kind they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1752"></td>
        <td id="LC1752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could get; which, however, they were forced to quilt together in several</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1753"></td>
        <td id="LC1753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">folds, for the thickest was some degrees finer than lawn.  Their linen is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1754"></td>
        <td id="LC1754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">usually three inches wide, and three feet make a piece.  The sempstresses</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1755"></td>
        <td id="LC1755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">took my measure as I lay on the ground, one standing at my neck, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1756"></td>
        <td id="LC1756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another at my mid-leg, with a strong cord extended, that each held by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1757"></td>
        <td id="LC1757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">end, while a third measured the length of the cord with a rule of an inch</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1758"></td>
        <td id="LC1758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long.  Then they measured my right thumb, and desired no more; for by a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1759"></td>
        <td id="LC1759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mathematical computation, that twice round the thumb is once round the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1760"></td>
        <td id="LC1760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrist, and so on to the neck and the waist, and by the help of my old</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1761"></td>
        <td id="LC1761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shirt, which I displayed on the ground before them for a pattern, they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1762"></td>
        <td id="LC1762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fitted me exactly.  Three hundred tailors were employed in the same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1763"></td>
        <td id="LC1763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manner to make me clothes; but they had another contrivance for taking my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1764"></td>
        <td id="LC1764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">measure.  I kneeled down, and they raised a ladder from the ground to my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1765"></td>
        <td id="LC1765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neck; upon this ladder one of them mounted, and let fall a plumb-line</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1766"></td>
        <td id="LC1766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from my collar to the floor, which just answered the length of my coat:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1767"></td>
        <td id="LC1767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but my waist and arms I measured myself.  When my clothes were finished,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1768"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1770"></td>
        <td id="LC1770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">England, only that mine were all of a colour.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1771"></td>
        <td id="LC1771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1772"></td>
        <td id="LC1772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had three hundred cooks to dress my victuals, in little convenient huts</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1773"></td>

        <td id="L1778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1778"></td>
        <td id="LC1778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very ingenious manner, by certain cords, as we draw the bucket up a well</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1779"></td>
        <td id="LC1779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in Europe.  A dish of their meat was a good mouthful, and a barrel of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1780"></td>
        <td id="LC1780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their liquor a reasonable draught.  Their mutton yields to ours, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC1781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their beef is excellent.  I have had a sirloin so large, that I have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1782"></td>
        <td id="LC1782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forced to make three bites of it; but this is rare.  My servants were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1783"></td>
        <td id="LC1783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">astonished to see me eat it, bones and all, as in our country we do the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1784"></td>
        <td id="LC1784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leg of a lark.  Their geese and turkeys I usually ate at a mouthful, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1785"></td>

        <td id="L1786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1786"></td>
        <td id="LC1786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">twenty or thirty at the end of my knife.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1787"></td>
        <td id="LC1787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1788"></td>
        <td id="LC1788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">One day his imperial majesty, being informed of my way of living, desired</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1791"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1792"></td>
        <td id="LC1792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of state, upon my table, just over against me, with their guards about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1793"></td>
        <td id="LC1793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them.  Flimnap, the lord high treasurer, attended there likewise with his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1794"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1795"></td>
        <td id="LC1795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">countenance, which I would not seem to regard, but ate more than usual,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1796"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1798"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1799"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1800"></td>
        <td id="LC1800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">outwardly caressed me more than was usual to the moroseness of his</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC1802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">treasury; that he was forced to take up money at a great discount; that</td>

        <td id="L1803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1803"></td>
        <td id="LC1803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exchequer bills would not circulate under nine per cent. below par; that</td>

        <td id="L1804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1804"></td>

        <td id="LC1807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of dismissing me.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1808"></td>
        <td id="LC1808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1809"></td>
        <td id="LC1809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am here obliged to vindicate the reputation of an excellent lady, who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1810"></td>
        <td id="LC1810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was an innocent sufferer upon my account.  The treasurer took a fancy to</td>

        <td id="L1811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1811"></td>
        <td id="LC1811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be jealous of his wife, from the malice of some evil tongues, who</td>

        <td id="L1812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1812"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1813"></td>
        <td id="LC1813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the court scandal ran for some time, that she once came privately to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1814"></td>
        <td id="LC1814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my lodging.  This I solemnly declare to be a most infamous falsehood,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1815"></td>
        <td id="LC1815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without any grounds, further than that her grace was pleased to treat me</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1816"></td>
        <td id="LC1816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with all innocent marks of freedom and friendship.  I own she came often</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1817"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1818"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1821"></td>

        <td id="L1824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1824"></td>

        <td id="LC1826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">table, where I had fixed a movable rim quite round, of five inches high,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1827"></td>
        <td id="LC1827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to prevent accidents.  And I have often had four coaches and horses at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1828"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1829"></td>
