      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1830"></td>
        <td id="LC1830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would gently drive the others round my table.  I have passed many an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1831"></td>
        <td id="LC1831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afternoon very agreeably in these conversations.  But I defy the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1832"></td>
        <td id="LC1832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">treasurer, or his two informers (I will name them, and let them make the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1833"></td>
        <td id="LC1833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">best of it) Clustril and Drunlo, to prove that any person ever came to me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1834"></td>
        <td id="LC1834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_incognito_, except the secretary Reldresal, who was sent by express</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1835"></td>
        <td id="LC1835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">command of his imperial majesty, as I have before related.  I should not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1836"></td>
        <td id="LC1836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have dwelt so long upon this particular, if it had not been a point</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1837"></td>
        <td id="LC1837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wherein the reputation of a great lady is so nearly concerned, to say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1838"></td>
        <td id="LC1838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing of my own; though I then had the honour to be a _nardac_, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1839"></td>
        <td id="LC1839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the treasurer himself is not; for all the world knows, that he is only a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1840"></td>
        <td id="LC1840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_glumglum_, a title inferior by one degree, as that of a marquis is to a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1841"></td>
        <td id="LC1841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">duke in England; yet I allow he preceded me in right of his post.  These</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1842"></td>
        <td id="LC1842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">false informations, which I afterwards came to the knowledge of by an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1843"></td>
        <td id="LC1843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accident not proper to mention, made the treasurer show his lady for some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1844"></td>
        <td id="LC1844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time an ill countenance, and me a worse; and although he was at last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1845"></td>
        <td id="LC1845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">undeceived and reconciled to her, yet I lost all credit with him, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1846"></td>
        <td id="LC1846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found my interest decline very fast with the emperor himself, who was,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1847"></td>
        <td id="LC1847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">indeed, too much governed by that favourite.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1848"></td>
        <td id="LC1848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1849"></td>
        <td id="LC1849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1850"></td>
        <td id="LC1850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1851"></td>
        <td id="LC1851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER VII.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1852"></td>
        <td id="LC1852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1853"></td>
        <td id="LC1853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1854"></td>
        <td id="LC1854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author, being informed of a design to accuse him of high-treason,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1855"></td>
        <td id="LC1855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">makes his escape to Blefuscu.  His reception there.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1856"></td>
        <td id="LC1856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1857"></td>
        <td id="LC1857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Before I proceed to give an account of my leaving this kingdom, it may be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1858"></td>
        <td id="LC1858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proper to inform the reader of a private intrigue which had been for two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1859"></td>
        <td id="LC1859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">months forming against me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1860"></td>
        <td id="LC1860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1861"></td>
        <td id="LC1861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had been hitherto, all my life, a stranger to courts, for which I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1862"></td>
        <td id="LC1862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unqualified by the meanness of my condition.  I had indeed heard and read</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1863"></td>
        <td id="LC1863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough of the dispositions of great princes and ministers, but never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1864"></td>
        <td id="LC1864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expected to have found such terrible effects of them, in so remote a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1865"></td>
        <td id="LC1865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">country, governed, as I thought, by very different maxims from those in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1866"></td>
        <td id="LC1866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Europe.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1867"></td>
        <td id="LC1867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1868"></td>
        <td id="LC1868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I was just preparing to pay my attendance on the emperor of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1869"></td>
        <td id="LC1869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Blefuscu, a considerable person at court (to whom I had been very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1870"></td>
        <td id="LC1870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">serviceable, at a time when he lay under the highest displeasure of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1871"></td>
        <td id="LC1871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imperial majesty) came to my house very privately at night, in a close</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1872"></td>
        <td id="LC1872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chair, and, without sending his name, desired admittance.  The chairmen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1873"></td>
        <td id="LC1873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were dismissed; I put the chair, with his lordship in it, into my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1874"></td>
        <td id="LC1874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coat-pocket: and, giving orders to a trusty servant, to say I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1875"></td>
        <td id="LC1875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">indisposed and gone to sleep, I fastened the door of my house, placed the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1876"></td>
        <td id="LC1876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chair on the table, according to my usual custom, and sat down by it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1877"></td>
        <td id="LC1877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After the common salutations were over, observing his lordship’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1878"></td>
        <td id="LC1878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">countenance full of concern, and inquiring into the reason, he desired “I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1879"></td>
        <td id="LC1879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would hear him with patience, in a matter that highly concerned my honour</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1880"></td>
        <td id="LC1880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and my life.”  His speech was to the following effect, for I took notes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1881"></td>
        <td id="LC1881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of it as soon as he left me:—</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1882"></td>
        <td id="LC1882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1883"></td>
        <td id="LC1883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You are to know,” said he, “that several committees of council have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1884"></td>
        <td id="LC1884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lately called, in the most private manner, on your account; and it is but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1885"></td>
        <td id="LC1885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two days since his majesty came to a full resolution.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1886"></td>
        <td id="LC1886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1887"></td>
        <td id="LC1887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You are very sensible that Skyresh Bolgolam” (_galbet_, or high-admiral)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1888"></td>
        <td id="LC1888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“has been your mortal enemy, almost ever since your arrival.  His</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1889"></td>
        <td id="LC1889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">original reasons I know not; but his hatred is increased since your great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1890"></td>
        <td id="LC1890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">success against Blefuscu, by which his glory as admiral is much obscured.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1891"></td>
        <td id="LC1891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This lord, in conjunction with Flimnap the high-treasurer, whose enmity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1892"></td>
        <td id="LC1892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against you is notorious on account of his lady, Limtoc the general,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1893"></td>
        <td id="LC1893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lalcon the chamberlain, and Balmuff the grand justiciary, have prepared</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1894"></td>
        <td id="LC1894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">articles of impeachment against you, for treason and other capital</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1895"></td>
        <td id="LC1895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crimes.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1896"></td>
        <td id="LC1896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1897"></td>
        <td id="LC1897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This preface made me so impatient, being conscious of my own merits and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1898"></td>
        <td id="LC1898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">innocence, that I was going to interrupt him; when he entreated me to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1899"></td>
        <td id="LC1899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silent, and thus proceeded:—</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1900"></td>
        <td id="LC1900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1901"></td>
        <td id="LC1901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Out of gratitude for the favours you have done me, I procured</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1902"></td>
        <td id="LC1902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">information of the whole proceedings, and a copy of the articles; wherein</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1903"></td>
        <td id="LC1903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I venture my head for your service.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1904"></td>
        <td id="LC1904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1905"></td>
        <td id="LC1905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    “‘_Articles of Impeachment against_ QUINBUS FLESTRIN, (_the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1906"></td>
        <td id="LC1906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Man-Mountain_.)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1907"></td>
        <td id="LC1907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1908"></td>
        <td id="LC1908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    ARTICLE I.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1909"></td>
        <td id="LC1909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1910"></td>
        <td id="LC1910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    “‘Whereas, by a statute made in the reign of his imperial majesty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1911"></td>
        <td id="LC1911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Calin Deffar Plune, it is enacted, that, whoever shall make water</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1912"></td>
        <td id="LC1912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    within the precincts of the royal palace, shall be liable to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1913"></td>
        <td id="LC1913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    pains and penalties of high-treason; notwithstanding, the said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1914"></td>
        <td id="LC1914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Quinbus Flestrin, in open breach of the said law, under colour of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1915"></td>
        <td id="LC1915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    extinguishing the fire kindled in the apartment of his majesty’s most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1916"></td>
        <td id="LC1916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    dear imperial consort, did maliciously, traitorously, and devilishly,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1917"></td>
        <td id="LC1917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    by discharge of his urine, put out the said fire kindled in the said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1918"></td>
        <td id="LC1918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    apartment, lying and being within the precincts of the said royal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1919"></td>
        <td id="LC1919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    palace, against the statute in that case provided, etc. against the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1920"></td>
        <td id="LC1920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    duty, etc.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1921"></td>
        <td id="LC1921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1922"></td>
        <td id="LC1922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    ARTICLE II.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1923"></td>
        <td id="LC1923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1924"></td>
        <td id="LC1924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    “‘That the said Quinbus Flestrin, having brought the imperial fleet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1925"></td>
        <td id="LC1925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    of Blefuscu into the royal port, and being afterwards commanded by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1926"></td>
        <td id="LC1926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    his imperial majesty to seize all the other ships of the said empire</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1927"></td>
        <td id="LC1927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    of Blefuscu, and reduce that empire to a province, to be governed by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1928"></td>
        <td id="LC1928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    a viceroy from hence, and to destroy and put to death, not only all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1929"></td>
        <td id="LC1929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    the Big-endian exiles, but likewise all the people of that empire who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1930"></td>
        <td id="LC1930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    would not immediately forsake the Big-endian heresy, he, the said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1931"></td>
        <td id="LC1931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Flestrin, like a false traitor against his most auspicious, serene,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1932"></td>
        <td id="LC1932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    imperial majesty, did petition to be excused from the said service,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1933"></td>
        <td id="LC1933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    upon pretence of unwillingness to force the consciences, or destroy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1934"></td>
        <td id="LC1934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    the liberties and lives of an innocent people.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1935"></td>
        <td id="LC1935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1936"></td>
        <td id="LC1936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    ARTICLE III.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1937"></td>
        <td id="LC1937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1938"></td>
        <td id="LC1938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    “‘That, whereas certain ambassadors arrived from the Court of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1939"></td>
        <td id="LC1939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Blefuscu, to sue for peace in his majesty’s court, he, the said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1940"></td>
        <td id="LC1940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Flestrin, did, like a false traitor, aid, abet, comfort, and divert,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1941"></td>
        <td id="LC1941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    the said ambassadors, although he knew them to be servants to a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1942"></td>
        <td id="LC1942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    prince who was lately an open enemy to his imperial majesty, and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1943"></td>
        <td id="LC1943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    an open war against his said majesty.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1944"></td>
        <td id="LC1944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1945"></td>
        <td id="LC1945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    ARTICLE IV.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1946"></td>
        <td id="LC1946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1947"></td>
        <td id="LC1947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    “‘That the said Quinbus Flestrin, contrary to the duty of a faithful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1948"></td>
        <td id="LC1948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    subject, is now preparing to make a voyage to the court and empire of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1949"></td>
        <td id="LC1949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Blefuscu, for which he has received only verbal license from his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1950"></td>
        <td id="LC1950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    imperial majesty; and, under colour of the said license, does falsely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1951"></td>
        <td id="LC1951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    and traitorously intend to take the said voyage, and thereby to aid,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1952"></td>
        <td id="LC1952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    comfort, and abet the emperor of Blefuscu, so lately an enemy, and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1953"></td>
        <td id="LC1953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    open war with his imperial majesty aforesaid.’</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1954"></td>
        <td id="LC1954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1955"></td>
        <td id="LC1955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There are some other articles; but these are the most important, of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1956"></td>
        <td id="LC1956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which I have read you an abstract.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1957"></td>
        <td id="LC1957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1958"></td>
        <td id="LC1958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“In the several debates upon this impeachment, it must be confessed that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1959"></td>
        <td id="LC1959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his majesty gave many marks of his great lenity; often urging the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1960"></td>
        <td id="LC1960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">services you had done him, and endeavouring to extenuate your crimes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1961"></td>
        <td id="LC1961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The treasurer and admiral insisted that you should be put to the most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1962"></td>
        <td id="LC1962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">painful and ignominious death, by setting fire to your house at night,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1963"></td>
        <td id="LC1963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the general was to attend with twenty thousand men, armed with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1964"></td>
        <td id="LC1964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poisoned arrows, to shoot you on the face and hands.  Some of your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1965"></td>
        <td id="LC1965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">servants were to have private orders to strew a poisonous juice on your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1966"></td>
        <td id="LC1966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shirts and sheets, which would soon make you tear your own flesh, and die</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1967"></td>
        <td id="LC1967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the utmost torture.  The general came into the same opinion; so that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1968"></td>
        <td id="LC1968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for a long time there was a majority against you; but his majesty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1969"></td>
        <td id="LC1969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resolving, if possible, to spare your life, at last brought off the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1970"></td>
        <td id="LC1970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chamberlain.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1971"></td>
        <td id="LC1971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1972"></td>
        <td id="LC1972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Upon this incident, Reldresal, principal secretary for private affairs,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1973"></td>
        <td id="LC1973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who always approved himself your true friend, was commanded by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1974"></td>
        <td id="LC1974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">emperor to deliver his opinion, which he accordingly did; and therein</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1975"></td>
        <td id="LC1975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justified the good thoughts you have of him.  He allowed your crimes to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1976"></td>
        <td id="LC1976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be great, but that still there was room for mercy, the most commendable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1977"></td>
        <td id="LC1977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">virtue in a prince, and for which his majesty was so justly celebrated.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1978"></td>
        <td id="LC1978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He said, the friendship between you and him was so well known to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1979"></td>
        <td id="LC1979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">world, that perhaps the most honourable board might think him partial;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1980"></td>
        <td id="LC1980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, in obedience to the command he had received, he would freely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1981"></td>
        <td id="LC1981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">offer his sentiments.  That if his majesty, in consideration of your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1982"></td>
        <td id="LC1982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">services, and pursuant to his own merciful disposition, would please to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1983"></td>
        <td id="LC1983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spare your life, and only give orders to put out both your eyes, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1984"></td>
        <td id="LC1984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">humbly conceived, that by this expedient justice might in some measure be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1985"></td>
        <td id="LC1985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">satisfied, and all the world would applaud the lenity of the emperor, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1986"></td>
        <td id="LC1986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well as the fair and generous proceedings of those who have the honour to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1987"></td>
        <td id="LC1987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be his counsellors.  That the loss of your eyes would be no impediment to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1988"></td>
        <td id="LC1988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your bodily strength, by which you might still be useful to his majesty;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1989"></td>
        <td id="LC1989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that blindness is an addition to courage, by concealing dangers from us;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1990"></td>
        <td id="LC1990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the fear you had for your eyes, was the greatest difficulty in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1991"></td>
        <td id="LC1991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bringing over the enemy’s fleet, and it would be sufficient for you to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1992"></td>
        <td id="LC1992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see by the eyes of the ministers, since the greatest princes do no more.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1993"></td>
        <td id="LC1993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1994"></td>
        <td id="LC1994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“This proposal was received with the utmost disapprobation by the whole</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1995"></td>
        <td id="LC1995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">board.  Bolgolam, the admiral, could not preserve his temper, but, rising</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1996"></td>
        <td id="LC1996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up in fury, said, he wondered how the secretary durst presume to give his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1997"></td>
        <td id="LC1997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opinion for preserving the life of a traitor; that the services you had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1998"></td>
        <td id="LC1998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">performed were, by all true reasons of state, the great aggravation of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1999"></td>
        <td id="LC1999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your crimes; that you, who were able to extinguish the fire by discharge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2000"></td>
        <td id="LC2000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of urine in her majesty’s apartment (which he mentioned with horror),</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2001"></td>
        <td id="LC2001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might, at another time, raise an inundation by the same means, to drown</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2002"></td>
        <td id="LC2002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the whole palace; and the same strength which enabled you to bring over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2003"></td>
        <td id="LC2003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the enemy’s fleet, might serve, upon the first discontent, to carry it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2004"></td>
        <td id="LC2004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back; that he had good reasons to think you were a Big-endian in your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2005"></td>
        <td id="LC2005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heart; and, as treason begins in the heart, before it appears in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2006"></td>
        <td id="LC2006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">overt-acts, so he accused you as a traitor on that account, and therefore</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2007"></td>
        <td id="LC2007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">insisted you should be put to death.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2008"></td>
        <td id="LC2008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2009"></td>
        <td id="LC2009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The treasurer was of the same opinion: he showed to what straits his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2010"></td>
        <td id="LC2010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">majesty’s revenue was reduced, by the charge of maintaining you, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2011"></td>
        <td id="LC2011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would soon grow insupportable; that the secretary’s expedient of putting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2012"></td>
        <td id="LC2012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out your eyes, was so far from being a remedy against this evil, that it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2013"></td>
        <td id="LC2013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would probably increase it, as is manifest from the common practice of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2014"></td>
        <td id="LC2014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blinding some kind of fowls, after which they fed the faster, and grew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2015"></td>
        <td id="LC2015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sooner fat; that his sacred majesty and the council, who are your judges,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2016"></td>
        <td id="LC2016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were, in their own consciences, fully convinced of your guilt, which was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2017"></td>
        <td id="LC2017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a sufficient argument to condemn you to death, without the formal proofs</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2018"></td>
        <td id="LC2018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">required by the strict letter of the law.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2019"></td>
        <td id="LC2019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2020"></td>
        <td id="LC2020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But his imperial majesty, fully determined against capital punishment,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2021"></td>
        <td id="LC2021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was graciously pleased to say, that since the council thought the loss of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2022"></td>
        <td id="LC2022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your eyes too easy a censure, some other way may be inflicted hereafter.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2023"></td>
        <td id="LC2023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And your friend the secretary, humbly desiring to be heard again, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2024"></td>
        <td id="LC2024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answer to what the treasurer had objected, concerning the great charge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2025"></td>
        <td id="LC2025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his majesty was at in maintaining you, said, that his excellency, who had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2026"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2114"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2116"></td>
        <td id="LC2116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in any fright or concern.  I lay on the ground to kiss his majesty’s and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2117"></td>
        <td id="LC2117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the empress’s hands.  I told his majesty, “that I was come according to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2118"></td>
        <td id="LC2118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my promise, and with the license of the emperor my master, to have the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2119"></td>
        <td id="LC2119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">honour of seeing so mighty a monarch, and to offer him any service in my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2120"></td>
        <td id="LC2120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">power, consistent with my duty to my own prince;” not mentioning a word</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2121"></td>
        <td id="LC2121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of my disgrace, because I had hitherto no regular information of it, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2122"></td>
        <td id="LC2122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might suppose myself wholly ignorant of any such design; neither could I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2123"></td>
        <td id="LC2123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reasonably conceive that the emperor would discover the secret, while I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2124"></td>
        <td id="LC2124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was out of his power; wherein, however, it soon appeared I was deceived.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2125"></td>
        <td id="LC2125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2126"></td>
        <td id="LC2126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I shall not trouble the reader with the particular account of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2127"></td>
        <td id="LC2127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reception at this court, which was suitable to the generosity of so great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2128"></td>
        <td id="LC2128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a prince; nor of the difficulties I was in for want of a house and bed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2129"></td>
        <td id="LC2129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being forced to lie on the ground, wrapped up in my coverlet.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2130"></td>
        <td id="LC2130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2131"></td>
        <td id="LC2131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2132"></td>
        <td id="LC2132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2133"></td>
        <td id="LC2133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER VIII.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2134"></td>
        <td id="LC2134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2135"></td>
        <td id="LC2135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2136"></td>
        <td id="LC2136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author, by a lucky accident, finds means to leave Blefuscu; and,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2137"></td>
        <td id="LC2137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after some difficulties, returns safe to his native country.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2138"></td>
        <td id="LC2138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2139"></td>
        <td id="LC2139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Three days after my arrival, walking out of curiosity to the north-east</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2140"></td>
        <td id="LC2140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coast of the island, I observed, about half a league off in the sea,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2141"></td>
        <td id="LC2141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">somewhat that looked like a boat overturned.  I pulled off my shoes and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2142"></td>
        <td id="LC2142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stockings, and, wailing two or three hundred yards, I found the object to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2143"></td>
        <td id="LC2143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">approach nearer by force of the tide; and then plainly saw it to be a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2144"></td>
        <td id="LC2144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">real boat, which I supposed might by some tempest have been driven from a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2145"></td>
        <td id="LC2145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ship.  Whereupon, I returned immediately towards the city, and desired</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2146"></td>
        <td id="LC2146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his imperial majesty to lend me twenty of the tallest vessels he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2147"></td>
        <td id="LC2147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">left, after the loss of his fleet, and three thousand seamen, under the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2148"></td>
        <td id="LC2148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">command of his vice-admiral.  This fleet sailed round, while I went back</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2149"></td>
        <td id="LC2149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the shortest way to the coast, where I first discovered the boat.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2150"></td>
        <td id="LC2150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found the tide had driven it still nearer.  The seamen were all provided</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2151"></td>
        <td id="LC2151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with cordage, which I had beforehand twisted to a sufficient strength.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2152"></td>
        <td id="LC2152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the ships came up, I stripped myself, and waded till I came within a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2153"></td>
        <td id="LC2153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hundred yards off the boat, after which I was forced to swim till I got</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2154"></td>
        <td id="LC2154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up to it.  The seamen threw me the end of the cord, which I fastened to a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2155"></td>
        <td id="LC2155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hole in the fore-part of the boat, and the other end to a man of war; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2156"></td>
        <td id="LC2156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I found all my labour to little purpose; for, being out of my depth, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2157"></td>
        <td id="LC2157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was not able to work.  In this necessity I was forced to swim behind, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2158"></td>
        <td id="LC2158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">push the boat forward, as often as I could, with one of my hands; and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2159"></td>
        <td id="LC2159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tide favouring me, I advanced so far that I could just hold up my chin</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2160"></td>
        <td id="LC2160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and feel the ground.  I rested two or three minutes, and then gave the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2161"></td>
        <td id="LC2161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boat another shove, and so on, till the sea was no higher than my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2162"></td>
        <td id="LC2162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arm-pits; and now, the most laborious part being over, I took out my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2163"></td>
        <td id="LC2163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other cables, which were stowed in one of the ships, and fastened them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2164"></td>
        <td id="LC2164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first to the boat, and then to nine of the vessels which attended me; the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2165"></td>
        <td id="LC2165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wind being favourable, the seamen towed, and I shoved, until we arrived</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2166"></td>
        <td id="LC2166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">within forty yards of the shore; and, waiting till the tide was out, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2167"></td>
        <td id="LC2167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got dry to the boat, and by the assistance of two thousand men, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2168"></td>
        <td id="LC2168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ropes and engines, I made a shift to turn it on its bottom, and found it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2169"></td>
        <td id="LC2169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was but little damaged.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2170"></td>
        <td id="LC2170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2171"></td>
        <td id="LC2171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I shall not trouble the reader with the difficulties I was under, by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2172"></td>
        <td id="LC2172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">help of certain paddles, which cost me ten days making, to get my boat to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2173"></td>
        <td id="LC2173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the royal port of Blefuscu, where a mighty concourse of people appeared</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2174"></td>
        <td id="LC2174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon my arrival, full of wonder at the sight of so prodigious a vessel.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2175"></td>
        <td id="LC2175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I told the emperor “that my good fortune had thrown this boat in my way,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2176"></td>
        <td id="LC2176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to carry me to some place whence I might return into my native country;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2177"></td>
        <td id="LC2177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and begged his majesty’s orders for getting materials to fit it up,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2178"></td>
        <td id="LC2178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together with his license to depart;” which, after some kind</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2179"></td>
        <td id="LC2179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expostulations, he was pleased to grant.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2180"></td>
        <td id="LC2180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2181"></td>
        <td id="LC2181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I did very much wonder, in all this time, not to have heard of any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2182"></td>
        <td id="LC2182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">express relating to me from our emperor to the court of Blefuscu.  But I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2183"></td>
        <td id="LC2183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was afterward given privately to understand, that his imperial majesty,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2184"></td>
        <td id="LC2184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never imagining I had the least notice of his designs, believed I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2185"></td>
        <td id="LC2185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only gone to Blefuscu in performance of my promise, according to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2186"></td>
        <td id="LC2186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">license he had given me, which was well known at our court, and would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2187"></td>
        <td id="LC2187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">return in a few days, when the ceremony was ended.  But he was at last in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2188"></td>
        <td id="LC2188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pain at my long absence; and after consulting with the treasurer and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2189"></td>
        <td id="LC2189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rest of that cabal, a person of quality was dispatched with the copy of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2190"></td>
        <td id="LC2190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the articles against me.  This envoy had instructions to represent to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2191"></td>
        <td id="LC2191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">monarch of Blefuscu, “the great lenity of his master, who was content to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2192"></td>
        <td id="LC2192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">punish me no farther than with the loss of mine eyes; that I had fled</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2193"></td>
        <td id="LC2193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from justice; and if I did not return in two hours, I should be deprived</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2194"></td>
        <td id="LC2194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of my title of _nardac_, and declared a traitor.”  The envoy further</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2195"></td>
        <td id="LC2195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">added, “that in order to maintain the peace and amity between both</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2196"></td>
        <td id="LC2196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">empires, his master expected that his brother of Blefuscu would give</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2197"></td>
        <td id="LC2197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">orders to have me sent back to Lilliput, bound hand and foot, to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2198"></td>
        <td id="LC2198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">punished as a traitor.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2199"></td>
        <td id="LC2199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2200"></td>
        <td id="LC2200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The emperor of Blefuscu, having taken three days to consult, returned an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2201"></td>
        <td id="LC2201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answer consisting of many civilities and excuses.  He said, “that as for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2202"></td>
        <td id="LC2202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sending me bound, his brother knew it was impossible; that, although I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2203"></td>
        <td id="LC2203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had deprived him of his fleet, yet he owed great obligations to me for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2204"></td>
        <td id="LC2204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many good offices I had done him in making the peace.  That, however,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2205"></td>
        <td id="LC2205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">both their majesties would soon be made easy; for I had found a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2206"></td>

        <td id="L2208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2208"></td>

        <td id="L2213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2213"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2275"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L2285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2285"></td>
        <td id="LC2285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">English merchantman, returning from Japan by the North and South seas;</td>

        <td id="L2286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2286"></td>

        <td id="L2287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2287"></td>
        <td id="LC2287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">excellent sailor.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2288"></td>
