      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2289"></td>
        <td id="LC2289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We were now in the latitude of 30 degrees south; there were about fifty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2290"></td>
        <td id="LC2290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men in the ship; and here I met an old comrade of mine, one Peter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2291"></td>
        <td id="LC2291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Williams, who gave me a good character to the captain.  This gentleman</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2292"></td>
        <td id="LC2292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">treated me with kindness, and desired I would let him know what place I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2293"></td>
        <td id="LC2293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came from last, and whither I was bound; which I did in a few words, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2294"></td>
        <td id="LC2294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he thought I was raving, and that the dangers I underwent had disturbed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2295"></td>
        <td id="LC2295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my head; whereupon I took my black cattle and sheep out of my pocket,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2296"></td>
        <td id="LC2296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which, after great astonishment, clearly convinced him of my veracity.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2297"></td>
        <td id="LC2297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then showed him the gold given me by the emperor of Blefuscu, together</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2298"></td>
        <td id="LC2298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with his majesty’s picture at full length, and some other rarities of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2299"></td>
        <td id="LC2299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that country.  I gave him two purses of two hundreds _sprugs_ each, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2300"></td>
        <td id="LC2300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">promised, when we arrived in England, to make him a present of a cow and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2301"></td>
        <td id="LC2301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a sheep big with young.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2302"></td>
        <td id="LC2302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2303"></td>
        <td id="LC2303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I shall not trouble the reader with a particular account of this voyage,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2304"></td>
        <td id="LC2304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which was very prosperous for the most part.  We arrived in the Downs on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2305"></td>
        <td id="LC2305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the 13th of April, 1702.  I had only one misfortune, that the rats on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2306"></td>
        <td id="LC2306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">board carried away one of my sheep; I found her bones in a hole, picked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2307"></td>
        <td id="LC2307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clean from the flesh.  The rest of my cattle I got safe ashore, and set</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2308"></td>
        <td id="LC2308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them a-grazing in a bowling-green at Greenwich, where the fineness of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2309"></td>
        <td id="LC2309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grass made them feed very heartily, though I had always feared the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2310"></td>
        <td id="LC2310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contrary: neither could I possibly have preserved them in so long a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2311"></td>
        <td id="LC2311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">voyage, if the captain had not allowed me some of his best biscuit,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2312"></td>
        <td id="LC2312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which, rubbed to powder, and mingled with water, was their constant food.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2313"></td>
        <td id="LC2313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The short time I continued in England, I made a considerable profit by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2314"></td>
        <td id="LC2314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">showing my cattle to many persons of quality and others: and before I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2315"></td>
        <td id="LC2315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">began my second voyage, I sold them for six hundred pounds.  Since my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2316"></td>
        <td id="LC2316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last return I find the breed is considerably increased, especially the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2317"></td>
        <td id="LC2317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sheep, which I hope will prove much to the advantage of the woollen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2318"></td>
        <td id="LC2318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manufacture, by the fineness of the fleeces.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2319"></td>
        <td id="LC2319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2320"></td>
        <td id="LC2320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I stayed but two months with my wife and family, for my insatiable desire</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2321"></td>
        <td id="LC2321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of seeing foreign countries, would suffer me to continue no longer.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2322"></td>
        <td id="LC2322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">left fifteen hundred pounds with my wife, and fixed her in a good house</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2323"></td>
        <td id="LC2323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at Redriff.  My remaining stock I carried with me, part in money and part</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2324"></td>
        <td id="LC2324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in goods, in hopes to improve my fortunes.  My eldest uncle John had left</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2325"></td>
        <td id="LC2325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me an estate in land, near Epping, of about thirty pounds a-year; and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2326"></td>
        <td id="LC2326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had a long lease of the Black Bull in Fetter-Lane, which yielded me as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2327"></td>
        <td id="LC2327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much more; so that I was not in any danger of leaving my family upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2328"></td>
        <td id="LC2328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">parish.  My son Johnny, named so after his uncle, was at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2329"></td>
        <td id="LC2329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grammar-school, and a towardly child.  My daughter Betty (who is now well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2330"></td>
        <td id="LC2330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">married, and has children) was then at her needle-work.  I took leave of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2331"></td>
        <td id="LC2331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my wife, and boy and girl, with tears on both sides, and went on board</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2332"></td>
        <td id="LC2332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Adventure, a merchant ship of three hundred tons, bound for Surat,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2333"></td>
        <td id="LC2333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">captain John Nicholas, of Liverpool, commander.  But my account of this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2334"></td>
        <td id="LC2334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">voyage must be referred to the Second Part of my Travels.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2335"></td>
        <td id="LC2335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2336"></td>
        <td id="LC2336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2337"></td>
        <td id="LC2337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2338"></td>
        <td id="LC2338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2339"></td>
        <td id="LC2339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2340"></td>
        <td id="LC2340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2341"></td>
        <td id="LC2341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">PART II.  A VOYAGE TO BROBDINGNAG.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2342"></td>
        <td id="LC2342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2343"></td>
        <td id="LC2343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2344"></td>
        <td id="LC2344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2345"></td>
        <td id="LC2345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2346"></td>
        <td id="LC2346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2347"></td>
        <td id="LC2347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2348"></td>
        <td id="LC2348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER I.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2349"></td>
        <td id="LC2349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2350"></td>
        <td id="LC2350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2351"></td>
        <td id="LC2351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A great storm described; the long boat sent to fetch water; the author</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2352"></td>
        <td id="LC2352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">goes with it to discover the country.  He is left on shore, is seized by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2353"></td>
        <td id="LC2353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one of the natives, and carried to a farmer’s house.  His reception, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2354"></td>
        <td id="LC2354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several accidents that happened there.  A description of the inhabitants.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2355"></td>
        <td id="LC2355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2356"></td>
        <td id="LC2356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Having been condemned, by nature and fortune, to active and restless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2357"></td>
        <td id="LC2357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life, in two months after my return, I again left my native country, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2358"></td>
        <td id="LC2358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">took shipping in the Downs, on the 20th day of June, 1702, in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2359"></td>
        <td id="LC2359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Adventure, Captain John Nicholas, a Cornish man, commander, bound for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2360"></td>
        <td id="LC2360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Surat.  We had a very prosperous gale, till we arrived at the Cape of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2361"></td>
        <td id="LC2361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Good Hope, where we landed for fresh water; but discovering a leak, we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2362"></td>
        <td id="LC2362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unshipped our goods and wintered there; for the captain falling sick of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2363"></td>
        <td id="LC2363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an ague, we could not leave the Cape till the end of March.  We then set</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2364"></td>
        <td id="LC2364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sail, and had a good voyage till we passed the Straits of Madagascar; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2365"></td>
        <td id="LC2365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">having got northward of that island, and to about five degrees south</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2366"></td>
        <td id="LC2366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">latitude, the winds, which in those seas are observed to blow a constant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2367"></td>
        <td id="LC2367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">equal gale between the north and west, from the beginning of December to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2368"></td>
        <td id="LC2368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the beginning of May, on the 19th of April began to blow with much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2369"></td>
        <td id="LC2369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greater violence, and more westerly than usual, continuing so for twenty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2370"></td>
        <td id="LC2370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">days together: during which time, we were driven a little to the east of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2371"></td>
        <td id="LC2371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Molucca Islands, and about three degrees northward of the line, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2372"></td>
        <td id="LC2372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our captain found by an observation he took the 2nd of May, at which time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2373"></td>
        <td id="LC2373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the wind ceased, and it was a perfect calm, whereat I was not a little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2374"></td>
        <td id="LC2374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rejoiced.  But he, being a man well experienced in the navigation of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2375"></td>
        <td id="LC2375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those seas, bid us all prepare against a storm, which accordingly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2376"></td>
        <td id="LC2376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happened the day following: for the southern wind, called the southern</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2377"></td>
        <td id="LC2377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">monsoon, began to set in.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2378"></td>
        <td id="LC2378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2379"></td>
        <td id="LC2379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Finding it was likely to overblow, we took in our sprit-sail, and stood</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2380"></td>
        <td id="LC2380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by to hand the fore-sail; but making foul weather, we looked the guns</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2381"></td>
        <td id="LC2381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were all fast, and handed the mizen.  The ship lay very broad off, so we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2382"></td>
        <td id="LC2382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thought it better spooning before the sea, than trying or hulling.  We</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2383"></td>
        <td id="LC2383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reefed the fore-sail and set him, and hauled aft the fore-sheet; the helm</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2384"></td>
        <td id="LC2384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was hard a-weather.  The ship wore bravely.  We belayed the fore</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2385"></td>
        <td id="LC2385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down-haul; but the sail was split, and we hauled down the yard, and got</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2386"></td>
        <td id="LC2386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sail into the ship, and unbound all the things clear of it.  It was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2387"></td>
        <td id="LC2387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very fierce storm; the sea broke strange and dangerous.  We hauled off</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2388"></td>
        <td id="LC2388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon the laniard of the whip-staff, and helped the man at the helm.  We</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2389"></td>
        <td id="LC2389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would not get down our topmast, but let all stand, because she scudded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2390"></td>
        <td id="LC2390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before the sea very well, and we knew that the top-mast being aloft, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2391"></td>
        <td id="LC2391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ship was the wholesomer, and made better way through the sea, seeing we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2392"></td>
        <td id="LC2392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had sea-room.  When the storm was over, we set fore-sail and main-sail,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2393"></td>
        <td id="LC2393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and brought the ship to.  Then we set the mizen, main-top-sail, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2394"></td>
        <td id="LC2394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fore-top-sail.  Our course was east-north-east, the wind was at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2395"></td>
        <td id="LC2395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">south-west.  We got the starboard tacks aboard, we cast off our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2396"></td>
        <td id="LC2396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weather-braces and lifts; we set in the lee-braces, and hauled forward by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2397"></td>
        <td id="LC2397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the weather-bowlings, and hauled them tight, and belayed them, and hauled</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2398"></td>
        <td id="LC2398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over the mizen tack to windward, and kept her full and by as near as she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2399"></td>
        <td id="LC2399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would lie.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2400"></td>
        <td id="LC2400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2401"></td>
        <td id="LC2401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">During this storm, which was followed by a strong wind west-south-west,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2402"></td>
        <td id="LC2402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we were carried, by my computation, about five hundred leagues to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2403"></td>
        <td id="LC2403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">east, so that the oldest sailor on board could not tell in what part of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2404"></td>
        <td id="LC2404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the world we were.  Our provisions held out well, our ship was staunch,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2405"></td>
        <td id="LC2405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and our crew all in good health; but we lay in the utmost distress for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2406"></td>
        <td id="LC2406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">water.  We thought it best to hold on the same course, rather than turn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2407"></td>
        <td id="LC2407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more northerly, which might have brought us to the north-west part of</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2408"></td>
        <td id="LC2408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Great Tartary, and into the Frozen Sea.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2409"></td>
        <td id="LC2409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2410"></td>
        <td id="LC2410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On the 16th day of June, 1703, a boy on the top-mast discovered land.  On</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2411"></td>
        <td id="LC2411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the 17th, we came in full view of a great island, or continent (for we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2412"></td>
        <td id="LC2412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knew not whether;) on the south side whereof was a small neck of land</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2413"></td>
        <td id="LC2413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">jutting out into the sea, and a creek too shallow to hold a ship of above</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2414"></td>
        <td id="LC2414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one hundred tons.  We cast anchor within a league of this creek, and our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2415"></td>
        <td id="LC2415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">captain sent a dozen of his men well armed in the long-boat, with vessels</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2416"></td>
        <td id="LC2416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for water, if any could be found.  I desired his leave to go with them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2417"></td>
        <td id="LC2417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I might see the country, and make what discoveries I could.  When we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2418"></td>
        <td id="LC2418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came to land we saw no river or spring, nor any sign of inhabitants.  Our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2419"></td>
        <td id="LC2419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men therefore wandered on the shore to find out some fresh water near the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2420"></td>
        <td id="LC2420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sea, and I walked alone about a mile on the other side, where I observed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2421"></td>
        <td id="LC2421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the country all barren and rocky.  I now began to be weary, and seeing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2422"></td>
        <td id="LC2422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing to entertain my curiosity, I returned gently down towards the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2423"></td>
        <td id="LC2423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">creek; and the sea being full in my view, I saw our men already got into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2424"></td>
        <td id="LC2424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the boat, and rowing for life to the ship.  I was going to holla after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2425"></td>
        <td id="LC2425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, although it had been to little purpose, when I observed a huge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2426"></td>
        <td id="LC2426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">creature walking after them in the sea, as fast as he could: he waded not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2427"></td>
        <td id="LC2427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much deeper than his knees, and took prodigious strides: but our men had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2428"></td>
        <td id="LC2428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the start of him half a league, and, the sea thereabouts being full of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2429"></td>
        <td id="LC2429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sharp-pointed rocks, the monster was not able to overtake the boat.  This</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2430"></td>
        <td id="LC2430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was afterwards told, for I durst not stay to see the issue of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2431"></td>
        <td id="LC2431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">adventure; but ran as fast as I could the way I first went, and then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2432"></td>
        <td id="LC2432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">climbed up a steep hill, which gave me some prospect of the country.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2433"></td>
        <td id="LC2433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found it fully cultivated; but that which first surprised me was the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2434"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2435"></td>
        <td id="LC2435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hay, was about twenty feet high.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2436"></td>
        <td id="LC2436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2437"></td>
        <td id="LC2437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I fell into a high road, for so I took it to be, though it served to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2438"></td>
        <td id="LC2438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inhabitants only as a foot-path through a field of barley.  Here I walked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2439"></td>
        <td id="LC2439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on for some time, but could see little on either side, it being now near</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2440"></td>
        <td id="LC2440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">harvest, and the corn rising at least forty feet.  I was an hour walking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2441"></td>
        <td id="LC2441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the end of this field, which was fenced in with a hedge of at least</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2442"></td>
        <td id="LC2442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one hundred and twenty feet high, and the trees so lofty that I could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2443"></td>
        <td id="LC2443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make no computation of their altitude.  There was a stile to pass from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2444"></td>
        <td id="LC2444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this field into the next.  It had four steps, and a stone to cross over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2445"></td>
        <td id="LC2445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when you came to the uppermost.  It was impossible for me to climb this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2446"></td>
        <td id="LC2446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stile, because every step was six-feet high, and the upper stone about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2447"></td>
        <td id="LC2447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">twenty.  I was endeavouring to find some gap in the hedge, when I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2448"></td>
        <td id="LC2448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discovered one of the inhabitants in the next field, advancing towards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2449"></td>
        <td id="LC2449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the stile, of the same size with him whom I saw in the sea pursuing our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2450"></td>
        <td id="LC2450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boat.  He appeared as tall as an ordinary spire steeple, and took about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2451"></td>
        <td id="LC2451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ten yards at every stride, as near as I could guess.  I was struck with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2452"></td>
        <td id="LC2452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the utmost fear and astonishment, and ran to hide myself in the corn,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2453"></td>
        <td id="LC2453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whence I saw him at the top of the stile looking back into the next field</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2454"></td>
        <td id="LC2454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the right hand, and heard him call in a voice many degrees louder than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2455"></td>
        <td id="LC2455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a speaking-trumpet: but the noise was so high in the air, that at first I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2456"></td>
        <td id="LC2456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certainly thought it was thunder.  Whereupon seven monsters, like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2457"></td>
        <td id="LC2457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself, came towards him with reaping-hooks in their hands, each hook</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2458"></td>
        <td id="LC2458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about the largeness of six scythes.  These people were not so well clad</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2459"></td>
        <td id="LC2459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as the first, whose servants or labourers they seemed to be; for, upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2460"></td>
        <td id="LC2460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some words he spoke, they went to reap the corn in the field where I lay.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2461"></td>
        <td id="LC2461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I kept from them at as great a distance as I could, but was forced to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2462"></td>
        <td id="LC2462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">move with extreme difficulty, for the stalks of the corn were sometimes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2463"></td>
        <td id="LC2463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not above a foot distant, so that I could hardly squeeze my body betwixt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2464"></td>
        <td id="LC2464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them.  However, I made a shift to go forward, till I came to a part of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2465"></td>
        <td id="LC2465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the field where the corn had been laid by the rain and wind.  Here it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2466"></td>
        <td id="LC2466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impossible for me to advance a step; for the stalks were so interwoven,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2467"></td>
        <td id="LC2467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I could not creep through, and the beards of the fallen ears so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2468"></td>
        <td id="LC2468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strong and pointed, that they pierced through my clothes into my flesh.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2469"></td>
        <td id="LC2469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At the same time I heard the reapers not a hundred yards behind me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2470"></td>
        <td id="LC2470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Being quite dispirited with toil, and wholly overcome by grief and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2471"></td>
        <td id="LC2471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dispair, I lay down between two ridges, and heartily wished I might there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2472"></td>
        <td id="LC2472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">end my days.  I bemoaned my desolate widow and fatherless children.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2473"></td>
        <td id="LC2473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lamented my own folly and wilfulness, in attempting a second voyage,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2474"></td>
        <td id="LC2474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against the advice of all my friends and relations.  In this terrible</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2476"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2740"></td>
        <td id="LC2740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2741"></td>
        <td id="LC2741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2742"></td>
        <td id="LC2742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER II.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2743"></td>
        <td id="LC2743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2744"></td>
        <td id="LC2744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2745"></td>
        <td id="LC2745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A description of the farmer’s daughter.  The author carried to a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2746"></td>
        <td id="LC2746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">market-town, and then to the metropolis.  The particulars of his journey.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2747"></td>
        <td id="LC2747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2748"></td>
        <td id="LC2748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My mistress had a daughter of nine years old, a child of towardly parts</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2749"></td>
        <td id="LC2749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for her age, very dexterous at her needle, and skilful in dressing her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2750"></td>
        <td id="LC2750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">baby.  Her mother and she contrived to fit up the baby’s cradle for me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2751"></td>
        <td id="LC2751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against night: the cradle was put into a small drawer of a cabinet, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2752"></td>
        <td id="LC2752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the drawer placed upon a hanging shelf for fear of the rats.  This was my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2753"></td>
        <td id="LC2753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bed all the time I staid with those people, though made more convenient</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2754"></td>
        <td id="LC2754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by degrees, as I began to learn their language and make my wants known.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2755"></td>
        <td id="LC2755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This young girl was so handy, that after I had once or twice pulled off</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2756"></td>
        <td id="LC2756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my clothes before her, she was able to dress and undress me, though I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2757"></td>
        <td id="LC2757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never gave her that trouble when she would let me do either myself.  She</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2758"></td>
        <td id="LC2758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made me seven shirts, and some other linen, of as fine cloth as could be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2759"></td>
        <td id="LC2759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got, which indeed was coarser than sackcloth; and these she constantly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2760"></td>
        <td id="LC2760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">washed for me with her own hands.  She was likewise my school-mistress,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2761"></td>
        <td id="LC2761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to teach me the language: when I pointed to any thing, she told me the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2762"></td>
        <td id="LC2762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">name of it in her own tongue, so that in a few days I was able to call</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2763"></td>
        <td id="LC2763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for whatever I had a mind to.  She was very good-natured, and not above</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2764"></td>
        <td id="LC2764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forty feet high, being little for her age.  She gave me the name of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2765"></td>
        <td id="LC2765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Grildrig_, which the family took up, and afterwards the whole kingdom.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2766"></td>
        <td id="LC2766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The word imports what the Latins call _nanunculus_, the Italians</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2767"></td>
        <td id="LC2767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_homunceletino_, and the English _mannikin_.  To her I chiefly owe my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2768"></td>
        <td id="LC2768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">preservation in that country: we never parted while I was there; I called</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2769"></td>
        <td id="LC2769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her my _Glumdalclitch_, or little nurse; and should be guilty of great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2770"></td>
        <td id="LC2770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ingratitude, if I omitted this honourable mention of her care and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2771"></td>
        <td id="LC2771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">affection towards me, which I heartily wish it lay in my power to requite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2772"></td>
        <td id="LC2772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as she deserves, instead of being the innocent, but unhappy instrument of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2773"></td>
        <td id="LC2773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her disgrace, as I have too much reason to fear.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2774"></td>
        <td id="LC2774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2775"></td>
        <td id="LC2775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It now began to be known and talked of in the neighbourhood, that my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2776"></td>
        <td id="LC2776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">master had found a strange animal in the field, about the bigness of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2777"></td>
        <td id="LC2777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_splacnuck_, but exactly shaped in every part like a human creature;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2778"></td>
        <td id="LC2778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which it likewise imitated in all its actions; seemed to speak in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2779"></td>
        <td id="LC2779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little language of its own, had already learned several words of theirs,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2780"></td>
        <td id="LC2780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went erect upon two legs, was tame and gentle, would come when it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2781"></td>
        <td id="LC2781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">called, do whatever it was bid, had the finest limbs in the world, and a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2782"></td>
        <td id="LC2782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">complexion fairer than a nobleman’s daughter of three years old.  Another</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2783"></td>
        <td id="LC2783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">farmer, who lived hard by, and was a particular friend of my master, came</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2784"></td>
        <td id="LC2784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on a visit on purpose to inquire into the truth of this story.  I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2785"></td>
        <td id="LC2785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">immediately produced, and placed upon a table, where I walked as I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2786"></td>
        <td id="LC2786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">commanded, drew my hanger, put it up again, made my reverence to my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2787"></td>
        <td id="LC2787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">master’s guest, asked him in his own language how he did, and told him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2788"></td>
        <td id="LC2788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_he was welcome_, just as my little nurse had instructed me.  This man,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2789"></td>
        <td id="LC2789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who was old and dim-sighted, put on his spectacles to behold me better;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2790"></td>
        <td id="LC2790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at which I could not forbear laughing very heartily, for his eyes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2791"></td>
        <td id="LC2791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appeared like the full moon shining into a chamber at two windows.  Our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2792"></td>
        <td id="LC2792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people, who discovered the cause of my mirth, bore me company in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2793"></td>
        <td id="LC2793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laughing, at which the old fellow was fool enough to be angry and out of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2794"></td>
        <td id="LC2794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">countenance.  He had the character of a great miser; and, to my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2795"></td>
        <td id="LC2795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">misfortune, he well deserved it, by the cursed advice he gave my master,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2796"></td>
        <td id="LC2796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to show me as a sight upon a market-day in the next town, which was half</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2797"></td>
        <td id="LC2797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an hour’s riding, about two-and-twenty miles from our house.  I guessed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2798"></td>
        <td id="LC2798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there was some mischief when I observed my master and his friend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2799"></td>
        <td id="LC2799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whispering together, sometimes pointing at me; and my fears made me fancy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2800"></td>
        <td id="LC2800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I overheard and understood some of their words.  But the next</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2801"></td>
        <td id="LC2801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morning Glumdalclitch, my little nurse, told me the whole matter, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2802"></td>
        <td id="LC2802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she had cunningly picked out from her mother.  The poor girl laid me on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2803"></td>
        <td id="LC2803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her bosom, and fell a weeping with shame and grief.  She apprehended some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2804"></td>
        <td id="LC2804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mischief would happen to me from rude vulgar folks, who might squeeze me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2805"></td>
        <td id="LC2805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to death, or break one of my limbs by taking me in their hands.  She had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2806"></td>
        <td id="LC2806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">also observed how modest I was in my nature, how nicely I regarded my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2807"></td>
        <td id="LC2807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">honour, and what an indignity I should conceive it, to be exposed for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2808"></td>
        <td id="LC2808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">money as a public spectacle, to the meanest of the people.  She said, her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2809"></td>
        <td id="LC2809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">papa and mamma had promised that Grildrig should be hers; but now she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2810"></td>
        <td id="LC2810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found they meant to serve her as they did last year, when they pretended</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2811"></td>
        <td id="LC2811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to give her a lamb, and yet, as soon as it was fat, sold it to a butcher.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2812"></td>
        <td id="LC2812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For my own part, I may truly affirm, that I was less concerned than my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2813"></td>
        <td id="LC2813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nurse.  I had a strong hope, which never left me, that I should one day</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2814"></td>
        <td id="LC2814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recover my liberty: and as to the ignominy of being carried about for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2815"></td>
        <td id="LC2815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">monster, I considered myself to be a perfect stranger in the country, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2816"></td>
        <td id="LC2816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that such a misfortune could never be charged upon me as a reproach, if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2817"></td>
        <td id="LC2817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ever I should return to England, since the king of Great Britain himself,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2818"></td>
        <td id="LC2818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in my condition, must have undergone the same distress.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2819"></td>
        <td id="LC2819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2820"></td>
        <td id="LC2820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My master, pursuant to the advice of his friend, carried me in a box the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2821"></td>
        <td id="LC2821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">next market-day to the neighbouring town, and took along with him his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2822"></td>
        <td id="LC2822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little daughter, my nurse, upon a pillion behind him.  The box was close</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2823"></td>
        <td id="LC2823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on every side, with a little door for me to go in and out, and a few</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2824"></td>
        <td id="LC2824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gimlet holes to let in air.  The girl had been so careful as to put the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2825"></td>
        <td id="LC2825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quilt of her baby’s bed into it, for me to lie down on.  However, I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2826"></td>
        <td id="LC2826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">terribly shaken and discomposed in this journey, though it was but of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2827"></td>
        <td id="LC2827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half an hour: for the horse went about forty feet at every step and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2828"></td>
        <td id="LC2828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trotted so high, that the agitation was equal to the rising and falling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2829"></td>

        <td id="L2917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2917"></td>
