      <tr>
        <td id="L2918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2918"></td>
        <td id="LC2918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make a shift to explain a sentence here and there; for Glumdalclitch had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2919"></td>
        <td id="LC2919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been my instructor while we were at home, and at leisure hours during our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2920"></td>
        <td id="LC2920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">journey.  She carried a little book in her pocket, not much larger than a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2921"></td>
        <td id="LC2921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sanson’s Atlas; it was a common treatise for the use of young girls,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2922"></td>
        <td id="LC2922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">giving a short account of their religion: out of this she taught me my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2923"></td>
        <td id="LC2923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">letters, and interpreted the words.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2924"></td>
        <td id="LC2924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2925"></td>
        <td id="LC2925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2926"></td>
        <td id="LC2926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2927"></td>
        <td id="LC2927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER III.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2928"></td>
        <td id="LC2928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2929"></td>
        <td id="LC2929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2930"></td>
        <td id="LC2930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author sent for to court.  The queen buys him of his master the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2931"></td>
        <td id="LC2931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">farmer, and presents him to the king.  He disputes with his majesty’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2932"></td>
        <td id="LC2932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great scholars.  An apartment at court provided for the author.  He is in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2933"></td>
        <td id="LC2933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">high favour with the queen.  He stands up for the honour of his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2934"></td>
        <td id="LC2934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">country.  His quarrels with the queen’s dwarf.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2935"></td>
        <td id="LC2935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2936"></td>
        <td id="LC2936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The frequent labours I underwent every day, made, in a few weeks, a very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2937"></td>
        <td id="LC2937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">considerable change in my health: the more my master got by me, the more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2938"></td>
        <td id="LC2938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">insatiable he grew.  I had quite lost my stomach, and was almost reduced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2939"></td>
        <td id="LC2939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to a skeleton.  The farmer observed it, and concluding I must soon die,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2940"></td>
        <td id="LC2940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resolved to make as good a hand of me as he could.  While he was thus</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2941"></td>
        <td id="LC2941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reasoning and resolving with himself, a _sardral_, or gentleman-usher,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2942"></td>
        <td id="LC2942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came from court, commanding my master to carry me immediately thither for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2943"></td>
        <td id="LC2943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the diversion of the queen and her ladies.  Some of the latter had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2944"></td>
        <td id="LC2944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">already been to see me, and reported strange things of my beauty,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2945"></td>
        <td id="LC2945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behaviour, and good sense.  Her majesty, and those who attended her, were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2946"></td>
        <td id="LC2946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beyond measure delighted with my demeanour.  I fell on my knees, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2947"></td>
        <td id="LC2947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">begged the honour of kissing her imperial foot; but this gracious</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2948"></td>
        <td id="LC2948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">princess held out her little finger towards me, after I was set on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2949"></td>
        <td id="LC2949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">table, which I embraced in both my arms, and put the tip of it with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2950"></td>
        <td id="LC2950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">utmost respect to my lip.  She made me some general questions about my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2951"></td>
        <td id="LC2951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">country and my travels, which I answered as distinctly, and in as few</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2952"></td>
        <td id="LC2952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">words as I could.  She asked, “whether I could be content to live at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2953"></td>
        <td id="LC2953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">court?”  I bowed down to the board of the table, and humbly answered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2954"></td>
        <td id="LC2954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“that I was my master’s slave: but, if I were at my own disposal, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2955"></td>
        <td id="LC2955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should be proud to devote my life to her majesty’s service.”  She then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2956"></td>
        <td id="LC2956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">asked my master, “whether he was willing to sell me at a good price?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2957"></td>
        <td id="LC2957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He, who apprehended I could not live a month, was ready enough to part</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2958"></td>
        <td id="LC2958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with me, and demanded a thousand pieces of gold, which were ordered him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2959"></td>
        <td id="LC2959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the spot, each piece being about the bigness of eight hundred</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2960"></td>
        <td id="LC2960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moidores; but allowing for the proportion of all things between that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2961"></td>
        <td id="LC2961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">country and Europe, and the high price of gold among them, was hardly so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2962"></td>
        <td id="LC2962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great a sum as a thousand guineas would be in England.  I then said to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2963"></td>
        <td id="LC2963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the queen, “since I was now her majesty’s most humble creature and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2964"></td>
        <td id="LC2964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vassal, I must beg the favour, that Glumdalclitch, who had always tended</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2965"></td>
        <td id="LC2965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me with so much care and kindness, and understood to do it so well, might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2966"></td>
        <td id="LC2966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be admitted into her service, and continue to be my nurse and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2967"></td>
        <td id="LC2967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instructor.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2968"></td>
        <td id="LC2968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2969"></td>
        <td id="LC2969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Her majesty agreed to my petition, and easily got the farmer’s consent,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2970"></td>
        <td id="LC2970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who was glad enough to have his daughter preferred at court, and the poor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2971"></td>
        <td id="LC2971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">girl herself was not able to hide her joy.  My late master withdrew,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2972"></td>
        <td id="LC2972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bidding me farewell, and saying he had left me in a good service; to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2973"></td>
        <td id="LC2973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which I replied not a word, only making him a slight bow.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2974"></td>
        <td id="LC2974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2975"></td>
        <td id="LC2975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The queen observed my coldness; and, when the farmer was gone out of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2976"></td>
        <td id="LC2976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">apartment, asked me the reason.  I made bold to tell her majesty, “that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2977"></td>
        <td id="LC2977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">owed no other obligation to my late master, than his not dashing out the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2978"></td>
        <td id="LC2978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brains of a poor harmless creature, found by chance in his fields: which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2979"></td>
        <td id="LC2979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">obligation was amply recompensed, by the gain he had made in showing me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2980"></td>
        <td id="LC2980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through half the kingdom, and the price he had now sold me for.  That the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2981"></td>
        <td id="LC2981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life I had since led was laborious enough to kill an animal of ten times</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2982"></td>
        <td id="LC2982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my strength.  That my health was much impaired, by the continual drudgery</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2983"></td>
        <td id="LC2983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of entertaining the rabble every hour of the day; and that, if my master</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2984"></td>
        <td id="LC2984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had not thought my life in danger, her majesty would not have got so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2985"></td>
        <td id="LC2985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cheap a bargain.  But as I was out of all fear of being ill-treated under</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2986"></td>
        <td id="LC2986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the protection of so great and good an empress, the ornament of nature,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2987"></td>
        <td id="LC2987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the darling of the world, the delight of her subjects, the phoenix of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2988"></td>
        <td id="LC2988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">creation, so I hoped my late master’s apprehensions would appear to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2989"></td>
        <td id="LC2989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">groundless; for I already found my spirits revive, by the influence of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2990"></td>
        <td id="LC2990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her most august presence.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2991"></td>
        <td id="LC2991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2992"></td>
        <td id="LC2992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This was the sum of my speech, delivered with great improprieties and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2993"></td>
        <td id="LC2993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hesitation.  The latter part was altogether framed in the style peculiar</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2994"></td>
        <td id="LC2994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to that people, whereof I learned some phrases from Glumdalclitch, while</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2995"></td>
        <td id="LC2995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she was carrying me to court.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2996"></td>
        <td id="LC2996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2997"></td>
        <td id="LC2997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The queen, giving great allowance for my defectiveness in speaking, was,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2998"></td>
        <td id="LC2998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, surprised at so much wit and good sense in so diminutive an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2999"></td>
        <td id="LC2999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">animal.  She took me in her own hand, and carried me to the king, who was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3000"></td>
        <td id="LC3000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then retired to his cabinet.  His majesty, a prince of much gravity and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3001"></td>
        <td id="LC3001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">austere countenance, not well observing my shape at first view, asked the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3002"></td>
        <td id="LC3002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">queen after a cold manner “how long it was since she grew fond of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3003"></td>
        <td id="LC3003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_splacnuck_?” for such it seems he took me to be, as I lay upon my breast</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3004"></td>
        <td id="LC3004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in her majesty’s right hand.  But this princess, who has an infinite deal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3005"></td>
        <td id="LC3005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of wit and humour, set me gently on my feet upon the scrutoire, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3006"></td>
        <td id="LC3006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">commanded me to give his majesty an account of myself, which I did in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3007"></td>
        <td id="LC3007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very few words: and Glumdalclitch who attended at the cabinet door, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3008"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3186"></td>
        <td id="LC3186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">room, and the queen was in such a fright, that she wanted presence of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3187"></td>
        <td id="LC3187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mind to assist me.  But my little nurse ran to my relief, and took me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3188"></td>
        <td id="LC3188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out, after I had swallowed above a quart of cream.  I was put to bed:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3189"></td>
        <td id="LC3189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, I received no other damage than the loss of a suit of clothes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3190"></td>
        <td id="LC3190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which was utterly spoiled.  The dwarf was soundly whipt, and as a farther</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3191"></td>
        <td id="LC3191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">punishment, forced to drink up the bowl of cream into which he had thrown</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3192"></td>
        <td id="LC3192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me: neither was he ever restored to favour; for soon after the queen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3193"></td>
        <td id="LC3193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bestowed him on a lady of high quality, so that I saw him no more, to my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3194"></td>
        <td id="LC3194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very great satisfaction; for I could not tell to what extremities such a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3195"></td>
        <td id="LC3195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">malicious urchin might have carried his resentment.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3196"></td>
        <td id="LC3196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3197"></td>
        <td id="LC3197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He had before served me a scurvy trick, which set the queen a-laughing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3198"></td>
        <td id="LC3198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">although at the same time she was heartily vexed, and would have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3199"></td>
        <td id="LC3199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">immediately cashiered him, if I had not been so generous as to intercede.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3200"></td>
        <td id="LC3200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Her majesty had taken a marrow-bone upon her plate, and, after knocking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3201"></td>
        <td id="LC3201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out the marrow, placed the bone again in the dish erect, as it stood</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3202"></td>
        <td id="LC3202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before; the dwarf, watching his opportunity, while Glumdalclitch was gone</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3203"></td>
        <td id="LC3203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the side-board, mounted the stool that she stood on to take care of me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3204"></td>
        <td id="LC3204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at meals, took me up in both hands, and squeezing my legs together,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3205"></td>
        <td id="LC3205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wedged them into the marrow bone above my waist, where I stuck for some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3206"></td>
        <td id="LC3206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time, and made a very ridiculous figure.  I believe it was near a minute</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3207"></td>
        <td id="LC3207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before any one knew what was become of me; for I thought it below me to</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3208"></td>
        <td id="LC3208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cry out.  But, as princes seldom get their meat hot, my legs were not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3209"></td>
        <td id="LC3209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scalded, only my stockings and breeches in a sad condition.  The dwarf,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3210"></td>
        <td id="LC3210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at my entreaty, had no other punishment than a sound whipping.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3211"></td>
        <td id="LC3211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3212"></td>
        <td id="LC3212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was frequently rallied by the queen upon account of my fearfulness; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3213"></td>
        <td id="LC3213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she used to ask me whether the people of my country were as great cowards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3214"></td>
        <td id="LC3214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as myself?  The occasion was this: the kingdom is much pestered with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3215"></td>
        <td id="LC3215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flies in summer; and these odious insects, each of them as big as a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3216"></td>
        <td id="LC3216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dunstable lark, hardly gave me any rest while I sat at dinner, with their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3217"></td>
        <td id="LC3217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">continual humming and buzzing about mine ears.  They would sometimes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3218"></td>
        <td id="LC3218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alight upon my victuals, and leave their loathsome excrement, or spawn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3219"></td>
        <td id="LC3219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behind, which to me was very visible, though not to the natives of that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3220"></td>
        <td id="LC3220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">country, whose large optics were not so acute as mine, in viewing smaller</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3221"></td>
        <td id="LC3221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">objects.  Sometimes they would fix upon my nose, or forehead, where they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3222"></td>
        <td id="LC3222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stung me to the quick, smelling very offensively; and I could easily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3223"></td>
        <td id="LC3223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trace that viscous matter, which, our naturalists tell us, enables those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3224"></td>
        <td id="LC3224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">creatures to walk with their feet upwards upon a ceiling.  I had much ado</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3225"></td>
        <td id="LC3225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to defend myself against these detestable animals, and could not forbear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3226"></td>
        <td id="LC3226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">starting when they came on my face.  It was the common practice of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3227"></td>
        <td id="LC3227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dwarf, to catch a number of these insects in his hand, as schoolboys do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3228"></td>
        <td id="LC3228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">among us, and let them out suddenly under my nose, on purpose to frighten</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3229"></td>
        <td id="LC3229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, and divert the queen.  My remedy was to cut them in pieces with my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3230"></td>
        <td id="LC3230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knife, as they flew in the air, wherein my dexterity was much admired.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3231"></td>
        <td id="LC3231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3232"></td>
        <td id="LC3232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I remember, one morning, when Glumdalclitch had set me in a box upon a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3233"></td>
        <td id="LC3233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">window, as she usually did in fair days to give me air (for I durst not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3234"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3235"></td>
        <td id="LC3235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cages in England), after I had lifted up one of my sashes, and sat down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3236"></td>
        <td id="LC3236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at my table to eat a piece of sweet cake for my breakfast, above twenty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3237"></td>
        <td id="LC3237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wasps, allured by the smell, came flying into the room, humming louder</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3238"></td>
        <td id="LC3238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than the drones of as many bagpipes.  Some of them seized my cake, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3239"></td>
        <td id="LC3239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carried it piecemeal away; others flew about my head and face,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3240"></td>
        <td id="LC3240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confounding me with the noise, and putting me in the utmost terror of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3241"></td>
        <td id="LC3241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their stings.  However, I had the courage to rise and draw my hanger, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3242"></td>
        <td id="LC3242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attack them in the air.  I dispatched four of them, but the rest got</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3243"></td>
        <td id="LC3243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away, and I presently shut my window.  These insects were as large as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3244"></td>
        <td id="LC3244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">partridges: I took out their stings, found them an inch and a half long,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3245"></td>
        <td id="LC3245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and as sharp as needles.  I carefully preserved them all; and having</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3246"></td>
        <td id="LC3246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">since shown them, with some other curiosities, in several parts of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3247"></td>
        <td id="LC3247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Europe, upon my return to England I gave three of them to Gresham</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3248"></td>
        <td id="LC3248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">College, and kept the fourth for myself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3249"></td>
        <td id="LC3249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3250"></td>
        <td id="LC3250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3251"></td>
        <td id="LC3251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3252"></td>
        <td id="LC3252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER IV.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3253"></td>
        <td id="LC3253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3254"></td>
        <td id="LC3254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3255"></td>
        <td id="LC3255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The country described.  A proposal for correcting modern maps.  The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3256"></td>
        <td id="LC3256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">king’s palace; and some account of the metropolis.  The author’s way of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3257"></td>
        <td id="LC3257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">travelling.  The chief temple described.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3258"></td>
        <td id="LC3258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3259"></td>
        <td id="LC3259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I now intend to give the reader a short description of this country, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3260"></td>
        <td id="LC3260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">far as I travelled in it, which was not above two thousand miles round</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3261"></td>
        <td id="LC3261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lorbrulgrud, the metropolis.  For the queen, whom I always attended,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3262"></td>
        <td id="LC3262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never went farther when she accompanied the king in his progresses, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3263"></td>
        <td id="LC3263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there staid till his majesty returned from viewing his frontiers.  The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3264"></td>
        <td id="LC3264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whole extent of this prince’s dominions reaches about six thousand miles</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3265"></td>
        <td id="LC3265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in length, and from three to five in breadth: whence I cannot but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3266"></td>
        <td id="LC3266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conclude, that our geographers of Europe are in a great error, by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3267"></td>
        <td id="LC3267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">supposing nothing but sea between Japan and California; for it was ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3268"></td>
        <td id="LC3268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my opinion, that there must be a balance of earth to counterpoise the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3269"></td>
        <td id="LC3269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great continent of Tartary; and therefore they ought to correct their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3270"></td>
        <td id="LC3270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">maps and charts, by joining this vast tract of land to the north-west</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3271"></td>
        <td id="LC3271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">parts of America, wherein I shall be ready to lend them my assistance.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3272"></td>
        <td id="LC3272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3273"></td>
        <td id="LC3273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The kingdom is a peninsula, terminated to the north-east by a ridge of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3274"></td>
        <td id="LC3274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mountains thirty miles high, which are altogether impassable, by reason</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3275"></td>
        <td id="LC3275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the volcanoes upon the tops: neither do the most learned know what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3276"></td>
        <td id="LC3276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sort of mortals inhabit beyond those mountains, or whether they be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3277"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3278"></td>
        <td id="LC3278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is not one seaport in the whole kingdom: and those parts of the</td>

        <td id="LC3279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coasts into which the rivers issue, are so full of pointed rocks, and the</td>

        <td id="L3280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3280"></td>
        <td id="LC3280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sea generally so rough, that there is no venturing with the smallest of</td>

        <td id="LC3281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their boats; so that these people are wholly excluded from any commerce</td>

        <td id="L3282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3282"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3365"></td>
        <td id="LC3365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, were very curious to crowd about the sedan, and the girl was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3366"></td>

        <td id="L3367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3367"></td>
        <td id="LC3367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I might be more conveniently seen.</td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3369"></td>

        <td id="LC3378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">obliged, it must be allowed, that whatever this famous tower wants in</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3381"></td>
        <td id="LC3381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">square, and adorned on all sides with statues of gods and emperors, cut</td>

        <td id="L3387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3387"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3388"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3389"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3395"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3400"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3401"></td>
        <td id="LC3401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">diminutive representation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3402"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3403"></td>
        <td id="LC3403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His majesty seldom keeps above six hundred horses in his stables: they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3404"></td>

        <td id="L3412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3412"></td>
        <td id="LC3412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER V.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3413"></td>
        <td id="LC3413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3414"></td>
        <td id="LC3414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3415"></td>
        <td id="LC3415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Several adventurers that happened to the author.  The execution of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3416"></td>
        <td id="LC3416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">criminal.  The author shows his skill in navigation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3417"></td>
        <td id="LC3417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3418"></td>
        <td id="LC3418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should have lived happy enough in that country, if my littleness had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3419"></td>
        <td id="LC3419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not exposed me to several ridiculous and troublesome accidents; some of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3420"></td>
        <td id="LC3420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which I shall venture to relate.  Glumdalclitch often carried me into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3421"></td>
        <td id="LC3421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gardens of the court in my smaller box, and would sometimes take me out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3422"></td>
        <td id="LC3422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of it, and hold me in her hand, or set me down to walk.  I remember,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3423"></td>
        <td id="LC3423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before the dwarf left the queen, he followed us one day into those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3424"></td>
        <td id="LC3424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gardens, and my nurse having set me down, he and I being close together,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3425"></td>
        <td id="LC3425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">near some dwarf apple trees, I must needs show my wit, by a silly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3426"></td>
        <td id="LC3426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">allusion between him and the trees, which happens to hold in their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3427"></td>
        <td id="LC3427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">language as it does in ours.  Whereupon, the malicious rogue, watching</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3428"></td>
        <td id="LC3428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his opportunity, when I was walking under one of them, shook it directly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3429"></td>
        <td id="LC3429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over my head, by which a dozen apples, each of them near as large as a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3430"></td>
        <td id="LC3430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bristol barrel, came tumbling about my ears; one of them hit me on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3431"></td>
        <td id="LC3431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back as I chanced to stoop, and knocked me down flat on my face; but I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3432"></td>
        <td id="LC3432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">received no other hurt, and the dwarf was pardoned at my desire, because</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3433"></td>
        <td id="LC3433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had given the provocation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3434"></td>
        <td id="LC3434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3435"></td>
        <td id="LC3435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Another day, Glumdalclitch left me on a smooth grass-plot to divert</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3436"></td>
        <td id="LC3436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">myself, while she walked at some distance with her governess.  In the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3437"></td>
        <td id="LC3437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meantime, there suddenly fell such a violent shower of hail, that I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3438"></td>
        <td id="LC3438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">immediately by the force of it, struck to the ground: and when I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3439"></td>
        <td id="LC3439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down, the hailstones gave me such cruel bangs all over the body, as if I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3440"></td>
        <td id="LC3440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been pelted with tennis-balls; however, I made a shift to creep on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3441"></td>
        <td id="LC3441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all fours, and shelter myself, by lying flat on my face, on the lee-side</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3442"></td>
        <td id="LC3442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a border of lemon-thyme, but so bruised from head to foot, that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3443"></td>
        <td id="LC3443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could not go abroad in ten days.  Neither is this at all to be wondered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3444"></td>
        <td id="LC3444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at, because nature, in that country, observing the same proportion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3445"></td>
        <td id="LC3445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through all her operations, a hailstone is near eighteen hundred times as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3446"></td>
        <td id="LC3446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">large as one in Europe; which I can assert upon experience, having been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3447"></td>
        <td id="LC3447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so curious as to weigh and measure them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3448"></td>
        <td id="LC3448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3449"></td>
        <td id="LC3449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But a more dangerous accident happened to me in the same garden, when my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3450"></td>
        <td id="LC3450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little nurse, believing she had put me in a secure place (which I often</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3451"></td>
        <td id="LC3451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entreated her to do, that I might enjoy my own thoughts,) and having left</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3452"></td>
        <td id="LC3452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my box at home, to avoid the trouble of carrying it, went to another part</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3453"></td>
        <td id="LC3453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the garden with her governess and some ladies of her acquaintance.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3454"></td>
        <td id="LC3454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">While she was absent, and out of hearing, a small white spaniel that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3455"></td>
        <td id="LC3455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">belonged to one of the chief gardeners, having got by accident into the</td>

        <td id="L3544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3544"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3721"></td>
        <td id="LC3721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3722"></td>
        <td id="LC3722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3723"></td>
        <td id="LC3723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER VI.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3724"></td>
        <td id="LC3724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3725"></td>
        <td id="LC3725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3726"></td>
        <td id="LC3726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Several contrivances of the author to please the king and queen.  He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3727"></td>
        <td id="LC3727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shows his skill in music.  The king inquires into the state of England,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3728"></td>
        <td id="LC3728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which the author relates to him.  The king’s observations thereon.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3729"></td>
        <td id="LC3729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3730"></td>
        <td id="LC3730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I used to attend the king’s levee once or twice a week, and had often</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3731"></td>
        <td id="LC3731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seen him under the barber’s hand, which indeed was at first very terrible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3732"></td>
        <td id="LC3732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to behold; for the razor was almost twice as long as an ordinary scythe.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3733"></td>
        <td id="LC3733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His majesty, according to the custom of the country, was only shaved</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3734"></td>
        <td id="LC3734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">twice a-week.  I once prevailed on the barber to give me some of the suds</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3735"></td>
        <td id="LC3735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or lather, out of which I picked forty or fifty of the strongest stumps</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3736"></td>
        <td id="LC3736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of hair.  I then took a piece of fine wood, and cut it like the back of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3737"></td>
        <td id="LC3737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comb, making several holes in it at equal distances with as small a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3738"></td>
        <td id="LC3738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">needle as I could get from Glumdalclitch.  I fixed in the stumps so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3739"></td>
        <td id="LC3739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">artificially, scraping and sloping them with my knife toward the points,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3740"></td>
        <td id="LC3740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I made a very tolerable comb; which was a seasonable supply, my own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3741"></td>
        <td id="LC3741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being so much broken in the teeth, that it was almost useless: neither</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3742"></td>
        <td id="LC3742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did I know any artist in that country so nice and exact, as would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3743"></td>
        <td id="LC3743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">undertake to make me another.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3744"></td>
        <td id="LC3744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3745"></td>
        <td id="LC3745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And this puts me in mind of an amusement, wherein I spent many of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3746"></td>
        <td id="LC3746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leisure hours.  I desired the queen’s woman to save for me the combings</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3747"></td>
        <td id="LC3747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of her majesty’s hair, whereof in time I got a good quantity; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3748"></td>
        <td id="LC3748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consulting with my friend the cabinet-maker, who had received general</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3749"></td>
        <td id="LC3749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">orders to do little jobs for me, I directed him to make two chair-frames,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3750"></td>
        <td id="LC3750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no larger than those I had in my box, and to bore little holes with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3751"></td>
        <td id="LC3751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fine awl, round those parts where I designed the backs and seats; through</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3752"></td>
        <td id="LC3752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these holes I wove the strongest hairs I could pick out, just after the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3753"></td>
        <td id="LC3753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manner of cane chairs in England.  When they were finished, I made a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3754"></td>
        <td id="LC3754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">present of them to her majesty; who kept them in her cabinet, and used to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3755"></td>
        <td id="LC3755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">show them for curiosities, as indeed they were the wonder of every one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3756"></td>
        <td id="LC3756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that beheld them.  The queen would have me sit upon one of these chairs,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3757"></td>
        <td id="LC3757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but I absolutely refused to obey her, protesting I would rather die than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3758"></td>
        <td id="LC3758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">place a dishonourable part of my body on those precious hairs, that once</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3759"></td>
        <td id="LC3759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">adorned her majesty’s head.  Of these hairs (as I had always a mechanical</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3760"></td>
        <td id="LC3760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">genius) I likewise made a neat little purse, about five feet long, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3761"></td>
        <td id="LC3761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her majesty’s name deciphered in gold letters, which I gave to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3762"></td>
        <td id="LC3762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Glumdalclitch, by the queen’s consent.  To say the truth, it was more for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3763"></td>
        <td id="LC3763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">show than use, being not of strength to bear the weight of the larger</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3764"></td>
        <td id="LC3764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coins, and therefore she kept nothing in it but some little toys that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3765"></td>
        <td id="LC3765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">girls are fond of.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3766"></td>
        <td id="LC3766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3767"></td>
        <td id="LC3767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The king, who delighted in music, had frequent concerts at court, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3768"></td>
        <td id="LC3768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which I was sometimes carried, and set in my box on a table to hear them:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3769"></td>
        <td id="LC3769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but the noise was so great that I could hardly distinguish the tunes.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3770"></td>
        <td id="LC3770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am confident that all the drums and trumpets of a royal army, beating and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3771"></td>
        <td id="LC3771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sounding together just at your ears, could not equal it.  My practice was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3772"></td>
        <td id="LC3772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to have my box removed from the place where the performers sat, as far as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3773"></td>
        <td id="LC3773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I could, then to shut the doors and windows of it, and draw the window</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3774"></td>
        <td id="LC3774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curtains; after which I found their music not disagreeable.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3775"></td>
        <td id="LC3775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3776"></td>
        <td id="LC3776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had learned in my youth to play a little upon the spinet.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3777"></td>
        <td id="LC3777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Glumdalclitch kept one in her chamber, and a master attended twice a-week</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3778"></td>
        <td id="LC3778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to teach her: I called it a spinet, because it somewhat resembled that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3779"></td>
        <td id="LC3779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instrument, and was played upon in the same manner.  A fancy came into my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3780"></td>
        <td id="LC3780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">head, that I would entertain the king and queen with an English tune upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3781"></td>
        <td id="LC3781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this instrument.  But this appeared extremely difficult: for the spinet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3782"></td>
        <td id="LC3782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was near sixty feet long, each key being almost a foot wide, so that with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3783"></td>
        <td id="LC3783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my arms extended I could not reach to above five keys, and to press them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3784"></td>
        <td id="LC3784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down required a good smart stroke with my fist, which would be too great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3785"></td>
        <td id="LC3785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a labour, and to no purpose.  The method I contrived was this: I prepared</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3786"></td>
        <td id="LC3786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two round sticks, about the bigness of common cudgels; they were thicker</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3787"></td>
        <td id="LC3787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at one end than the other, and I covered the thicker ends with pieces of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3788"></td>
        <td id="LC3788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a mouse’s skin, that by rapping on them I might neither damage the tops</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3789"></td>
        <td id="LC3789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the keys nor interrupt the sound.  Before the spinet a bench was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3790"></td>
        <td id="LC3790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">placed, about four feet below the keys, and I was put upon the bench.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3791"></td>
        <td id="LC3791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ran sideling upon it, that way and this, as fast as I could, banging the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3792"></td>
        <td id="LC3792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proper keys with my two sticks, and made a shift to play a jig, to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3793"></td>
        <td id="LC3793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great satisfaction of both their majesties; but it was the most violent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3794"></td>
        <td id="LC3794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exercise I ever underwent; and yet I could not strike above sixteen keys,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3795"></td>
        <td id="LC3795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nor consequently play the bass and treble together, as other artists do;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3796"></td>
        <td id="LC3796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which was a great disadvantage to my performance.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3797"></td>
        <td id="LC3797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3798"></td>
        <td id="LC3798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The king, who, as I before observed, was a prince of excellent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3799"></td>
        <td id="LC3799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understanding, would frequently order that I should be brought in my box,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3800"></td>
        <td id="LC3800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and set upon the table in his closet: he would then command me to bring</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3801"></td>
        <td id="LC3801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one of my chairs out of the box, and sit down within three yards distance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3802"></td>
        <td id="LC3802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon the top of the cabinet, which brought me almost to a level with his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3803"></td>
        <td id="LC3803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face.  In this manner I had several conversations with him.  I one day</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3804"></td>
        <td id="LC3804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">took the freedom to tell his majesty, “that the contempt he discovered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3805"></td>
        <td id="LC3805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">towards Europe, and the rest of the world, did not seem answerable to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3806"></td>
        <td id="LC3806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those excellent qualities of mind that he was master of; that reason did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3807"></td>
        <td id="LC3807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not extend itself with the bulk of the body; on the contrary, we observed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
