        <td id="L3808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3808"></td>
        <td id="LC3808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in our country, that the tallest persons were usually the least provided</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3809"></td>
        <td id="LC3809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with it; that among other animals, bees and ants had the reputation of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3810"></td>
        <td id="LC3810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more industry, art, and sagacity, than many of the larger kinds; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3811"></td>
        <td id="LC3811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that, as inconsiderable as he took me to be, I hoped I might live to do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3812"></td>
        <td id="LC3812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his majesty some signal service.”  The king heard me with attention, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3813"></td>
        <td id="LC3813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">began to conceive a much better opinion of me than he had ever before.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3814"></td>
        <td id="LC3814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He desired “I would give him as exact an account of the government of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3815"></td>
        <td id="LC3815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">England as I possibly could; because, as fond as princes commonly are of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3816"></td>
        <td id="LC3816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their own customs (for so he conjectured of other monarchs, by my former</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3817"></td>
        <td id="LC3817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discourses), he should be glad to hear of any thing that might deserve</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3818"></td>
        <td id="LC3818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imitation.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3819"></td>
        <td id="LC3819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3820"></td>
        <td id="LC3820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Imagine with thyself, courteous reader, how often I then wished for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3821"></td>
        <td id="LC3821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tongue of Demosthenes or Cicero, that might have enabled me to celebrate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3822"></td>
        <td id="LC3822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the praise of my own dear native country in a style equal to its merits</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3823"></td>
        <td id="LC3823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and felicity.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3824"></td>
        <td id="LC3824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3825"></td>
        <td id="LC3825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I began my discourse by informing his majesty, that our dominions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3826"></td>
        <td id="LC3826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consisted of two islands, which composed three mighty kingdoms, under one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3827"></td>
        <td id="LC3827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sovereign, beside our plantations in America.  I dwelt long upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3828"></td>
        <td id="LC3828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fertility of our soil, and the temperature of our climate.  I then spoke</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3829"></td>
        <td id="LC3829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at large upon the constitution of an English parliament; partly made up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3830"></td>
        <td id="LC3830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of an illustrious body called the House of Peers; persons of the noblest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3831"></td>
        <td id="LC3831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blood, and of the most ancient and ample patrimonies.  I described that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3832"></td>
        <td id="LC3832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extraordinary care always taken of their education in arts and arms, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3833"></td>
        <td id="LC3833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">qualify them for being counsellors both to the king and kingdom; to have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3834"></td>
        <td id="LC3834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a share in the legislature; to be members of the highest court of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3835"></td>
        <td id="LC3835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">judicature, whence there can be no appeal; and to be champions always</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3836"></td>
        <td id="LC3836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ready for the defence of their prince and country, by their valour,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3837"></td>
        <td id="LC3837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conduct, and fidelity.  That these were the ornament and bulwark of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3838"></td>
        <td id="LC3838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kingdom, worthy followers of their most renowned ancestors, whose honour</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3839"></td>
        <td id="LC3839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been the reward of their virtue, from which their posterity were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3840"></td>
        <td id="LC3840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never once known to degenerate.  To these were joined several holy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3841"></td>
        <td id="LC3841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">persons, as part of that assembly, under the title of bishops, whose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3842"></td>
        <td id="LC3842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">peculiar business is to take care of religion, and of those who instruct</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3843"></td>
        <td id="LC3843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the people therein.  These were searched and sought out through the whole</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3844"></td>
        <td id="LC3844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nation, by the prince and his wisest counsellors, among such of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3845"></td>
        <td id="LC3845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">priesthood as were most deservedly distinguished by the sanctity of their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3846"></td>
        <td id="LC3846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lives, and the depth of their erudition; who were indeed the spiritual</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3847"></td>
        <td id="LC3847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fathers of the clergy and the people.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3848"></td>
        <td id="LC3848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3849"></td>
        <td id="LC3849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That the other part of the parliament consisted of an assembly called the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3850"></td>
        <td id="LC3850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">House of Commons, who were all principal gentlemen, freely picked and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3851"></td>
        <td id="LC3851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">culled out by the people themselves, for their great abilities and love</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3852"></td>
        <td id="LC3852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of their country, to represent the wisdom of the whole nation.  And that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3853"></td>
        <td id="LC3853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these two bodies made up the most august assembly in Europe; to whom, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3854"></td>
        <td id="LC3854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conjunction with the prince, the whole legislature is committed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3855"></td>
        <td id="LC3855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3856"></td>
        <td id="LC3856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I then descended to the courts of justice; over which the judges, those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3857"></td>
        <td id="LC3857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">venerable sages and interpreters of the law, presided, for determining</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3858"></td>
        <td id="LC3858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the disputed rights and properties of men, as well as for the punishment</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3859"></td>
        <td id="LC3859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of vice and protection of innocence.  I mentioned the prudent management</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3860"></td>
        <td id="LC3860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of our treasury; the valour and achievements of our forces, by sea and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3861"></td>
        <td id="LC3861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">land.  I computed the number of our people, by reckoning how many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3862"></td>
        <td id="LC3862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">millions there might be of each religious sect, or political party among</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3863"></td>
        <td id="LC3863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us.  I did not omit even our sports and pastimes, or any other particular</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3864"></td>
        <td id="LC3864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which I thought might redound to the honour of my country.  And I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3865"></td>
        <td id="LC3865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">finished all with a brief historical account of affairs and events in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3866"></td>
        <td id="LC3866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">England for about a hundred years past.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3867"></td>
        <td id="LC3867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3868"></td>
        <td id="LC3868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This conversation was not ended under five audiences, each of several</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3869"></td>
        <td id="LC3869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hours; and the king heard the whole with great attention, frequently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3870"></td>
        <td id="LC3870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">taking notes of what I spoke, as well as memorandums of what questions he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3871"></td>
        <td id="LC3871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intended to ask me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3872"></td>
        <td id="LC3872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3873"></td>
        <td id="LC3873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I had put an end to these long discources, his majesty, in a sixth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3874"></td>
        <td id="LC3874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">audience, consulting his notes, proposed many doubts, queries, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3875"></td>
        <td id="LC3875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">objections, upon every article.  He asked, “What methods were used to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3876"></td>
        <td id="LC3876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cultivate the minds and bodies of our young nobility, and in what kind of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3877"></td>
        <td id="LC3877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">business they commonly spent the first and teachable parts of their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3878"></td>
        <td id="LC3878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lives?  What course was taken to supply that assembly, when any noble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3879"></td>
        <td id="LC3879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">family became extinct?  What qualifications were necessary in those who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3880"></td>
        <td id="LC3880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are to be created new lords: whether the humour of the prince, a sum of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3881"></td>
        <td id="LC3881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">money to a court lady, or a design of strengthening a party opposite to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3882"></td>
        <td id="LC3882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the public interest, ever happened to be the motive in those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3883"></td>
        <td id="LC3883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advancements?  What share of knowledge these lords had in the laws of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3884"></td>
        <td id="LC3884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their country, and how they came by it, so as to enable them to decide</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3885"></td>
        <td id="LC3885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the properties of their fellow-subjects in the last resort?  Whether they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3886"></td>
        <td id="LC3886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were always so free from avarice, partialities, or want, that a bribe, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3887"></td>
        <td id="LC3887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some other sinister view, could have no place among them?  Whether those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3888"></td>
        <td id="LC3888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">holy lords I spoke of were always promoted to that rank upon account of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3889"></td>
        <td id="LC3889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their knowledge in religious matters, and the sanctity of their lives;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3890"></td>
        <td id="LC3890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had never been compliers with the times, while they were common priests;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3891"></td>
        <td id="LC3891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or slavish prostitute chaplains to some nobleman, whose opinions they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3892"></td>
        <td id="LC3892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">continued servilely to follow, after they were admitted into that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3893"></td>
        <td id="LC3893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assembly?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3894"></td>
        <td id="LC3894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3895"></td>
        <td id="LC3895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He then desired to know, “What arts were practised in electing those whom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3896"></td>
        <td id="LC3896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I called commoners: whether a stranger, with a strong purse, might not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3897"></td>
        <td id="LC3897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">influence the vulgar voters to choose him before their own landlord, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3898"></td>
        <td id="LC3898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the most considerable gentleman in the neighbourhood?  How it came to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3899"></td>
        <td id="LC3899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pass, that people were so violently bent upon getting into this assembly,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3900"></td>
        <td id="LC3900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which I allowed to be a great trouble and expense, often to the ruin of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3901"></td>
        <td id="LC3901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their families, without any salary or pension? because this appeared such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3902"></td>
        <td id="LC3902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an exalted strain of virtue and public spirit, that his majesty seemed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3903"></td>
        <td id="LC3903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doubt it might possibly not be always sincere.”  And he desired to know,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3904"></td>
        <td id="LC3904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Whether such zealous gentlemen could have any views of refunding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3905"></td>
        <td id="LC3905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">themselves for the charges and trouble they were at by sacrificing the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3906"></td>
        <td id="LC3906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">public good to the designs of a weak and vicious prince, in conjunction</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3907"></td>
        <td id="LC3907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a corrupted ministry?”  He multiplied his questions, and sifted me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3908"></td>
        <td id="LC3908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thoroughly upon every part of this head, proposing numberless inquiries</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3909"></td>
        <td id="LC3909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and objections, which I think it not prudent or convenient to repeat.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3910"></td>
        <td id="LC3910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3911"></td>
        <td id="LC3911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Upon what I said in relation to our courts of justice, his majesty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3912"></td>
        <td id="LC3912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desired to be satisfied in several points: and this I was the better able</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3913"></td>
        <td id="LC3913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to do, having been formerly almost ruined by a long suit in chancery,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3914"></td>
        <td id="LC3914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which was decreed for me with costs.  He asked, “What time was usually</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3915"></td>
        <td id="LC3915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spent in determining between right and wrong, and what degree of expense?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3916"></td>
        <td id="LC3916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whether advocates and orators had liberty to plead in causes manifestly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3917"></td>
        <td id="LC3917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">known to be unjust, vexatious, or oppressive?  Whether party, in religion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3918"></td>
        <td id="LC3918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or politics, were observed to be of any weight in the scale of justice?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3919"></td>
        <td id="LC3919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whether those pleading orators were persons educated in the general</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3920"></td>
        <td id="LC3920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knowledge of equity, or only in provincial, national, and other local</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3921"></td>
        <td id="LC3921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">customs?  Whether they or their judges had any part in penning those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3922"></td>
        <td id="LC3922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laws, which they assumed the liberty of interpreting, and glossing upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3923"></td>
        <td id="LC3923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at their pleasure?  Whether they had ever, at different times, pleaded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3924"></td>
        <td id="LC3924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for and against the same cause, and cited precedents to prove contrary</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3925"></td>
        <td id="LC3925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opinions?  Whether they were a rich or a poor corporation?  Whether they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3926"></td>
        <td id="LC3926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">received any pecuniary reward for pleading, or delivering their opinions?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3927"></td>
        <td id="LC3927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And particularly, whether they were ever admitted as members in the lower</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3928"></td>
        <td id="LC3928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">senate?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3929"></td>
        <td id="LC3929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3930"></td>
        <td id="LC3930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He fell next upon the management of our treasury; and said, “he thought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3931"></td>
        <td id="LC3931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my memory had failed me, because I computed our taxes at about five or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3932"></td>
        <td id="LC3932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">six millions a-year, and when I came to mention the issues, he found they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3933"></td>
        <td id="LC3933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sometimes amounted to more than double; for the notes he had taken were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3934"></td>
        <td id="LC3934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very particular in this point, because he hoped, as he told me, that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3935"></td>
        <td id="LC3935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knowledge of our conduct might be useful to him, and he could not be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3936"></td>
        <td id="LC3936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deceived in his calculations.  But, if what I told him were true, he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3937"></td>
        <td id="LC3937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">still at a loss how a kingdom could run out of its estate, like a private</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3938"></td>
        <td id="LC3938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">person.”  He asked me, “who were our creditors; and where we found money</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3939"></td>
        <td id="LC3939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to pay them?”  He wondered to hear me talk of such chargeable and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3940"></td>
        <td id="LC3940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expensive wars; “that certainly we must be a quarrelsome people, or live</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3941"></td>
        <td id="LC3941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">among very bad neighbours, and that our generals must needs be richer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3942"></td>
        <td id="LC3942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than our kings.”  He asked, what business we had out of our own islands,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3943"></td>
        <td id="LC3943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unless upon the score of trade, or treaty, or to defend the coasts with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3944"></td>
        <td id="LC3944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our fleet?”  Above all, he was amazed to hear me talk of a mercenary</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3945"></td>
        <td id="LC3945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">standing army, in the midst of peace, and among a free people.  He said,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3946"></td>
        <td id="LC3946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“if we were governed by our own consent, in the persons of our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3947"></td>
        <td id="LC3947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">representatives, he could not imagine of whom we were afraid, or against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3948"></td>
        <td id="LC3948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whom we were to fight; and would hear my opinion, whether a private man’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3949"></td>
        <td id="LC3949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house might not be better defended by himself, his children, and family,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3950"></td>
        <td id="LC3950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than by half-a-dozen rascals, picked up at a venture in the streets for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3951"></td>
        <td id="LC3951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">small wages, who might get a hundred times more by cutting their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3952"></td>
        <td id="LC3952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">throats?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3953"></td>
        <td id="LC3953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3954"></td>
        <td id="LC3954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He laughed at my “odd kind of arithmetic,” as he was pleased to call it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3955"></td>
        <td id="LC3955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“in reckoning the numbers of our people, by a computation drawn from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3956"></td>
        <td id="LC3956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several sects among us, in religion and politics.”  He said, “he knew no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3957"></td>
        <td id="LC3957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reason why those, who entertain opinions prejudicial to the public,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3958"></td>
        <td id="LC3958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should be obliged to change, or should not be obliged to conceal them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3959"></td>
        <td id="LC3959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And as it was tyranny in any government to require the first, so it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3960"></td>
        <td id="LC3960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weakness not to enforce the second: for a man may be allowed to keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3961"></td>
        <td id="LC3961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poisons in his closet, but not to vend them about for cordials.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3962"></td>
        <td id="LC3962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3963"></td>
        <td id="LC3963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He observed, “that among the diversions of our nobility and gentry, I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3964"></td>
        <td id="LC3964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mentioned gaming: he desired to know at what age this entertainment was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3965"></td>
        <td id="LC3965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">usually taken up, and when it was laid down; how much of their time it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3966"></td>
        <td id="LC3966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">employed; whether it ever went so high as to affect their fortunes;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3967"></td>
        <td id="LC3967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether mean, vicious people, by their dexterity in that art, might not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3968"></td>
        <td id="LC3968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arrive at great riches, and sometimes keep our very nobles in dependence,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3969"></td>
        <td id="LC3969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as well as habituate them to vile companions, wholly take them from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3970"></td>
        <td id="LC3970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">improvement of their minds, and force them, by the losses they received,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3971"></td>
        <td id="LC3971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to learn and practise that infamous dexterity upon others?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3972"></td>
        <td id="LC3972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3973"></td>
        <td id="LC3973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He was perfectly astonished with the historical account gave him of our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3974"></td>
        <td id="LC3974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">affairs during the last century; protesting “it was only a heap of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3975"></td>
        <td id="LC3975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conspiracies, rebellions, murders, massacres, revolutions, banishments,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3976"></td>
        <td id="LC3976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the very worst effects that avarice, faction, hypocrisy, perfidiousness,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3977"></td>
        <td id="LC3977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cruelty, rage, madness, hatred, envy, lust, malice, and ambition, could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3978"></td>
        <td id="LC3978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">produce.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3979"></td>
        <td id="LC3979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3980"></td>
        <td id="LC3980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His majesty, in another audience, was at the pains to recapitulate the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3981"></td>
        <td id="LC3981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sum of all I had spoken; compared the questions he made with the answers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3982"></td>
        <td id="LC3982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had given; then taking me into his hands, and stroking me gently,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3983"></td>
        <td id="LC3983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">delivered himself in these words, which I shall never forget, nor the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3984"></td>
        <td id="LC3984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manner he spoke them in: “My little friend Grildrig, you have made a most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3985"></td>
        <td id="LC3985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">admirable panegyric upon your country; you have clearly proved, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3986"></td>
        <td id="LC3986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ignorance, idleness, and vice, are the proper ingredients for qualifying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3987"></td>
        <td id="LC3987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a legislator; that laws are best explained, interpreted, and applied, by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3988"></td>
        <td id="LC3988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those whose interest and abilities lie in perverting, confounding, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3989"></td>
        <td id="LC3989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eluding them.  I observe among you some lines of an institution, which,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3990"></td>
        <td id="LC3990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in its original, might have been tolerable, but these half erased, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3991"></td>
        <td id="LC3991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the rest wholly blurred and blotted by corruptions.  It does not appear,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3992"></td>
        <td id="LC3992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from all you have said, how any one perfection is required toward the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3993"></td>
        <td id="LC3993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">procurement of any one station among you; much less, that men are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3994"></td>
        <td id="LC3994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ennobled on account of their virtue; that priests are advanced for their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3995"></td>
        <td id="LC3995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">piety or learning; soldiers, for their conduct or valour; judges, for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3996"></td>
        <td id="LC3996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their integrity; senators, for the love of their country; or counsellors</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3997"></td>
        <td id="LC3997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for their wisdom.  As for yourself,” continued the king, “who have spent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3998"></td>
        <td id="LC3998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the greatest part of your life in travelling, I am well disposed to hope</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3999"></td>
        <td id="LC3999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you may hitherto have escaped many vices of your country.  But by what I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4000"></td>
        <td id="LC4000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have gathered from your own relation, and the answers I have with much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4001"></td>
        <td id="LC4001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pains wrung and extorted from you, I cannot but conclude the bulk of your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4002"></td>
        <td id="LC4002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">natives to be the most pernicious race of little odious vermin that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4003"></td>
        <td id="LC4003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nature ever suffered to crawl upon the surface of the earth.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4004"></td>
        <td id="LC4004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4005"></td>
        <td id="LC4005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4006"></td>
        <td id="LC4006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4007"></td>
        <td id="LC4007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER VII.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4008"></td>
        <td id="LC4008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4009"></td>
        <td id="LC4009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4010"></td>
        <td id="LC4010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author’s love of his country.  He makes a proposal of much advantage</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4011"></td>
        <td id="LC4011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the king, which is rejected.  The king’s great ignorance in politics.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4012"></td>
        <td id="LC4012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The learning of that country very imperfect and confined.  The laws, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4013"></td>
        <td id="LC4013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">military affairs, and parties in the state.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4014"></td>
        <td id="LC4014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4015"></td>
        <td id="LC4015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nothing but an extreme love of truth could have hindered me from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4016"></td>
        <td id="LC4016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">concealing this part of my story.  It was in vain to discover my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4017"></td>
        <td id="LC4017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resentments, which were always turned into ridicule; and I was forced to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4018"></td>
        <td id="LC4018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rest with patience, while my noble and beloved country was so injuriously</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4019"></td>
        <td id="LC4019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">treated.  I am as heartily sorry as any of my readers can possibly be,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4020"></td>
        <td id="LC4020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that such an occasion was given: but this prince happened to be so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4021"></td>
        <td id="LC4021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curious and inquisitive upon every particular, that it could not consist</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4022"></td>
        <td id="LC4022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">either with gratitude or good manners, to refuse giving him what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4023"></td>
        <td id="LC4023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">satisfaction I was able.  Yet thus much I may be allowed to say in my own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4024"></td>
        <td id="LC4024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vindication, that I artfully eluded many of his questions, and gave to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4025"></td>
        <td id="LC4025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every point a more favourable turn, by many degrees, than the strictness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4026"></td>
        <td id="LC4026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of truth would allow.  For I have always borne that laudable partiality</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4027"></td>
        <td id="LC4027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to my own country, which Dionysius Halicarnassensis, with so much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4028"></td>
        <td id="LC4028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice, recommends to an historian: I would hide the frailties and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4029"></td>
        <td id="LC4029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deformities of my political mother, and place her virtues and beauties in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4030"></td>
        <td id="LC4030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the most advantageous light.  This was my sincere endeavour in those many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4031"></td>
        <td id="LC4031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discourses I had with that monarch, although it unfortunately failed of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4032"></td>
        <td id="LC4032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">success.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4033"></td>
        <td id="LC4033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4034"></td>
        <td id="LC4034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But great allowances should be given to a king, who lives wholly secluded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4035"></td>
        <td id="LC4035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the rest of the world, and must therefore be altogether unacquainted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4036"></td>
        <td id="LC4036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the manners and customs that most prevail in other nations: the want</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4037"></td>
        <td id="LC4037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of which knowledge will ever produce many prejudices, and a certain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4038"></td>
        <td id="LC4038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">narrowness of thinking, from which we, and the politer countries of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4039"></td>
        <td id="LC4039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Europe, are wholly exempted.  And it would be hard indeed, if so remote a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4040"></td>
        <td id="LC4040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prince’s notions of virtue and vice were to be offered as a standard for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4041"></td>
        <td id="LC4041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all mankind.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4042"></td>
        <td id="LC4042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4043"></td>
        <td id="LC4043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To confirm what I have now said, and further to show the miserable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4044"></td>
        <td id="LC4044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">effects of a confined education, I shall here insert a passage, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4045"></td>
        <td id="LC4045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will hardly obtain belief.  In hopes to ingratiate myself further into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4046"></td>
        <td id="LC4046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his majesty’s favour, I told him of “an invention, discovered between</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4047"></td>
        <td id="LC4047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">three and four hundred years ago, to make a certain powder, into a heap</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4048"></td>
        <td id="LC4048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of which, the smallest spark of fire falling, would kindle the whole in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4049"></td>
        <td id="LC4049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moment, although it were as big as a mountain, and make it all fly up in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4050"></td>
        <td id="LC4050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the air together, with a noise and agitation greater than thunder.  That</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4051"></td>
        <td id="LC4051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a proper quantity of this powder rammed into a hollow tube of brass or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4052"></td>
        <td id="LC4052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">iron, according to its bigness, would drive a ball of iron or lead, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4053"></td>
        <td id="LC4053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such violence and speed, as nothing was able to sustain its force.  That</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4054"></td>
        <td id="LC4054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the largest balls thus discharged, would not only destroy whole ranks of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4055"></td>
        <td id="LC4055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an army at once, but batter the strongest walls to the ground, sink down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4056"></td>
        <td id="LC4056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ships, with a thousand men in each, to the bottom of the sea, and when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4057"></td>
        <td id="LC4057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">linked together by a chain, would cut through masts and rigging, divide</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4058"></td>
        <td id="LC4058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hundreds of bodies in the middle, and lay all waste before them.  That we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4059"></td>
        <td id="LC4059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">often put this powder into large hollow balls of iron, and discharged</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4060"></td>
        <td id="LC4060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them by an engine into some city we were besieging, which would rip up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4061"></td>
        <td id="LC4061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the pavements, tear the houses to pieces, burst and throw splinters on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4062"></td>
        <td id="LC4062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every side, dashing out the brains of all who came near.  That I knew the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4063"></td>
        <td id="LC4063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ingredients very well, which were cheap and common; I understood the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4064"></td>
        <td id="LC4064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manner of compounding them, and could direct his workmen how to make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4065"></td>
        <td id="LC4065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those tubes, of a size proportionable to all other things in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4066"></td>
        <td id="LC4066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">majesty’s kingdom, and the largest need not be above a hundred feet long;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4067"></td>
        <td id="LC4067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">twenty or thirty of which tubes, charged with the proper quantity of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4068"></td>
        <td id="LC4068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">powder and balls, would batter down the walls of the strongest town in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4069"></td>
        <td id="LC4069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his dominions in a few hours, or destroy the whole metropolis, if ever it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4070"></td>
        <td id="LC4070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should pretend to dispute his absolute commands.”  This I humbly offered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4071"></td>
        <td id="LC4071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to his majesty, as a small tribute of acknowledgment, in turn for so many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4072"></td>
        <td id="LC4072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">marks that I had received, of his royal favour and protection.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4073"></td>
        <td id="LC4073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4074"></td>
        <td id="LC4074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The king was struck with horror at the description I had given of those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4075"></td>
        <td id="LC4075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">terrible engines, and the proposal I had made.  “He was amazed, how so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4076"></td>
        <td id="LC4076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impotent and grovelling an insect as I” (these were his expressions)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4077"></td>
        <td id="LC4077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“could entertain such inhuman ideas, and in so familiar a manner, as to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4078"></td>
        <td id="LC4078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appear wholly unmoved at all the scenes of blood and desolation which I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4079"></td>
        <td id="LC4079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had painted as the common effects of those destructive machines;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4080"></td>
        <td id="LC4080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whereof,” he said, “some evil genius, enemy to mankind, must have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4081"></td>
        <td id="LC4081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the first contriver.  As for himself, he protested, that although few</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4082"></td>
        <td id="LC4082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things delighted him so much as new discoveries in art or in nature, yet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4083"></td>

        <td id="L4171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4171"></td>
        <td id="LC4171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dug up in several parts of the kingdom, far exceeding the common dwindled</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4172"></td>
        <td id="LC4172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">race of men in our days.”  He argued, “that the very laws of nature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4173"></td>
        <td id="LC4173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">absolutely required we should have been made, in the beginning of a size</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4174"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L4177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4177"></td>
        <td id="LC4177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reasoning, the author drew several moral applications, useful in the</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L4179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4179"></td>

        <td id="L4226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4226"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4241"></td>

        <td id="L4242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4242"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4250"></td>
        <td id="LC4250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had now been two years in this country; and about the beginning of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4251"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4252"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4253"></td>
        <td id="LC4253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">travelling-box, which as I have already described, was a very convenient</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4254"></td>
        <td id="LC4254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">closet, of twelve feet wide.  And I had ordered a hammock to be fixed, by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4255"></td>
        <td id="LC4255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silken ropes from the four corners at the top, to break the jolts, when a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4256"></td>
        <td id="LC4256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">servant carried me before him on horseback, as I sometimes desired; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4257"></td>
        <td id="LC4257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would often sleep in my hammock, while we were upon the road.  On the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4258"></td>
        <td id="LC4258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">roof of my closet, not directly over the middle of the hammock, I ordered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4259"></td>
        <td id="LC4259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the joiner to cut out a hole of a foot square, to give me air in hot</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4260"></td>
        <td id="LC4260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weather, as I slept; which hole I shut at pleasure with a board that drew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4261"></td>
        <td id="LC4261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">backward and forward through a groove.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4262"></td>
        <td id="LC4262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4263"></td>
        <td id="LC4263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When we came to our journey’s end, the king thought proper to pass a few</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4353"></td>

        <td id="L4354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4354"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4355"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4363"></td>

        <td id="L4364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4364"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4435"></td>

        <td id="L4436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4436"></td>

        <td id="L4437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4437"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4438"></td>
        <td id="LC4438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ordered them to tow my chest, as they called it, toward the ship.  When</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4439"></td>
        <td id="LC4439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it was there, he gave directions to fasten another cable to the ring</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4440"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4515"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4518"></td>

        <td id="L4519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4519"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4520"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4521"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4522"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4523"></td>
        <td id="LC4523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">likewise observed another thing, that, when I first got into the ship,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4524"></td>
        <td id="LC4524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the sailors stood all about me, I thought they were the most little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4525"></td>
        <td id="LC4525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contemptible creatures I had ever beheld.”  For indeed, while I was in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4526"></td>
        <td id="LC4526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that prince’s country, I could never endure to look in a glass, after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4527"></td>
        <td id="LC4527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mine eyes had been accustomed to such prodigious objects, because the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4528"></td>
        <td id="LC4528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comparison gave me so despicable a conceit of myself.  The captain said,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4529"></td>
        <td id="LC4529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“that while we were at supper, he observed me to look at every thing with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4530"></td>
        <td id="LC4530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a sort of wonder, and that I often seemed hardly able to contain my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4531"></td>
        <td id="LC4531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laughter, which he knew not well how to take, but imputed it to some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4532"></td>
        <td id="LC4532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disorder in my brain.”  I answered, “it was very true; and I wondered how</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4533"></td>
        <td id="LC4533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I could forbear, when I saw his dishes of the size of a silver</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4534"></td>
        <td id="LC4534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">three-pence, a leg of pork hardly a mouthful, a cup not so big as a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4535"></td>
        <td id="LC4535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nut-shell;” and so I went on, describing the rest of his household-stuff</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4536"></td>
        <td id="LC4536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and provisions, after the same manner.  For, although he queen had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4537"></td>
        <td id="LC4537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ordered a little equipage of all things necessary for me, while I was in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4538"></td>
        <td id="LC4538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her service, yet my ideas were wholly taken up with what I saw on every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4539"></td>
        <td id="LC4539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">side of me, and I winked at my own littleness, as people do at their own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4540"></td>
        <td id="LC4540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">faults.  The captain understood my raillery very well, and merrily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4541"></td>
        <td id="LC4541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">replied with the old English proverb, “that he doubted mine eyes were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4542"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4543"></td>
