        <td id="L4544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4544"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4548"></td>

        <td id="L4549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4549"></td>
        <td id="LC4549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did not much admire the conceit.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4550"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4551"></td>
        <td id="LC4551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The captain having been at Tonquin, was, in his return to England, driven</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4552"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4556"></td>
        <td id="LC4556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Good Hope.  Our voyage was very prosperous, but I shall not trouble the</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC4557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reader with a journal of it.  The captain called in at one or two ports,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4558"></td>
        <td id="LC4558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and sent in his long-boat for provisions and fresh water; but I never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4559"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC4564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hired a horse and guide for five shillings, which I borrowed of the</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4565"></td>
        <td id="LC4565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">captain.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4566"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4567"></td>
        <td id="LC4567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As I was on the road, observing the littleness of the houses, the trees,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4568"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4569"></td>
        <td id="LC4569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afraid of trampling on every traveller I met, and often called aloud to</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4584"></td>
        <td id="LC4584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so unaccountably, that they were all of the captain’s opinion when he</td>

        <td id="L4588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4588"></td>

        <td id="LC4599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">PART III.  A VOYAGE TO LAPUTA, BALNIBARBI, LUGGNAGG, GLUBBDUBDRIB, AND</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4600"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4607"></td>
        <td id="LC4607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER I.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4608"></td>
        <td id="LC4608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4609"></td>
        <td id="LC4609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4610"></td>
        <td id="LC4610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author sets out on his third voyage.  Is taken by pirates.  The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4611"></td>
        <td id="LC4611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">malice of a Dutchman.  His arrival at an island.  He is received into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4612"></td>
        <td id="LC4612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Laputa.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4613"></td>
        <td id="LC4613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4614"></td>
        <td id="LC4614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had not been at home above ten days, when Captain William Robinson, a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4615"></td>
        <td id="LC4615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Cornish man, commander of the Hopewell, a stout ship of three hundred</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4616"></td>
        <td id="LC4616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tons, came to my house.  I had formerly been surgeon of another ship</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4617"></td>
        <td id="LC4617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where he was master, and a fourth part owner, in a voyage to the Levant.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4618"></td>
        <td id="LC4618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He had always treated me more like a brother, than an inferior officer;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4619"></td>
        <td id="LC4619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and, hearing of my arrival, made me a visit, as I apprehended only out of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4620"></td>
        <td id="LC4620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friendship, for nothing passed more than what is usual after long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4621"></td>
        <td id="LC4621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">absences.  But repeating his visits often, expressing his joy to find I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4622"></td>
        <td id="LC4622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me in good health, asking, “whether I were now settled for life?” adding,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4623"></td>
        <td id="LC4623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“that he intended a voyage to the East Indies in two months,” at last he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4624"></td>
        <td id="LC4624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plainly invited me, though with some apologies, to be surgeon of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4625"></td>
        <td id="LC4625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ship; “that I should have another surgeon under me, beside our two mates;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4626"></td>
        <td id="LC4626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that my salary should be double to the usual pay; and that having</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4627"></td>
        <td id="LC4627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">experienced my knowledge in sea-affairs to be at least equal to his, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4628"></td>
        <td id="LC4628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would enter into any engagement to follow my advice, as much as if I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4629"></td>
        <td id="LC4629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shared in the command.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4630"></td>
        <td id="LC4630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4631"></td>
        <td id="LC4631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He said so many other obliging things, and I knew him to be so honest a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4632"></td>
        <td id="LC4632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man, that I could not reject this proposal; the thirst I had of seeing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4633"></td>
        <td id="LC4633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the world, notwithstanding my past misfortunes, continuing as violent as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4634"></td>
        <td id="LC4634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ever.  The only difficulty that remained, was to persuade my wife, whose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4635"></td>
        <td id="LC4635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consent however I at last obtained, by the prospect of advantage she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4636"></td>
        <td id="LC4636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proposed to her children.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4637"></td>
        <td id="LC4637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4638"></td>
        <td id="LC4638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We set out the 5th day of August, 1706, and arrived at Fort St. George</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4639"></td>
        <td id="LC4639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the 11th of April, 1707.  We staid there three weeks to refresh our crew,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4640"></td>
        <td id="LC4640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many of whom were sick.  From thence we went to Tonquin, where the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4641"></td>
        <td id="LC4641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">captain resolved to continue some time, because many of the goods he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4642"></td>
        <td id="LC4642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intended to buy were not ready, nor could he expect to be dispatched in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4643"></td>
        <td id="LC4643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several months.  Therefore, in hopes to defray some of the charges he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4644"></td>
        <td id="LC4644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must be at, he bought a sloop, loaded it with several sorts of goods,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4645"></td>
        <td id="LC4645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wherewith the Tonquinese usually trade to the neighbouring islands, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4646"></td>
        <td id="LC4646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">putting fourteen men on board, whereof three were of the country, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4647"></td>
        <td id="LC4647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appointed me master of the sloop, and gave me power to traffic, while he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4648"></td>
        <td id="LC4648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">transacted his affairs at Tonquin.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4649"></td>
        <td id="LC4649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4650"></td>
        <td id="LC4650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We had not sailed above three days, when a great storm arising, we were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4651"></td>
        <td id="LC4651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">driven five days to the north-north-east, and then to the east: after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4652"></td>
        <td id="LC4652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which we had fair weather, but still with a pretty strong gale from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4653"></td>
        <td id="LC4653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">west.  Upon the tenth day we were chased by two pirates, who soon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4654"></td>
        <td id="LC4654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">overtook us; for my sloop was so deep laden, that she sailed very slow,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4655"></td>
        <td id="LC4655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neither were we in a condition to defend ourselves.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4656"></td>
        <td id="LC4656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4657"></td>
        <td id="LC4657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We were boarded about the same time by both the pirates, who entered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4658"></td>
        <td id="LC4658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">furiously at the head of their men; but finding us all prostrate upon our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4659"></td>
        <td id="LC4659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">faces (for so I gave order), they pinioned us with strong ropes, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4660"></td>
        <td id="LC4660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">setting guard upon us, went to search the sloop.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4661"></td>
        <td id="LC4661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4662"></td>
        <td id="LC4662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I observed among them a Dutchman, who seemed to be of some authority,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4663"></td>
        <td id="LC4663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though he was not commander of either ship.  He knew us by our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4664"></td>
        <td id="LC4664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">countenances to be Englishmen, and jabbering to us in his own language,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4665"></td>
        <td id="LC4665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swore we should be tied back to back and thrown into the sea.  I spoken</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4666"></td>
        <td id="LC4666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dutch tolerably well; I told him who we were, and begged him, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4667"></td>
        <td id="LC4667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consideration of our being Christians and Protestants, of neighbouring</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4668"></td>
        <td id="LC4668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">countries in strict alliance, that he would move the captains to take</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4669"></td>
        <td id="LC4669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some pity on us.  This inflamed his rage; he repeated his threatenings,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4670"></td>
        <td id="LC4670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and turning to his companions, spoke with great vehemence in the Japanese</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4671"></td>
        <td id="LC4671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">language, as I suppose, often using the word _Christianos_.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4672"></td>
        <td id="LC4672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4673"></td>
        <td id="LC4673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The largest of the two pirate ships was commanded by a Japanese captain,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4674"></td>
        <td id="LC4674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who spoke a little Dutch, but very imperfectly.  He came up to me, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4675"></td>
        <td id="LC4675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after several questions, which I answered in great humility, he said, “we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4676"></td>
        <td id="LC4676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should not die.”  I made the captain a very low bow, and then, turning to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4677"></td>
        <td id="LC4677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Dutchman, said, “I was sorry to find more mercy in a heathen, than in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4678"></td>
        <td id="LC4678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a brother christian.”  But I had soon reason to repent those foolish</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4679"></td>
        <td id="LC4679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">words: for that malicious reprobate, having often endeavoured in vain to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4680"></td>
        <td id="LC4680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">persuade both the captains that I might be thrown into the sea (which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4681"></td>
        <td id="LC4681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they would not yield to, after the promise made me that I should not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4682"></td>
        <td id="LC4682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">die), however, prevailed so far, as to have a punishment inflicted on me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4683"></td>
        <td id="LC4683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">worse, in all human appearance, than death itself.  My men were sent by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4684"></td>
        <td id="LC4684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an equal division into both the pirate ships, and my sloop new manned.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4685"></td>
        <td id="LC4685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As to myself, it was determined that I should be set adrift in a small</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4686"></td>
        <td id="LC4686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">canoe, with paddles and a sail, and four days’ provisions; which last,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4687"></td>
        <td id="LC4687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Japanese captain was so kind to double out of his own stores, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4688"></td>
        <td id="LC4688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would permit no man to search me.  I got down into the canoe, while the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4689"></td>
        <td id="LC4689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dutchman, standing upon the deck, loaded me with all the curses and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4690"></td>
        <td id="LC4690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">injurious terms his language could afford.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4691"></td>
        <td id="LC4691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4692"></td>
        <td id="LC4692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">About an hour before we saw the pirates I had taken an observation, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4693"></td>
        <td id="LC4693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found we were in the latitude of 46 N. and longitude of 183.  When I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4694"></td>
        <td id="LC4694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at some distance from the pirates, I discovered, by my pocket-glass,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4695"></td>
        <td id="LC4695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several islands to the south-east.  I set up my sail, the wind being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4696"></td>
        <td id="LC4696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fair, with a design to reach the nearest of those islands, which I made a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4697"></td>
        <td id="LC4697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shift to do, in about three hours.  It was all rocky: however I got many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4698"></td>
        <td id="LC4698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">birds’ eggs; and, striking fire, I kindled some heath and dry sea-weed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4699"></td>
        <td id="LC4699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by which I roasted my eggs.  I ate no other supper, being resolved to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4700"></td>
        <td id="LC4700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spare my provisions as much as I could.  I passed the night under the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4701"></td>
        <td id="LC4701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shelter of a rock, strewing some heath under me, and slept pretty well.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4702"></td>
        <td id="LC4702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4703"></td>
        <td id="LC4703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The next day I sailed to another island, and thence to a third and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4704"></td>
        <td id="LC4704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fourth, sometimes using my sail, and sometimes my paddles.  But, not to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4705"></td>
        <td id="LC4705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trouble the reader with a particular account of my distresses, let it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4706"></td>
        <td id="LC4706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suffice, that on the fifth day I arrived at the last island in my sight,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4707"></td>
        <td id="LC4707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which lay south-south-east to the former.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4708"></td>
        <td id="LC4708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4709"></td>
        <td id="LC4709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This island was at a greater distance than I expected, and I did not</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4799"></td>
        <td id="LC4799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the marks and circumstances of wonder; neither indeed was I much in their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4800"></td>
        <td id="LC4800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">debt, having never till then seen a race of mortals so singular in their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4801"></td>
        <td id="LC4801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shapes, habits, and countenances.  Their heads were all reclined, either</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4802"></td>
        <td id="LC4802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the right, or the left; one of their eyes turned inward, and the other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4803"></td>
        <td id="LC4803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">directly up to the zenith.  Their outward garments were adorned with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4804"></td>
        <td id="LC4804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">figures of suns, moons, and stars; interwoven with those of fiddles,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4805"></td>
        <td id="LC4805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flutes, harps, trumpets, guitars, harpsichords, and many other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4806"></td>
        <td id="LC4806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instruments of music, unknown to us in Europe.  I observed, here and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4807"></td>
        <td id="LC4807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there, many in the habit of servants, with a blown bladder, fastened like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4808"></td>
        <td id="LC4808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a flail to the end of a stick, which they carried in their hands.  In</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4809"></td>
        <td id="LC4809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">each bladder was a small quantity of dried peas, or little pebbles, as I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4810"></td>
        <td id="LC4810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was afterwards informed.  With these bladders, they now and then flapped</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4811"></td>
        <td id="LC4811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the mouths and ears of those who stood near them, of which practice I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4812"></td>
        <td id="LC4812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could not then conceive the meaning.  It seems the minds of these people</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4813"></td>
        <td id="LC4813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are so taken up with intense speculations, that they neither can speak,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4814"></td>
        <td id="LC4814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nor attend to the discourses of others, without being roused by some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4815"></td>
        <td id="LC4815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">external taction upon the organs of speech and hearing; for which reason,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4816"></td>
        <td id="LC4816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those persons who are able to afford it always keep a flapper (the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4817"></td>
        <td id="LC4817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">original is _climenole_) in their family, as one of their domestics; nor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4818"></td>
        <td id="LC4818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ever walk abroad, or make visits, without him.  And the business of this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4819"></td>
        <td id="LC4819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">officer is, when two, three, or more persons are in company, gently to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4820"></td>
        <td id="LC4820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strike with his bladder the mouth of him who is to speak, and the right</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4821"></td>
        <td id="LC4821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ear of him or them to whom the speaker addresses himself.  This flapper</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4822"></td>
        <td id="LC4822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is likewise employed diligently to attend his master in his walks, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4823"></td>
        <td id="LC4823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon occasion to give him a soft flap on his eyes; because he is always</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4824"></td>
        <td id="LC4824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so wrapped up in cogitation, that he is in manifest danger of falling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4825"></td>
        <td id="LC4825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down every precipice, and bouncing his head against every post; and in</td>

        <td id="L4826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4826"></td>
        <td id="LC4826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the streets, of justling others, or being justled himself into the</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4829"></td>

        <td id="L4835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4835"></td>

        <td id="LC4845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">persons belonging to the court.  But he was then deep in a problem; and</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4846"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4850"></td>
        <td id="LC4850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looking towards me and the company I was in, recollected the occasion of</td>

        <td id="LC4855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found, gave his majesty, and the whole court, a very mean opinion of my</td>

        <td id="LC4857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">questions, and I addressed myself to him in all the languages I had.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4858"></td>
        <td id="LC4858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When it was found I could neither understand nor be understood, I was</td>

        <td id="L4859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4859"></td>
        <td id="LC4859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conducted by his order to an apartment in his palace (this prince being</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4862"></td>
        <td id="LC4862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was brought, and four persons of quality, whom I remembered to have seen</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4863"></td>
        <td id="LC4863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very near the king’s person, did me the honour to dine with me.  We had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4864"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4866"></td>

        <td id="L4867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4867"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4872"></td>

        <td id="L4876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4876"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4877"></td>
        <td id="LC4877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4878"></td>
        <td id="LC4878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After dinner my company withdrew, and a person was sent to me by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4879"></td>
        <td id="LC4879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">king’s order, attended by a flapper.  He brought with him pen, ink, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4880"></td>
        <td id="LC4880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">paper, and three or four books, giving me to understand by signs, that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4881"></td>
        <td id="LC4881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was sent to teach me the language.  We sat together four hours, in which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4882"></td>
        <td id="LC4882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time I wrote down a great number of words in columns, with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4883"></td>
        <td id="LC4883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">translations over against them; I likewise made a shift to learn several</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4884"></td>
        <td id="LC4884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">short sentences; for my tutor would order one of my servants to fetch</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4885"></td>
        <td id="LC4885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something, to turn about, to make a bow, to sit, or to stand, or walk,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4886"></td>
        <td id="LC4886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the like.  Then I took down the sentence in writing.  He showed me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4887"></td>
        <td id="LC4887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">also, in one of his books, the figures of the sun, moon, and stars, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4888"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4894"></td>
        <td id="LC4894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The word, which I interpret the flying or floating island, is in the</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4895"></td>
        <td id="LC4895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">original _Laputa_, whereof I could never learn the true etymology.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4896"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4898"></td>

        <td id="L4900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4900"></td>
        <td id="LC4900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conjecture of my own, that Laputa was _quasi lap outed_; _lap_,</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4973"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4974"></td>
        <td id="LC4974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and politics, perpetually inquiring into public affairs, giving their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4975"></td>
        <td id="LC4975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">judgments in matters of state, and passionately disputing every inch of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4976"></td>
        <td id="LC4976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">party opinion.  I have indeed observed the same disposition among most of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4977"></td>
        <td id="LC4977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the mathematicians I have known in Europe, although I could never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4978"></td>
        <td id="LC4978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discover the least analogy between the two sciences; unless those people</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4979"></td>
        <td id="LC4979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suppose, that because the smallest circle has as many degrees as the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4980"></td>
        <td id="LC4980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">largest, therefore the regulation and management of the world require no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4981"></td>
        <td id="LC4981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more abilities than the handling and turning of a globe; but I rather</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4982"></td>
        <td id="LC4982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">take this quality to spring from a very common infirmity of human nature,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4983"></td>
        <td id="LC4983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inclining us to be most curious and conceited in matters where we have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4984"></td>
        <td id="LC4984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">least concern, and for which we are least adapted by study or nature.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4985"></td>
        <td id="LC4985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4986"></td>
        <td id="LC4986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">These people are under continual disquietudes, never enjoying a minutes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4987"></td>
        <td id="LC4987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">peace of mind; and their disturbances proceed from causes which very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4988"></td>
        <td id="LC4988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little affect the rest of mortals.  Their apprehensions arise from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4989"></td>
        <td id="LC4989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several changes they dread in the celestial bodies: for instance, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4990"></td>
        <td id="LC4990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the earth, by the continual approaches of the sun towards it, must, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4991"></td>
        <td id="LC4991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">course of time, be absorbed, or swallowed up; that the face of the sun,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4992"></td>
        <td id="LC4992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will, by degrees, be encrusted with its own effluvia, and give no more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4993"></td>
        <td id="LC4993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">light to the world; that the earth very narrowly escaped a brush from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4994"></td>
        <td id="LC4994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tail of the last comet, which would have infallibly reduced it to ashes;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4995"></td>
        <td id="LC4995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that the next, which they have calculated for one-and-thirty years</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4996"></td>
        <td id="LC4996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hence, will probably destroy us.  For if, in its perihelion, it should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4997"></td>
        <td id="LC4997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">approach within a certain degree of the sun (as by their calculations</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4998"></td>
        <td id="LC4998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they have reason to dread) it will receive a degree of heat ten thousand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4999"></td>
        <td id="LC4999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">times more intense than that of red hot glowing iron, and in its absence</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5000"></td>
        <td id="LC5000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the sun, carry a blazing tail ten hundred thousand and fourteen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5001"></td>
        <td id="LC5001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">miles long, through which, if the earth should pass at the distance of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5002"></td>
        <td id="LC5002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one hundred thousand miles from the nucleus, or main body of the comet,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5003"></td>
        <td id="LC5003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it must in its passage be set on fire, and reduced to ashes: that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5004"></td>
        <td id="LC5004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sun, daily spending its rays without any nutriment to supply them, will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5005"></td>
        <td id="LC5005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at last be wholly consumed and annihilated; which must be attended with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5006"></td>
        <td id="LC5006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the destruction of this earth, and of all the planets that receive their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5007"></td>
        <td id="LC5007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">light from it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5008"></td>
        <td id="LC5008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5009"></td>
        <td id="LC5009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They are so perpetually alarmed with the apprehensions of these, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5010"></td>
        <td id="LC5010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like impending dangers, that they can neither sleep quietly in their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5011"></td>
        <td id="LC5011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beds, nor have any relish for the common pleasures and amusements of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5012"></td>
        <td id="LC5012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life.  When they meet an acquaintance in the morning, the first question</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5013"></td>
        <td id="LC5013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is about the sun’s health, how he looked at his setting and rising, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5014"></td>
        <td id="LC5014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what hopes they have to avoid the stroke of the approaching comet.  This</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5015"></td>
        <td id="LC5015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conversation they are apt to run into with the same temper that boys</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5016"></td>
        <td id="LC5016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discover in delighting to hear terrible stories of spirits and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5017"></td>
        <td id="LC5017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hobgoblins, which they greedily listen to, and dare not go to bed for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5018"></td>
        <td id="LC5018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fear.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5019"></td>
        <td id="LC5019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5020"></td>
        <td id="LC5020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The women of the island have abundance of vivacity: they, contemn their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5021"></td>
        <td id="LC5021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">husbands, and are exceedingly fond of strangers, whereof there is always</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5022"></td>
        <td id="LC5022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a considerable number from the continent below, attending at court,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5023"></td>
        <td id="LC5023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">either upon affairs of the several towns and corporations, or their own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5024"></td>
        <td id="LC5024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">particular occasions, but are much despised, because they want the same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5025"></td>
        <td id="LC5025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">endowments.  Among these the ladies choose their gallants: but the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5026"></td>
        <td id="LC5026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vexation is, that they act with too much ease and security; for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5027"></td>
        <td id="LC5027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">husband is always so rapt in speculation, that the mistress and lover may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5028"></td>
        <td id="LC5028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proceed to the greatest familiarities before his face, if he be but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5029"></td>
        <td id="LC5029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">provided with paper and implements, and without his flapper at his side.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5030"></td>
        <td id="LC5030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5031"></td>
        <td id="LC5031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The wives and daughters lament their confinement to the island, although</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5032"></td>
        <td id="LC5032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I think it the most delicious spot of ground in the world; and although</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5033"></td>
        <td id="LC5033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they live here in the greatest plenty and magnificence, and are allowed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5034"></td>
        <td id="LC5034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to do whatever they please, they long to see the world, and take the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5035"></td>
        <td id="LC5035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">diversions of the metropolis, which they are not allowed to do without a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5036"></td>
        <td id="LC5036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">particular license from the king; and this is not easy to be obtained,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5037"></td>
        <td id="LC5037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because the people of quality have found, by frequent experience, how</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5038"></td>
        <td id="LC5038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hard it is to persuade their women to return from below.  I was told that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5039"></td>
        <td id="LC5039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a great court lady, who had several children,—is married to the prime</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5040"></td>
        <td id="LC5040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">minister, the richest subject in the kingdom, a very graceful person,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5041"></td>
        <td id="LC5041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extremely fond of her, and lives in the finest palace of the island,—went</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5042"></td>
        <td id="LC5042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down to Lagado on the pretence of health, there hid herself for several</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5043"></td>
        <td id="LC5043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">months, till the king sent a warrant to search for her; and she was found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5044"></td>
        <td id="LC5044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in an obscure eating-house all in rags, having pawned her clothes to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5045"></td>
        <td id="LC5045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">maintain an old deformed footman, who beat her every day, and in whose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5046"></td>
        <td id="LC5046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">company she was taken, much against her will.  And although her husband</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5047"></td>
        <td id="LC5047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">received her with all possible kindness, and without the least reproach,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5048"></td>
        <td id="LC5048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she soon after contrived to steal down again, with all her jewels, to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5049"></td>
        <td id="LC5049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">same gallant, and has not been heard of since.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5050"></td>
        <td id="LC5050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5051"></td>
        <td id="LC5051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This may perhaps pass with the reader rather for an European or English</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5052"></td>
        <td id="LC5052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">story, than for one of a country so remote.  But he may please to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5053"></td>
        <td id="LC5053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consider, that the caprices of womankind are not limited by any climate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5054"></td>
        <td id="LC5054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or nation, and that they are much more uniform, than can be easily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5055"></td>
        <td id="LC5055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imagined.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5056"></td>
        <td id="LC5056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5057"></td>
        <td id="LC5057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In about a month’s time, I had made a tolerable proficiency in their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5058"></td>
        <td id="LC5058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">language, and was able to answer most of the king’s questions, when I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5059"></td>
        <td id="LC5059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the honour to attend him.  His majesty discovered not the least curiosity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5060"></td>
        <td id="LC5060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to inquire into the laws, government, history, religion, or manners of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5061"></td>
        <td id="LC5061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the countries where I had been; but confined his questions to the state</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5062"></td>
        <td id="LC5062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of mathematics, and received the account I gave him with great contempt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5063"></td>
        <td id="LC5063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and indifference, though often roused by his flapper on each side.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5064"></td>
        <td id="LC5064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5065"></td>
        <td id="LC5065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5066"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5067"></td>
        <td id="LC5067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER III.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5068"></td>
        <td id="LC5068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5069"></td>
        <td id="LC5069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5070"></td>

        <td id="LC5249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author leaves Laputa; is conveyed to Balnibarbi; arrives at the</td>

        <td id="L5250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5250"></td>
        <td id="LC5250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">metropolis.  A description of the metropolis, and the country adjoining.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5251"></td>
        <td id="LC5251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author hospitably received by a great lord.  His conversation with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5252"></td>

        <td id="L5254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5254"></td>
        <td id="LC5254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Although I cannot say that I was ill treated in this island, yet I must</td>

        <td id="L5255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5255"></td>

        <td id="L5338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5338"></td>

        <td id="L5341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5341"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5342"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5343"></td>
        <td id="LC5343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the building, what absurdities I observed, and what quarrel I had with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5344"></td>
        <td id="LC5344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the dress or looks of his domestics?”  This he might safely do; because</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5345"></td>
        <td id="LC5345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every thing about him was magnificent, regular, and polite.  I answered,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5346"></td>
        <td id="LC5346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“that his excellency’s prudence, quality, and fortune, had exempted him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5347"></td>
        <td id="LC5347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from those defects, which folly and beggary had produced in others.”  He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5348"></td>
        <td id="LC5348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said, “if I would go with him to his country-house, about twenty miles</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5349"></td>
        <td id="LC5349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distant, where his estate lay, there would be more leisure for this kind</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5350"></td>
        <td id="LC5350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of conversation.”  I told his excellency “that I was entirely at his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5351"></td>
        <td id="LC5351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disposal;” and accordingly we set out next morning.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5352"></td>
        <td id="LC5352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5353"></td>
        <td id="LC5353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">During our journey he made me observe the several methods used by farmers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5354"></td>
        <td id="LC5354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in managing their lands, which to me were wholly unaccountable; for,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5355"></td>
        <td id="LC5355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">except in some very few places, I could not discover one ear of corn or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5356"></td>
        <td id="LC5356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blade of grass.  But, in three hours travelling, the scene was wholly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5357"></td>
        <td id="LC5357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">altered; we came into a most beautiful country; farmers’ houses, at small</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5358"></td>
        <td id="LC5358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distances, neatly built; the fields enclosed, containing vineyards,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5359"></td>
        <td id="LC5359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">corn-grounds, and meadows.  Neither do I remember to have seen a more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5360"></td>
        <td id="LC5360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">delightful prospect.  His excellency observed my countenance to clear up;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5361"></td>
        <td id="LC5361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he told me, with a sigh, “that there his estate began, and would continue</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC5362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the same, till we should come to his house: that his countrymen ridiculed</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5363"></td>
        <td id="LC5363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and despised him, for managing his affairs no better, and for setting so</td>

        <td id="LC5364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ill an example to the kingdom; which, however, was followed by very few,</td>

        <td id="L5366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5366"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5367"></td>
        <td id="LC5367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We came at length to the house, which was indeed a noble structure, built</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5368"></td>

        <td id="L5385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5385"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5392"></td>
        <td id="LC5392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lagado; and the humour prevailed so strongly among the people, that there</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5415"></td>

        <td id="L5421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5421"></td>

        <td id="L5422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5422"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5423"></td>
