      <tr>
        <td id="L5424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5424"></td>
        <td id="LC5424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of that mountain, on the long ridge whereof a long canal must be cut, for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5425"></td>
        <td id="LC5425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a repository of water, to be conveyed up by pipes and engines to supply</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5426"></td>
        <td id="LC5426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the mill, because the wind and air upon a height agitated the water, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5427"></td>
        <td id="LC5427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thereby made it fitter for motion, and because the water, descending down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5428"></td>
        <td id="LC5428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a declivity, would turn the mill with half the current of a river whose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5429"></td>
        <td id="LC5429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">course is more upon a level.”  He said, “that being then not very well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5430"></td>
        <td id="LC5430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the court, and pressed by many of his friends, he complied with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5431"></td>
        <td id="LC5431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proposal; and after employing a hundred men for two years, the work</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5432"></td>
        <td id="LC5432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">miscarried, the projectors went off, laying the blame entirely upon him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5433"></td>
        <td id="LC5433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">railing at him ever since, and putting others upon the same experiment,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5434"></td>
        <td id="LC5434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with equal assurance of success, as well as equal disappointment.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5435"></td>
        <td id="LC5435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5436"></td>
        <td id="LC5436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In a few days we came back to town; and his excellency, considering the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5437"></td>
        <td id="LC5437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bad character he had in the academy, would not go with me himself, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5438"></td>
        <td id="LC5438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recommended me to a friend of his, to bear me company thither.  My lord</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5439"></td>
        <td id="LC5439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was pleased to represent me as a great admirer of projects, and a person</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5440"></td>
        <td id="LC5440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of much curiosity and easy belief; which, indeed, was not without truth;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5441"></td>
        <td id="LC5441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for I had myself been a sort of projector in my younger days.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5442"></td>
        <td id="LC5442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5443"></td>
        <td id="LC5443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5444"></td>
        <td id="LC5444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5445"></td>
        <td id="LC5445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER V.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5446"></td>
        <td id="LC5446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5447"></td>
        <td id="LC5447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5448"></td>
        <td id="LC5448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author permitted to see the grand academy of Lagado.  The academy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5449"></td>
        <td id="LC5449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">largely described.  The arts wherein the professors employ themselves.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5450"></td>
        <td id="LC5450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5451"></td>
        <td id="LC5451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This academy is not an entire single building, but a continuation of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5452"></td>
        <td id="LC5452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several houses on both sides of a street, which growing waste, was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5453"></td>
        <td id="LC5453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">purchased and applied to that use.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5454"></td>
        <td id="LC5454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5455"></td>
        <td id="LC5455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was received very kindly by the warden, and went for many days to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5456"></td>
        <td id="LC5456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">academy.  Every room has in it one or more projectors; and I believe I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5457"></td>
        <td id="LC5457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could not be in fewer than five hundred rooms.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5458"></td>
        <td id="LC5458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5459"></td>
        <td id="LC5459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The first man I saw was of a meagre aspect, with sooty hands and face,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5460"></td>
        <td id="LC5460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his hair and beard long, ragged, and singed in several places.  His</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5461"></td>
        <td id="LC5461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clothes, shirt, and skin, were all of the same colour.  He has been eight</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5462"></td>
        <td id="LC5462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">years upon a project for extracting sunbeams out of cucumbers, which were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5463"></td>
        <td id="LC5463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be put in phials hermetically sealed, and let out to warm the air in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5464"></td>
        <td id="LC5464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">raw inclement summers.  He told me, he did not doubt, that, in eight</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5465"></td>
        <td id="LC5465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">years more, he should be able to supply the governor’s gardens with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5466"></td>
        <td id="LC5466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sunshine, at a reasonable rate: but he complained that his stock was low,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5467"></td>
        <td id="LC5467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and entreated me “to give him something as an encouragement to ingenuity,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5468"></td>
        <td id="LC5468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">especially since this had been a very dear season for cucumbers.”  I made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5469"></td>
        <td id="LC5469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him a small present, for my lord had furnished me with money on purpose,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5470"></td>
        <td id="LC5470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because he knew their practice of begging from all who go to see them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5471"></td>
        <td id="LC5471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5472"></td>
        <td id="LC5472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I went into another chamber, but was ready to hasten back, being almost</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5473"></td>
        <td id="LC5473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">overcome with a horrible stink.  My conductor pressed me forward,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5474"></td>
        <td id="LC5474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conjuring me in a whisper “to give no offence, which would be highly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5475"></td>
        <td id="LC5475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resented;” and therefore I durst not so much as stop my nose.  The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5476"></td>
        <td id="LC5476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">projector of this cell was the most ancient student of the academy; his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5477"></td>
        <td id="LC5477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face and beard were of a pale yellow; his hands and clothes daubed over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5478"></td>
        <td id="LC5478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with filth.  When I was presented to him, he gave me a close embrace, a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5479"></td>
        <td id="LC5479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">compliment I could well have excused.  His employment, from his first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5480"></td>
        <td id="LC5480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coming into the academy, was an operation to reduce human excrement to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5481"></td>
        <td id="LC5481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">its original food, by separating the several parts, removing the tincture</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5482"></td>
        <td id="LC5482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which it receives from the gall, making the odour exhale, and scumming</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5483"></td>
        <td id="LC5483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off the saliva.  He had a weekly allowance, from the society, of a vessel</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5484"></td>
        <td id="LC5484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">filled with human ordure, about the bigness of a Bristol barrel.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5485"></td>
        <td id="LC5485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5486"></td>
        <td id="LC5486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I saw another at work to calcine ice into gunpowder; who likewise showed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5487"></td>
        <td id="LC5487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me a treatise he had written concerning the malleability of fire, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5488"></td>
        <td id="LC5488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he intended to publish.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5489"></td>
        <td id="LC5489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5490"></td>
        <td id="LC5490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was a most ingenious architect, who had contrived a new method for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5491"></td>
        <td id="LC5491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">building houses, by beginning at the roof, and working downward to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5492"></td>
        <td id="LC5492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">foundation; which he justified to me, by the like practice of those two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5493"></td>
        <td id="LC5493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prudent insects, the bee and the spider.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5494"></td>
        <td id="LC5494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5495"></td>
        <td id="LC5495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was a man born blind, who had several apprentices in his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5496"></td>
        <td id="LC5496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">condition: their employment was to mix colours for painters, which their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5497"></td>
        <td id="LC5497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">master taught them to distinguish by feeling and smelling.  It was indeed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5498"></td>
        <td id="LC5498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my misfortune to find them at that time not very perfect in their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5499"></td>
        <td id="LC5499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lessons, and the professor himself happened to be generally mistaken.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5500"></td>
        <td id="LC5500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This artist is much encouraged and esteemed by the whole fraternity.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5501"></td>
        <td id="LC5501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5502"></td>
        <td id="LC5502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In another apartment I was highly pleased with a projector who had found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5503"></td>
        <td id="LC5503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a device of ploughing the ground with hogs, to save the charges of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5504"></td>
        <td id="LC5504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ploughs, cattle, and labour.  The method is this: in an acre of ground</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5505"></td>
        <td id="LC5505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you bury, at six inches distance and eight deep, a quantity of acorns,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5506"></td>
        <td id="LC5506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dates, chestnuts, and other mast or vegetables, whereof these animals are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5507"></td>
        <td id="LC5507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fondest; then you drive six hundred or more of them into the field,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5508"></td>
        <td id="LC5508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where, in a few days, they will root up the whole ground in search of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5509"></td>
        <td id="LC5509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their food, and make it fit for sowing, at the same time manuring it with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5510"></td>
        <td id="LC5510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their dung: it is true, upon experiment, they found the charge and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5511"></td>
        <td id="LC5511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trouble very great, and they had little or no crop.  However it is not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5512"></td>
        <td id="LC5512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doubted, that this invention may be capable of great improvement.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5513"></td>
        <td id="LC5513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5514"></td>
        <td id="LC5514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I went into another room, where the walls and ceiling were all hung round</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5515"></td>
        <td id="LC5515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with cobwebs, except a narrow passage for the artist to go in and out.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5516"></td>
        <td id="LC5516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At my entrance, he called aloud to me, “not to disturb his webs.”  He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5517"></td>
        <td id="LC5517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lamented “the fatal mistake the world had been so long in, of using</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5518"></td>
        <td id="LC5518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silkworms, while we had such plenty of domestic insects who infinitely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5519"></td>
        <td id="LC5519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">excelled the former, because they understood how to weave, as well as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5520"></td>
        <td id="LC5520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spin.”  And he proposed further, “that by employing spiders, the charge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5521"></td>
        <td id="LC5521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of dyeing silks should be wholly saved;” whereof I was fully convinced,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5522"></td>
        <td id="LC5522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when he showed me a vast number of flies most beautifully coloured,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5523"></td>
        <td id="LC5523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wherewith he fed his spiders, assuring us “that the webs would take a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5524"></td>

        <td id="L5613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5613"></td>

        <td id="L5614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5614"></td>
        <td id="LC5614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the public would raise a fund for making and employing five hundred such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5615"></td>
        <td id="LC5615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">frames in Lagado, and oblige the managers to contribute in common their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5616"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5618"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5620"></td>

        <td id="L5621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5621"></td>

        <td id="L5624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5624"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC5644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some degree, a diminution of our lunge by corrosion, and, consequently,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5645"></td>
        <td id="LC5645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contributes to the shortening of our lives.  An expedient was therefore</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5649"></td>

        <td id="L5678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5678"></td>
        <td id="LC5678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was at the mathematical school, where the master taught his pupils</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5679"></td>

        <td id="LC5680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">demonstration, were fairly written on a thin wafer, with ink composed of</td>

        <td id="L5683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5683"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5696"></td>
        <td id="LC5696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A further account of the academy.  The author proposes some improvements,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5697"></td>
        <td id="LC5697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which are honourably received.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5698"></td>
        <td id="LC5698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5699"></td>
        <td id="LC5699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the school of political projectors, I was but ill entertained; the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5700"></td>
        <td id="LC5700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">professors appearing, in my judgment, wholly out of their senses, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5701"></td>
        <td id="LC5701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is a scene that never fails to make me melancholy.  These unhappy people</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5702"></td>
        <td id="LC5702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were proposing schemes for persuading monarchs to choose favourites upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5703"></td>
        <td id="LC5703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the score of their wisdom, capacity, and virtue; of teaching ministers to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5704"></td>
        <td id="LC5704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consult the public good; of rewarding merit, great abilities, eminent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5705"></td>
        <td id="LC5705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">services; of instructing princes to know their true interest, by placing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5706"></td>
        <td id="LC5706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it on the same foundation with that of their people; of choosing for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5707"></td>
        <td id="LC5707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">employments persons qualified to exercise them, with many other wild,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5708"></td>
        <td id="LC5708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impossible chimeras, that never entered before into the heart of man to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5709"></td>
        <td id="LC5709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conceive; and confirmed in me the old observation, “that there is nothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5710"></td>
        <td id="LC5710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so extravagant and irrational, which some philosophers have not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5711"></td>
        <td id="LC5711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">maintained for truth.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5712"></td>
        <td id="LC5712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5713"></td>
        <td id="LC5713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, however, I shall so far do justice to this part of the Academy, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5714"></td>
        <td id="LC5714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to acknowledge that all of them were not so visionary.  There was a most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5715"></td>
        <td id="LC5715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ingenious doctor, who seemed to be perfectly versed in the whole nature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5716"></td>
        <td id="LC5716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and system of government.  This illustrious person had very usefully</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5717"></td>
        <td id="LC5717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">employed his studies, in finding out effectual remedies for all diseases</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5718"></td>
        <td id="LC5718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and corruptions to which the several kinds of public administration are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5719"></td>
        <td id="LC5719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subject, by the vices or infirmities of those who govern, as well as by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5720"></td>
        <td id="LC5720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the licentiousness of those who are to obey.  For instance: whereas all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5721"></td>
        <td id="LC5721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">writers and reasoners have agreed, that there is a strict universal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5722"></td>
        <td id="LC5722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resemblance between the natural and the political body; can there be any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5723"></td>
        <td id="LC5723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thing more evident, than that the health of both must be preserved, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5724"></td>
        <td id="LC5724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the diseases cured, by the same prescriptions?  It is allowed, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5725"></td>
        <td id="LC5725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">senates and great councils are often troubled with redundant, ebullient,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5726"></td>
        <td id="LC5726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and other peccant humours; with many diseases of the head, and more of</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5727"></td>
        <td id="LC5727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the heart; with strong convulsions, with grievous contractions of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5728"></td>
        <td id="LC5728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nerves and sinews in both hands, but especially the right; with spleen,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5729"></td>
        <td id="LC5729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flatus, vertigos, and deliriums; with scrofulous tumours, full of fetid</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5730"></td>

        <td id="L5731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5731"></td>
        <td id="LC5731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crudeness of digestion, besides many others, needless to mention.  This</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5732"></td>
        <td id="LC5732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doctor therefore proposed, “that upon the meeting of the senate, certain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC5733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">physicians should attend it the three first days of their sitting, and at</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5734"></td>
        <td id="LC5734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the close of each day’s debate feel the pulses of every senator; after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5735"></td>
        <td id="LC5735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which, having maturely considered and consulted upon the nature of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5736"></td>
        <td id="LC5736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several maladies, and the methods of cure, they should on the fourth day</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5737"></td>
        <td id="LC5737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">return to the senate house, attended by their apothecaries stored with</td>

        <td id="L5739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5739"></td>

        <td id="LC5743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meeting.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5744"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5745"></td>
        <td id="LC5745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This project could not be of any great expense to the public; and might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5746"></td>
        <td id="LC5746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in my poor opinion, be of much use for the despatch of business, in those</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L5750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5750"></td>
        <td id="LC5750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">correct the positiveness of the old; rouse the stupid, and damp the pert.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5751"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5752"></td>
        <td id="LC5752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Again: because it is a general complaint, that the favourites of princes</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5754"></td>

        <td id="LC5755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the utmost brevity and in the plainest words, should, at his</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC5756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">departure, give the said minister a tweak by the nose, or a kick in the</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5761"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5762"></td>
        <td id="LC5762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He likewise directed, “that every senator in the great council of a</td>

        <td id="LC5763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nation, after he had delivered his opinion, and argued in the defence of</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5764"></td>
        <td id="LC5764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it, should be obliged to give his vote directly contrary; because if that</td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5766"></td>
        <td id="LC5766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">public.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5767"></td>
        <td id="LC5767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5768"></td>
        <td id="LC5768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When parties in a state are violent, he offered a wonderful contrivance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5769"></td>
        <td id="LC5769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to reconcile them.  The method is this: You take a hundred leaders of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5770"></td>
        <td id="LC5770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">each party; you dispose them into couples of such whose heads are nearest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5771"></td>
        <td id="LC5771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a size; then let two nice operators saw off the occiput of each couple</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5772"></td>
        <td id="LC5772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the same time, in such a manner that the brain may be equally divided.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5773"></td>
        <td id="LC5773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let the occiputs, thus cut off, be interchanged, applying each to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5774"></td>
        <td id="LC5774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">head of his opposite party-man.  It seems indeed to be a work that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5775"></td>
        <td id="LC5775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">requires some exactness, but the professor assured us, “that if it were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5776"></td>
        <td id="LC5776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dexterously performed, the cure would be infallible.”  For he argued</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5777"></td>
        <td id="LC5777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thus: “that the two half brains being left to debate the matter between</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5778"></td>
        <td id="LC5778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">themselves within the space of one skull, would soon come to a good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5779"></td>
        <td id="LC5779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understanding, and produce that moderation, as well as regularity of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5780"></td>
        <td id="LC5780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thinking, so much to be wished for in the heads of those, who imagine</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5781"></td>
        <td id="LC5781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they come into the world only to watch and govern its motion: and as to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5782"></td>
        <td id="LC5782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the difference of brains, in quantity or quality, among those who are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5783"></td>
        <td id="LC5783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">directors in faction, the doctor assured us, from his own knowledge, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5784"></td>
        <td id="LC5784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“it was a perfect trifle.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5785"></td>
        <td id="LC5785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5786"></td>
        <td id="LC5786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I heard a very warm debate between two professors, about the most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5787"></td>
        <td id="LC5787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">commodious and effectual ways and means of raising money, without</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5788"></td>
        <td id="LC5788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grieving the subject.  The first affirmed, “the justest method would be,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5789"></td>
        <td id="LC5789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to lay a certain tax upon vices and folly; and the sum fixed upon every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5790"></td>
        <td id="LC5790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man to be rated, after the fairest manner, by a jury of his neighbours.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5791"></td>
        <td id="LC5791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The second was of an opinion directly contrary; “to tax those qualities</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5792"></td>
        <td id="LC5792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of body and mind, for which men chiefly value themselves; the rate to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5793"></td>
        <td id="LC5793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more or less, according to the degrees of excelling; the decision whereof</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5794"></td>
        <td id="LC5794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should be left entirely to their own breast.”  The highest tax was upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5795"></td>
        <td id="LC5795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men who are the greatest favourites of the other sex, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
