      <tr>
        <td id="L5887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5887"></td>
        <td id="LC5887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5888"></td>
        <td id="LC5888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER VII.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5889"></td>
        <td id="LC5889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5890"></td>
        <td id="LC5890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5891"></td>
        <td id="LC5891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author leaves Lagado: arrives at Maldonada.  No ship ready.  He takes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5892"></td>
        <td id="LC5892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a short voyage to Glubbdubdrib.  His reception by the governor.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5893"></td>
        <td id="LC5893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5894"></td>
        <td id="LC5894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The continent, of which this kingdom is apart, extends itself, as I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5895"></td>
        <td id="LC5895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reason to believe, eastward, to that unknown tract of America westward of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5896"></td>
        <td id="LC5896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">California; and north, to the Pacific Ocean, which is not above a hundred</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5897"></td>
        <td id="LC5897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and fifty miles from Lagado; where there is a good port, and much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5898"></td>
        <td id="LC5898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">commerce with the great island of Luggnagg, situated to the north-west</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5899"></td>
        <td id="LC5899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about 29 degrees north latitude, and 140 longitude.  This island of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5900"></td>
        <td id="LC5900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Luggnagg stands south-eastward of Japan, about a hundred leagues distant.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5901"></td>
        <td id="LC5901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is a strict alliance between the Japanese emperor and the king of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5902"></td>
        <td id="LC5902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Luggnagg; which affords frequent opportunities of sailing from one island</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5903"></td>
        <td id="LC5903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the other.  I determined therefore to direct my course this way, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5904"></td>
        <td id="LC5904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">order to my return to Europe.  I hired two mules, with a guide, to show</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5905"></td>
        <td id="LC5905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me the way, and carry my small baggage.  I took leave of my noble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5906"></td>
        <td id="LC5906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">protector, who had shown me so much favour, and made me a generous</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5907"></td>
        <td id="LC5907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">present at my departure.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5908"></td>
        <td id="LC5908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5909"></td>
        <td id="LC5909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My journey was without any accident or adventure worth relating.  When I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5910"></td>
        <td id="LC5910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arrived at the port of Maldonada (for so it is called) there was no ship</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5911"></td>
        <td id="LC5911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the harbour bound for Luggnagg, nor likely to be in some time.  The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5912"></td>
        <td id="LC5912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">town is about as large as Portsmouth.  I soon fell into some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5913"></td>
        <td id="LC5913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acquaintance, and was very hospitably received.  A gentleman of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5914"></td>
        <td id="LC5914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distinction said to me, “that since the ships bound for Luggnagg could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5915"></td>
        <td id="LC5915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not be ready in less than a month, it might be no disagreeable amusement</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5916"></td>
        <td id="LC5916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for me to take a trip to the little island of Glubbdubdrib, about five</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5917"></td>
        <td id="LC5917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leagues off to the south-west.”  He offered himself and a friend to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5918"></td>
        <td id="LC5918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accompany me, and that I should be provided with a small convenient bark</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5919"></td>
        <td id="LC5919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the voyage.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5920"></td>
        <td id="LC5920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5921"></td>
        <td id="LC5921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Glubbdubdrib, as nearly as I can interpret the word, signifies the island</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5922"></td>
        <td id="LC5922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of sorcerers or magicians.  It is about one third as large as the Isle of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5923"></td>
        <td id="LC5923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Wight, and extremely fruitful: it is governed by the head of a certain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5924"></td>
        <td id="LC5924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tribe, who are all magicians.  This tribe marries only among each other,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5925"></td>
        <td id="LC5925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the eldest in succession is prince or governor.  He has a noble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5926"></td>
        <td id="LC5926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">palace, and a park of about three thousand acres, surrounded by a wall of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5927"></td>
        <td id="LC5927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hewn stone twenty feet high.  In this park are several small enclosures</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5928"></td>
        <td id="LC5928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for cattle, corn, and gardening.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5929"></td>
        <td id="LC5929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5930"></td>
        <td id="LC5930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The governor and his family are served and attended by domestics of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5931"></td>
        <td id="LC5931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kind somewhat unusual.  By his skill in necromancy he has a power of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5932"></td>
        <td id="LC5932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">calling whom he pleases from the dead, and commanding their service for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5933"></td>
        <td id="LC5933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">twenty-four hours, but no longer; nor can he call the same persons up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5934"></td>
        <td id="LC5934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again in less than three months, except upon very extraordinary</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5935"></td>
        <td id="LC5935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">occasions.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5936"></td>
        <td id="LC5936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5937"></td>
        <td id="LC5937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When we arrived at the island, which was about eleven in the morning, one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5938"></td>
        <td id="LC5938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the gentlemen who accompanied me went to the governor, and desired</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5939"></td>
        <td id="LC5939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">admittance for a stranger, who came on purpose to have the honour of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5940"></td>
        <td id="LC5940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attending on his highness.  This was immediately granted, and we all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5941"></td>
        <td id="LC5941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">three entered the gate of the palace between two rows of guards, armed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5942"></td>
        <td id="LC5942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and dressed after a very antic manner, and with something in their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5943"></td>
        <td id="LC5943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">countenances that made my flesh creep with a horror I cannot express.  We</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5944"></td>
        <td id="LC5944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passed through several apartments, between servants of the same sort,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5945"></td>
        <td id="LC5945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ranked on each side as before, till we came to the chamber of presence;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5946"></td>
        <td id="LC5946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where, after three profound obeisances, and a few general questions, we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5947"></td>
        <td id="LC5947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were permitted to sit on three stools, near the lowest step of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5948"></td>
        <td id="LC5948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">highness’s throne.  He understood the language of Balnibarbi, although it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5949"></td>
        <td id="LC5949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was different from that of this island.  He desired me to give him some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5950"></td>
        <td id="LC5950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">account of my travels; and, to let me see that I should be treated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5951"></td>
        <td id="LC5951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without ceremony, he dismissed all his attendants with a turn of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5952"></td>
        <td id="LC5952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">finger; at which, to my great astonishment, they vanished in an instant,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5953"></td>
        <td id="LC5953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like visions in a dream when we awake on a sudden.  I could not recover</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5954"></td>
        <td id="LC5954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">myself in some time, till the governor assured me, “that I should receive</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5955"></td>
        <td id="LC5955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no hurt:” and observing my two companions to be under no concern, who had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5956"></td>
        <td id="LC5956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been often entertained in the same manner, I began to take courage, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5957"></td>
        <td id="LC5957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">related to his highness a short history of my several adventures; yet not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5958"></td>
        <td id="LC5958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without some hesitation, and frequently looking behind me to the place</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5959"></td>
        <td id="LC5959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where I had seen those domestic spectres.  I had the honour to dine with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5960"></td>
        <td id="LC5960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the governor, where a new set of ghosts served up the meat, and waited at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5961"></td>
        <td id="LC5961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">table.  I now observed myself to be less terrified than I had been in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5962"></td>
        <td id="LC5962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morning.  I stayed till sunset, but humbly desired his highness to excuse</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5963"></td>
        <td id="LC5963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me for not accepting his invitation of lodging in the palace.  My two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5964"></td>
        <td id="LC5964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friends and I lay at a private house in the town adjoining, which is the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5965"></td>
        <td id="LC5965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">capital of this little island; and the next morning we returned to pay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5966"></td>
        <td id="LC5966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our duty to the governor, as he was pleased to command us.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5967"></td>
        <td id="LC5967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5968"></td>
        <td id="LC5968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After this manner we continued in the island for ten days, most part of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5969"></td>
        <td id="LC5969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every day with the governor, and at night in our lodging.  I soon grew so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5970"></td>
        <td id="LC5970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">familiarized to the sight of spirits, that after the third or fourth time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5971"></td>
        <td id="LC5971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they gave me no emotion at all: or, if I had any apprehensions left, my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5972"></td>
        <td id="LC5972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curiosity prevailed over them.  For his highness the governor ordered me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5973"></td>
        <td id="LC5973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“to call up whatever persons I would choose to name, and in whatever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5974"></td>
        <td id="LC5974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">numbers, among all the dead from the beginning of the world to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5975"></td>
        <td id="LC5975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">present time, and command them to answer any questions I should think fit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5976"></td>
        <td id="LC5976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to ask; with this condition, that my questions must be confined within</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5977"></td>
        <td id="LC5977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the compass of the times they lived in.  And one thing I might depend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5978"></td>
        <td id="LC5978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon, that they would certainly tell me the truth, for lying was a talent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5979"></td>
        <td id="LC5979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of no use in the lower world.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5980"></td>
        <td id="LC5980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5981"></td>
        <td id="LC5981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I made my humble acknowledgments to his highness for so great a favour.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5982"></td>
        <td id="LC5982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We were in a chamber, from whence there was a fair prospect into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5983"></td>
        <td id="LC5983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">park.  And because my first inclination was to be entertained with scenes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5984"></td>
        <td id="LC5984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of pomp and magnificence, I desired to see Alexander the Great at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5985"></td>
        <td id="LC5985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">head of his army, just after the battle of Arbela: which, upon a motion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5986"></td>
        <td id="LC5986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the governor’s finger, immediately appeared in a large field, under</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5987"></td>
        <td id="LC5987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the window where we stood.  Alexander was called up into the room: it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5988"></td>
        <td id="LC5988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with great difficulty that I understood his Greek, and had but little of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5989"></td>
        <td id="LC5989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my own.  He assured me upon his honour “that he was not poisoned, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5990"></td>
        <td id="LC5990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">died of a bad fever by excessive drinking.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5991"></td>
        <td id="LC5991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5992"></td>
        <td id="LC5992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Next, I saw Hannibal passing the Alps, who told me “he had not a drop of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5993"></td>
        <td id="LC5993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vinegar in his camp.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5994"></td>
        <td id="LC5994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5995"></td>
        <td id="LC5995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I saw Cæsar and Pompey at the head of their troops, just ready to engage.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5996"></td>
        <td id="LC5996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I saw the former, in his last great triumph.  I desired that the senate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5997"></td>
        <td id="LC5997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of Rome might appear before me, in one large chamber, and an assembly of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5998"></td>
        <td id="LC5998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">somewhat a later age in counterview, in another.  The first seemed to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5999"></td>
        <td id="LC5999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an assembly of heroes and demigods; the other, a knot of pedlars,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6000"></td>
        <td id="LC6000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pick-pockets, highwayman, and bullies.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6001"></td>
        <td id="LC6001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6002"></td>
        <td id="LC6002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The governor, at my request, gave the sign for Cæsar and Brutus to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6003"></td>
        <td id="LC6003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advance towards us.  I was struck with a profound veneration at the sight</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6004"></td>
        <td id="LC6004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of Brutus, and could easily discover the most consummate virtue, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6005"></td>
        <td id="LC6005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greatest intrepidity and firmness of mind, the truest love of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6006"></td>
        <td id="LC6006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">country, and general benevolence for mankind, in every lineament of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6007"></td>
        <td id="LC6007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">countenance.  I observed, with much pleasure, that these two persons were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6008"></td>
        <td id="LC6008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in good intelligence with each other; and Cæsar freely confessed to me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6009"></td>
        <td id="LC6009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“that the greatest actions of his own life were not equal, by many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6010"></td>
        <td id="LC6010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">degrees, to the glory of taking it away.”  I had the honour to have much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6011"></td>
        <td id="LC6011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conversation with Brutus; and was told, “that his ancestor Junius,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6012"></td>
        <td id="LC6012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Socrates, Epaminondas, Cato the younger, Sir Thomas More, and himself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6013"></td>
        <td id="LC6013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were perpetually together:” a sextumvirate, to which all the ages of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6014"></td>
        <td id="LC6014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">world cannot add a seventh.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6015"></td>
        <td id="LC6015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6016"></td>
        <td id="LC6016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It would be tedious to trouble the reader with relating what vast numbers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6017"></td>
        <td id="LC6017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of illustrious persons were called up to gratify that insatiable desire I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6018"></td>
        <td id="LC6018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had to see the world in every period of antiquity placed before me.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6019"></td>
        <td id="LC6019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chiefly fed mine eyes with beholding the destroyers of tyrants and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6020"></td>
        <td id="LC6020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">usurpers, and the restorers of liberty to oppressed and injured nations.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6021"></td>
        <td id="LC6021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But it is impossible to express the satisfaction I received in my own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6022"></td>
        <td id="LC6022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mind, after such a manner as to make it a suitable entertainment to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6023"></td>
        <td id="LC6023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reader.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6024"></td>
        <td id="LC6024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6025"></td>
        <td id="LC6025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6026"></td>
        <td id="LC6026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6027"></td>
        <td id="LC6027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER VIII.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6028"></td>
        <td id="LC6028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6029"></td>
        <td id="LC6029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6030"></td>
        <td id="LC6030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A further account of Glubbdubdrib.  Ancient and modern history corrected.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6031"></td>
        <td id="LC6031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6032"></td>
        <td id="LC6032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Having a desire to see those ancients who were most renowned for wit and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6033"></td>
        <td id="LC6033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">learning, I set apart one day on purpose.  I proposed that Homer and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6034"></td>
        <td id="LC6034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Aristotle might appear at the head of all their commentators; but these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6035"></td>
        <td id="LC6035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were so numerous, that some hundreds were forced to attend in the court,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6036"></td>
        <td id="LC6036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and outward rooms of the palace.  I knew, and could distinguish those two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6037"></td>
        <td id="LC6037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heroes, at first sight, not only from the crowd, but from each other.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6038"></td>
        <td id="LC6038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Homer was the taller and comelier person of the two, walked very erect</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6039"></td>
        <td id="LC6039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for one of his age, and his eyes were the most quick and piercing I ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6040"></td>
        <td id="LC6040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beheld.  Aristotle stooped much, and made use of a staff.  His visage was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6041"></td>
        <td id="LC6041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meagre, his hair lank and thin, and his voice hollow.  I soon discovered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6042"></td>
        <td id="LC6042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that both of them were perfect strangers to the rest of the company, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6043"></td>
        <td id="LC6043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had never seen or heard of them before; and I had a whisper from a ghost</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6044"></td>
        <td id="LC6044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who shall be nameless, “that these commentators always kept in the most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6045"></td>
        <td id="LC6045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distant quarters from their principals, in the lower world, through a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6046"></td>
        <td id="LC6046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consciousness of shame and guilt, because they had so horribly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6047"></td>
        <td id="LC6047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">misrepresented the meaning of those authors to posterity.”  I introduced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6048"></td>
        <td id="LC6048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Didymus and Eustathius to Homer, and prevailed on him to treat them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6049"></td>
        <td id="LC6049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">better than perhaps they deserved, for he soon found they wanted a genius</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6050"></td>
        <td id="LC6050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to enter into the spirit of a poet.  But Aristotle was out of all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6051"></td>
        <td id="LC6051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">patience with the account I gave him of Scotus and Ramus, as I presented</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6052"></td>
        <td id="LC6052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them to him; and he asked them, “whether the rest of the tribe were as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6053"></td>
        <td id="LC6053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great dunces as themselves?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6054"></td>
        <td id="LC6054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6055"></td>
        <td id="LC6055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I then desired the governor to call up Descartes and Gassendi, with whom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6056"></td>
        <td id="LC6056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I prevailed to explain their systems to Aristotle.  This great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6057"></td>
        <td id="LC6057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">philosopher freely acknowledged his own mistakes in natural philosophy,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6058"></td>
        <td id="LC6058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because he proceeded in many things upon conjecture, as all men must do;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6059"></td>
        <td id="LC6059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and he found that Gassendi, who had made the doctrine of Epicurus as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6060"></td>
        <td id="LC6060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">palatable as he could, and the vortices of Descartes, were equally to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6061"></td>
        <td id="LC6061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exploded.  He predicted the same fate to _attraction_, whereof the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6062"></td>
        <td id="LC6062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">present learned are such zealous asserters.  He said, “that new systems</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6063"></td>
        <td id="LC6063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of nature were but new fashions, which would vary in every age; and even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6064"></td>
        <td id="LC6064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those, who pretend to demonstrate them from mathematical principles,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6065"></td>
        <td id="LC6065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would flourish but a short period of time, and be out of vogue when that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6066"></td>
        <td id="LC6066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was determined.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6067"></td>
        <td id="LC6067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6068"></td>
        <td id="LC6068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I spent five days in conversing with many others of the ancient learned.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6069"></td>
        <td id="LC6069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I saw most of the first Roman emperors.  I prevailed on the governor to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6070"></td>
        <td id="LC6070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">call up Heliogabalus’s cooks to dress us a dinner, but they could not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6071"></td>
        <td id="LC6071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">show us much of their skill, for want of materials.  A helot of Agesilaus</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6072"></td>
        <td id="LC6072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made us a dish of Spartan broth, but I was not able to get down a second</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6073"></td>
        <td id="LC6073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spoonful.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6074"></td>
        <td id="LC6074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6075"></td>
        <td id="LC6075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The two gentlemen, who conducted me to the island, were pressed by their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6076"></td>
        <td id="LC6076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">private affairs to return in three days, which I employed in seeing some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6077"></td>
        <td id="LC6077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the modern dead, who had made the greatest figure, for two or three</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6078"></td>
        <td id="LC6078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hundred years past, in our own and other countries of Europe; and having</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6079"></td>
        <td id="LC6079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been always a great admirer of old illustrious families, I desired the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6080"></td>
        <td id="LC6080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">governor would call up a dozen or two of kings, with their ancestors in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6081"></td>
        <td id="LC6081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">order for eight or nine generations.  But my disappointment was grievous</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6082"></td>
        <td id="LC6082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and unexpected.  For, instead of a long train with royal diadems, I saw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6083"></td>
        <td id="LC6083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in one family two fiddlers, three spruce courtiers, and an Italian</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6084"></td>
        <td id="LC6084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prelate.  In another, a barber, an abbot, and two cardinals.  I have too</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6085"></td>
        <td id="LC6085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great a veneration for crowned heads, to dwell any longer on so nice a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6086"></td>
        <td id="LC6086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subject.  But as to counts, marquises, dukes, earls, and the like, I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6087"></td>
        <td id="LC6087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not so scrupulous.  And I confess, it was not without some pleasure, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6088"></td>
        <td id="LC6088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I found myself able to trace the particular features, by which certain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6089"></td>
        <td id="LC6089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">families are distinguished, up to their originals.  I could plainly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6090"></td>
        <td id="LC6090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discover whence one family derives a long chin; why a second has abounded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6091"></td>
        <td id="LC6091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with knaves for two generations, and fools for two more; why a third</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6092"></td>
        <td id="LC6092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happened to be crack-brained, and a fourth to be sharpers; whence it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6093"></td>
        <td id="LC6093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came, what Polydore Virgil says of a certain great house, _Nec vir</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6094"></td>
        <td id="LC6094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fortis_, _nec foemina casta_; how cruelty, falsehood, and cowardice, grew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6095"></td>
        <td id="LC6095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be characteristics by which certain families are distinguished as much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6096"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6097"></td>
        <td id="LC6097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which has lineally descended scrofulous tumours to their posterity.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6098"></td>
        <td id="LC6098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Neither could I wonder at all this, when I saw such an interruption of</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6101"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6102"></td>
        <td id="LC6102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was chiefly disgusted with modern history.  For having strictly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6103"></td>
        <td id="LC6103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">examined all the persons of greatest name in the courts of princes, for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6104"></td>

        <td id="L6105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6105"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6106"></td>
        <td id="LC6106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">counsel, to fools; sincerity, to flatterers; Roman virtue, to betrayers</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6107"></td>
        <td id="LC6107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of their country; piety, to atheists; chastity, to sodomites; truth, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC6108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">informers: how many innocent and excellent persons had been condemned to</td>

        <td id="L6111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6111"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6112"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6113"></td>
        <td id="LC6113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">senates might be challenged by bawds, whores, pimps, parasites, and</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6114"></td>
        <td id="LC6114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">buffoons.  How low an opinion I had of human wisdom and integrity, when I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6115"></td>
        <td id="LC6115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was truly informed of the springs and motives of great enterprises and</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6118"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6119"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6120"></td>
        <td id="LC6120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anecdotes, or secret history; who send so many kings to their graves with</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6121"></td>
        <td id="LC6121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a cup of poison; will repeat the discourse between a prince and chief</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6122"></td>
        <td id="LC6122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">minister, where no witness was by; unlock the thoughts and cabinets of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L6125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6125"></td>
        <td id="LC6125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that have surprised the world; how a whore can govern the back-stairs,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6126"></td>
        <td id="LC6126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the back-stairs a council, and the council a senate.  A general</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6127"></td>
        <td id="LC6127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confessed, in my presence, “that he got a victory purely by the force of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6128"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC6129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intelligence, he beat the enemy, to whom he intended to betray the</td>

        <td id="LC6130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fleet.”  Three kings protested to me, “that in their whole reigns they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6131"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6135"></td>
        <td id="LC6135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because that positive, confident, restiff temper, which virtue infused</td>
