        <td id="L6136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6136"></td>
        <td id="LC6136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into a man, was a perpetual clog to public business.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6137"></td>
        <td id="LC6137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6138"></td>
        <td id="LC6138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had the curiosity to inquire in a particular manner, by what methods</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6139"></td>
        <td id="LC6139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great numbers had procured to themselves high titles of honour, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6140"></td>
        <td id="LC6140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prodigious estates; and I confined my inquiry to a very modern period:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6141"></td>
        <td id="LC6141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, without grating upon present times, because I would be sure to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6142"></td>
        <td id="LC6142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">give no offence even to foreigners (for I hope the reader need not be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6143"></td>
        <td id="LC6143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told, that I do not in the least intend my own country, in what I say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6144"></td>
        <td id="LC6144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon this occasion,) a great number of persons concerned were called up;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6145"></td>
        <td id="LC6145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and, upon a very slight examination, discovered such a scene of infamy,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6146"></td>
        <td id="LC6146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I cannot reflect upon it without some seriousness.  Perjury,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6147"></td>
        <td id="LC6147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">oppression, subornation, fraud, pandarism, and the like infirmities, were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6148"></td>
        <td id="LC6148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">among the most excusable arts they had to mention; and for these I gave,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6149"></td>
        <td id="LC6149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as it was reasonable, great allowance.  But when some confessed they owed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6150"></td>
        <td id="LC6150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their greatness and wealth to sodomy, or incest; others, to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6151"></td>
        <td id="LC6151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prostituting of their own wives and daughters; others, to the betraying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6152"></td>
        <td id="LC6152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of their country or their prince; some, to poisoning; more to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6153"></td>
        <td id="LC6153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perverting of justice, in order to destroy the innocent, I hope I may be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6154"></td>
        <td id="LC6154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pardoned, if these discoveries inclined me a little to abate of that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6155"></td>
        <td id="LC6155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">profound veneration, which I am naturally apt to pay to persons of high</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6156"></td>
        <td id="LC6156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rank, who ought to be treated with the utmost respect due to their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6157"></td>
        <td id="LC6157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sublime dignity, by us their inferiors.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6158"></td>
        <td id="LC6158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6159"></td>
        <td id="LC6159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had often read of some great services done to princes and states, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6160"></td>
        <td id="LC6160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desired to see the persons by whom those services were performed.  Upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6161"></td>
        <td id="LC6161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inquiry I was told, “that their names were to be found on no record,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6162"></td>
        <td id="LC6162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">except a few of them, whom history has represented as the vilest of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6163"></td>
        <td id="LC6163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rogues and traitors.”  As to the rest, I had never once heard of them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6164"></td>
        <td id="LC6164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They all appeared with dejected looks, and in the meanest habit; most of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6165"></td>
        <td id="LC6165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them telling me, “they died in poverty and disgrace, and the rest on a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6166"></td>
        <td id="LC6166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scaffold or a gibbet.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6167"></td>
        <td id="LC6167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6168"></td>
        <td id="LC6168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Among others, there was one person, whose case appeared a little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6169"></td>
        <td id="LC6169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">singular.  He had a youth about eighteen years old standing by his side.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6170"></td>
        <td id="LC6170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He told me, “he had for many years been commander of a ship; and in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6171"></td>
        <td id="LC6171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sea fight at Actium had the good fortune to break through the enemy’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6172"></td>
        <td id="LC6172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great line of battle, sink three of their capital ships, and take a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6173"></td>
        <td id="LC6173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fourth, which was the sole cause of Antony’s flight, and of the victory</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6174"></td>
        <td id="LC6174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that ensued; that the youth standing by him, his only son, was killed in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6175"></td>
        <td id="LC6175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the action.”  He added, “that upon the confidence of some merit, the war</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6176"></td>
        <td id="LC6176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being at an end, he went to Rome, and solicited at the court of Augustus</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6177"></td>
        <td id="LC6177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be preferred to a greater ship, whose commander had been killed; but,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6178"></td>
        <td id="LC6178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without any regard to his pretensions, it was given to a boy who had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6179"></td>
        <td id="LC6179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never seen the sea, the son of Libertina, who waited on one of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6180"></td>
        <td id="LC6180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">emperor’s mistresses.  Returning back to his own vessel, he was charged</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6181"></td>
        <td id="LC6181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with neglect of duty, and the ship given to a favourite page of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6182"></td>
        <td id="LC6182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Publicola, the vice-admiral; whereupon he retired to a poor farm at a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6183"></td>
        <td id="LC6183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great distance from Rome, and there ended his life.”  I was so curious to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6184"></td>
        <td id="LC6184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know the truth of this story, that I desired Agrippa might be called, who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6185"></td>
        <td id="LC6185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was admiral in that fight.  He appeared, and confirmed the whole account:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6186"></td>
        <td id="LC6186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but with much more advantage to the captain, whose modesty had extenuated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6187"></td>
        <td id="LC6187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or concealed a great part of his merit.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6188"></td>
        <td id="LC6188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6189"></td>
        <td id="LC6189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was surprised to find corruption grown so high and so quick in that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6190"></td>
        <td id="LC6190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">empire, by the force of luxury so lately introduced; which made me less</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6191"></td>
        <td id="LC6191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wonder at many parallel cases in other countries, where vices of all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6192"></td>
        <td id="LC6192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kinds have reigned so much longer, and where the whole praise, as well as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6193"></td>
        <td id="LC6193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pillage, has been engrossed by the chief commander, who perhaps had the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6194"></td>
        <td id="LC6194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">least title to either.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6195"></td>
        <td id="LC6195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6196"></td>
        <td id="LC6196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As every person called up made exactly the same appearance he had done in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6197"></td>
        <td id="LC6197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the world, it gave me melancholy reflections to observe how much the race</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6198"></td>
        <td id="LC6198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of human kind was degenerated among us within these hundred years past;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6199"></td>
        <td id="LC6199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">how the pox, under all its consequences and denominations had altered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6200"></td>
        <td id="LC6200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every lineament of an English countenance; shortened the size of bodies,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6201"></td>
        <td id="LC6201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unbraced the nerves, relaxed the sinews and muscles, introduced a sallow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6202"></td>
        <td id="LC6202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">complexion, and rendered the flesh loose and rancid.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6203"></td>
        <td id="LC6203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6204"></td>
        <td id="LC6204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I descended so low, as to desire some English yeoman of the old stamp</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6205"></td>
        <td id="LC6205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might be summoned to appear; once so famous for the simplicity of their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6206"></td>
        <td id="LC6206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manners, diet, and dress; for justice in their dealings; for their true</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6207"></td>
        <td id="LC6207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spirit of liberty; for their valour, and love of their country.  Neither</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6208"></td>
        <td id="LC6208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could I be wholly unmoved, after comparing the living with the dead, when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6209"></td>
        <td id="LC6209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I considered how all these pure native virtues were prostituted for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6210"></td>
        <td id="LC6210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">piece of money by their grand-children; who, in selling their votes and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6211"></td>
        <td id="LC6211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">managing at elections, have acquired every vice and corruption that can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6212"></td>
        <td id="LC6212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possibly be learned in a court.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6213"></td>
        <td id="LC6213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6214"></td>
        <td id="LC6214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6215"></td>
        <td id="LC6215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6216"></td>
        <td id="LC6216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER IX.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6217"></td>
        <td id="LC6217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6218"></td>
        <td id="LC6218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6219"></td>
        <td id="LC6219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author returns to Maldonada.  Sails to the kingdom of Luggnagg.  The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6220"></td>
        <td id="LC6220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">author confined.  He is sent for to court.  The manner of his admittance.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6221"></td>
        <td id="LC6221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The king’s great lenity to his subjects.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6222"></td>
        <td id="LC6222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6223"></td>
        <td id="LC6223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The day of our departure being come, I took leave of his highness, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6224"></td>
        <td id="LC6224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Governor of Glubbdubdrib, and returned with my two companions to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6225"></td>
        <td id="LC6225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Maldonada, where, after a fortnight’s waiting, a ship was ready to sail</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6226"></td>
        <td id="LC6226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for Luggnagg.  The two gentlemen, and some others, were so generous and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6227"></td>
        <td id="LC6227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kind as to furnish me with provisions, and see me on board.  I was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6228"></td>
        <td id="LC6228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">month in this voyage.  We had one violent storm, and were under a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6229"></td>
        <td id="LC6229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">necessity of steering westward to get into the trade wind, which holds</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6230"></td>
        <td id="LC6230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for above sixty leagues.  On the 21st of April, 1708, we sailed into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6231"></td>
        <td id="LC6231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">river of Clumegnig, which is a seaport town, at the south-east point of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6232"></td>
        <td id="LC6232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Luggnagg.  We cast anchor within a league of the town, and made a signal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6233"></td>
        <td id="LC6233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for a pilot.  Two of them came on board in less than half an hour, by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6234"></td>
        <td id="LC6234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whom we were guided between certain shoals and rocks, which are very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6235"></td>
        <td id="LC6235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dangerous in the passage, to a large basin, where a fleet may ride in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6236"></td>
        <td id="LC6236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">safety within a cable’s length of the town-wall.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6237"></td>
        <td id="LC6237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6238"></td>
        <td id="LC6238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Some of our sailors, whether out of treachery or inadvertence, had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6239"></td>
        <td id="LC6239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">informed the pilots “that I was a stranger, and great traveller;” whereof</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6240"></td>
        <td id="LC6240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these gave notice to a custom-house officer, by whom I was examined very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6241"></td>
        <td id="LC6241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strictly upon my landing.  This officer spoke to me in the language of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6242"></td>
        <td id="LC6242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Balnibarbi, which, by the force of much commerce, is generally understood</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6243"></td>
        <td id="LC6243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in that town, especially by seamen and those employed in the customs.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6244"></td>
        <td id="LC6244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gave him a short account of some particulars, and made my story as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6245"></td>
        <td id="LC6245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plausible and consistent as I could; but I thought it necessary to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6246"></td>
        <td id="LC6246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disguise my country, and call myself a Hollander; because my intentions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6247"></td>
        <td id="LC6247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were for Japan, and I knew the Dutch were the only Europeans permitted to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6248"></td>
        <td id="LC6248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enter into that kingdom.  I therefore told the officer, “that having been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6249"></td>
        <td id="LC6249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shipwrecked on the coast of Balnibarbi, and cast on a rock, I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6250"></td>
        <td id="LC6250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">received up into Laputa, or the flying island (of which he had often</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6251"></td>
        <td id="LC6251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heard), and was now endeavouring to get to Japan, whence I might find a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6252"></td>
        <td id="LC6252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">convenience of returning to my own country.”  The officer said, “I must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6253"></td>
        <td id="LC6253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be confined till he could receive orders from court, for which he would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6254"></td>
        <td id="LC6254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">write immediately, and hoped to receive an answer in a fortnight.”  I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6255"></td>
        <td id="LC6255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carried to a convenient lodging with a sentry placed at the door;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6256"></td>
        <td id="LC6256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, I had the liberty of a large garden, and was treated with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6257"></td>
        <td id="LC6257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">humanity enough, being maintained all the time at the king’s charge.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6258"></td>
        <td id="LC6258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was invited by several persons, chiefly out of curiosity, because it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6259"></td>
        <td id="LC6259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reported that I came from countries very remote, of which they had never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6260"></td>
        <td id="LC6260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heard.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6261"></td>
        <td id="LC6261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6262"></td>
        <td id="LC6262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I hired a young man, who came in the same ship, to be an interpreter; he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6263"></td>
        <td id="LC6263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a native of Luggnagg, but had lived some years at Maldonada, and was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6264"></td>
        <td id="LC6264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a perfect master of both languages.  By his assistance, I was able to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6265"></td>
        <td id="LC6265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hold a conversation with those who came to visit me; but this consisted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6266"></td>
        <td id="LC6266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only of their questions, and my answers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6267"></td>
        <td id="LC6267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6268"></td>
        <td id="LC6268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The despatch came from court about the time we expected.  It contained a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6269"></td>
        <td id="LC6269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warrant for conducting me and my retinue to _Traldragdubh_, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6270"></td>
        <td id="LC6270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Trildrogdrib_ (for it is pronounced both ways as near as I can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6271"></td>
        <td id="LC6271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remember), by a party of ten horse.  All my retinue was that poor lad for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6272"></td>
        <td id="LC6272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an interpreter, whom I persuaded into my service, and, at my humble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6273"></td>
        <td id="LC6273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">request, we had each of us a mule to ride on.  A messenger was despatched</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6274"></td>
        <td id="LC6274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half a day’s journey before us, to give the king notice of my approach,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6275"></td>
        <td id="LC6275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and to desire, “that his majesty would please to appoint a day and hour,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6276"></td>
        <td id="LC6276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when it would by his gracious pleasure that I might have the honour to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6277"></td>
        <td id="LC6277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lick the dust before his footstool.”  This is the court style, and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6278"></td>
        <td id="LC6278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found it to be more than matter of form: for, upon my admittance two days</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6279"></td>
        <td id="LC6279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after my arrival, I was commanded to crawl upon my belly, and lick the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6280"></td>
        <td id="LC6280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">floor as I advanced; but, on account of my being a stranger, care was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6281"></td>
        <td id="LC6281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">taken to have it made so clean, that the dust was not offensive.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6282"></td>
        <td id="LC6282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">However, this was a peculiar grace, not allowed to any but persons of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6283"></td>
        <td id="LC6283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">highest rank, when they desire an admittance.  Nay, sometimes the floor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6284"></td>
        <td id="LC6284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is strewed with dust on purpose, when the person to be admitted happens</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6285"></td>
        <td id="LC6285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to have powerful enemies at court; and I have seen a great lord with his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6286"></td>
        <td id="LC6286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mouth so crammed, that when he had crept to the proper distance from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6287"></td>
        <td id="LC6287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">throne; he was not able to speak a word.  Neither is there any remedy;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6288"></td>
        <td id="LC6288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because it is capital for those, who receive an audience to spit or wipe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6289"></td>
        <td id="LC6289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their mouths in his majesty’s presence.  There is indeed another custom,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6290"></td>
        <td id="LC6290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which I cannot altogether approve of: when the king has a mind to put any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6291"></td>
        <td id="LC6291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of his nobles to death in a gentle indulgent manner, he commands the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6292"></td>
        <td id="LC6292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">floor to be strewed with a certain brown powder of a deadly composition,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6293"></td>
        <td id="LC6293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which being licked up, infallibly kills him in twenty-four hours.  But in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6294"></td>
        <td id="LC6294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice to this prince’s great clemency, and the care he has of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6295"></td>
        <td id="LC6295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subjects’ lives (wherein it were much to be wished that the Monarchs of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6296"></td>
        <td id="LC6296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Europe would imitate him), it must be mentioned for his honour, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6297"></td>
        <td id="LC6297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strict orders are given to have the infected parts of the floor well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6298"></td>
        <td id="LC6298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">washed after every such execution, which, if his domestics neglect, they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6299"></td>
        <td id="LC6299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are in danger of incurring his royal displeasure.  I myself heard him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6300"></td>
        <td id="LC6300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">give directions, that one of his pages should be whipped, whose turn it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6301"></td>
        <td id="LC6301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was to give notice about washing the floor after an execution, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6302"></td>
        <td id="LC6302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">maliciously had omitted it; by which neglect a young lord of great hopes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6303"></td>
        <td id="LC6303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coming to an audience, was unfortunately poisoned, although the king at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6304"></td>
        <td id="LC6304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that time had no design against his life.  But this good prince was so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6305"></td>
        <td id="LC6305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gracious as to forgive the poor page his whipping, upon promise that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6306"></td>
        <td id="LC6306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would do so no more, without special orders.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6307"></td>
        <td id="LC6307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6308"></td>
        <td id="LC6308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To return from this digression.  When I had crept within four yards of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6309"></td>
        <td id="LC6309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the throne, I raised myself gently upon my knees, and then striking my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6310"></td>
        <td id="LC6310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forehead seven times against the ground, I pronounced the following</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6311"></td>
        <td id="LC6311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">words, as they had been taught me the night before, _Inckpling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6312"></td>
        <td id="LC6312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gloffthrobb squut serummblhiop mlashnalt zwin tnodbalkuffh slhiophad</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6313"></td>
        <td id="LC6313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gurdlubh asht_.  This is the compliment, established by the laws of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6314"></td>
        <td id="LC6314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">land, for all persons admitted to the king’s presence.  It may be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6315"></td>
        <td id="LC6315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rendered into English thus: “May your celestial majesty outlive the sun,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6316"></td>
        <td id="LC6316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eleven moons and a half!”  To this the king returned some answer, which,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6317"></td>
        <td id="LC6317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">although I could not understand, yet I replied as I had been directed:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6318"></td>
        <td id="LC6318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Fluft drin yalerick dwuldom prastrad mirpush_, which properly signifies,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6319"></td>
        <td id="LC6319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My tongue is in the mouth of my friend;” and by this expression was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6320"></td>
        <td id="LC6320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meant, that I desired leave to bring my interpreter; whereupon the young</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6321"></td>
        <td id="LC6321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man already mentioned was accordingly introduced, by whose intervention I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6322"></td>
        <td id="LC6322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answered as many questions as his majesty could put in above an hour.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6323"></td>
        <td id="LC6323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spoke in the Balnibarbian tongue, and my interpreter delivered my meaning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6324"></td>
        <td id="LC6324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in that of Luggnagg.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6325"></td>
        <td id="LC6325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6326"></td>
        <td id="LC6326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The king was much delighted with my company, and ordered his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6327"></td>
        <td id="LC6327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_bliffmarklub_, or high-chamberlain, to appoint a lodging in the court</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6328"></td>
        <td id="LC6328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for me and my interpreter; with a daily allowance for my table, and a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6329"></td>
        <td id="LC6329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">large purse of gold for my common expenses.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6330"></td>
        <td id="LC6330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6331"></td>
        <td id="LC6331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I staid three months in this country, out of perfect obedience to his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6332"></td>
        <td id="LC6332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">majesty; who was pleased highly to favour me, and made me very honourable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6333"></td>
        <td id="LC6333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">offers.  But I thought it more consistent with prudence and justice to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6334"></td>
        <td id="LC6334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pass the remainder of my days with my wife and family.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6335"></td>
        <td id="LC6335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6336"></td>
        <td id="LC6336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6337"></td>
        <td id="LC6337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6338"></td>
        <td id="LC6338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER X.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6339"></td>
        <td id="LC6339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6340"></td>
        <td id="LC6340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6341"></td>
        <td id="LC6341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Luggnaggians commended.  A particular description of the Struldbrugs,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6342"></td>
        <td id="LC6342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with many conversations between the author and some eminent persons upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6343"></td>
        <td id="LC6343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that subject.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6344"></td>
        <td id="LC6344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6345"></td>
        <td id="LC6345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Luggnaggians are a polite and generous people; and although they are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6346"></td>
        <td id="LC6346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not without some share of that pride which is peculiar to all Eastern</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6347"></td>
        <td id="LC6347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">countries, yet they show themselves courteous to strangers, especially</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6348"></td>
        <td id="LC6348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such who are countenanced by the court.  I had many acquaintance, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6349"></td>
        <td id="LC6349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">among persons of the best fashion; and being always attended by my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6350"></td>
        <td id="LC6350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interpreter, the conversation we had was not disagreeable.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6351"></td>
        <td id="LC6351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6352"></td>
        <td id="LC6352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">One day, in much good company, I was asked by a person of quality,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6353"></td>
        <td id="LC6353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“whether I had seen any of their _struldbrugs_, or immortals?”  I said,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6354"></td>
        <td id="LC6354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I had not;” and desired he would explain to me “what he meant by such an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6355"></td>
        <td id="LC6355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appellation, applied to a mortal creature.”  He told me “that sometimes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6356"></td>
        <td id="LC6356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though very rarely, a child happened to be born in a family, with a red</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6357"></td>
        <td id="LC6357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">circular spot in the forehead, directly over the left eyebrow, which was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6358"></td>
        <td id="LC6358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an infallible mark that it should never die.”  The spot, as he described</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6359"></td>
        <td id="LC6359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it, “was about the compass of a silver threepence, but in the course of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6360"></td>
        <td id="LC6360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time grew larger, and changed its colour; for at twelve years old it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6361"></td>
        <td id="LC6361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">became green, so continued till five and twenty, then turned to a deep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6362"></td>
        <td id="LC6362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blue: at five and forty it grew coal black, and as large as an English</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6363"></td>
        <td id="LC6363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shilling; but never admitted any further alteration.”  He said, “these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6364"></td>
        <td id="LC6364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">births were so rare, that he did not believe there could be above eleven</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6365"></td>
        <td id="LC6365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hundred struldbrugs, of both sexes, in the whole kingdom; of which he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6366"></td>
        <td id="LC6366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">computed about fifty in the metropolis, and, among the rest, a young girl</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6367"></td>
        <td id="LC6367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">born; about three years ago: that these productions were not peculiar to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6368"></td>
        <td id="LC6368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any family, but a mere effect of chance; and the children of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6369"></td>
        <td id="LC6369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_struldbrugs_ themselves were equally mortal with the rest of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6370"></td>
        <td id="LC6370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6371"></td>
        <td id="LC6371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6372"></td>
        <td id="LC6372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I freely own myself to have been struck with inexpressible delight, upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6373"></td>
        <td id="LC6373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hearing this account: and the person who gave it me happening to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6374"></td>
        <td id="LC6374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understand the Balnibarbian language, which I spoke very well, I could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6375"></td>
        <td id="LC6375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not forbear breaking out into expressions, perhaps a little too</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6376"></td>
        <td id="LC6376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extravagant.  I cried out, as in a rapture, “Happy nation, where every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6377"></td>
        <td id="LC6377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">child hath at least a chance for being immortal!  Happy people, who enjoy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6378"></td>
        <td id="LC6378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so many living examples of ancient virtue, and have masters ready to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6379"></td>
        <td id="LC6379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instruct them in the wisdom of all former ages! but happiest, beyond all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6380"></td>
        <td id="LC6380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comparison, are those excellent _struldbrugs_, who, being born exempt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6381"></td>
        <td id="LC6381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from that universal calamity of human nature, have their minds free and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6382"></td>
        <td id="LC6382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disengaged, without the weight and depression of spirits caused by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6383"></td>
        <td id="LC6383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">continual apprehensions of death!”  I discovered my admiration that I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6384"></td>
        <td id="LC6384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not observed any of these illustrious persons at court; the black spot on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6385"></td>
        <td id="LC6385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the forehead being so remarkable a distinction, that I could not have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6386"></td>
        <td id="LC6386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">easily overlooked it: and it was impossible that his majesty, a most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6387"></td>
        <td id="LC6387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">judicious prince, should not provide himself with a good number of such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6388"></td>
        <td id="LC6388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wise and able counsellors.  Yet perhaps the virtue of those reverend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6389"></td>
        <td id="LC6389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sages was too strict for the corrupt and libertine manners of a court:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6390"></td>
        <td id="LC6390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and we often find by experience, that young men are too opinionated and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6391"></td>
        <td id="LC6391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">volatile to be guided by the sober dictates of their seniors.  However,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6392"></td>
        <td id="LC6392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">since the king was pleased to allow me access to his royal person, I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6393"></td>
        <td id="LC6393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resolved, upon the very first occasion, to deliver my opinion to him on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6394"></td>
        <td id="LC6394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this matter freely and at large, by the help of my interpreter; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6395"></td>
        <td id="LC6395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether he would please to take my advice or not, yet in one thing I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6396"></td>
        <td id="LC6396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">determined, that his majesty having frequently offered me an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6397"></td>
        <td id="LC6397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">establishment in this country, I would, with great thankfulness, accept</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6398"></td>
        <td id="LC6398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the favour, and pass my life here in the conversation of those superior</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6399"></td>
        <td id="LC6399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beings the _struldbrugs_, if they would please to admit me.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6400"></td>
        <td id="LC6400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6401"></td>
        <td id="LC6401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The gentleman to whom I addressed my discourse, because (as I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6402"></td>
        <td id="LC6402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">already observed) he spoke the language of Balnibarbi, said to me, with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6403"></td>
        <td id="LC6403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sort of a smile which usually arises from pity to the ignorant, “that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6404"></td>
        <td id="LC6404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was glad of any occasion to keep me among them, and desired my permission</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6405"></td>
        <td id="LC6405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to explain to the company what I had spoke.”  He did so, and they talked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6406"></td>
        <td id="LC6406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together for some time in their own language, whereof I understood not a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6407"></td>
        <td id="LC6407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">syllable, neither could I observe by their countenances, what impression</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6408"></td>
        <td id="LC6408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my discourse had made on them.  After a short silence, the same person</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6409"></td>
        <td id="LC6409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told me, “that his friends and mine (so he thought fit to express</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6410"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6411"></td>
        <td id="LC6411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the great happiness and advantages of immortal life, and they were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6412"></td>
        <td id="LC6412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desirous to know, in a particular manner, what scheme of living I should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6413"></td>
        <td id="LC6413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have formed to myself, if it had fallen to my lot to have been born a</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6414"></td>
