      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6415"></td>
        <td id="LC6415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6416"></td>
        <td id="LC6416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I answered, “it was easy to be eloquent on so copious and delightful a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6417"></td>
        <td id="LC6417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subject, especially to me, who had been often apt to amuse myself with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6418"></td>
        <td id="LC6418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">visions of what I should do, if I were a king, a general, or a great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6419"></td>
        <td id="LC6419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lord: and upon this very case, I had frequently run over the whole system</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6420"></td>
        <td id="LC6420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">how I should employ myself, and pass the time, if I were sure to live for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6421"></td>
        <td id="LC6421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ever.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6422"></td>
        <td id="LC6422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6423"></td>
        <td id="LC6423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That, if it had been my good fortune to come into the world a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6424"></td>
        <td id="LC6424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_struldbrug_, as soon as I could discover my own happiness, by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6425"></td>
        <td id="LC6425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understanding the difference between life and death, I would first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6426"></td>
        <td id="LC6426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resolve, by all arts and methods, whatsoever, to procure myself riches.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6427"></td>
        <td id="LC6427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the pursuit of which, by thrift and management, I might reasonably</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6428"></td>
        <td id="LC6428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expect, in about two hundred years, to be the wealthiest man in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6429"></td>
        <td id="LC6429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kingdom.  In the second place, I would, from my earliest youth, apply</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6430"></td>
        <td id="LC6430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">myself to the study of arts and sciences, by which I should arrive in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6431"></td>
        <td id="LC6431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time to excel all others in learning.  Lastly, I would carefully record</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6432"></td>
        <td id="LC6432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every action and event of consequence, that happened in the public,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6433"></td>
        <td id="LC6433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impartially draw the characters of the several successions of princes and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6434"></td>
        <td id="LC6434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great ministers of state, with my own observations on every point.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6435"></td>
        <td id="LC6435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would exactly set down the several changes in customs, language, fashions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6436"></td>
        <td id="LC6436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of dress, diet, and diversions.  By all which acquirements, I should be a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6437"></td>
        <td id="LC6437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">living treasure of knowledge and wisdom, and certainly become the oracle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6438"></td>
        <td id="LC6438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the nation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6439"></td>
        <td id="LC6439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6440"></td>
        <td id="LC6440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I would never marry after threescore, but live in a hospitable manner,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6441"></td>
        <td id="LC6441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yet still on the saving side.  I would entertain myself in forming and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6442"></td>
        <td id="LC6442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">directing the minds of hopeful young men, by convincing them, from my own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6443"></td>
        <td id="LC6443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remembrance, experience, and observation, fortified by numerous examples,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6444"></td>
        <td id="LC6444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the usefulness of virtue in public and private life.  But my choice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6445"></td>
        <td id="LC6445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and constant companions should be a set of my own immortal brotherhood;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6446"></td>
        <td id="LC6446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">among whom, I would elect a dozen from the most ancient, down to my own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6447"></td>
        <td id="LC6447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contemporaries.  Where any of these wanted fortunes, I would provide them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6448"></td>
        <td id="LC6448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with convenient lodges round my own estate, and have some of them always</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6449"></td>
        <td id="LC6449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at my table; only mingling a few of the most valuable among you mortals,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6450"></td>
        <td id="LC6450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whom length of time would harden me to lose with little or no reluctance,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6451"></td>
        <td id="LC6451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and treat your posterity after the same manner; just as a man diverts</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6452"></td>
        <td id="LC6452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself with the annual succession of pinks and tulips in his garden,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6453"></td>
        <td id="LC6453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without regretting the loss of those which withered the preceding year.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6454"></td>
        <td id="LC6454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6455"></td>
        <td id="LC6455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“These _struldbrugs_ and I would mutually communicate our observations</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6456"></td>
        <td id="LC6456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and memorials, through the course of time; remark the several gradations</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6457"></td>
        <td id="LC6457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by which corruption steals into the world, and oppose it in every step,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6458"></td>
        <td id="LC6458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by giving perpetual warning and instruction to mankind; which, added to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6459"></td>
        <td id="LC6459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the strong influence of our own example, would probably prevent that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6460"></td>
        <td id="LC6460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">continual degeneracy of human nature so justly complained of in all ages.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6461"></td>
        <td id="LC6461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6462"></td>
        <td id="LC6462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Add to this, the pleasure of seeing the various revolutions of states</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6463"></td>
        <td id="LC6463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and empires; the changes in the lower and upper world; ancient cities in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6464"></td>
        <td id="LC6464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ruins, and obscure villages become the seats of kings; famous rivers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6465"></td>
        <td id="LC6465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lessening into shallow brooks; the ocean leaving one coast dry, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6466"></td>
        <td id="LC6466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">overwhelming another; the discovery of many countries yet unknown;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6467"></td>
        <td id="LC6467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">barbarity overrunning the politest nations, and the most barbarous become</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6468"></td>
        <td id="LC6468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">civilized.  I should then see the discovery of the longitude, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6469"></td>
        <td id="LC6469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perpetual motion, the universal medicine, and many other great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6470"></td>
        <td id="LC6470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inventions, brought to the utmost perfection.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6471"></td>
        <td id="LC6471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6472"></td>
        <td id="LC6472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What wonderful discoveries should we make in astronomy, by outliving and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6473"></td>
        <td id="LC6473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confirming our own predictions; by observing the progress and return of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6474"></td>
        <td id="LC6474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comets, with the changes of motion in the sun, moon, and stars!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6475"></td>
        <td id="LC6475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6476"></td>
        <td id="LC6476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I enlarged upon many other topics, which the natural desire of endless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6477"></td>
        <td id="LC6477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life, and sublunary happiness, could easily furnish me with.  When I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6478"></td>
        <td id="LC6478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ended, and the sum of my discourse had been interpreted, as before, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6479"></td>
        <td id="LC6479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the rest of the company, there was a good deal of talk among them in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6480"></td>
        <td id="LC6480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">language of the country, not without some laughter at my expense.  At</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6481"></td>
        <td id="LC6481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last, the same gentleman who had been my interpreter, said, “he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6482"></td>
        <td id="LC6482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desired by the rest to set me right in a few mistakes, which I had fallen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6483"></td>
        <td id="LC6483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into through the common imbecility of human nature, and upon that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6484"></td>
        <td id="LC6484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">allowance was less answerable for them.  That this breed of _struldbrugs_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6485"></td>
        <td id="LC6485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was peculiar to their country, for there were no such people either in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6486"></td>
        <td id="LC6486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Balnibarbi or Japan, where he had the honour to be ambassador from his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6487"></td>
        <td id="LC6487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">majesty, and found the natives in both those kingdoms very hard to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6488"></td>
        <td id="LC6488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">believe that the fact was possible: and it appeared from my astonishment</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6489"></td>
        <td id="LC6489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when he first mentioned the matter to me, that I received it as a thing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6490"></td>
        <td id="LC6490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wholly new, and scarcely to be credited.  That in the two kingdoms above</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6491"></td>
        <td id="LC6491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mentioned, where, during his residence, he had conversed very much, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6492"></td>
        <td id="LC6492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">observed long life to be the universal desire and wish of mankind.  That</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6493"></td>
        <td id="LC6493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whoever had one foot in the grave was sure to hold back the other as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6494"></td>
        <td id="LC6494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strongly as he could.  That the oldest had still hopes of living one day</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6495"></td>
        <td id="LC6495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">longer, and looked on death as the greatest evil, from which nature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6496"></td>
        <td id="LC6496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always prompted him to retreat.  Only in this island of Luggnagg the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6497"></td>
        <td id="LC6497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appetite for living was not so eager, from the continual example of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6498"></td>
        <td id="LC6498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_struldbrugs_ before their eyes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6499"></td>
        <td id="LC6499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6500"></td>
        <td id="LC6500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That the system of living contrived by me, was unreasonable and unjust;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6501"></td>
        <td id="LC6501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because it supposed a perpetuity of youth, health, and vigour, which no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6502"></td>
        <td id="LC6502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man could be so foolish to hope, however extravagant he may be in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6503"></td>
        <td id="LC6503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wishes.  That the question therefore was not, whether a man would choose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6504"></td>
        <td id="LC6504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be always in the prime of youth, attended with prosperity and health;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6505"></td>
        <td id="LC6505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but how he would pass a perpetual life under all the usual disadvantages</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6506"></td>
        <td id="LC6506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which old age brings along with it.  For although few men will avow their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6507"></td>
        <td id="LC6507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desires of being immortal, upon such hard conditions, yet in the two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6508"></td>
        <td id="LC6508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kingdoms before mentioned, of Balnibarbi and Japan, he observed that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6509"></td>
        <td id="LC6509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every man desired to put off death some time longer, let it approach ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6510"></td>
        <td id="LC6510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so late: and he rarely heard of any man who died willingly, except he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6511"></td>
        <td id="LC6511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were incited by the extremity of grief or torture.  And he appealed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6512"></td>
        <td id="LC6512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, whether in those countries I had travelled, as well as my own, I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6513"></td>
        <td id="LC6513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not observed the same general disposition.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6514"></td>
        <td id="LC6514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6515"></td>
        <td id="LC6515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After this preface, he gave me a particular account of the _struldbrugs_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6516"></td>
        <td id="LC6516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">among them.  He said, “they commonly acted like mortals till about thirty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6517"></td>
        <td id="LC6517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">years old; after which, by degrees, they grew melancholy and dejected,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6518"></td>
        <td id="LC6518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">increasing in both till they came to fourscore.  This he learned from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6519"></td>
        <td id="LC6519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their own confession: for otherwise, there not being above two or three</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6520"></td>
        <td id="LC6520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of that species born in an age, they were too few to form a general</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6521"></td>
        <td id="LC6521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">observation by.  When they came to fourscore years, which is reckoned the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6522"></td>
        <td id="LC6522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extremity of living in this country, they had not only all the follies</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6523"></td>
        <td id="LC6523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and infirmities of other old men, but many more which arose from the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6524"></td>
        <td id="LC6524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dreadful prospect of never dying.  They were not only opinionative,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6525"></td>
        <td id="LC6525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">peevish, covetous, morose, vain, talkative, but incapable of friendship,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6526"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6527"></td>
        <td id="LC6527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grandchildren.  Envy and impotent desires are their prevailing passions.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6528"></td>
        <td id="LC6528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But those objects against which their envy seems principally directed,</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC6532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">repine that others have gone to a harbour of rest to which they</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6535"></td>
        <td id="LC6535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">middle-age, and even that is very imperfect; and for the truth or</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6611"></td>
        <td id="LC6611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laws of the kingdom, or else I should have been well content with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6612"></td>
        <td id="LC6612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trouble and expense of transporting them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6613"></td>
        <td id="LC6613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6614"></td>
        <td id="LC6614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I could not but agree, that the laws of this kingdom relative to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6615"></td>
        <td id="LC6615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_struldbrugs_ were founded upon the strongest reasons, and such as any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6616"></td>
        <td id="LC6616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other country would be under the necessity of enacting, in the like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6617"></td>
        <td id="LC6617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">circumstances.  Otherwise, as avarice is the necessary consequence of old</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6618"></td>
        <td id="LC6618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">age, those immortals would in time become proprietors of the whole</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6619"></td>
        <td id="LC6619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nation, and engross the civil power, which, for want of abilities to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6620"></td>
        <td id="LC6620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manage, must end in the ruin of the public.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6621"></td>
        <td id="LC6621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6622"></td>
        <td id="LC6622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6623"></td>
        <td id="LC6623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6624"></td>
        <td id="LC6624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XI.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6625"></td>
        <td id="LC6625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6626"></td>
        <td id="LC6626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6627"></td>
        <td id="LC6627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author leaves Luggnagg, and sails to Japan.  From thence he returns</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6628"></td>
        <td id="LC6628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a Dutch ship to Amsterdam, and from Amsterdam to England.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6629"></td>
        <td id="LC6629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6630"></td>
        <td id="LC6630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I thought this account of the _struldbrugs_ might be some entertainment</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6631"></td>
        <td id="LC6631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the reader, because it seems to be a little out of the common way; at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6632"></td>
        <td id="LC6632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">least I do not remember to have met the like in any book of travels that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6633"></td>
        <td id="LC6633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has come to my hands: and if I am deceived, my excuse must be, that it is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6634"></td>
        <td id="LC6634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">necessary for travellers who describe the same country, very often to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6635"></td>
        <td id="LC6635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">agree in dwelling on the same particulars, without deserving the censure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6636"></td>
        <td id="LC6636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of having borrowed or transcribed from those who wrote before them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6637"></td>
        <td id="LC6637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6638"></td>
        <td id="LC6638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is indeed a perpetual commerce between this kingdom and the great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6639"></td>
        <td id="LC6639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">empire of Japan; and it is very probable, that the Japanese authors may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6640"></td>
        <td id="LC6640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have given some account of the _struldbrugs_; but my stay in Japan was so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6641"></td>
        <td id="LC6641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">short, and I was so entirely a stranger to the language, that I was not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6642"></td>
        <td id="LC6642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">qualified to make any inquiries.  But I hope the Dutch, upon this notice,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6643"></td>
        <td id="LC6643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will be curious and able enough to supply my defects.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6644"></td>
        <td id="LC6644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6645"></td>
        <td id="LC6645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His majesty having often pressed me to accept some employment in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6646"></td>
        <td id="LC6646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">court, and finding me absolutely determined to return to my native</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6647"></td>
        <td id="LC6647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">country, was pleased to give me his license to depart; and honoured me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6648"></td>
        <td id="LC6648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a letter of recommendation, under his own hand, to the Emperor of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6649"></td>
        <td id="LC6649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Japan.  He likewise presented me with four hundred and forty-four large</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6650"></td>
        <td id="LC6650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pieces of gold (this nation delighting in even numbers), and a red</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6651"></td>
        <td id="LC6651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">diamond, which I sold in England for eleven hundred pounds.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6652"></td>
        <td id="LC6652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6653"></td>
        <td id="LC6653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On the 6th of May, 1709, I took a solemn leave of his majesty, and all my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6654"></td>
        <td id="LC6654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friends.  This prince was so gracious as to order a guard to conduct me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6655"></td>
        <td id="LC6655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to Glanguenstald, which is a royal port to the south-west part of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6656"></td>
        <td id="LC6656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">island.  In six days I found a vessel ready to carry me to Japan, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6657"></td>
        <td id="LC6657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spent fifteen days in the voyage.  We landed at a small port-town called</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6658"></td>
        <td id="LC6658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Xamoschi, situated on the south-east part of Japan; the town lies on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6659"></td>
        <td id="LC6659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">western point, where there is a narrow strait leading northward into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6660"></td>
        <td id="LC6660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">along arm of the sea, upon the north-west part of which, Yedo, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6661"></td>
        <td id="LC6661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">metropolis, stands.  At landing, I showed the custom-house officers my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6662"></td>
        <td id="LC6662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">letter from the king of Luggnagg to his imperial majesty.  They knew the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6663"></td>
        <td id="LC6663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seal perfectly well; it was as broad as the palm of my hand.  The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6664"></td>
        <td id="LC6664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impression was, _A king lifting up a lame beggar from the earth_.  The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6665"></td>
        <td id="LC6665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">magistrates of the town, hearing of my letter, received me as a public</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6666"></td>
        <td id="LC6666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">minister.  They provided me with carriages and servants, and bore my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6667"></td>
        <td id="LC6667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">charges to Yedo; where I was admitted to an audience, and delivered my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6668"></td>
        <td id="LC6668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">letter, which was opened with great ceremony, and explained to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6669"></td>
        <td id="LC6669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Emperor by an interpreter, who then gave me notice, by his majesty’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6670"></td>
        <td id="LC6670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">order, “that I should signify my request, and, whatever it were, it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6671"></td>
        <td id="LC6671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should be granted, for the sake of his royal brother of Luggnagg.”  This</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6672"></td>
        <td id="LC6672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interpreter was a person employed to transact affairs with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6673"></td>
        <td id="LC6673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hollanders.  He soon conjectured, by my countenance, that I was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6674"></td>
        <td id="LC6674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">European, and therefore repeated his majesty’s commands in Low Dutch,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6675"></td>
        <td id="LC6675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which he spoke perfectly well.  I answered, as I had before determined,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6676"></td>
        <td id="LC6676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“that I was a Dutch merchant, shipwrecked in a very remote country,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6677"></td>
        <td id="LC6677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whence I had travelled by sea and land to Luggnagg, and then took</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6678"></td>
        <td id="LC6678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shipping for Japan; where I knew my countrymen often traded, and with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6679"></td>
        <td id="LC6679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some of these I hoped to get an opportunity of returning into Europe: I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6680"></td>
        <td id="LC6680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">therefore most humbly entreated his royal favour, to give order that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6681"></td>
        <td id="LC6681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should be conducted in safety to Nangasac.”  To this I added another</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6682"></td>
        <td id="LC6682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">petition, “that for the sake of my patron the king of Luggnagg, his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6683"></td>
        <td id="LC6683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">majesty would condescend to excuse my performing the ceremony imposed on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6684"></td>
        <td id="LC6684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my countrymen, of trampling upon the crucifix: because I had been thrown</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6685"></td>
        <td id="LC6685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into his kingdom by my misfortunes, without any intention of trading.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6686"></td>
        <td id="LC6686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When this latter petition was interpreted to the Emperor, he seemed a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6687"></td>
        <td id="LC6687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little surprised; and said, “he believed I was the first of my countrymen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6688"></td>
        <td id="LC6688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who ever made any scruple in this point; and that he began to doubt,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6689"></td>
        <td id="LC6689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether I was a real Hollander, or not; but rather suspected I must be a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6690"></td>
        <td id="LC6690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Christian.  However, for the reasons I had offered, but chiefly to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6691"></td>
        <td id="LC6691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gratify the king of Luggnagg by an uncommon mark of his favour, he would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6692"></td>
        <td id="LC6692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comply with the singularity of my humour; but the affair must be managed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6693"></td>
        <td id="LC6693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with dexterity, and his officers should be commanded to let me pass, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6694"></td>
        <td id="LC6694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it were by forgetfulness.  For he assured me, that if the secret should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6695"></td>
        <td id="LC6695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be discovered by my countrymen the Dutch, they would cut my throat in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6696"></td>
        <td id="LC6696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">voyage.”  I returned my thanks, by the interpreter, for so unusual a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6697"></td>
        <td id="LC6697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">favour; and some troops being at that time on their march to Nangasac,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6698"></td>
        <td id="LC6698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the commanding officer had orders to convey me safe thither, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6699"></td>
        <td id="LC6699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">particular instructions about the business of the crucifix.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6700"></td>
        <td id="LC6700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6701"></td>
        <td id="LC6701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On the 9th day of June, 1709, I arrived at Nangasac, after a very long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6702"></td>
        <td id="LC6702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and troublesome journey.  I soon fell into the company of some Dutch</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6703"></td>
        <td id="LC6703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sailors belonging to the Amboyna, of Amsterdam, a stout ship of 450 tons.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6704"></td>
        <td id="LC6704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had lived long in Holland, pursuing my studies at Leyden, and I spoke</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6705"></td>
        <td id="LC6705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dutch well.  The seamen soon knew whence I came last: they were curious</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6706"></td>
        <td id="LC6706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to inquire into my voyages and course of life.  I made up a story as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6707"></td>
        <td id="LC6707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">short and probable as I could, but concealed the greatest part.  I knew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6708"></td>
        <td id="LC6708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many persons in Holland.  I was able to invent names for my parents, whom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6709"></td>
        <td id="LC6709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I pretended to be obscure people in the province of Gelderland.  I would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6710"></td>
        <td id="LC6710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have given the captain (one Theodorus Vangrult) what he pleased to ask</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6711"></td>
        <td id="LC6711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for my voyage to Holland; but understanding I was a surgeon, he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6712"></td>
        <td id="LC6712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contented to take half the usual rate, on condition that I would serve</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6713"></td>
        <td id="LC6713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him in the way of my calling.  Before we took shipping, I was often asked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6714"></td>
        <td id="LC6714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by some of the crew, whether I had performed the ceremony above</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6715"></td>
        <td id="LC6715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mentioned?  I evaded the question by general answers; “that I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6716"></td>
        <td id="LC6716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">satisfied the Emperor and court in all particulars.”  However, a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6717"></td>
        <td id="LC6717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">malicious rogue of a skipper went to an officer, and pointing to me, told</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6718"></td>
        <td id="LC6718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him, “I had not yet trampled on the crucifix;” but the other, who had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6719"></td>
        <td id="LC6719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">received instructions to let me pass, gave the rascal twenty strokes on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6720"></td>
        <td id="LC6720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the shoulders with a bamboo; after which I was no more troubled with such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6721"></td>
        <td id="LC6721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">questions.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6722"></td>
        <td id="LC6722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6723"></td>
        <td id="LC6723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nothing happened worth mentioning in this voyage.  We sailed with a fair</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6724"></td>
        <td id="LC6724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wind to the Cape of Good Hope, where we staid only to take in fresh</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6725"></td>
        <td id="LC6725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">water.  On the 10th of April, 1710, we arrived safe at Amsterdam, having</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6726"></td>
        <td id="LC6726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lost only three men by sickness in the voyage, and a fourth, who fell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6727"></td>
        <td id="LC6727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the foremast into the sea, not far from the coast of Guinea.  From</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6728"></td>
        <td id="LC6728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Amsterdam I soon after set sail for England, in a small vessel belonging</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6729"></td>
        <td id="LC6729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to that city.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6730"></td>
        <td id="LC6730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6731"></td>
        <td id="LC6731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On the 16th of April we put in at the Downs.  I landed next morning, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6732"></td>
        <td id="LC6732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saw once more my native country, after an absence of five years and six</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6733"></td>
        <td id="LC6733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">months complete.  I went straight to Redriff, where I arrived the same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6734"></td>
        <td id="LC6734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">day at two in the afternoon, and found my wife and family in good health.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6735"></td>
        <td id="LC6735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6736"></td>
        <td id="LC6736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6737"></td>
        <td id="LC6737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6738"></td>
        <td id="LC6738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6739"></td>
        <td id="LC6739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6740"></td>
        <td id="LC6740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6741"></td>
        <td id="LC6741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">PART IV.  A VOYAGE TO THE COUNTRY OF THE HOUYHNHNMS.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6742"></td>
        <td id="LC6742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6743"></td>
        <td id="LC6743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6744"></td>
        <td id="LC6744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6745"></td>
        <td id="LC6745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6746"></td>
        <td id="LC6746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6747"></td>
        <td id="LC6747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6748"></td>
        <td id="LC6748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER I.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6749"></td>
        <td id="LC6749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6750"></td>
        <td id="LC6750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6751"></td>
        <td id="LC6751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author sets out as captain of a ship.  His men conspire against him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6752"></td>
        <td id="LC6752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confine him a long time to his cabin, and set him on shore in an unknown</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6753"></td>
        <td id="LC6753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">land.  He travels up into the country.  The Yahoos, a strange sort of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6754"></td>
        <td id="LC6754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">animal, described.  The author meets two Houyhnhnms.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6755"></td>
        <td id="LC6755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6756"></td>
        <td id="LC6756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I continued at home with my wife and children about five months, in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6757"></td>
        <td id="LC6757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very happy condition, if I could have learned the lesson of knowing when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6758"></td>
        <td id="LC6758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was well.  I left my poor wife big with child, and accepted an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6759"></td>
        <td id="LC6759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advantageous offer made me to be captain of the Adventurer, a stout</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6760"></td>
        <td id="LC6760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">merchantman of 350 tons: for I understood navigation well, and being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6761"></td>
        <td id="LC6761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grown weary of a surgeon’s employment at sea, which, however, I could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6762"></td>
        <td id="LC6762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exercise upon occasion, I took a skilful young man of that calling, one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6763"></td>
        <td id="LC6763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Robert Purefoy, into my ship.  We set sail from Portsmouth upon the 7th</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6764"></td>
        <td id="LC6764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">day of September, 1710; on the 14th we met with Captain Pocock, of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6765"></td>
        <td id="LC6765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bristol, at Teneriffe, who was going to the bay of Campechy to cut</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6766"></td>
        <td id="LC6766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">logwood.  On the 16th, he was parted from us by a storm; I heard since my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6767"></td>
        <td id="LC6767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">return, that his ship foundered, and none escaped but one cabin boy.  He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6768"></td>
        <td id="LC6768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was an honest man, and a good sailor, but a little too positive in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6769"></td>
        <td id="LC6769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own opinions, which was the cause of his destruction, as it has been with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6770"></td>
        <td id="LC6770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several others; for if he had followed my advice, he might have been safe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6771"></td>
        <td id="LC6771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at home with his family at this time, as well as myself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6772"></td>
        <td id="LC6772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6773"></td>
        <td id="LC6773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had several men who died in my ship of calentures, so that I was forced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6774"></td>
        <td id="LC6774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to get recruits out of Barbadoes and the Leeward Islands, where I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6775"></td>
        <td id="LC6775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">touched, by the direction of the merchants who employed me; which I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6776"></td>
        <td id="LC6776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soon too much cause to repent: for I found afterwards, that most of them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6777"></td>
        <td id="LC6777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been buccaneers.  I had fifty hands onboard; and my orders were, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6778"></td>
        <td id="LC6778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should trade with the Indians in the South-Sea, and make what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6779"></td>
        <td id="LC6779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discoveries I could.  These rogues, whom I had picked up, debauched my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6780"></td>
        <td id="LC6780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other men, and they all formed a conspiracy to seize the ship, and secure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6781"></td>
        <td id="LC6781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me; which they did one morning, rushing into my cabin, and binding me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6782"></td>
        <td id="LC6782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand and foot, threatening to throw me overboard, if I offered to stir.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6783"></td>
        <td id="LC6783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I told them, “I was their prisoner, and would submit.”  This they made me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6784"></td>
        <td id="LC6784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swear to do, and then they unbound me, only fastening one of my legs with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6785"></td>
        <td id="LC6785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a chain, near my bed, and placed a sentry at my door with his piece</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6786"></td>
        <td id="LC6786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">charged, who was commanded to shoot me dead if I attempted my liberty.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6787"></td>
        <td id="LC6787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They sent me own victuals and drink, and took the government of the ship</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6788"></td>
        <td id="LC6788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to themselves.  Their design was to turn pirates and, plunder the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6789"></td>
        <td id="LC6789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Spaniards, which they could not do till they got more men.  But first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6790"></td>
        <td id="LC6790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they resolved to sell the goods the ship, and then go to Madagascar for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6791"></td>
        <td id="LC6791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recruits, several among them having died since my confinement.  They</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6792"></td>
        <td id="LC6792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sailed many weeks, and traded with the Indians; but I knew not what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6793"></td>
        <td id="LC6793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">course they took, being kept a close prisoner in my cabin, and expecting</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6794"></td>
        <td id="LC6794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing less than to be murdered, as they often threatened me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6795"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6796"></td>
        <td id="LC6796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Upon the 9th day of May, 1711, one James Welch came down to my cabin, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6797"></td>
        <td id="LC6797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said, “he had orders from the captain to set me ashore.”  I expostulated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6798"></td>
        <td id="LC6798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with him, but in vain; neither would he so much as tell me who their new</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6799"></td>
        <td id="LC6799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">captain was.  They forced me into the long-boat, letting me put on my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6800"></td>
        <td id="LC6800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">best suit of clothes, which were as good as new, and take a small bundle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6801"></td>
        <td id="LC6801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of linen, but no arms, except my hanger; and they were so civil as not to</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6802"></td>
        <td id="LC6802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">search my pockets, into which I conveyed what money I had, with some</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6804"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6805"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6811"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L6878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6878"></td>
        <td id="LC6878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">common style and whistle of jockeys, when they are going to handle a</td>

        <td id="L6879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6879"></td>
