      <tr>
        <td id="L6881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6881"></td>
        <td id="LC6881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fore-foot to remove my hand.  Then he neighed three or four times, but in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6882"></td>
        <td id="LC6882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so different a cadence, that I almost began to think he was speaking to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6883"></td>
        <td id="LC6883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself, in some language of his own.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6884"></td>
        <td id="LC6884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6885"></td>
        <td id="LC6885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">While he and I were thus employed, another horse came up; who applying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6886"></td>
        <td id="LC6886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself to the first in a very formal manner, they gently struck each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6887"></td>
        <td id="LC6887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other’s right hoof before, neighing several times by turns, and varying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6888"></td>
        <td id="LC6888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sound, which seemed to be almost articulate.  They went some paces</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6889"></td>
        <td id="LC6889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off, as if it were to confer together, walking side by side, backward and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6890"></td>
        <td id="LC6890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forward, like persons deliberating upon some affair of weight, but often</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6891"></td>
        <td id="LC6891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turning their eyes towards me, as it were to watch that I might not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6892"></td>
        <td id="LC6892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">escape.  I was amazed to see such actions and behaviour in brute beasts;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6893"></td>
        <td id="LC6893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and concluded with myself, that if the inhabitants of this country were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6894"></td>
        <td id="LC6894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">endued with a proportionable degree of reason, they must needs be the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6895"></td>
        <td id="LC6895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wisest people upon earth.  This thought gave me so much comfort, that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6896"></td>
        <td id="LC6896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resolved to go forward, until I could discover some house or village, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6897"></td>
        <td id="LC6897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meet with any of the natives, leaving the two horses to discourse</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6898"></td>
        <td id="LC6898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together as they pleased.  But the first, who was a dapple gray,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6899"></td>
        <td id="LC6899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">observing me to steal off, neighed after me in so expressive a tone, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6900"></td>
        <td id="LC6900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I fancied myself to understand what he meant; whereupon I turned back,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6901"></td>
        <td id="LC6901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and came near to him to expect his farther commands: but concealing my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6902"></td>
        <td id="LC6902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fear as much as I could, for I began to be in some pain how this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6903"></td>
        <td id="LC6903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">adventure might terminate; and the reader will easily believe I did not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6904"></td>
        <td id="LC6904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much like my present situation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6905"></td>
        <td id="LC6905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6906"></td>
        <td id="LC6906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The two horses came up close to me, looking with great earnestness upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6907"></td>
        <td id="LC6907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my face and hands.  The gray steed rubbed my hat all round with his right</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6908"></td>
        <td id="LC6908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fore-hoof, and discomposed it so much that I was forced to adjust it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6909"></td>
        <td id="LC6909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">better by taking it off and settling it again; whereat, both he and his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6910"></td>
        <td id="LC6910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">companion (who was a brown bay) appeared to be much surprised: the latter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6911"></td>
        <td id="LC6911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">felt the lappet of my coat, and finding it to hang loose about me, they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6912"></td>
        <td id="LC6912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">both looked with new signs of wonder.  He stroked my right hand, seeming</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6913"></td>
        <td id="LC6913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to admire the softness and colour; but he squeezed it so hard between his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6914"></td>
        <td id="LC6914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hoof and his pastern, that I was forced to roar; after which they both</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6915"></td>
        <td id="LC6915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">touched me with all possible tenderness.  They were under great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6916"></td>
        <td id="LC6916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perplexity about my shoes and stockings, which they felt very often,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6917"></td>
        <td id="LC6917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neighing to each other, and using various gestures, not unlike those of a</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6918"></td>
        <td id="LC6918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">philosopher, when he would attempt to solve some new and difficult</td>

        <td id="L6919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6919"></td>
        <td id="LC6919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">phenomenon.</td>

        <td id="L6920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6920"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6921"></td>
        <td id="LC6921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Upon the whole, the behaviour of these animals was so orderly and</td>

        <td id="L6923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6923"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6925"></td>
        <td id="LC6925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with him; or, perhaps, were really amazed at the sight of a man so very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6926"></td>
        <td id="LC6926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">different in habit, feature, and complexion, from those who might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6927"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6928"></td>
        <td id="LC6928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reasoning, I ventured to address them in the following manner:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6929"></td>
        <td id="LC6929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Gentlemen, if you be conjurers, as I have good cause to believe, you can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6930"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6931"></td>
        <td id="LC6931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I am a poor distressed Englishman, driven by his misfortunes upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6932"></td>
        <td id="LC6932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your coast; and I entreat one of you to let me ride upon his back, as if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6933"></td>
        <td id="LC6933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he were a real horse, to some house or village where I can be relieved.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6934"></td>
        <td id="LC6934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In return of which favour, I will make you a present of this knife and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6935"></td>
        <td id="LC6935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bracelet,” taking them out of my pocket.  The two creatures stood silent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6936"></td>
        <td id="LC6936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">while I spoke, seeming to listen with great attention, and when I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6937"></td>
        <td id="LC6937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ended, they neighed frequently towards each other, as if they were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6938"></td>
        <td id="LC6938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">engaged in serious conversation.  I plainly observed that their language</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6939"></td>
        <td id="LC6939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expressed the passions very well, and the words might, with little pains,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6940"></td>
        <td id="LC6940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be resolved into an alphabet more easily than the Chinese.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6941"></td>
        <td id="LC6941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6942"></td>
        <td id="LC6942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I could frequently distinguish the word _Yahoo_, which was repeated by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6943"></td>
        <td id="LC6943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">each of them several times: and although it was impossible for me to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6944"></td>
        <td id="LC6944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conjecture what it meant, yet while the two horses were busy in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6945"></td>
        <td id="LC6945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conversation, I endeavoured to practise this word upon my tongue; and as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6946"></td>
        <td id="LC6946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soon as they were silent, I boldly pronounced _Yahoo_ in a loud voice,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6947"></td>
        <td id="LC6947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imitating at the same time, as near as I could, the neighing of a horse;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6948"></td>
        <td id="LC6948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at which they were both visibly surprised; and the gray repeated the same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6949"></td>
        <td id="LC6949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">word twice, as if he meant to teach me the right accent; wherein I spoke</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6950"></td>
        <td id="LC6950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after him as well as I could, and found myself perceivably to improve</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6951"></td>
        <td id="LC6951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every time, though very far from any degree of perfection.  Then the bay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6952"></td>
        <td id="LC6952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tried me with a second word, much harder to be pronounced; but reducing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6953"></td>
        <td id="LC6953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it to the English orthography, may be spelt thus, _Houyhnhnm_.  I did not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6954"></td>
        <td id="LC6954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">succeed in this so well as in the former; but after two or three farther</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6955"></td>
        <td id="LC6955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trials, I had better fortune; and they both appeared amazed at my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6956"></td>
        <td id="LC6956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">capacity.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6957"></td>
        <td id="LC6957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6958"></td>
        <td id="LC6958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After some further discourse, which I then conjectured might relate to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6959"></td>
        <td id="LC6959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, the two friends took their leaves, with the same compliment of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6960"></td>
        <td id="LC6960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">striking each other’s hoof; and the gray made me signs that I should walk</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6961"></td>
        <td id="LC6961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before him; wherein I thought it prudent to comply, till I could find a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6962"></td>
        <td id="LC6962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">better director.  When I offered to slacken my pace, he would cry _hhuun</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6963"></td>
        <td id="LC6963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hhuun_: I guessed his meaning, and gave him to understand, as well as I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6964"></td>
        <td id="LC6964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could, “that I was weary, and not able to walk faster;” upon which he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6965"></td>
        <td id="LC6965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would stand awhile to let me rest.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6966"></td>
        <td id="LC6966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6967"></td>
        <td id="LC6967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6968"></td>
        <td id="LC6968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6969"></td>
        <td id="LC6969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER II.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6970"></td>
        <td id="LC6970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6971"></td>
        <td id="LC6971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6972"></td>

        <td id="L7060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7060"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7061"></td>

        <td id="L7064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7064"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7150"></td>
        <td id="LC7150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When it grew towards evening, the master horse ordered a place for me to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7151"></td>
        <td id="LC7151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lodge in; it was but six yards from the house and separated from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7152"></td>
        <td id="LC7152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stable of the _Yahoos_.  Here I got some straw, and covering myself with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7153"></td>
        <td id="LC7153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my own clothes, slept very sound.  But I was in a short time better</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7154"></td>
        <td id="LC7154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accommodated, as the reader shall know hereafter, when I come to treat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7155"></td>
        <td id="LC7155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more particularly about my way of living.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7156"></td>
        <td id="LC7156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7157"></td>
        <td id="LC7157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7158"></td>
        <td id="LC7158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7159"></td>
        <td id="LC7159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER III.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7160"></td>
        <td id="LC7160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7161"></td>
        <td id="LC7161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7162"></td>
        <td id="LC7162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author studies to learn the language.  The Houyhnhnm, his master,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7163"></td>
        <td id="LC7163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assists in teaching him.  The language described.  Several Houyhnhnms of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7164"></td>
        <td id="LC7164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quality come out of curiosity to see the author.  He gives his master a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7165"></td>
        <td id="LC7165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">short account of his voyage.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7166"></td>
        <td id="LC7166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7167"></td>
        <td id="LC7167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My principal endeavour was to learn the language, which my master (for so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7168"></td>
        <td id="LC7168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I shall henceforth call him), and his children, and every servant of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7169"></td>
        <td id="LC7169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house, were desirous to teach me; for they looked upon it as a prodigy,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7170"></td>
        <td id="LC7170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that a brute animal should discover such marks of a rational creature.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7171"></td>
        <td id="LC7171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pointed to every thing, and inquired the name of it, which I wrote down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7172"></td>
        <td id="LC7172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in my journal-book when I was alone, and corrected my bad accent by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7173"></td>
        <td id="LC7173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desiring those of the family to pronounce it often.  In this employment,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7174"></td>
        <td id="LC7174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a sorrel nag, one of the under-servants, was very ready to assist me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7175"></td>
        <td id="LC7175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7176"></td>
        <td id="LC7176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In speaking, they pronounced through the nose and throat, and their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7177"></td>
        <td id="LC7177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">language approaches nearest to the High-Dutch, or German, of any I know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7178"></td>
        <td id="LC7178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in Europe; but is much more graceful and significant.  The emperor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7179"></td>
        <td id="LC7179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Charles V. made almost the same observation, when he said “that if he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7180"></td>
        <td id="LC7180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were to speak to his horse, it should be in High-Dutch.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7181"></td>
        <td id="LC7181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7182"></td>
        <td id="LC7182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The curiosity and impatience of my master were so great, that he spent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7183"></td>
        <td id="LC7183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many hours of his leisure to instruct me.  He was convinced (as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7184"></td>
        <td id="LC7184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afterwards told me) that I must be a _Yahoo_; but my teachableness,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7185"></td>
        <td id="LC7185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">civility, and cleanliness, astonished him; which were qualities</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7186"></td>
        <td id="LC7186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">altogether opposite to those animals.  He was most perplexed about my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7187"></td>
        <td id="LC7187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clothes, reasoning sometimes with himself, whether they were a part of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7188"></td>
        <td id="LC7188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">body: for I never pulled them off till the family were asleep, and got</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7189"></td>
        <td id="LC7189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them on before they waked in the morning.  My master was eager to learn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7190"></td>
        <td id="LC7190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“whence I came; how I acquired those appearances of reason, which I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7191"></td>
        <td id="LC7191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discovered in all my actions; and to know my story from my own mouth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7192"></td>
        <td id="LC7192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which he hoped he should soon do by the great proficiency I made in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7193"></td>
        <td id="LC7193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">learning and pronouncing their words and sentences.”  To help my memory,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7194"></td>
        <td id="LC7194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I formed all I learned into the English alphabet, and writ the words</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7195"></td>
        <td id="LC7195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down, with the translations.  This last, after some time, I ventured to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7196"></td>
        <td id="LC7196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do in my master’s presence.  It cost me much trouble to explain to him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7197"></td>
        <td id="LC7197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what I was doing; for the inhabitants have not the least idea of books or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7198"></td>
        <td id="LC7198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">literature.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7199"></td>
        <td id="LC7199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7200"></td>
        <td id="LC7200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In about ten weeks time, I was able to understand most of his questions;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7201"></td>
        <td id="LC7201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and in three months, could give him some tolerable answers.  He was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7202"></td>
        <td id="LC7202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extremely curious to know “from what part of the country I came, and how</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7203"></td>
        <td id="LC7203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was taught to imitate a rational creature; because the _Yahoos_ (whom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7204"></td>
        <td id="LC7204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he saw I exactly resembled in my head, hands, and face, that were only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7205"></td>
        <td id="LC7205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">visible), with some appearance of cunning, and the strongest disposition</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7206"></td>
        <td id="LC7206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to mischief, were observed to be the most unteachable of all brutes.”  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7207"></td>
        <td id="LC7207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answered, “that I came over the sea, from a far place, with many others</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7208"></td>
        <td id="LC7208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of my own kind, in a great hollow vessel made of the bodies of trees:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7209"></td>
        <td id="LC7209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that my companions forced me to land on this coast, and then left me to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7210"></td>
        <td id="LC7210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shift for myself.”  It was with some difficulty, and by the help of many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7211"></td>
        <td id="LC7211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">signs, that I brought him to understand me.  He replied, “that I must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7212"></td>
        <td id="LC7212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">needs be mistaken, or that I said the thing which was not;” for they have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7213"></td>
        <td id="LC7213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no word in their language to express lying or falsehood.  “He knew it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7214"></td>
        <td id="LC7214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impossible that there could be a country beyond the sea, or that a parcel</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7215"></td>
        <td id="LC7215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of brutes could move a wooden vessel whither they pleased upon water.  He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7216"></td>
        <td id="LC7216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was sure no _Houyhnhnm_ alive could make such a vessel, nor would trust</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7217"></td>
        <td id="LC7217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Yahoos_ to manage it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7218"></td>
        <td id="LC7218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7219"></td>
        <td id="LC7219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The word _Houyhnhnm_, in their tongue, signifies a _horse_, and, in its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7220"></td>
        <td id="LC7220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">etymology, the _perfection of nature_.  I told my master, “that I was at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7221"></td>
        <td id="LC7221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a loss for expression, but would improve as fast as I could; and hoped,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7222"></td>
        <td id="LC7222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a short time, I should be able to tell him wonders.”  He was pleased</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7223"></td>
        <td id="LC7223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to direct his own mare, his colt, and foal, and the servants of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7224"></td>
        <td id="LC7224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">family, to take all opportunities of instructing me; and every day, for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7225"></td>
        <td id="LC7225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two or three hours, he was at the same pains himself.  Several horses and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7226"></td>
        <td id="LC7226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mares of quality in the neighbourhood came often to our house, upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7227"></td>
        <td id="LC7227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">report spread of “a wonderful _Yahoo_, that could speak like a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7228"></td>
        <td id="LC7228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Houyhnhnm_, and seemed, in his words and actions, to discover some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7229"></td>
        <td id="LC7229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">glimmerings of reason.”  These delighted to converse with me: they put</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7230"></td>
        <td id="LC7230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many questions, and received such answers as I was able to return.  By</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7231"></td>
        <td id="LC7231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all these advantages I made so great a progress, that, in five months</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7232"></td>
        <td id="LC7232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from my arrival I understood whatever was spoken, and could express</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7233"></td>
        <td id="LC7233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">myself tolerably well.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7234"></td>
        <td id="LC7234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7235"></td>
        <td id="LC7235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The _Houyhnhnms_, who came to visit my master out of a design of seeing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7236"></td>
        <td id="LC7236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and talking with me, could hardly believe me to be a right _Yahoo_,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7237"></td>
        <td id="LC7237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because my body had a different covering from others of my kind.  They</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7238"></td>
        <td id="LC7238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were astonished to observe me without the usual hair or skin, except on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7239"></td>
        <td id="LC7239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my head, face, and hands; but I discovered that secret to my master upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7240"></td>
        <td id="LC7240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an accident which happened about a fortnight before.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7241"></td>
        <td id="LC7241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7242"></td>
        <td id="LC7242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have already told the reader, that every night, when the family were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7243"></td>
        <td id="LC7243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gone to bed, it was my custom to strip, and cover myself with my clothes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7244"></td>
        <td id="LC7244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It happened, one morning early, that my master sent for me by the sorrel</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7245"></td>
        <td id="LC7245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nag, who was his valet.  When he came I was fast asleep, my clothes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7246"></td>
        <td id="LC7246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fallen off on one side, and my shirt above my waist.  I awaked at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7247"></td>
        <td id="LC7247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">noise he made, and observed him to deliver his message in some disorder;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7248"></td>
        <td id="LC7248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after which he went to my master, and in a great fright gave him a very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7249"></td>
        <td id="LC7249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confused account of what he had seen.  This I presently discovered, for,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7250"></td>
        <td id="LC7250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">going as soon as I was dressed to pay my attendance upon his honour, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7251"></td>
        <td id="LC7251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">asked me “the meaning of what his servant had reported, that I was not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7252"></td>
        <td id="LC7252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the same thing when I slept, as I appeared to be at other times; that his</td>

        <td id="L7253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7253"></td>
        <td id="LC7253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vale assured him, some part of me was white, some yellow, at least not so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7254"></td>
        <td id="LC7254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">white, and some brown.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7255"></td>
        <td id="LC7255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7256"></td>
        <td id="LC7256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had hitherto concealed the secret of my dress, in order to distinguish</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7257"></td>
        <td id="LC7257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">myself, as much as possible, from that cursed race of _Yahoos_; but now I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7258"></td>

        <td id="L7259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7259"></td>
        <td id="LC7259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clothes and shoes would soon wear out, which already were in a declining</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7260"></td>
        <td id="LC7260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">condition, and must be supplied by some contrivance from the hides of</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7261"></td>
        <td id="LC7261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Yahoos_, or other brutes; whereby the whole secret would be known.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7262"></td>
        <td id="LC7262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">therefore told my master, “that in the country whence I came, those of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7263"></td>
        <td id="LC7263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kind always covered their bodies with the hairs of certain animals</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7264"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7266"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7273"></td>

        <td id="LC7274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breeches.  I let my shirt down to my waist, and drew up the bottom;</td>

        <td id="LC7275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fastening it like a girdle about my middle, to hide my nakedness.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7276"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC7277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My master observed the whole performance with great signs of curiosity</td>

      <tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC7279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after another, and examined them diligently; he then stroked my body very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7280"></td>
        <td id="LC7280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gently, and looked round me several times; after which, he said, it was</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7281"></td>
        <td id="LC7281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plain I must be a perfect _Yahoo_; but that I differed very much from the</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7283"></td>
        <td id="LC7283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my want of hair in several parts of my body; the shape and shortness of</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7287"></td>
        <td id="LC7287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7288"></td>
        <td id="LC7288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I expressed my uneasiness at his giving me so often the appellation of</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7289"></td>
        <td id="LC7289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Yahoo_, an odious animal, for which I had so utter a hatred and</td>

        <td id="L7298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7298"></td>

        <td id="L7305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7305"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7306"></td>

        <td id="L7307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7307"></td>

        <td id="L7316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7316"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7317"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7318"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7319"></td>
        <td id="LC7319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That I came from a very far country, as I already had attempted to tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7320"></td>
        <td id="LC7320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him, with about fifty more of my own species; that we travelled upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7321"></td>
        <td id="LC7321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seas in a great hollow vessel made of wood, and larger than his honour’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7322"></td>
        <td id="LC7322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house.  I described the ship to him in the best terms I could, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7323"></td>
        <td id="LC7323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">explained, by the help of my handkerchief displayed, how it was driven</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7324"></td>
        <td id="LC7324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forward by the wind.  That upon a quarrel among us, I was set on shore on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7325"></td>
        <td id="LC7325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this coast, where I walked forward, without knowing whither, till he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7326"></td>
        <td id="LC7326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">delivered me from the persecution of those execrable _Yahoos_.”  He asked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7327"></td>
        <td id="LC7327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, “who made the ship, and how it was possible that the _Houyhnhnms_ of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7328"></td>
        <td id="LC7328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my country would leave it to the management of brutes?”  My answer was,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7329"></td>
        <td id="LC7329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“that I durst proceed no further in my relation, unless he would give me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7330"></td>
        <td id="LC7330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his word and honour that he would not be offended, and then I would tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7331"></td>
        <td id="LC7331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him the wonders I had so often promised.”  He agreed; and I went on by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7332"></td>
        <td id="LC7332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assuring him, that the ship was made by creatures like myself; who, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7333"></td>
        <td id="LC7333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the countries I had travelled, as well as in my own, were the only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7334"></td>
        <td id="LC7334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">governing rational animals; and that upon my arrival hither, I was as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7335"></td>
        <td id="LC7335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much astonished to see the _Houyhnhnms_ act like rational beings, as he,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7336"></td>
        <td id="LC7336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or his friends, could be, in finding some marks of reason in a creature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7337"></td>
        <td id="LC7337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was pleased to call a _Yahoo_; to which I owned my resemblance in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7338"></td>
        <td id="LC7338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every part, but could not account for their degenerate and brutal nature.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7339"></td>
        <td id="LC7339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I said farther, “that if good fortune ever restored me to my native</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7340"></td>
        <td id="LC7340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">country, to relate my travels hither, as I resolved to do, everybody</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7341"></td>
        <td id="LC7341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would believe, that I said the thing that was not, that I invented the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7342"></td>
        <td id="LC7342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">story out of my own head; and (with all possible respect to himself, his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7343"></td>
        <td id="LC7343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">family, and friends, and under his promise of not being offended) our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7344"></td>
        <td id="LC7344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">countrymen would hardly think it probable that a _Houyhnhnm_ should be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7345"></td>
        <td id="LC7345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the presiding creature of a nation, and a _Yahoo_ the brute.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7346"></td>
        <td id="LC7346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7347"></td>
        <td id="LC7347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7348"></td>
        <td id="LC7348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7349"></td>
        <td id="LC7349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER IV.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7350"></td>
        <td id="LC7350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7351"></td>
        <td id="LC7351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7352"></td>
        <td id="LC7352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Houyhnhnm’s notion of truth and falsehood.  The author’s discourse</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7353"></td>
        <td id="LC7353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disapproved by his master.  The author gives a more particular account of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7354"></td>
        <td id="LC7354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself, and the accidents of his voyage.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7355"></td>
        <td id="LC7355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7356"></td>
        <td id="LC7356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My master heard me with great appearances of uneasiness in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7357"></td>
        <td id="LC7357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">countenance; because doubting, or not believing, are so little known in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7358"></td>
        <td id="LC7358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this country, that the inhabitants cannot tell how to behave themselves</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7359"></td>
        <td id="LC7359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under such circumstances.  And I remember, in frequent discourses with my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7360"></td>
        <td id="LC7360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">master concerning the nature of manhood in other parts of the world,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7361"></td>
        <td id="LC7361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">having occasion to talk of lying and false representation, it was with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7362"></td>
        <td id="LC7362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much difficulty that he comprehended what I meant, although he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7363"></td>
        <td id="LC7363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">otherwise a most acute judgment.  For he argued thus: “that the use of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7364"></td>
        <td id="LC7364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speech was to make us understand one another, and to receive information</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7365"></td>
        <td id="LC7365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of facts; now, if any one said the thing which was not, these ends were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7366"></td>
        <td id="LC7366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">defeated, because I cannot properly be said to understand him; and I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7367"></td>
        <td id="LC7367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so far from receiving information, that he leaves me worse than in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7368"></td>
        <td id="LC7368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ignorance; for I am led to believe a thing black, when it is white, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7369"></td>
        <td id="LC7369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">short, when it is long.”  And these were all the notions he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7370"></td>
        <td id="LC7370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">concerning that faculty of lying, so perfectly well understood, and so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7371"></td>
        <td id="LC7371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">universally practised, among human creatures.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7372"></td>
        <td id="LC7372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7373"></td>
        <td id="LC7373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To return from this digression.  When I asserted that the _Yahoos_ were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7374"></td>
        <td id="LC7374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the only governing animals in my country, which my master said was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7375"></td>
        <td id="LC7375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">altogether past his conception, he desired to know, “whether we had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7376"></td>
        <td id="LC7376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Houyhnhnms_ among us, and what was their employment?”  I told him, “we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7377"></td>
        <td id="LC7377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had great numbers; that in summer they grazed in the fields, and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7378"></td>
        <td id="LC7378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">winter were kept in houses with hay and oats, where _Yahoo_ servants were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7379"></td>
        <td id="LC7379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">employed to rub their skins smooth, comb their manes, pick their feet,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7380"></td>
        <td id="LC7380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">serve them with food, and make their beds.”  “I understand you well,”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7381"></td>
        <td id="LC7381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said my master: “it is now very plain, from all you have spoken, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7382"></td>
        <td id="LC7382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whatever share of reason the _Yahoos_ pretend to, the _Houyhnhnms_ are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7383"></td>
        <td id="LC7383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your masters; I heartily wish our _Yahoos_ would be so tractable.”  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7384"></td>
        <td id="LC7384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">begged “his honour would please to excuse me from proceeding any further,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7385"></td>
        <td id="LC7385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because I was very certain that the account he expected from me would be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7386"></td>
        <td id="LC7386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">highly displeasing.”  But he insisted in commanding me to let him know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7387"></td>
        <td id="LC7387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the best and the worst.  I told him “he should be obeyed.”  I owned “that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7388"></td>
        <td id="LC7388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the _Houyhnhnms_ among us, whom we called horses, were the most generous</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7389"></td>
        <td id="LC7389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and comely animals we had; that they excelled in strength and swiftness;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7390"></td>
        <td id="LC7390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and when they belonged to persons of quality, were employed in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7391"></td>
        <td id="LC7391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">travelling, racing, or drawing chariots; they were treated with much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7392"></td>
        <td id="LC7392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kindness and care, till they fell into diseases, or became foundered in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7393"></td>
        <td id="LC7393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the feet; but then they were sold, and used to all kind of drudgery till</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7394"></td>
        <td id="LC7394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they died; after which their skins were stripped, and sold for what they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7395"></td>
        <td id="LC7395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were worth, and their bodies left to be devoured by dogs and birds of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7396"></td>
        <td id="LC7396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prey.  But the common race of horses had not so good fortune, being kept</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7397"></td>
        <td id="LC7397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by farmers and carriers, and other mean people, who put them to greater</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7398"></td>
        <td id="LC7398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">labour, and fed them worse.”  I described, as well as I could, our way of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7399"></td>
        <td id="LC7399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">riding; the shape and use of a bridle, a saddle, a spur, and a whip; of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7400"></td>
        <td id="LC7400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">harness and wheels.  I added, “that we fastened plates of a certain hard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7401"></td>
        <td id="LC7401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">substance, called iron, at the bottom of their feet, to preserve their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7402"></td>
        <td id="LC7402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hoofs from being broken by the stony ways, on which we often travelled.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7403"></td>
        <td id="LC7403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7404"></td>
        <td id="LC7404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My master, after some expressions of great indignation, wondered “how we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7405"></td>
        <td id="LC7405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dared to venture upon a _Houyhnhnm’s_ back; for he was sure, that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7406"></td>
        <td id="LC7406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weakest servant in his house would be able to shake off the strongest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7407"></td>
        <td id="LC7407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Yahoo_; or by lying down and rolling on his back, squeeze the brute to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7408"></td>
        <td id="LC7408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">death.”  I answered “that our horses were trained up, from three or four</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7409"></td>
        <td id="LC7409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">years old, to the several uses we intended them for; that if any of them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7410"></td>
        <td id="LC7410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proved intolerably vicious, they were employed for carriages; that they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7411"></td>
        <td id="LC7411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were severely beaten, while they were young, for any mischievous tricks;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7412"></td>
        <td id="LC7412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the males, designed for the common use of riding or draught, were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7413"></td>
        <td id="LC7413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">generally castrated about two years after their birth, to take down their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7414"></td>
        <td id="LC7414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spirits, and make them more tame and gentle; that they were indeed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7415"></td>
        <td id="LC7415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sensible of rewards and punishments; but his honour would please to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7416"></td>
        <td id="LC7416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consider, that they had not the least tincture of reason, any more than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7417"></td>
        <td id="LC7417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the _Yahoos_ in this country.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7418"></td>
        <td id="LC7418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7419"></td>
        <td id="LC7419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It put me to the pains of many circumlocutions, to give my master a right</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7420"></td>
        <td id="LC7420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">idea of what I spoke; for their language does not abound in variety of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7421"></td>
        <td id="LC7421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">words, because their wants and passions are fewer than among us.  But it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7422"></td>
        <td id="LC7422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is impossible to express his noble resentment at our savage treatment of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7423"></td>
        <td id="LC7423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the _Houyhnhnm_ race; particularly after I had explained the manner and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7424"></td>
        <td id="LC7424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">use of castrating horses among us, to hinder them from propagating their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7425"></td>
        <td id="LC7425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kind, and to render them more servile.  He said, “if it were possible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7426"></td>
        <td id="LC7426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there could be any country where _Yahoos_ alone were endued with reason,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7427"></td>
        <td id="LC7427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they certainly must be the governing animal; because reason in time will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7428"></td>
        <td id="LC7428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always prevail against brutal strength.  But, considering the frame of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7429"></td>
