        <td id="LC7429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our bodies, and especially of mine, he thought no creature of equal bulk</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7430"></td>
        <td id="LC7430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was so ill-contrived for employing that reason in the common offices of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7431"></td>
        <td id="LC7431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life;” whereupon he desired to know “whether those among whom I lived</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7432"></td>
        <td id="LC7432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resembled me, or the _Yahoos_ of his country?”  I assured him, “that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7433"></td>
        <td id="LC7433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was as well shaped as most of my age; but the younger, and the females,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7434"></td>
        <td id="LC7434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were much more soft and tender, and the skins of the latter generally as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7435"></td>
        <td id="LC7435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">white as milk.”  He said, “I differed indeed from other _Yahoos_, being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7436"></td>
        <td id="LC7436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much more cleanly, and not altogether so deformed; but, in point of real</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7437"></td>
        <td id="LC7437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advantage, he thought I differed for the worse: that my nails were of no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7438"></td>
        <td id="LC7438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">use either to my fore or hinder feet; as to my fore feet, he could not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7439"></td>
        <td id="LC7439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">properly call them by that name, for he never observed me to walk upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7440"></td>
        <td id="LC7440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them; that they were too soft to bear the ground; that I generally went</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7441"></td>
        <td id="LC7441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with them uncovered; neither was the covering I sometimes wore on them of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7442"></td>
        <td id="LC7442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the same shape, or so strong as that on my feet behind: that I could not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7443"></td>
        <td id="LC7443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">walk with any security, for if either of my hinder feet slipped, I must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7444"></td>
        <td id="LC7444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inevitably fail.”  He then began to find fault with other parts of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7445"></td>
        <td id="LC7445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">body: “the flatness of my face, the prominence of my nose, mine eyes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7446"></td>
        <td id="LC7446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">placed directly in front, so that I could not look on either side without</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7447"></td>
        <td id="LC7447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turning my head: that I was not able to feed myself, without lifting one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7448"></td>
        <td id="LC7448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of my fore-feet to my mouth: and therefore nature had placed those joints</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7449"></td>
        <td id="LC7449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to answer that necessity.  He knew not what could be the use of those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7450"></td>
        <td id="LC7450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several clefts and divisions in my feet behind; that these were too soft</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7451"></td>
        <td id="LC7451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to bear the hardness and sharpness of stones, without a covering made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7452"></td>
        <td id="LC7452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the skin of some other brute; that my whole body wanted a fence</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7453"></td>
        <td id="LC7453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against heat and cold, which I was forced to put on and off every day,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7454"></td>
        <td id="LC7454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with tediousness and trouble: and lastly, that he observed every animal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7455"></td>
        <td id="LC7455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in this country naturally to abhor the _Yahoos_, whom the weaker avoided,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7456"></td>
        <td id="LC7456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the stronger drove from them.  So that, supposing us to have the gift</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7457"></td>
        <td id="LC7457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of reason, he could not see how it were possible to cure that natural</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7458"></td>
        <td id="LC7458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">antipathy, which every creature discovered against us; nor consequently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7459"></td>
        <td id="LC7459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">how we could tame and render them serviceable.  However, he would,” as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7460"></td>
        <td id="LC7460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said, “debate the matter no farther, because he was more desirous to know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7461"></td>
        <td id="LC7461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my own story, the country where I was born, and the several actions and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7462"></td>
        <td id="LC7462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">events of my life, before I came hither.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7463"></td>
        <td id="LC7463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7464"></td>
        <td id="LC7464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I assured him, “how extremely desirous I was that he should be satisfied</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7465"></td>
        <td id="LC7465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on every point; but I doubted much, whether it would be possible for me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7466"></td>
        <td id="LC7466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to explain myself on several subjects, whereof his honour could have no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7467"></td>
        <td id="LC7467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conception; because I saw nothing in his country to which I could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7468"></td>
        <td id="LC7468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resemble them; that, however, I would do my best, and strive to express</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7469"></td>
        <td id="LC7469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">myself by similitudes, humbly desiring his assistance when I wanted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7470"></td>
        <td id="LC7470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proper words;” which he was pleased to promise me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7471"></td>
        <td id="LC7471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7472"></td>
        <td id="LC7472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I said, “my birth was of honest parents, in an island called England;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7473"></td>
        <td id="LC7473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which was remote from his country, as many days’ journey as the strongest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7474"></td>
        <td id="LC7474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of his honour’s servants could travel in the annual course of the sun;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7475"></td>
        <td id="LC7475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I was bred a surgeon, whose trade it is to cure wounds and hurts in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7476"></td>
        <td id="LC7476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the body, gotten by accident or violence; that my country was governed by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7477"></td>
        <td id="LC7477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a female man, whom we called queen; that I left it to get riches, whereby</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7478"></td>
        <td id="LC7478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I might maintain myself and family, when I should return; that, in my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7479"></td>
        <td id="LC7479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last voyage, I was commander of the ship, and had about fifty _Yahoos_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7480"></td>
        <td id="LC7480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under me, many of which died at sea, and I was forced to supply them by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7481"></td>
        <td id="LC7481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">others picked out from several nations; that our ship was twice in danger</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7482"></td>
        <td id="LC7482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of being sunk, the first time by a great storm, and the second by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7483"></td>
        <td id="LC7483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">striking against a rock.”  Here my master interposed, by asking me, “how</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7484"></td>
        <td id="LC7484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I could persuade strangers, out of different countries, to venture with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7485"></td>
        <td id="LC7485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, after the losses I had sustained, and the hazards I had run?”  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7486"></td>
        <td id="LC7486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said, “they were fellows of desperate fortunes, forced to fly from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7487"></td>
        <td id="LC7487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">places of their birth on account of their poverty or their crimes.  Some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7488"></td>
        <td id="LC7488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were undone by lawsuits; others spent all they had in drinking, whoring,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7489"></td>
        <td id="LC7489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and gaming; others fled for treason; many for murder, theft, poisoning,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7490"></td>
        <td id="LC7490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">robbery, perjury, forgery, coining false money, for committing rapes, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7491"></td>
        <td id="LC7491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sodomy; for flying from their colours, or deserting to the enemy; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7492"></td>
        <td id="LC7492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">most of them had broken prison; none of these durst return to their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7493"></td>
        <td id="LC7493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">native countries, for fear of being hanged, or of starving in a jail; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7494"></td>
        <td id="LC7494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">therefore they were under the necessity of seeking a livelihood in other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7495"></td>
        <td id="LC7495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">places.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7496"></td>
        <td id="LC7496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7497"></td>
        <td id="LC7497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">During this discourse, my master was pleased to interrupt me several</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7498"></td>
        <td id="LC7498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">times.  I had made use of many circumlocutions in describing to him the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7499"></td>
        <td id="LC7499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nature of the several crimes for which most of our crew had been forced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7500"></td>
        <td id="LC7500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to fly their country.  This labour took up several days’ conversation,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7501"></td>
        <td id="LC7501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before he was able to comprehend me.  He was wholly at a loss to know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7502"></td>
        <td id="LC7502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what could be the use or necessity of practising those vices.  To clear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7503"></td>
        <td id="LC7503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up which, I endeavoured to give some ideas of the desire of power and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7504"></td>
        <td id="LC7504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">riches; of the terrible effects of lust, intemperance, malice, and envy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7505"></td>
        <td id="LC7505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">All this I was forced to define and describe by putting cases and making</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7506"></td>
        <td id="LC7506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suppositions.  After which, like one whose imagination was struck with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7507"></td>
        <td id="LC7507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something never seen or heard of before, he would lift up his eyes with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7508"></td>
        <td id="LC7508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">amazement and indignation.  Power, government, war, law, punishment, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7509"></td>
        <td id="LC7509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a thousand other things, had no terms wherein that language could express</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7510"></td>
        <td id="LC7510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, which made the difficulty almost insuperable, to give my master any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7511"></td>
        <td id="LC7511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conception of what I meant.  But being of an excellent understanding,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7512"></td>
        <td id="LC7512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much improved by contemplation and converse, he at last arrived at a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7513"></td>
        <td id="LC7513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">competent knowledge of what human nature, in our parts of the world, is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7514"></td>
        <td id="LC7514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">capable to perform, and desired I would give him some particular account</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7515"></td>
        <td id="LC7515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of that land which we call Europe, but especially of my own country.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7516"></td>
        <td id="LC7516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7517"></td>
        <td id="LC7517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7518"></td>
        <td id="LC7518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7519"></td>
        <td id="LC7519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER V.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7520"></td>
        <td id="LC7520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7521"></td>
        <td id="LC7521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7522"></td>
        <td id="LC7522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author at his master’s command, informs him of the state of England.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7523"></td>
        <td id="LC7523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The causes of war among the princes of Europe.  The author begins to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7524"></td>
        <td id="LC7524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">explain the English constitution.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7525"></td>
        <td id="LC7525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7526"></td>
        <td id="LC7526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The reader may please to observe, that the following extract of many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7527"></td>
        <td id="LC7527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conversations I had with my master, contains a summary of the most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7528"></td>
        <td id="LC7528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">material points which were discoursed at several times for above two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7529"></td>
        <td id="LC7529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">years; his honour often desiring fuller satisfaction, as I farther</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7530"></td>
        <td id="LC7530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">improved in the _Houyhnhnm_ tongue.  I laid before him, as well as I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7531"></td>
        <td id="LC7531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could, the whole state of Europe; I discoursed of trade and manufactures,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7532"></td>
        <td id="LC7532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of arts and sciences; and the answers I gave to all the questions he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7533"></td>
        <td id="LC7533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made, as they arose upon several subjects, were a fund of conversation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7534"></td>
        <td id="LC7534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not to be exhausted.  But I shall here only set down the substance of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7535"></td>
        <td id="LC7535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what passed between us concerning my own country, reducing it in order as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7536"></td>
        <td id="LC7536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well as I can, without any regard to time or other circumstances, while I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7537"></td>
        <td id="LC7537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strictly adhere to truth.  My only concern is, that I shall hardly be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7538"></td>
        <td id="LC7538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">able to do justice to my master’s arguments and expressions, which must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7539"></td>
        <td id="LC7539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">needs suffer by my want of capacity, as well as by a translation into our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7540"></td>
        <td id="LC7540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">barbarous English.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7541"></td>
        <td id="LC7541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7542"></td>
        <td id="LC7542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In obedience, therefore, to his honour’s commands, I related to him the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7543"></td>
        <td id="LC7543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Revolution under the Prince of Orange; the long war with France, entered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7544"></td>
        <td id="LC7544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into by the said prince, and renewed by his successor, the present queen,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7545"></td>
        <td id="LC7545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wherein the greatest powers of Christendom were engaged, and which still</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7546"></td>
        <td id="LC7546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">continued: I computed, at his request, “that about a million of _Yahoos_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7547"></td>
        <td id="LC7547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might have been killed in the whole progress of it; and perhaps a hundred</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7548"></td>
        <td id="LC7548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or more cities taken, and five times as many ships burnt or sunk.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7549"></td>
        <td id="LC7549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7550"></td>
        <td id="LC7550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He asked me, “what were the usual causes or motives that made one country</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7551"></td>
        <td id="LC7551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go to war with another?”  I answered “they were innumerable; but I should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7552"></td>
        <td id="LC7552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only mention a few of the chief.  Sometimes the ambition of princes, who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7553"></td>
        <td id="LC7553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never think they have land or people enough to govern; sometimes the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7554"></td>
        <td id="LC7554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">corruption of ministers, who engage their master in a war, in order to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7555"></td>
        <td id="LC7555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stifle or divert the clamour of the subjects against their evil</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7556"></td>
        <td id="LC7556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">administration.  Difference in opinions has cost many millions of lives:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7557"></td>
        <td id="LC7557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for instance, whether flesh be bread, or bread be flesh; whether the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7558"></td>
        <td id="LC7558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">juice of a certain berry be blood or wine; whether whistling be a vice or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7559"></td>
        <td id="LC7559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a virtue; whether it be better to kiss a post, or throw it into the fire;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7560"></td>
        <td id="LC7560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what is the best colour for a coat, whether black, white, red, or gray;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7561"></td>
        <td id="LC7561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and whether it should be long or short, narrow or wide, dirty or clean;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7562"></td>
        <td id="LC7562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with many more.  Neither are any wars so furious and bloody, or of so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7563"></td>
        <td id="LC7563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long a continuance, as those occasioned by difference in opinion,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7564"></td>
        <td id="LC7564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">especially if it be in things indifferent.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7565"></td>
        <td id="LC7565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7566"></td>
        <td id="LC7566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Sometimes the quarrel between two princes is to decide which of them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7567"></td>
        <td id="LC7567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall dispossess a third of his dominions, where neither of them pretend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7568"></td>
        <td id="LC7568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to any right.  Sometimes one prince quarrels with another for fear the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7569"></td>
        <td id="LC7569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other should quarrel with him.  Sometimes a war is entered upon, because</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7570"></td>
        <td id="LC7570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the enemy is too strong; and sometimes, because he is too weak.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7571"></td>
        <td id="LC7571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sometimes our neighbours want the things which we have, or have the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7572"></td>
        <td id="LC7572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things which we want, and we both fight, till they take ours, or give us</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7573"></td>
        <td id="LC7573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">theirs.  It is a very justifiable cause of a war, to invade a country</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7574"></td>
        <td id="LC7574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after the people have been wasted by famine, destroyed by pestilence, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7575"></td>
        <td id="LC7575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">embroiled by factions among themselves.  It is justifiable to enter into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7576"></td>
        <td id="LC7576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">war against our nearest ally, when one of his towns lies convenient for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7577"></td>
        <td id="LC7577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us, or a territory of land, that would render our dominions round and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7578"></td>
        <td id="LC7578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">complete.  If a prince sends forces into a nation, where the people are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7579"></td>
        <td id="LC7579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poor and ignorant, he may lawfully put half of them to death, and make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7580"></td>
        <td id="LC7580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slaves of the rest, in order to civilize and reduce them from their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7581"></td>
        <td id="LC7581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">barbarous way of living.  It is a very kingly, honourable, and frequent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7582"></td>
        <td id="LC7582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">practice, when one prince desires the assistance of another, to secure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7583"></td>
        <td id="LC7583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him against an invasion, that the assistant, when he has driven out the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7584"></td>
        <td id="LC7584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">invader, should seize on the dominions himself, and kill, imprison, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7585"></td>
        <td id="LC7585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">banish, the prince he came to relieve.  Alliance by blood, or marriage,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7586"></td>
        <td id="LC7586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is a frequent cause of war between princes; and the nearer the kindred</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7587"></td>
        <td id="LC7587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is, the greater their disposition to quarrel; poor nations are hungry,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7588"></td>
        <td id="LC7588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and rich nations are proud; and pride and hunger will ever be at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7589"></td>
        <td id="LC7589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">variance.  For these reasons, the trade of a soldier is held the most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7590"></td>
        <td id="LC7590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">honourable of all others; because a soldier is a _Yahoo_ hired to kill,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7591"></td>
        <td id="LC7591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in cold blood, as many of his own species, who have never offended him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7592"></td>
        <td id="LC7592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as possibly he can.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7593"></td>
        <td id="LC7593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7594"></td>
        <td id="LC7594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There is likewise a kind of beggarly princes in Europe, not able to make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7595"></td>
        <td id="LC7595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">war by themselves, who hire out their troops to richer nations, for so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7596"></td>
        <td id="LC7596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much a day to each man; of which they keep three-fourths to themselves,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7597"></td>
        <td id="LC7597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and it is the best part of their maintenance: such are those in many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7598"></td>
        <td id="LC7598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">northern parts of Europe.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7599"></td>
        <td id="LC7599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7600"></td>
        <td id="LC7600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What you have told me,” said my master, “upon the subject of war, does</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7601"></td>
        <td id="LC7601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">indeed discover most admirably the effects of that reason you pretend to:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7602"></td>
        <td id="LC7602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, it is happy that the shame is greater than the danger; and that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7603"></td>
        <td id="LC7603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nature has left you utterly incapable of doing much mischief.  For, your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7604"></td>
        <td id="LC7604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mouths lying flat with your faces, you can hardly bite each other to any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7605"></td>
        <td id="LC7605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">purpose, unless by consent.  Then as to the claws upon your feet before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7606"></td>
        <td id="LC7606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and behind, they are so short and tender, that one of our _Yahoos_ would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7607"></td>
        <td id="LC7607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drive a dozen of yours before him.  And therefore, in recounting the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7608"></td>
        <td id="LC7608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">numbers of those who have been killed in battle, I cannot but think you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7609"></td>
        <td id="LC7609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have said the thing which is not.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7610"></td>
        <td id="LC7610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7611"></td>
        <td id="LC7611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I could not forbear shaking my head, and smiling a little at his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7612"></td>
        <td id="LC7612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ignorance.  And being no stranger to the art of war, I gave him a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7613"></td>
        <td id="LC7613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">description of cannons, culverins, muskets, carabines, pistols, bullets,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7614"></td>
        <td id="LC7614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">powder, swords, bayonets, battles, sieges, retreats, attacks, undermines,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7615"></td>
        <td id="LC7615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">countermines, bombardments, sea fights, ships sunk with a thousand men,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7616"></td>
        <td id="LC7616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">twenty thousand killed on each side, dying groans, limbs flying in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7617"></td>
        <td id="LC7617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">air, smoke, noise, confusion, trampling to death under horses’ feet,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7618"></td>
        <td id="LC7618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flight, pursuit, victory; fields strewed with carcases, left for food to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7619"></td>
        <td id="LC7619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dogs and wolves and birds of prey; plundering, stripping, ravishing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7620"></td>
        <td id="LC7620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">burning, and destroying.  And to set forth the valour of my own dear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7621"></td>
        <td id="LC7621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">countrymen, I assured him, “that I had seen them blow up a hundred</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7622"></td>
        <td id="LC7622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enemies at once in a siege, and as many in a ship, and beheld the dead</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7623"></td>
        <td id="LC7623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bodies drop down in pieces from the clouds, to the great diversion of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7624"></td>
        <td id="LC7624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spectators.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7625"></td>
        <td id="LC7625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7626"></td>
        <td id="LC7626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was going on to more particulars, when my master commanded me silence.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7627"></td>
        <td id="LC7627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He said, “whoever understood the nature of _Yahoos_, might easily believe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7628"></td>
        <td id="LC7628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it possible for so vile an animal to be capable of every action I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7629"></td>
        <td id="LC7629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">named, if their strength and cunning equalled their malice.  But as my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7630"></td>
        <td id="LC7630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discourse had increased his abhorrence of the whole species, so he found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7631"></td>
        <td id="LC7631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it gave him a disturbance in his mind to which he was wholly a stranger</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7632"></td>
        <td id="LC7632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before.  He thought his ears, being used to such abominable words, might,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7633"></td>
        <td id="LC7633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by degrees, admit them with less detestation: that although he hated the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7634"></td>
        <td id="LC7634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Yahoos_ of this country, yet he no more blamed them for their odious</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7635"></td>
        <td id="LC7635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">qualities, than he did a _gnnayh_ (a bird of prey) for its cruelty, or a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7636"></td>
        <td id="LC7636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sharp stone for cutting his hoof.  But when a creature pretending to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7637"></td>
        <td id="LC7637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reason could be capable of such enormities, he dreaded lest the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7638"></td>
        <td id="LC7638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">corruption of that faculty might be worse than brutality itself.  He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7639"></td>
        <td id="LC7639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemed therefore confident, that, instead of reason we were only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7640"></td>
        <td id="LC7640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possessed of some quality fitted to increase our natural vices; as the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7641"></td>
        <td id="LC7641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reflection from a troubled stream returns the image of an ill shapen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7642"></td>
        <td id="LC7642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">body, not only larger but more distorted.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7643"></td>
        <td id="LC7643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7644"></td>
        <td id="LC7644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He added, “that he had heard too much upon the subject of war, both in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7645"></td>
        <td id="LC7645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this and some former discourses.  There was another point, which a little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7646"></td>
        <td id="LC7646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perplexed him at present.  I had informed him, that some of our crew left</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7647"></td>
        <td id="LC7647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their country on account of being ruined by law; that I had already</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7648"></td>
        <td id="LC7648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">explained the meaning of the word; but he was at a loss how it should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7649"></td>
        <td id="LC7649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come to pass, that the law, which was intended for every man’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7650"></td>
        <td id="LC7650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">preservation, should be any man’s ruin.  Therefore he desired to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7651"></td>
        <td id="LC7651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">further satisfied what I meant by law, and the dispensers thereof,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7652"></td>
        <td id="LC7652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">according to the present practice in my own country; because he thought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7653"></td>
        <td id="LC7653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nature and reason were sufficient guides for a reasonable animal, as we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7654"></td>
        <td id="LC7654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pretended to be, in showing us what he ought to do, and what to avoid.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7655"></td>
        <td id="LC7655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7656"></td>
        <td id="LC7656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I assured his honour, “that the law was a science in which I had not much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7657"></td>
        <td id="LC7657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conversed, further than by employing advocates, in vain, upon some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7658"></td>
        <td id="LC7658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">injustices that had been done me: however, I would give him all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7659"></td>
        <td id="LC7659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">satisfaction I was able.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7660"></td>
        <td id="LC7660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7661"></td>
        <td id="LC7661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I said, “there was a society of men among us, bred up from their youth in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7662"></td>
        <td id="LC7662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the art of proving, by words multiplied for the purpose, that white is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7663"></td>
        <td id="LC7663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">black, and black is white, according as they are paid.  To this society</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7664"></td>
        <td id="LC7664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the rest of the people are slaves.  For example, if my neighbour has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7665"></td>
        <td id="LC7665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a mind to my cow, he has a lawyer to prove that he ought to have my cow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7666"></td>
        <td id="LC7666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from me.  I must then hire another to defend my right, it being against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7667"></td>
        <td id="LC7667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all rules of law that any man should be allowed to speak for himself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7668"></td>
        <td id="LC7668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now, in this case, I, who am the right owner, lie under two great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7669"></td>
        <td id="LC7669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disadvantages: first, my lawyer, being practised almost from his cradle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7670"></td>
        <td id="LC7670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in defending falsehood, is quite out of his element when he would be an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7671"></td>
        <td id="LC7671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advocate for justice, which is an unnatural office he always attempts</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7672"></td>
        <td id="LC7672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with great awkwardness, if not with ill-will.  The second disadvantage</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7673"></td>
        <td id="LC7673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is, that my lawyer must proceed with great caution, or else he will be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7674"></td>
        <td id="LC7674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reprimanded by the judges, and abhorred by his brethren, as one that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7675"></td>
        <td id="LC7675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would lessen the practice of the law.  And therefore I have but two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7676"></td>
        <td id="LC7676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">methods to preserve my cow.  The first is, to gain over my adversary’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7677"></td>
        <td id="LC7677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lawyer with a double fee, who will then betray his client by insinuating</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7678"></td>
        <td id="LC7678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he hath justice on his side.  The second way is for my lawyer to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7679"></td>
        <td id="LC7679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make my cause appear as unjust as he can, by allowing the cow to belong</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7680"></td>
        <td id="LC7680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to my adversary: and this, if it be skilfully done, will certainly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7681"></td>
        <td id="LC7681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bespeak the favour of the bench.  Now your honour is to know, that these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7682"></td>
        <td id="LC7682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">judges are persons appointed to decide all controversies of property, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7683"></td>
        <td id="LC7683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well as for the trial of criminals, and picked out from the most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7684"></td>
        <td id="LC7684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dexterous lawyers, who are grown old or lazy; and having been biassed all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7685"></td>
        <td id="LC7685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their lives against truth and equity, lie under such a fatal necessity of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7686"></td>
        <td id="LC7686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">favouring fraud, perjury, and oppression, that I have known some of them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7687"></td>
        <td id="LC7687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">refuse a large bribe from the side where justice lay, rather than injure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7688"></td>
        <td id="LC7688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the faculty, by doing any thing unbecoming their nature or their office.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7689"></td>
        <td id="LC7689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7690"></td>
        <td id="LC7690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is a maxim among these lawyers that whatever has been done before,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7691"></td>
        <td id="LC7691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may legally be done again: and therefore they take special care to record</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7692"></td>
        <td id="LC7692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the decisions formerly made against common justice, and the general</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7693"></td>
        <td id="LC7693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reason of mankind.  These, under the name of precedents, they produce as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7694"></td>
        <td id="LC7694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">authorities to justify the most iniquitous opinions; and the judges never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7695"></td>
        <td id="LC7695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fail of directing accordingly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7696"></td>
        <td id="LC7696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7697"></td>
        <td id="LC7697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“In pleading, they studiously avoid entering into the merits of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7698"></td>
        <td id="LC7698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cause; but are loud, violent, and tedious, in dwelling upon all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7699"></td>
        <td id="LC7699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">circumstances which are not to the purpose.  For instance, in the case</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7700"></td>
        <td id="LC7700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">already mentioned; they never desire to know what claim or title my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7701"></td>
        <td id="LC7701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">adversary has to my cow; but whether the said cow were red or black; her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7702"></td>
        <td id="LC7702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horns long or short; whether the field I graze her in be round or square;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7703"></td>
        <td id="LC7703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether she was milked at home or abroad; what diseases she is subject</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7704"></td>
        <td id="LC7704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to, and the like; after which they consult precedents, adjourn the cause</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7705"></td>
        <td id="LC7705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from time to time, and in ten, twenty, or thirty years, come to an issue.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7706"></td>
        <td id="LC7706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7707"></td>
        <td id="LC7707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is likewise to be observed, that this society has a peculiar cant and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7708"></td>
        <td id="LC7708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">jargon of their own, that no other mortal can understand, and wherein all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7709"></td>
        <td id="LC7709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their laws are written, which they take special care to multiply; whereby</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7710"></td>
        <td id="LC7710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they have wholly confounded the very essence of truth and falsehood, of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7711"></td>
        <td id="LC7711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">right and wrong; so that it will take thirty years to decide, whether the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7712"></td>
        <td id="LC7712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">field left me by my ancestors for six generations belongs to me, or to a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7713"></td>
        <td id="LC7713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stranger three hundred miles off.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7714"></td>
        <td id="LC7714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7715"></td>
        <td id="LC7715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“In the trial of persons accused for crimes against the state, the method</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7716"></td>
        <td id="LC7716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is much more short and commendable: the judge first sends to sound the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7717"></td>
        <td id="LC7717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disposition of those in power, after which he can easily hang or save a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7718"></td>
        <td id="LC7718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">criminal, strictly preserving all due forms of law.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7719"></td>
        <td id="LC7719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7720"></td>
        <td id="LC7720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Here my master interposing, said, “it was a pity, that creatures endowed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7721"></td>
        <td id="LC7721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with such prodigious abilities of mind, as these lawyers, by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7722"></td>
        <td id="LC7722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">description I gave of them, must certainly be, were not rather encouraged</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7723"></td>
        <td id="LC7723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be instructors of others in wisdom and knowledge.”  In answer to which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7724"></td>
        <td id="LC7724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I assured his honour, “that in all points out of their own trade, they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7725"></td>
        <td id="LC7725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were usually the most ignorant and stupid generation among us, the most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7726"></td>
        <td id="LC7726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">despicable in common conversation, avowed enemies to all knowledge and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7727"></td>
        <td id="LC7727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">learning, and equally disposed to pervert the general reason of mankind</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7728"></td>
        <td id="LC7728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in every other subject of discourse as in that of their own profession.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7729"></td>
        <td id="LC7729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7730"></td>
        <td id="LC7730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7731"></td>
        <td id="LC7731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7732"></td>
        <td id="LC7732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER VI.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7733"></td>
        <td id="LC7733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7734"></td>
        <td id="LC7734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7735"></td>
        <td id="LC7735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A continuation of the state of England under Queen Anne.  The character</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7736"></td>
        <td id="LC7736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a first minister of state in European courts.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7737"></td>
        <td id="LC7737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7738"></td>
        <td id="LC7738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My master was yet wholly at a loss to understand what motives could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7739"></td>
        <td id="LC7739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">incite this race of lawyers to perplex, disquiet, and weary themselves,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7740"></td>
        <td id="LC7740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and engage in a confederacy of injustice, merely for the sake of injuring</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7741"></td>
        <td id="LC7741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their fellow-animals; neither could he comprehend what I meant in saying,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7742"></td>
        <td id="LC7742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they did it for hire.  Whereupon I was at much pains to describe to him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7743"></td>
        <td id="LC7743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the use of money, the materials it was made of, and the value of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7744"></td>
        <td id="LC7744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">metals; “that when a _Yahoo_ had got a great store of this precious</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7745"></td>
        <td id="LC7745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">substance, he was able to purchase whatever he had a mind to; the finest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7746"></td>
        <td id="LC7746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clothing, the noblest houses, great tracts of land, the most costly meats</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7747"></td>
        <td id="LC7747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and drinks, and have his choice of the most beautiful females.  Therefore</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7748"></td>
        <td id="LC7748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">since money alone was able to perform all these feats, our _Yahoos_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7749"></td>
        <td id="LC7749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thought they could never have enough of it to spend, or to save, as they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7750"></td>
        <td id="LC7750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found themselves inclined, from their natural bent either to profusion or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7751"></td>
        <td id="LC7751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">avarice; that the rich man enjoyed the fruit of the poor man’s labour,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7752"></td>
