        <td id="LC7752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the latter were a thousand to one in proportion to the former; that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7753"></td>
        <td id="LC7753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the bulk of our people were forced to live miserably, by labouring every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7754"></td>
        <td id="LC7754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">day for small wages, to make a few live plentifully.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7755"></td>
        <td id="LC7755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7756"></td>
        <td id="LC7756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I enlarged myself much on these, and many other particulars to the same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7757"></td>
        <td id="LC7757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">purpose; but his honour was still to seek; for he went upon a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7758"></td>
        <td id="LC7758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">supposition, that all animals had a title to their share in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7759"></td>
        <td id="LC7759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">productions of the earth, and especially those who presided over the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7760"></td>
        <td id="LC7760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rest.  Therefore he desired I would let him know, “what these costly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7761"></td>
        <td id="LC7761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meats were, and how any of us happened to want them?”  Whereupon I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7762"></td>
        <td id="LC7762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enumerated as many sorts as came into my head, with the various methods</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7763"></td>
        <td id="LC7763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of dressing them, which could not be done without sending vessels by sea</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7764"></td>
        <td id="LC7764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to every part of the world, as well for liquors to drink as for sauces</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7765"></td>
        <td id="LC7765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and innumerable other conveniences.  I assured him “that this whole globe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7766"></td>
        <td id="LC7766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of earth must be at least three times gone round before one of our better</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7767"></td>
        <td id="LC7767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">female _Yahoos_ could get her breakfast, or a cup to put it in.”  He said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7768"></td>
        <td id="LC7768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“that must needs be a miserable country which cannot furnish food for its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7769"></td>
        <td id="LC7769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own inhabitants.  But what he chiefly wondered at was, how such vast</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7770"></td>
        <td id="LC7770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tracts of ground as I described should be wholly without fresh water, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7771"></td>
        <td id="LC7771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the people put to the necessity of sending over the sea for drink.”  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7772"></td>
        <td id="LC7772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">replied “that England (the dear place of my nativity) was computed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7773"></td>
        <td id="LC7773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">produce three times the quantity of food more than its inhabitants are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7774"></td>
        <td id="LC7774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">able to consume, as well as liquors extracted from grain, or pressed out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7775"></td>
        <td id="LC7775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the fruit of certain trees, which made excellent drink, and the same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7776"></td>
        <td id="LC7776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proportion in every other convenience of life.  But, in order to feed the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7777"></td>
        <td id="LC7777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">luxury and intemperance of the males, and the vanity of the females, we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7778"></td>
        <td id="LC7778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sent away the greatest part of our necessary things to other countries,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7779"></td>
        <td id="LC7779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whence, in return, we brought the materials of diseases, folly, and vice,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7780"></td>
        <td id="LC7780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to spend among ourselves.  Hence it follows of necessity, that vast</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7781"></td>
        <td id="LC7781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">numbers of our people are compelled to seek their livelihood by begging,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7782"></td>
        <td id="LC7782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">robbing, stealing, cheating, pimping, flattering, suborning, forswearing,</td>

        <td id="LC7784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">star-gazing, poisoning, whoring, canting, libelling, freethinking, and</td>

        <td id="L7785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7785"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7786"></td>
        <td id="LC7786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make him understand.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7787"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7788"></td>
        <td id="LC7788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That wine was not imported among us from foreign countries to supply the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7789"></td>
        <td id="LC7789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">want of water or other drinks, but because it was a sort of liquid which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7790"></td>
        <td id="LC7790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made us merry by putting us out of our senses, diverted all melancholy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7791"></td>
        <td id="LC7791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thoughts, begat wild extravagant imaginations in the brain, raised our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7792"></td>
        <td id="LC7792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hopes and banished our fears, suspended every office of reason for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7793"></td>
        <td id="LC7793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time, and deprived us of the use of our limbs, till we fell into a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7794"></td>
        <td id="LC7794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">profound sleep; although it must be confessed, that we always awaked sick</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7795"></td>
        <td id="LC7795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and dispirited; and that the use of this liquor filled us with diseases</td>

        <td id="LC7796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which made our lives uncomfortable and short.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7797"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7798"></td>
        <td id="LC7798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But beside all this, the bulk of our people supported themselves by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7799"></td>
        <td id="LC7799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">furnishing the necessities or conveniences of life to the rich and to</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7800"></td>
        <td id="LC7800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">each other.  For instance, when I am at home, and dressed as I ought to</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC7801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be, I carry on my body the workmanship of a hundred tradesmen; the</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7805"></td>
        <td id="LC7805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was going on to tell him of another sort of people, who get their</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7808"></td>
        <td id="LC7808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the utmost difficulty that I brought him to apprehend what I meant.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7809"></td>
        <td id="LC7809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He could easily conceive, that a _Houyhnhnm_, grew weak and heavy a few</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7810"></td>

        <td id="LC7813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reason of so unaccountable an evil.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7814"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7815"></td>
        <td id="LC7815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I told him “we fed on a thousand things which operated contrary to each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7816"></td>
        <td id="LC7816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other; that we ate when we were not hungry, and drank without the</td>

        <td id="LC7817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">provocation of thirst; that we sat whole nights drinking strong liquors,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7818"></td>
        <td id="LC7818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without eating a bit, which disposed us to sloth, inflamed our bodies,</td>

        <td id="LC7819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and precipitated or prevented digestion; that prostitute female _Yahoos_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7820"></td>
        <td id="LC7820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acquired a certain malady, which bred rottenness in the bones of those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7821"></td>
        <td id="LC7821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who fell into their embraces; that this, and many other diseases, were</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7822"></td>
        <td id="LC7822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">propagated from father to son; so that great numbers came into the world</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7823"></td>
        <td id="LC7823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with complicated maladies upon them; that it would be endless to give him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7824"></td>
        <td id="LC7824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a catalogue of all diseases incident to human bodies, for they would not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7825"></td>
        <td id="LC7825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be fewer than five or six hundred, spread over every limb and joint—in</td>

        <td id="L7826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7826"></td>
        <td id="LC7826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">short, every part, external and intestine, having diseases appropriated</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7827"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7828"></td>
        <td id="LC7828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the profession, or pretence, of curing the sick.  And because I had</td>

        <td id="L7830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7830"></td>
        <td id="LC7830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know the whole mystery and method by which they proceed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7831"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7832"></td>
        <td id="LC7832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Their fundamental is, that all diseases arise from repletion; whence</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7833"></td>
        <td id="LC7833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they conclude, that a great evacuation of the body is necessary, either</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7834"></td>
        <td id="LC7834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through the natural passage or upwards at the mouth.  Their next business</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7835"></td>
        <td id="LC7835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is from herbs, minerals, gums, oils, shells, salts, juices, sea-weed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7836"></td>
        <td id="LC7836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">excrements, barks of trees, serpents, toads, frogs, spiders, dead men’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7837"></td>
        <td id="LC7837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flesh and bones, birds, beasts, and fishes, to form a composition, for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7838"></td>
        <td id="LC7838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smell and taste, the most abominable, nauseous, and detestable, they can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7839"></td>
        <td id="LC7839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possibly contrive, which the stomach immediately rejects with loathing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7840"></td>
        <td id="LC7840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and this they call a vomit; or else, from the same store-house, with some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7841"></td>
        <td id="LC7841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other poisonous additions, they command us to take in at the orifice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7842"></td>
        <td id="LC7842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">above or below (just as the physician then happens to be disposed) a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7843"></td>
        <td id="LC7843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">medicine equally annoying and disgustful to the bowels; which, relaxing</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7844"></td>
        <td id="LC7844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the belly, drives down all before it; and this they call a purge, or a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7845"></td>
        <td id="LC7845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clyster.  For nature (as the physicians allege) having intended the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7846"></td>
        <td id="LC7846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">superior anterior orifice only for the intromission of solids and</td>

        <td id="LC7847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">liquids, and the inferior posterior for ejection, these artists</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7848"></td>
        <td id="LC7848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ingeniously considering that in all diseases nature is forced out of her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7849"></td>
        <td id="LC7849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seat, therefore, to replace her in it, the body must be treated in a</td>

        <td id="LC7851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forcing solids and liquids in at the anus, and making evacuations at the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7852"></td>
        <td id="LC7852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mouth.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7853"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7854"></td>
        <td id="LC7854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But, besides real diseases, we are subject to many that are only</td>

        <td id="L7859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7859"></td>
        <td id="LC7859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“One great excellency in this tribe, is their skill at prognostics,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7860"></td>
        <td id="LC7860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wherein they seldom fail; their predictions in real diseases, when they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7861"></td>
        <td id="LC7861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rise to any degree of malignity, generally portending death, which is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7862"></td>
        <td id="LC7862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always in their power, when recovery is not: and therefore, upon any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7863"></td>
        <td id="LC7863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unexpected signs of amendment, after they have pronounced their sentence,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7864"></td>
        <td id="LC7864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rather than be accused as false prophets, they know how to approve their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7865"></td>
        <td id="LC7865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sagacity to the world, by a seasonable dose.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7866"></td>
        <td id="LC7866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7867"></td>
        <td id="LC7867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“They are likewise of special use to husbands and wives who are grown</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7868"></td>
        <td id="LC7868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weary of their mates; to eldest sons, to great ministers of state, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7869"></td>
        <td id="LC7869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">often to princes.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7870"></td>
        <td id="LC7870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7871"></td>
        <td id="LC7871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had formerly, upon occasion, discoursed with my master upon the nature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7872"></td>
        <td id="LC7872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of government in general, and particularly of our own excellent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7873"></td>
        <td id="LC7873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">constitution, deservedly the wonder and envy of the whole world.  But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7874"></td>
        <td id="LC7874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">having here accidentally mentioned a minister of state, he commanded me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7875"></td>
        <td id="LC7875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some time after, to inform him, “what species of _Yahoo_ I particularly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7876"></td>
        <td id="LC7876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meant by that appellation.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7877"></td>
        <td id="LC7877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7878"></td>
        <td id="LC7878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I told him, “that a first or chief minister of state, who was the person</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7879"></td>
        <td id="LC7879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I intended to describe, was the creature wholly exempt from joy and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7880"></td>
        <td id="LC7880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grief, love and hatred, pity and anger; at least, makes use of no other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7881"></td>
        <td id="LC7881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passions, but a violent desire of wealth, power, and titles; that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7882"></td>
        <td id="LC7882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">applies his words to all uses, except to the indication of his mind; that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7883"></td>
        <td id="LC7883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he never tells a truth but with an intent that you should take it for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7884"></td>
        <td id="LC7884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lie; nor a lie, but with a design that you should take it for a truth;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7885"></td>
        <td id="LC7885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that those he speaks worst of behind their backs are in the surest way of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7886"></td>
        <td id="LC7886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">preferment; and whenever he begins to praise you to others, or to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7887"></td>
        <td id="LC7887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yourself, you are from that day forlorn.  The worst mark you can receive</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7888"></td>
        <td id="LC7888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is a promise, especially when it is confirmed with an oath; after which,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7889"></td>
        <td id="LC7889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every wise man retires, and gives over all hopes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7890"></td>
        <td id="LC7890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7891"></td>
        <td id="LC7891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There are three methods, by which a man may rise to be chief minister.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7892"></td>
        <td id="LC7892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The first is, by knowing how, with prudence, to dispose of a wife, a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7893"></td>
        <td id="LC7893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">daughter, or a sister; the second, by betraying or undermining his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7894"></td>
        <td id="LC7894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">predecessor; and the third is, by a furious zeal, in public assemblies,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7895"></td>
        <td id="LC7895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against the corruption’s of the court.  But a wise prince would rather</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7896"></td>
        <td id="LC7896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">choose to employ those who practise the last of these methods; because</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7897"></td>
        <td id="LC7897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such zealots prove always the most obsequious and subservient to the will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7898"></td>
        <td id="LC7898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and passions of their master.  That these ministers, having all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7899"></td>
        <td id="LC7899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">employments at their disposal, preserve themselves in power, by bribing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7900"></td>
        <td id="LC7900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the majority of a senate or great council; and at last, by an expedient,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7901"></td>
        <td id="LC7901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">called an act of indemnity” (whereof I described the nature to him),</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7902"></td>
        <td id="LC7902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“they secure themselves from after-reckonings, and retire from the public</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7903"></td>
        <td id="LC7903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laden with the spoils of the nation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7904"></td>
        <td id="LC7904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7905"></td>
        <td id="LC7905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The palace of a chief minister is a seminary to breed up others in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7906"></td>
        <td id="LC7906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own trade: the pages, lackeys, and porters, by imitating their master,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7907"></td>
        <td id="LC7907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">become ministers of state in their several districts, and learn to excel</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7908"></td>
        <td id="LC7908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the three principal ingredients, of insolence, lying, and bribery.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7909"></td>
        <td id="LC7909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Accordingly, they have a subaltern court paid to them by persons of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7910"></td>
        <td id="LC7910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">best rank; and sometimes by the force of dexterity and impudence, arrive,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7911"></td>
        <td id="LC7911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through several gradations, to be successors to their lord.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7912"></td>
        <td id="LC7912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7913"></td>
        <td id="LC7913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He is usually governed by a decayed wench, or favourite footman, who are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7914"></td>
        <td id="LC7914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the tunnels through which all graces are conveyed, and may properly be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7915"></td>
        <td id="LC7915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">called, in the last resort, the governors of the kingdom.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7916"></td>
        <td id="LC7916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7917"></td>
        <td id="LC7917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">One day, in discourse, my master, having heard me mention the nobility of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7918"></td>
        <td id="LC7918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my country, was pleased to make me a compliment which I could not pretend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7919"></td>
        <td id="LC7919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to deserve: “that he was sure I must have been born of some noble family,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7920"></td>
        <td id="LC7920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because I far exceeded in shape, colour, and cleanliness, all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7921"></td>
        <td id="LC7921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Yahoos_ of his nation, although I seemed to fail in strength and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7922"></td>
        <td id="LC7922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">agility, which must be imputed to my different way of living from those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7923"></td>
        <td id="LC7923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other brutes; and besides I was not only endowed with the faculty of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7924"></td>
        <td id="LC7924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speech, but likewise with some rudiments of reason, to a degree that,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7925"></td>
        <td id="LC7925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with all his acquaintance, I passed for a prodigy.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7926"></td>
        <td id="LC7926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7927"></td>
        <td id="LC7927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He made me observe, “that among the _Houyhnhnms_, the white, the sorrel,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7928"></td>
        <td id="LC7928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the iron-gray, were not so exactly shaped as the bay, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7929"></td>
        <td id="LC7929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dapple-gray, and the black; nor born with equal talents of mind, or a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7930"></td>
        <td id="LC7930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">capacity to improve them; and therefore continued always in the condition</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7931"></td>
        <td id="LC7931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of servants, without ever aspiring to match out of their own race, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7932"></td>
        <td id="LC7932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in that country would be reckoned monstrous and unnatural.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7933"></td>
        <td id="LC7933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7934"></td>
        <td id="LC7934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I made his honour my most humble acknowledgments for the good opinion he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7935"></td>
        <td id="LC7935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was pleased to conceive of me, but assured him at the same time, “that my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7936"></td>
        <td id="LC7936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">birth was of the lower sort, having been born of plain honest parents,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7937"></td>
        <td id="LC7937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who were just able to give me a tolerable education; that nobility, among</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7938"></td>
        <td id="LC7938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us, was altogether a different thing from the idea he had of it; that our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7939"></td>
        <td id="LC7939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">young noblemen are bred from their childhood in idleness and luxury;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7940"></td>
        <td id="LC7940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that, as soon as years will permit, they consume their vigour, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7941"></td>
        <td id="LC7941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contract odious diseases among lewd females; and when their fortunes are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7942"></td>
        <td id="LC7942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">almost ruined, they marry some woman of mean birth, disagreeable person,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7943"></td>
        <td id="LC7943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and unsound constitution (merely for the sake of money), whom they hate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7944"></td>
        <td id="LC7944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and despise.  That the productions of such marriages are generally</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7945"></td>
        <td id="LC7945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scrofulous, rickety, or deformed children; by which means the family</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7946"></td>
        <td id="LC7946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seldom continues above three generations, unless the wife takes care to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7947"></td>
        <td id="LC7947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">provide a healthy father, among her neighbours or domestics, in order to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7948"></td>
        <td id="LC7948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">improve and continue the breed.  That a weak diseased body, a meagre</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7949"></td>
        <td id="LC7949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">countenance, and sallow complexion, are the true marks of noble blood;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7950"></td>
        <td id="LC7950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a healthy robust appearance is so disgraceful in a man of quality,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7951"></td>
        <td id="LC7951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the world concludes his real father to have been a groom or a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7952"></td>
        <td id="LC7952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coachman.  The imperfections of his mind run parallel with those of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7953"></td>
        <td id="LC7953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">body, being a composition of spleen, dullness, ignorance, caprice,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7954"></td>
        <td id="LC7954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sensuality, and pride.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7955"></td>
        <td id="LC7955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7956"></td>
        <td id="LC7956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Without the consent of this illustrious body, no law can be enacted,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7957"></td>
        <td id="LC7957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">repealed, or altered: and these nobles have likewise the decision of all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7958"></td>
        <td id="LC7958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our possessions, without appeal.” {514}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7959"></td>
        <td id="LC7959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7960"></td>
        <td id="LC7960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7961"></td>
        <td id="LC7961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7962"></td>
        <td id="LC7962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER VII.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7963"></td>
        <td id="LC7963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7964"></td>
        <td id="LC7964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7965"></td>
        <td id="LC7965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author’s great love of his native country.  His master’s observations</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7966"></td>
        <td id="LC7966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon the constitution and administration of England, as described by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7967"></td>
        <td id="LC7967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">author, with parallel cases and comparisons.  His master’s observations</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7968"></td>
        <td id="LC7968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon human nature.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7969"></td>
        <td id="LC7969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7970"></td>
        <td id="LC7970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The reader may be disposed to wonder how I could prevail on myself to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7971"></td>
        <td id="LC7971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">give so free a representation of my own species, among a race of mortals</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7972"></td>
        <td id="LC7972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who are already too apt to conceive the vilest opinion of humankind, from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7973"></td>
        <td id="LC7973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that entire congruity between me and their _Yahoos_.  But I must freely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7974"></td>
        <td id="LC7974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confess, that the many virtues of those excellent quadrupeds, placed in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7975"></td>
        <td id="LC7975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opposite view to human corruptions, had so far opened my eyes and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7976"></td>
        <td id="LC7976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enlarged my understanding, that I began to view the actions and passions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7977"></td>
        <td id="LC7977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of man in a very different light, and to think the honour of my own kind</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7978"></td>
        <td id="LC7978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not worth managing; which, besides, it was impossible for me to do,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7979"></td>
        <td id="LC7979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before a person of so acute a judgment as my master, who daily convinced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7980"></td>
        <td id="LC7980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me of a thousand faults in myself, whereof I had not the least perception</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7981"></td>
        <td id="LC7981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before, and which, with us, would never be numbered even among human</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7982"></td>
        <td id="LC7982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">infirmities.  I had likewise learned, from his example, an utter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7983"></td>
        <td id="LC7983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">detestation of all falsehood or disguise; and truth appeared so amiable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7984"></td>
        <td id="LC7984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to me, that I determined upon sacrificing every thing to it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7985"></td>
        <td id="LC7985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7986"></td>
        <td id="LC7986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let me deal so candidly with the reader as to confess that there was yet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7987"></td>
        <td id="LC7987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a much stronger motive for the freedom I took in my representation of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7988"></td>
        <td id="LC7988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things.  I had not yet been a year in this country before I contracted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7989"></td>
        <td id="LC7989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such a love and veneration for the inhabitants, that I entered on a firm</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7990"></td>
        <td id="LC7990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resolution never to return to humankind, but to pass the rest of my life</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7991"></td>
        <td id="LC7991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">among these admirable _Houyhnhnms_, in the contemplation and practice of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7992"></td>
        <td id="LC7992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every virtue, where I could have no example or incitement to vice.  But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7993"></td>
        <td id="LC7993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it was decreed by fortune, my perpetual enemy, that so great a felicity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7994"></td>
        <td id="LC7994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should not fall to my share.  However, it is now some comfort to reflect,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7995"></td>
        <td id="LC7995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that in what I said of my countrymen, I extenuated their faults as much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7996"></td>
        <td id="LC7996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as I durst before so strict an examiner; and upon every article gave as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7997"></td>
        <td id="LC7997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">favourable a turn as the matter would bear.  For, indeed, who is there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7998"></td>
        <td id="LC7998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alive that will not be swayed by his bias and partiality to the place of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7999"></td>
        <td id="LC7999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his birth?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8000"></td>
        <td id="LC8000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8001"></td>
        <td id="LC8001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have related the substance of several conversations I had with my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8002"></td>
        <td id="LC8002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">master during the greatest part of the time I had the honour to be in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8003"></td>
        <td id="LC8003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">service; but have, indeed, for brevity sake, omitted much more than is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8004"></td>
        <td id="LC8004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here set down.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8005"></td>
        <td id="LC8005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8006"></td>
        <td id="LC8006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I had answered all his questions, and his curiosity seemed to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8007"></td>
        <td id="LC8007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fully satisfied, he sent for me one morning early, and commanded me to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8008"></td>
        <td id="LC8008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sit down at some distance (an honour which he had never before conferred</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8009"></td>
        <td id="LC8009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon me).  He said, “he had been very seriously considering my whole</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8010"></td>
        <td id="LC8010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">story, as far as it related both to myself and my country; that he looked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8011"></td>
        <td id="LC8011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon us as a sort of animals, to whose share, by what accident he could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8012"></td>
        <td id="LC8012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not conjecture, some small pittance of reason had fallen, whereof we made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8013"></td>
        <td id="LC8013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no other use, than by its assistance, to aggravate our natural</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8014"></td>
        <td id="LC8014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">corruptions, and to acquire new ones, which nature had not given us; that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8015"></td>
        <td id="LC8015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we disarmed ourselves of the few abilities she had bestowed; had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8016"></td>
        <td id="LC8016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very successful in multiplying our original wants, and seemed to spend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8017"></td>
        <td id="LC8017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our whole lives in vain endeavours to supply them by our own inventions;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8018"></td>
        <td id="LC8018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that, as to myself, it was manifest I had neither the strength nor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8019"></td>
        <td id="LC8019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">agility of a common _Yahoo_; that I walked infirmly on my hinder feet;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8020"></td>
        <td id="LC8020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had found out a contrivance to make my claws of no use or defence, and to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8021"></td>
        <td id="LC8021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remove the hair from my chin, which was intended as a shelter from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8022"></td>
        <td id="LC8022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sun and the weather: lastly, that I could neither run with speed, nor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8023"></td>
        <td id="LC8023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">climb trees like my brethren,” as he called them, “the _Yahoos_ in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8024"></td>
        <td id="LC8024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">country.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8025"></td>
        <td id="LC8025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8026"></td>
        <td id="LC8026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That our institutions of government and law were plainly owing to our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8027"></td>
        <td id="LC8027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gross defects in reason, and by consequence in virtue; because reason</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8028"></td>
        <td id="LC8028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alone is sufficient to govern a rational creature; which was, therefore,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8029"></td>
        <td id="LC8029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a character we had no pretence to challenge, even from the account I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8030"></td>
        <td id="LC8030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">given of my own people; although he manifestly perceived, that, in order</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8031"></td>
        <td id="LC8031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to favour them, I had concealed many particulars, and often said the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8032"></td>
        <td id="LC8032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thing which was not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8033"></td>
        <td id="LC8033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8034"></td>
        <td id="LC8034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He was the more confirmed in this opinion, because, he observed, that as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8035"></td>
        <td id="LC8035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I agreed in every feature of my body with other _Yahoos_, except where it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8036"></td>
        <td id="LC8036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was to my real disadvantage in point of strength, speed, and activity,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8037"></td>
        <td id="LC8037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the shortness of my claws, and some other particulars where nature had no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8038"></td>
        <td id="LC8038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">part; so from the representation I had given him of our lives, our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8039"></td>
        <td id="LC8039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manners, and our actions, he found as near a resemblance in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8040"></td>
        <td id="LC8040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disposition of our minds.”  He said, “the _Yahoos_ were known to hate one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8041"></td>
        <td id="LC8041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another, more than they did any different species of animals; and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8042"></td>
        <td id="LC8042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reason usually assigned was, the odiousness of their own shapes, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8043"></td>
        <td id="LC8043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all could see in the rest, but not in themselves.  He had therefore begun</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8044"></td>
        <td id="LC8044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to think it not unwise in us to cover our bodies, and by that invention</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8045"></td>
        <td id="LC8045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conceal many of our deformities from each other, which would else be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8046"></td>
        <td id="LC8046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hardly supportable.  But he now found he had been mistaken, and that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8047"></td>
        <td id="LC8047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dissensions of those brutes in his country were owing to the same cause</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8048"></td>
        <td id="LC8048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with ours, as I had described them.  For if,” said he, “you throw among</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8049"></td>
        <td id="LC8049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">five _Yahoos_ as much food as would be sufficient for fifty, they will,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8050"></td>
        <td id="LC8050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instead of eating peaceably, fall together by the ears, each single one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8051"></td>
        <td id="LC8051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impatient to have all to itself; and therefore a servant was usually</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8052"></td>
        <td id="LC8052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">employed to stand by while they were feeding abroad, and those kept at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8053"></td>
        <td id="LC8053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">home were tied at a distance from each other: that if a cow died of age</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8054"></td>
        <td id="LC8054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or accident, before a _Houyhnhnm_ could secure it for his own _Yahoos_,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8055"></td>
        <td id="LC8055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those in the neighbourhood would come in herds to seize it, and then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8056"></td>
        <td id="LC8056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would ensue such a battle as I had described, with terrible wounds made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8057"></td>
        <td id="LC8057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by their claws on both sides, although they seldom were able to kill one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8058"></td>
        <td id="LC8058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another, for want of such convenient instruments of death as we had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8059"></td>
        <td id="LC8059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">invented.  At other times, the like battles have been fought between the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8060"></td>
        <td id="LC8060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Yahoos_ of several neighbourhoods, without any visible cause; those of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8061"></td>
        <td id="LC8061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one district watching all opportunities to surprise the next, before they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8062"></td>
        <td id="LC8062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are prepared.  But if they find their project has miscarried, they return</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8063"></td>
        <td id="LC8063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">home, and, for want of enemies, engage in what I call a civil war among</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8064"></td>
        <td id="LC8064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">themselves.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8065"></td>
        <td id="LC8065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8066"></td>
        <td id="LC8066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That in some fields of his country there are certain shining stones of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8067"></td>
        <td id="LC8067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several colours, whereof the _Yahoos_ are violently fond: and when part</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8068"></td>
        <td id="LC8068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of these stones is fixed in the earth, as it sometimes happens, they will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8069"></td>
        <td id="LC8069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dig with their claws for whole days to get them out; then carry them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8070"></td>
        <td id="LC8070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away, and hide them by heaps in their kennels; but still looking round</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8071"></td>
        <td id="LC8071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with great caution, for fear their comrades should find out their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8072"></td>
        <td id="LC8072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">treasure.”  My master said, “he could never discover the reason of this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8073"></td>
        <td id="LC8073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unnatural appetite, or how these stones could be of any use to a _Yahoo_;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8074"></td>
        <td id="LC8074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but now he believed it might proceed from the same principle of avarice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8075"></td>
        <td id="LC8075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which I had ascribed to mankind.  That he had once, by way of experiment,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8076"></td>
        <td id="LC8076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">privately removed a heap of these stones from the place where one of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8077"></td>
        <td id="LC8077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Yahoos_ had buried it; whereupon the sordid animal, missing his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8078"></td>
        <td id="LC8078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">treasure, by his loud lamenting brought the whole herd to the place,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8079"></td>
        <td id="LC8079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there miserably howled, then fell to biting and tearing the rest, began</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8080"></td>
        <td id="LC8080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to pine away, would neither eat, nor sleep, nor work, till he ordered a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8081"></td>
        <td id="LC8081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">servant privately to convey the stones into the same hole, and hide them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8082"></td>
        <td id="LC8082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as before; which, when his _Yahoo_ had found, he presently recovered his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8083"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8084"></td>
        <td id="LC8084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hiding place, and has ever since been a very serviceable brute.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8085"></td>
        <td id="LC8085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8086"></td>
        <td id="LC8086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My master further assured me, which I also observed myself, “that in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L8088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8088"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8090"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8091"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC8092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">field, and were contending which of them should be the proprietor, a</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC8093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">third would take the advantage, and carry it away from them both;” which</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8094"></td>
        <td id="LC8094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my master would needs contend to have some kind of resemblance with our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8095"></td>
        <td id="LC8095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suits at law; wherein I thought it for our credit not to undeceive him;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8096"></td>
        <td id="LC8096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">since the decision he mentioned was much more equitable than many decrees</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8097"></td>
        <td id="LC8097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">among us; because the plaintiff and defendant there lost nothing beside</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8098"></td>
        <td id="LC8098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the stone they contended for: whereas our courts of equity would never</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8099"></td>
