      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8100"></td>
        <td id="LC8100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8101"></td>
        <td id="LC8101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My master, continuing his discourse, said, “there was nothing that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8102"></td>
        <td id="LC8102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rendered the _Yahoos_ more odious, than their undistinguishing appetite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8103"></td>
        <td id="LC8103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to devour every thing that came in their way, whether herbs, roots,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8104"></td>
        <td id="LC8104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">berries, the corrupted flesh of animals, or all mingled together: and it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8105"></td>
        <td id="LC8105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was peculiar in their temper, that they were fonder of what they could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8106"></td>
        <td id="LC8106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">get by rapine or stealth, at a greater distance, than much better food</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8107"></td>
        <td id="LC8107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">provided for them at home.  If their prey held out, they would eat till</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8108"></td>
        <td id="LC8108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they were ready to burst; after which, nature had pointed out to them a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8109"></td>
        <td id="LC8109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certain root that gave them a general evacuation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8110"></td>
        <td id="LC8110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8111"></td>
        <td id="LC8111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There was also another kind of root, very juicy, but somewhat rare and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8112"></td>
        <td id="LC8112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">difficult to be found, which the _Yahoos_ sought for with much eagerness,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8113"></td>
        <td id="LC8113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and would suck it with great delight; it produced in them the same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8114"></td>
        <td id="LC8114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">effects that wine has upon us.  It would make them sometimes hug, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8115"></td>
        <td id="LC8115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sometimes tear one another; they would howl, and grin, and chatter, and</td>

        <td id="L8116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8116"></td>
        <td id="LC8116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reel, and tumble, and then fall asleep in the mud.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8117"></td>
        <td id="LC8117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8118"></td>
        <td id="LC8118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I did indeed observe that the _Yahoos_ were the only animals in this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8119"></td>
        <td id="LC8119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">country subject to any diseases; which, however, were much fewer than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8120"></td>
        <td id="LC8120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horses have among us, and contracted, not by any ill-treatment they meet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8121"></td>
        <td id="LC8121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with, but by the nastiness and greediness of that sordid brute.  Neither</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8122"></td>
        <td id="LC8122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has their language any more than a general appellation for those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8123"></td>
        <td id="LC8123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">maladies, which is borrowed from the name of the beast, and called</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8124"></td>
        <td id="LC8124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_hnea-yahoo_, or _Yahoo’s evil_; and the cure prescribed is a mixture of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8125"></td>
        <td id="LC8125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their own dung and urine, forcibly put down the _Yahoo’s_ throat.  This I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8126"></td>
        <td id="LC8126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have since often known to have been taken with success, and do here</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8127"></td>
        <td id="LC8127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">freely recommend it to my countrymen for the public good, as an admirable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8128"></td>
        <td id="LC8128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">specific against all diseases produced by repletion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8129"></td>
        <td id="LC8129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8130"></td>
        <td id="LC8130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“As to learning, government, arts, manufactures, and the like,” my master</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8131"></td>
        <td id="LC8131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confessed, “he could find little or no resemblance between the _Yahoos_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8132"></td>
        <td id="LC8132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of that country and those in ours; for he only meant to observe what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8133"></td>
        <td id="LC8133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">parity there was in our natures.  He had heard, indeed, some curious</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8134"></td>
        <td id="LC8134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Houyhnhnms_ observe, that in most herds there was a sort of ruling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8135"></td>
        <td id="LC8135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Yahoo_ (as among us there is generally some leading or principal stag in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8136"></td>
        <td id="LC8136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a park), who was always more deformed in body, and mischievous in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8137"></td>
        <td id="LC8137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disposition, than any of the rest; that this leader had usually a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8138"></td>
        <td id="LC8138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">favourite as like himself as he could get, whose employment was to lick</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8139"></td>
        <td id="LC8139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his master’s feet and posteriors, and drive the female _Yahoos_ to his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8140"></td>
        <td id="LC8140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kennel; for which he was now and then rewarded with a piece of ass’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8141"></td>
        <td id="LC8141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flesh.  This favourite is hated by the whole herd, and therefore, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8142"></td>
        <td id="LC8142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">protect himself, keeps always near the person of his leader.  He usually</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8143"></td>
        <td id="LC8143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">continues in office till a worse can be found; but the very moment he is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8144"></td>
        <td id="LC8144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discarded, his successor, at the head of all the _Yahoos_ in that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8145"></td>
        <td id="LC8145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">district, young and old, male and female, come in a body, and discharge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8146"></td>
        <td id="LC8146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their excrements upon him from head to foot.  But how far this might be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8147"></td>
        <td id="LC8147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">applicable to our courts, and favourites, and ministers of state, my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8148"></td>
        <td id="LC8148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">master said I could best determine.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8149"></td>
        <td id="LC8149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8150"></td>
        <td id="LC8150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I durst make no return to this malicious insinuation, which debased human</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8151"></td>
        <td id="LC8151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understanding below the sagacity of a common hound, who has judgment</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8152"></td>
        <td id="LC8152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough to distinguish and follow the cry of the ablest dog in the pack,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8153"></td>
        <td id="LC8153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without being ever mistaken.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8154"></td>
        <td id="LC8154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8155"></td>
        <td id="LC8155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My master told me, “there were some qualities remarkable in the _Yahoos_,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8156"></td>
        <td id="LC8156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which he had not observed me to mention, or at least very slightly, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8157"></td>
        <td id="LC8157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the accounts I had given of humankind.”  He said, “those animals, like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8158"></td>
        <td id="LC8158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other brutes, had their females in common; but in this they differed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8159"></td>
        <td id="LC8159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the she _Yahoo_ would admit the males while she was pregnant; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8160"></td>
        <td id="LC8160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the hes would quarrel and fight with the females, as fiercely as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8161"></td>
        <td id="LC8161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with each other; both which practices were such degrees of infamous</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8162"></td>
        <td id="LC8162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brutality, as no other sensitive creature ever arrived at.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8163"></td>
        <td id="LC8163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8164"></td>
        <td id="LC8164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Another thing he wondered at in the _Yahoos_, was their strange</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8165"></td>
        <td id="LC8165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disposition to nastiness and dirt; whereas there appears to be a natural</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8166"></td>
        <td id="LC8166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">love of cleanliness in all other animals.”  As to the two former</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8167"></td>
        <td id="LC8167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accusations, I was glad to let them pass without any reply, because I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8168"></td>
        <td id="LC8168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not a word to offer upon them in defence of my species, which otherwise I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8169"></td>
        <td id="LC8169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certainly had done from my own inclinations.  But I could have easily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8170"></td>
        <td id="LC8170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vindicated humankind from the imputation of singularity upon the last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8171"></td>
        <td id="LC8171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">article, if there had been any swine in that country (as unluckily for me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8172"></td>
        <td id="LC8172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there were not), which, although it may be a sweeter quadruped than a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8173"></td>
        <td id="LC8173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Yahoo_, cannot, I humbly conceive, in justice, pretend to more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8174"></td>
        <td id="LC8174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cleanliness; and so his honour himself must have owned, if he had seen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8175"></td>
        <td id="LC8175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their filthy way of feeding, and their custom of wallowing and sleeping</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8176"></td>
        <td id="LC8176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the mud.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8177"></td>
        <td id="LC8177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8178"></td>
        <td id="LC8178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My master likewise mentioned another quality which his servants had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8179"></td>
        <td id="LC8179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discovered in several Yahoos, and to him was wholly unaccountable.  He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8180"></td>
        <td id="LC8180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said, “a fancy would sometimes take a _Yahoo_ to retire into a corner, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8181"></td>
        <td id="LC8181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lie down, and howl, and groan, and spurn away all that came near him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8182"></td>
        <td id="LC8182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">although he were young and fat, wanted neither food nor water, nor did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8183"></td>
        <td id="LC8183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the servant imagine what could possibly ail him.  And the only remedy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8184"></td>
        <td id="LC8184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they found was, to set him to hard work, after which he would infallibly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8185"></td>
        <td id="LC8185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come to himself.”  To this I was silent out of partiality to my own kind;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8186"></td>
        <td id="LC8186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yet here I could plainly discover the true seeds of spleen, which only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8187"></td>
        <td id="LC8187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seizes on the lazy, the luxurious, and the rich; who, if they were forced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8188"></td>
        <td id="LC8188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to undergo the same regimen, I would undertake for the cure.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8189"></td>
        <td id="LC8189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8190"></td>
        <td id="LC8190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His honour had further observed, “that a female _Yahoo_ would often stand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8191"></td>
        <td id="LC8191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behind a bank or a bush, to gaze on the young males passing by, and then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8192"></td>
        <td id="LC8192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appear, and hide, using many antic gestures and grimaces, at which time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8193"></td>
        <td id="LC8193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it was observed that she had a most offensive smell; and when any of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8194"></td>
        <td id="LC8194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">males advanced, would slowly retire, looking often back, and with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8195"></td>
        <td id="LC8195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">counterfeit show of fear, run off into some convenient place, where she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8196"></td>
        <td id="LC8196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knew the male would follow her.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8197"></td>
        <td id="LC8197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8198"></td>
        <td id="LC8198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“At other times, if a female stranger came among them, three or four of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8199"></td>
        <td id="LC8199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her own sex would get about her, and stare, and chatter, and grin, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8200"></td>
        <td id="LC8200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smell her all over; and then turn off with gestures, that seemed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8201"></td>
        <td id="LC8201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">express contempt and disdain.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8202"></td>
        <td id="LC8202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8203"></td>
        <td id="LC8203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Perhaps my master might refine a little in these speculations, which he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8204"></td>
        <td id="LC8204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had drawn from what he observed himself, or had been told him by others;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8205"></td>
        <td id="LC8205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, I could not reflect without some amazement, and much sorrow,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8206"></td>
        <td id="LC8206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the rudiments of lewdness, coquetry, censure, and scandal, should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8207"></td>
        <td id="LC8207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have place by instinct in womankind.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8208"></td>
        <td id="LC8208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8209"></td>
        <td id="LC8209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I expected every moment that my master would accuse the _Yahoos_ of those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8210"></td>
        <td id="LC8210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unnatural appetites in both sexes, so common among us.  But nature, it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8211"></td>
        <td id="LC8211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seems, has not been so expert a school-mistress; and these politer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8212"></td>
        <td id="LC8212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleasures are entirely the productions of art and reason on our side of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8213"></td>
        <td id="LC8213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the globe.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8214"></td>
        <td id="LC8214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8215"></td>
        <td id="LC8215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8216"></td>
        <td id="LC8216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8217"></td>
        <td id="LC8217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER VIII.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8218"></td>
        <td id="LC8218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8219"></td>
        <td id="LC8219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8220"></td>
        <td id="LC8220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author relates several particulars of the _Yahoos_.  The great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8221"></td>
        <td id="LC8221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">virtues of the _Houyhnhnms_.  The education and exercise of their youth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8222"></td>
        <td id="LC8222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Their general assembly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8223"></td>
        <td id="LC8223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8224"></td>
        <td id="LC8224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As I ought to have understood human nature much better than I supposed it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8225"></td>
        <td id="LC8225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possible for my master to do, so it was easy to apply the character he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8226"></td>
        <td id="LC8226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gave of the _Yahoos_ to myself and my countrymen; and I believed I could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8227"></td>
        <td id="LC8227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yet make further discoveries, from my own observation.  I therefore often</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8228"></td>
        <td id="LC8228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">begged his honour to let me go among the herds of _Yahoos_ in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8229"></td>
        <td id="LC8229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neighbourhood; to which he always very graciously consented, being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8230"></td>
        <td id="LC8230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perfectly convinced that the hatred I bore these brutes would never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8231"></td>
        <td id="LC8231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suffer me to be corrupted by them; and his honour ordered one of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8232"></td>
        <td id="LC8232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">servants, a strong sorrel nag, very honest and good-natured, to be my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8233"></td>
        <td id="LC8233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guard; without whose protection I durst not undertake such adventures.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8234"></td>
        <td id="LC8234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For I have already told the reader how much I was pestered by these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8325"></td>
        <td id="LC8325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">either.  So that controversies, wranglings, disputes, and positiveness,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8326"></td>
        <td id="LC8326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in false or dubious propositions, are evils unknown among the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8327"></td>
        <td id="LC8327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Houyhnhnms_.  In the like manner, when I used to explain to him our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8328"></td>
        <td id="LC8328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several systems of natural philosophy, he would laugh, “that a creature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8329"></td>
        <td id="LC8329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pretending to reason, should value itself upon the knowledge of other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8330"></td>
        <td id="LC8330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people’s conjectures, and in things where that knowledge, if it were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8331"></td>
        <td id="LC8331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certain, could be of no use.”  Wherein he agreed entirely with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8332"></td>
        <td id="LC8332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sentiments of Socrates, as Plato delivers them; which I mention as the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8333"></td>
        <td id="LC8333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">highest honour I can do that prince of philosophers.  I have often since</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8334"></td>
        <td id="LC8334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reflected, what destruction such doctrine would make in the libraries of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8335"></td>
        <td id="LC8335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Europe; and how many paths of fame would be then shut up in the learned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8336"></td>
        <td id="LC8336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">world.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8337"></td>
        <td id="LC8337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8338"></td>
        <td id="LC8338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Friendship and benevolence are the two principal virtues among the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8339"></td>
        <td id="LC8339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Houyhnhnms_; and these not confined to particular objects, but universal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8340"></td>
        <td id="LC8340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the whole race; for a stranger from the remotest part is equally</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8341"></td>
        <td id="LC8341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">treated with the nearest neighbour, and wherever he goes, looks upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8342"></td>
        <td id="LC8342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself as at home.  They preserve decency and civility in the highest</td>

        <td id="L8343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8343"></td>
        <td id="LC8343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">degrees, but are altogether ignorant of ceremony.  They have no fondness</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8344"></td>
        <td id="LC8344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for their colts or foals, but the care they take in educating them</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8345"></td>
        <td id="LC8345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proceeds entirely from the dictates of reason.  And I observed my master</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8346"></td>
        <td id="LC8346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to show the same affection to his neighbour’s issue, that he had for his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8347"></td>
        <td id="LC8347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own.  They will have it that nature teaches them to love the whole</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8348"></td>
        <td id="LC8348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">species, and it is reason only that makes a distinction of persons, where</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8349"></td>
        <td id="LC8349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there is a superior degree of virtue.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8350"></td>
        <td id="LC8350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8351"></td>
        <td id="LC8351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the matron _Houyhnhnms_ have produced one of each sex, they no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8353"></td>
        <td id="LC8353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by some casualty, which very seldom happens; but in such a case they meet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8354"></td>
        <td id="LC8354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again; or when the like accident befalls a person whose wife is past</td>

        <td id="LC8355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bearing, some other couple bestow on him one of their own colts, and then</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8358"></td>
        <td id="LC8358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But the race of inferior _Houyhnhnms_, bred up to be servants, is not so</td>

        <td id="L8361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8361"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8362"></td>
        <td id="LC8362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In their marriages, they are exactly careful to choose such colours as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8363"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8364"></td>
        <td id="LC8364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">valued in the male, and comeliness in the female; not upon the account of</td>

        <td id="LC8366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happens to excel in strength, a consort is chosen, with regard to</td>

        <td id="LC8370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thoughts, or terms whereby to express them in their language.  The young</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8379"></td>
        <td id="LC8379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In educating the youth of both sexes, their method is admirable, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8380"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8381"></td>
        <td id="LC8381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of oats, except upon certain days, till eighteen years old; nor milk, but</td>

        <td id="L8383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8383"></td>
        <td id="LC8383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many in the evening, which their parents likewise observe; but the</td>

        <td id="L8384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8384"></td>

        <td id="LC8385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grass is brought home, which they eat at the most convenient hours, when</td>

        <td id="L8386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8386"></td>
        <td id="LC8386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they can be best spared from work.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8387"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8388"></td>

        <td id="L8394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8394"></td>
        <td id="LC8394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to such useless animals, he said, was yet a greater instance of</td>

        <td id="L8395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8395"></td>
        <td id="LC8395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brutality.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8396"></td>
        <td id="LC8396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8397"></td>
        <td id="LC8397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But the _Houyhnhnms_ train up their youth to strength, speed, and</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8399"></td>
        <td id="LC8399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and over hard stony grounds; and when they are all in a sweat, they are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8400"></td>
        <td id="LC8400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ordered to leap over head and ears into a pond or river.  Four times a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8401"></td>
        <td id="LC8401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">year the youth of a certain district meet to show their proficiency in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8402"></td>
        <td id="LC8402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">running and leaping, and other feats of strength and agility; where the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8403"></td>
        <td id="LC8403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">victor is rewarded with a song in his or her praise.  On this festival,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8404"></td>
        <td id="LC8404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the servants drive a herd of _Yahoos_ into the field, laden with hay, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8405"></td>
        <td id="LC8405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">oats, and milk, for a repast to the _Houyhnhnms_; after which, these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8406"></td>
        <td id="LC8406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brutes are immediately driven back again, for fear of being noisome to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8407"></td>
        <td id="LC8407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the assembly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8408"></td>
        <td id="LC8408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8409"></td>
        <td id="LC8409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Every fourth year, at the vernal equinox, there is a representative</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8410"></td>
        <td id="LC8410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">council of the whole nation, which meets in a plain about twenty miles</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8411"></td>
        <td id="LC8411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from our house, and continues about five or six days.  Here they inquire</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8412"></td>
        <td id="LC8412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into the state and condition of the several districts; whether they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8413"></td>
        <td id="LC8413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">abound or be deficient in hay or oats, or cows, or _Yahoos_; and wherever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8414"></td>
        <td id="LC8414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there is any want (which is but seldom) it is immediately supplied by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8415"></td>
        <td id="LC8415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unanimous consent and contribution.  Here likewise the regulation of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8416"></td>
        <td id="LC8416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">children is settled: as for instance, if a _Houyhnhnm_ has two males, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8417"></td>
        <td id="LC8417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">changes one of them with another that has two females; and when a child</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8418"></td>
        <td id="LC8418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has been lost by any casualty, where the mother is past breeding, it is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8419"></td>
        <td id="LC8419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">determined what family in the district shall breed another to supply the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8420"></td>
        <td id="LC8420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">loss.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8421"></td>
        <td id="LC8421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8422"></td>
        <td id="LC8422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8423"></td>
        <td id="LC8423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8424"></td>
        <td id="LC8424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER IX.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8425"></td>
        <td id="LC8425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8426"></td>
        <td id="LC8426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8427"></td>
        <td id="LC8427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A grand debate at the general assembly of the _Houyhnhnms_, and how it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8428"></td>
        <td id="LC8428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was determined.  The learning of the _Houyhnhnms_.  Their buildings.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8429"></td>
        <td id="LC8429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Their manner of burials.  The defectiveness of their language.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8430"></td>
        <td id="LC8430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8431"></td>
        <td id="LC8431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">One of these grand assemblies was held in my time, about three months</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8432"></td>
        <td id="LC8432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before my departure, whither my master went as the representative of our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8433"></td>
        <td id="LC8433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">district.  In this council was resumed their old debate, and indeed the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8434"></td>
        <td id="LC8434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only debate that ever happened in their country; whereof my master, after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8435"></td>
        <td id="LC8435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his return, give me a very particular account.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8436"></td>
        <td id="LC8436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8437"></td>
        <td id="LC8437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The question to be debated was, “whether the _Yahoos_ should be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8438"></td>
        <td id="LC8438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exterminated from the face of the earth?”  One of the members for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8439"></td>
        <td id="LC8439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">affirmative offered several arguments of great strength and weight,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8440"></td>
        <td id="LC8440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alleging, “that as the _Yahoos_ were the most filthy, noisome, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8441"></td>
        <td id="LC8441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deformed animals which nature ever produced, so they were the most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8442"></td>
        <td id="LC8442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">restive and indocible, mischievous and malicious; they would privately</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8443"></td>
        <td id="LC8443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suck the teats of the _Houyhnhnms’_ cows, kill and devour their cats,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8444"></td>
        <td id="LC8444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trample down their oats and grass, if they were not continually watched,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8445"></td>
        <td id="LC8445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and commit a thousand other extravagancies.”  He took notice of a general</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8446"></td>
        <td id="LC8446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tradition, “that _Yahoos_ had not been always in their country; but that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8447"></td>
        <td id="LC8447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many ages ago, two of these brutes appeared together upon a mountain;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8448"></td>
        <td id="LC8448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether produced by the heat of the sun upon corrupted mud and slime, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8449"></td>
        <td id="LC8449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the ooze and froth of the sea, was never known; that these _Yahoos_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8450"></td>
        <td id="LC8450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">engendered, and their brood, in a short time, grew so numerous as to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8451"></td>
        <td id="LC8451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">overrun and infest the whole nation; that the _Houyhnhnms_, to get rid of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8452"></td>
        <td id="LC8452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this evil, made a general hunting, and at last enclosed the whole herd;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8453"></td>
        <td id="LC8453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and destroying the elder, every _Houyhnhnm_ kept two young ones in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8454"></td>
        <td id="LC8454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kennel, and brought them to such a degree of tameness, as an animal, so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8455"></td>
        <td id="LC8455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">savage by nature, can be capable of acquiring, using them for draught and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8456"></td>
        <td id="LC8456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carriage; that there seemed to be much truth in this tradition, and that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8457"></td>
        <td id="LC8457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those creatures could not be _yinhniamshy_ (or _aborigines_ of the land),</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8458"></td>
        <td id="LC8458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because of the violent hatred the _Houyhnhnms_, as well as all other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8459"></td>
        <td id="LC8459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">animals, bore them, which, although their evil disposition sufficiently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8460"></td>
        <td id="LC8460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deserved, could never have arrived at so high a degree if they had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8461"></td>
        <td id="LC8461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_aborigines_, or else they would have long since been rooted out; that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8462"></td>
        <td id="LC8462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the inhabitants, taking a fancy to use the service of the _Yahoos_, had,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8463"></td>
        <td id="LC8463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very imprudently, neglected to cultivate the breed of asses, which are a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8464"></td>
        <td id="LC8464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comely animal, easily kept, more tame and orderly, without any offensive</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8465"></td>
        <td id="LC8465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smell, strong enough for labour, although they yield to the other in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8466"></td>
        <td id="LC8466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">agility of body, and if their braying be no agreeable sound, it is far</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8467"></td>
        <td id="LC8467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">preferable to the horrible howlings of the _Yahoos_.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8468"></td>
        <td id="LC8468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8469"></td>
        <td id="LC8469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Several others declared their sentiments to the same purpose, when my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8470"></td>
        <td id="LC8470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">master proposed an expedient to the assembly, whereof he had indeed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8471"></td>
        <td id="LC8471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">borrowed the hint from me.  “He approved of the tradition mentioned by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8472"></td>
        <td id="LC8472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the honourable member who spoke before, and affirmed, that the two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8473"></td>
        <td id="LC8473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Yahoos_ said to be seen first among them, had been driven thither over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8474"></td>
        <td id="LC8474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sea; that coming to land, and being forsaken by their companions,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8475"></td>
        <td id="LC8475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they retired to the mountains, and degenerating by degrees, became in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8476"></td>
        <td id="LC8476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">process of time much more savage than those of their own species in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8477"></td>
        <td id="LC8477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">country whence these two originals came.  The reason of this assertion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8478"></td>
        <td id="LC8478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was, that he had now in his possession a certain wonderful _Yahoo_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8479"></td>
        <td id="LC8479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(meaning myself) which most of them had heard of, and many of them had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8480"></td>
        <td id="LC8480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seen.  He then related to them how he first found me; that my body was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8481"></td>
        <td id="LC8481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all covered with an artificial composure of the skins and hairs of other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8482"></td>
        <td id="LC8482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">animals; that I spoke in a language of my own, and had thoroughly learned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8483"></td>
        <td id="LC8483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">theirs; that I had related to him the accidents which brought me thither;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8484"></td>
        <td id="LC8484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that when he saw me without my covering, I was an exact _Yahoo_ in every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8485"></td>
        <td id="LC8485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">part, only of a whiter colour, less hairy, and with shorter claws.  He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8486"></td>
        <td id="LC8486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">added, how I had endeavoured to persuade him, that in my own and other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8487"></td>
        <td id="LC8487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">countries, the _Yahoos_ acted as the governing, rational animal, and held</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8488"></td>
        <td id="LC8488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the _Houyhnhnms_ in servitude; that he observed in me all the qualities</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8489"></td>
        <td id="LC8489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a _Yahoo_, only a little more civilized by some tincture of reason,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8490"></td>
        <td id="LC8490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which, however, was in a degree as far inferior to the _Houyhnhnm_ race,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8491"></td>
        <td id="LC8491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as the _Yahoos_ of their country were to me; that, among other things, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8492"></td>
        <td id="LC8492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mentioned a custom we had of castrating _Houyhnhnms_ when they were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8493"></td>
        <td id="LC8493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">young, in order to render them tame; that the operation was easy and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8494"></td>
        <td id="LC8494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">safe; that it was no shame to learn wisdom from brutes, as industry is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8495"></td>
        <td id="LC8495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">taught by the ant, and building by the swallow (for so I translate the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8496"></td>
        <td id="LC8496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">word _lyhannh_, although it be a much larger fowl); that this invention</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8497"></td>
        <td id="LC8497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might be practised upon the younger _Yahoos_ here, which besides</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8498"></td>
        <td id="LC8498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rendering them tractable and fitter for use, would in an age put an end</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8499"></td>
        <td id="LC8499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the whole species, without destroying life; that in the mean time the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8500"></td>
        <td id="LC8500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Houyhnhnms_ should be exhorted to cultivate the breed of asses, which,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8501"></td>
        <td id="LC8501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as they are in all respects more valuable brutes, so they have this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8502"></td>
        <td id="LC8502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advantage, to be fit for service at five years old, which the others are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8503"></td>
        <td id="LC8503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not till twelve.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8504"></td>
        <td id="LC8504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8505"></td>
        <td id="LC8505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This was all my master thought fit to tell me, at that time, of what</td>
      </tr>
