      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8596"></td>
        <td id="LC8596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I could, with great pleasure, enlarge further upon the manners and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8597"></td>
        <td id="LC8597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">virtues of this excellent people; but intending in a short time to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8598"></td>
        <td id="LC8598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">publish a volume by itself, expressly upon that subject, I refer the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8599"></td>
        <td id="LC8599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reader thither; and, in the mean time, proceed to relate my own sad</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8600"></td>
        <td id="LC8600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">catastrophe.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8601"></td>
        <td id="LC8601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8602"></td>
        <td id="LC8602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8603"></td>
        <td id="LC8603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8604"></td>
        <td id="LC8604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER X.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8605"></td>
        <td id="LC8605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8606"></td>
        <td id="LC8606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8607"></td>
        <td id="LC8607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author’s economy, and happy life, among the Houyhnhnms.  His great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8608"></td>
        <td id="LC8608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">improvement in virtue by conversing with them.  Their conversations.  The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8609"></td>
        <td id="LC8609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">author has notice given him by his master, that he must depart from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8610"></td>
        <td id="LC8610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">country.  He falls into a swoon for grief; but submits.  He contrives and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8611"></td>
        <td id="LC8611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">finishes a canoe by the help of a fellow-servant, and puts to sea at a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8612"></td>
        <td id="LC8612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">venture.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8613"></td>
        <td id="LC8613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8614"></td>
        <td id="LC8614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had settled my little economy to my own heart’s content.  My master had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8615"></td>
        <td id="LC8615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ordered a room to be made for me, after their manner, about six yards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8616"></td>
        <td id="LC8616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the house: the sides and floors of which I plastered with clay, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8617"></td>
        <td id="LC8617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">covered with rush-mats of my own contriving.  I had beaten hemp, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8618"></td>
        <td id="LC8618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there grows wild, and made of it a sort of ticking; this I filled with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8619"></td>
        <td id="LC8619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the feathers of several birds I had taken with springes made of _Yahoos’_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8620"></td>
        <td id="LC8620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hairs, and were excellent food.  I had worked two chairs with my knife,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8621"></td>
        <td id="LC8621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sorrel nag helping me in the grosser and more laborious part.  When</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8622"></td>
        <td id="LC8622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my clothes were worn to rags, I made myself others with the skins of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8623"></td>
        <td id="LC8623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rabbits, and of a certain beautiful animal, about the same size, called</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8624"></td>
        <td id="LC8624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_nnuhnoh_, the skin of which is covered with a fine down.  Of these I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8625"></td>
        <td id="LC8625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">also made very tolerable stockings.  I soled my shoes with wood, which I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8626"></td>
        <td id="LC8626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cut from a tree, and fitted to the upper-leather; and when this was worn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8627"></td>
        <td id="LC8627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out, I supplied it with the skins of _Yahoos_ dried in the sun.  I often</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8628"></td>
        <td id="LC8628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got honey out of hollow trees, which I mingled with water, or ate with my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8629"></td>
        <td id="LC8629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bread.  No man could more verify the truth of these two maxims, “That</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8630"></td>
        <td id="LC8630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nature is very easily satisfied;” and, “That necessity is the mother of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8631"></td>
        <td id="LC8631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">invention.”  I enjoyed perfect health of body, and tranquillity of mind;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8632"></td>
        <td id="LC8632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I did not feel the treachery or inconstancy of a friend, nor the injuries</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8633"></td>
        <td id="LC8633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a secret or open enemy.  I had no occasion of bribing, flattering, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8634"></td>
        <td id="LC8634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pimping, to procure the favour of any great man, or of his minion; I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8635"></td>
        <td id="LC8635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wanted no fence against fraud or oppression: here was neither physician</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8636"></td>
        <td id="LC8636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to destroy my body, nor lawyer to ruin my fortune; no informer to watch</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8637"></td>
        <td id="LC8637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my words and actions, or forge accusations against me for hire: here were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8638"></td>
        <td id="LC8638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no gibers, censurers, backbiters, pickpockets, highwaymen, housebreakers,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8639"></td>
        <td id="LC8639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attorneys, bawds, buffoons, gamesters, politicians, wits, splenetics,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8640"></td>
        <td id="LC8640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tedious talkers, controvertists, ravishers, murderers, robbers,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8641"></td>
        <td id="LC8641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">virtuosos; no leaders, or followers, of party and faction; no encouragers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8642"></td>
        <td id="LC8642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to vice, by seducement or examples; no dungeon, axes, gibbets,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8643"></td>
        <td id="LC8643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whipping-posts, or pillories; no cheating shopkeepers or mechanics; no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8644"></td>
        <td id="LC8644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pride, vanity, or affectation; no fops, bullies, drunkards, strolling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8645"></td>
        <td id="LC8645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whores, or poxes; no ranting, lewd, expensive wives; no stupid, proud</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8646"></td>
        <td id="LC8646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pedants; no importunate, overbearing, quarrelsome, noisy, roaring, empty,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8647"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8648"></td>
        <td id="LC8648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the merit of their vices, or nobility thrown into it on account of their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8649"></td>
        <td id="LC8649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">virtues; no lords, fiddlers, judges, or dancing-masters.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8650"></td>
        <td id="LC8650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8651"></td>
        <td id="LC8651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had the favour of being admitted to several _Houyhnhnms_, who came to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8652"></td>

        <td id="L8656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8656"></td>
        <td id="LC8656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I never presumed to speak, except in answer to a question; and then I did</td>

        <td id="LC8658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">improving myself; but I was infinitely delighted with the station of an</td>

        <td id="L8659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8659"></td>
        <td id="LC8659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">humble auditor in such conversations, where nothing passed but what was</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8660"></td>
        <td id="LC8660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">useful, expressed in the fewest and most significant words; where, as I</td>

        <td id="L8661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8661"></td>
        <td id="LC8661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have already said, the greatest decency was observed, without the least</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8662"></td>
        <td id="LC8662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">degree of ceremony; where no person spoke without being pleased himself,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8663"></td>
        <td id="LC8663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and pleasing his companions; where there was no interruption,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8664"></td>
        <td id="LC8664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tediousness, heat, or difference of sentiments.  They have a notion, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8665"></td>
        <td id="LC8665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when people are met together, a short silence does much improve</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8666"></td>
        <td id="LC8666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conversation: this I found to be true; for during those little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8667"></td>
        <td id="LC8667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intermissions of talk, new ideas would arise in their minds, which very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8668"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L8673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8673"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8675"></td>

        <td id="L8676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8676"></td>
        <td id="LC8676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me and my country, upon which they were all pleased to descant, in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8677"></td>
        <td id="LC8677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manner not very advantageous to humankind: and for that reason I shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8678"></td>
        <td id="LC8678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not repeat what they said; only I may be allowed to observe, that his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8679"></td>
        <td id="LC8679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">honour, to my great admiration, appeared to understand the nature of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8680"></td>
        <td id="LC8680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Yahoos_ much better than myself.  He went through all our vices and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8681"></td>
        <td id="LC8681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">follies, and discovered many, which I had never mentioned to him, by only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8682"></td>
        <td id="LC8682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">supposing what qualities a _Yahoo_ of their country, with a small</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8683"></td>
        <td id="LC8683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proportion of reason, might be capable of exerting; and concluded, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8684"></td>
        <td id="LC8684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too much probability, “how vile, as well as miserable, such a creature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8685"></td>
        <td id="LC8685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must be.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8686"></td>
        <td id="LC8686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8687"></td>
        <td id="LC8687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I freely confess, that all the little knowledge I have of any value, was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8688"></td>
        <td id="LC8688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acquired by the lectures I received from my master, and from hearing the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8689"></td>
        <td id="LC8689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discourses of him and his friends; to which I should be prouder to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8690"></td>
        <td id="LC8690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">listen, than to dictate to the greatest and wisest assembly in Europe.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8691"></td>
        <td id="LC8691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">admired the strength, comeliness, and speed of the inhabitants; and such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8692"></td>
        <td id="LC8692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a constellation of virtues, in such amiable persons, produced in me the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8693"></td>
        <td id="LC8693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">highest veneration.  At first, indeed, I did not feel that natural awe,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8694"></td>
        <td id="LC8694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which the _Yahoos_ and all other animals bear toward them; but it grew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8695"></td>
        <td id="LC8695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon me by decrees, much sooner than I imagined, and was mingled with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8696"></td>
        <td id="LC8696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">respectful love and gratitude, that they would condescend to distinguish</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8697"></td>
        <td id="LC8697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me from the rest of my species.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8698"></td>
        <td id="LC8698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8699"></td>
        <td id="LC8699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I thought of my family, my friends, my countrymen, or the human race</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8700"></td>
        <td id="LC8700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in general, I considered them, as they really were, _Yahoos_ in shape and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8701"></td>
        <td id="LC8701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disposition, perhaps a little more civilized, and qualified with the gift</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8702"></td>
        <td id="LC8702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of speech; but making no other use of reason, than to improve and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8703"></td>
        <td id="LC8703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">multiply those vices whereof their brethren in this country had only the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8704"></td>
        <td id="LC8704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">share that nature allotted them.  When I happened to behold the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8705"></td>
        <td id="LC8705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reflection of my own form in a lake or fountain, I turned away my face in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8706"></td>
        <td id="LC8706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horror and detestation of myself, and could better endure the sight of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8707"></td>
        <td id="LC8707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">common _Yahoo_ than of my own person.  By conversing with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8708"></td>
        <td id="LC8708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Houyhnhnms_, and looking upon them with delight, I fell to imitate their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8709"></td>
        <td id="LC8709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gait and gesture, which is now grown into a habit; and my friends often</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8710"></td>
        <td id="LC8710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tell me, in a blunt way, “that I trot like a horse;” which, however, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8711"></td>
        <td id="LC8711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">take for a great compliment.  Neither shall I disown, that in speaking I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8712"></td>
        <td id="LC8712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am apt to fall into the voice and manner of the _Houyhnhnms_, and hear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8713"></td>
        <td id="LC8713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">myself ridiculed on that account, without the least mortification.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8714"></td>
        <td id="LC8714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8715"></td>
        <td id="LC8715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the midst of all this happiness, and when I looked upon myself to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8716"></td>
        <td id="LC8716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fully settled for life, my master sent for me one morning a little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8717"></td>
        <td id="LC8717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">earlier than his usual hour.  I observed by his countenance that he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8718"></td>
        <td id="LC8718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in some perplexity, and at a loss how to begin what he had to speak.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8719"></td>
        <td id="LC8719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After a short silence, he told me, “he did not know how I would take what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8720"></td>
        <td id="LC8720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was going to say: that in the last general assembly, when the affair</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8721"></td>
        <td id="LC8721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the _Yahoos_ was entered upon, the representatives had taken offence</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8722"></td>
        <td id="LC8722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at his keeping a _Yahoo_ (meaning myself) in his family, more like a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8723"></td>
        <td id="LC8723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Houyhnhnm_ than a brute animal; that he was known frequently to converse</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8724"></td>
        <td id="LC8724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with me, as if he could receive some advantage or pleasure in my company;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8725"></td>
        <td id="LC8725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that such a practice was not agreeable to reason or nature, or a thing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8726"></td>
        <td id="LC8726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ever heard of before among them; the assembly did therefore exhort him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8727"></td>
        <td id="LC8727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">either to employ me like the rest of my species, or command me to swim</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8728"></td>
        <td id="LC8728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back to the place whence I came: that the first of these expedients was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8729"></td>
        <td id="LC8729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">utterly rejected by all the _Houyhnhnms_ who had ever seen me at his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8730"></td>
        <td id="LC8730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house or their own; for they alleged, that because I had some rudiments</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8731"></td>
        <td id="LC8731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of reason, added to the natural pravity of those animals, it was to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8732"></td>
        <td id="LC8732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feared I might be able to seduce them into the woody and mountainous</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8733"></td>
        <td id="LC8733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">parts of the country, and bring them in troops by night to destroy the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8734"></td>
        <td id="LC8734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Houyhnhnms’_ cattle, as being naturally of the ravenous kind, and averse</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8735"></td>
        <td id="LC8735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from labour.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8736"></td>
        <td id="LC8736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8737"></td>
        <td id="LC8737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My master added, “that he was daily pressed by the _Houyhnhnms_ of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8738"></td>
        <td id="LC8738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neighbourhood to have the assembly’s exhortation executed, which he could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8739"></td>
        <td id="LC8739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not put off much longer.  He doubted it would be impossible for me to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8740"></td>
        <td id="LC8740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swim to another country; and therefore wished I would contrive some sort</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8741"></td>
        <td id="LC8741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of vehicle, resembling those I had described to him, that might carry me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8742"></td>
        <td id="LC8742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the sea; in which work I should have the assistance of his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8743"></td>
        <td id="LC8743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">servants, as well as those of his neighbours.”  He concluded, “that for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8744"></td>
        <td id="LC8744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his own part, he could have been content to keep me in his service as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8745"></td>
        <td id="LC8745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long as I lived; because he found I had cured myself of some bad habits</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8746"></td>
        <td id="LC8746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and dispositions, by endeavouring, as far as my inferior nature was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8747"></td>
        <td id="LC8747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">capable, to imitate the _Houyhnhnms_.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8748"></td>
        <td id="LC8748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8749"></td>
        <td id="LC8749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should here observe to the reader, that a decree of the general</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8750"></td>
        <td id="LC8750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assembly in this country is expressed by the word _hnhloayn_, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8751"></td>
        <td id="LC8751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">signifies an exhortation, as near as I can render it; for they have no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8752"></td>
        <td id="LC8752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conception how a rational creature can be compelled, but only advised, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8753"></td>
        <td id="LC8753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exhorted; because no person can disobey reason, without giving up his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8754"></td>
        <td id="LC8754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">claim to be a rational creature.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8755"></td>
        <td id="LC8755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8756"></td>
        <td id="LC8756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was struck with the utmost grief and despair at my master’s discourse;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8757"></td>
        <td id="LC8757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and being unable to support the agonies I was under, I fell into a swoon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8758"></td>
        <td id="LC8758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at his feet.  When I came to myself, he told me “that he concluded I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8759"></td>
        <td id="LC8759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been dead;” for these people are subject to no such imbecilities of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8760"></td>
        <td id="LC8760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nature.  I answered in a faint voice, “that death would have been too</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8761"></td>
        <td id="LC8761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great a happiness; that although I could not blame the assembly’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8762"></td>
        <td id="LC8762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exhortation, or the urgency of his friends; yet, in my weak and corrupt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8763"></td>
        <td id="LC8763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">judgment, I thought it might consist with reason to have been less</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8764"></td>
        <td id="LC8764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rigorous; that I could not swim a league, and probably the nearest land</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8765"></td>
        <td id="LC8765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to theirs might be distant above a hundred: that many materials,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8766"></td>
        <td id="LC8766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">necessary for making a small vessel to carry me off, were wholly wanting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8767"></td>
        <td id="LC8767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in this country; which, however, I would attempt, in obedience and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8768"></td>
        <td id="LC8768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gratitude to his honour, although I concluded the thing to be impossible,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8769"></td>
        <td id="LC8769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and therefore looked on myself as already devoted to destruction; that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8770"></td>
        <td id="LC8770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the certain prospect of an unnatural death was the least of my evils;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8771"></td>
        <td id="LC8771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for, supposing I should escape with life by some strange adventure, how</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8772"></td>
        <td id="LC8772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could I think with temper of passing my days among _Yahoos_, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8773"></td>
        <td id="LC8773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">relapsing into my old corruptions, for want of examples to lead and keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8774"></td>
        <td id="LC8774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me within the paths of virtue? that I knew too well upon what solid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8775"></td>
        <td id="LC8775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reasons all the determinations of the wise _Houyhnhnms_ were founded, not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8776"></td>
        <td id="LC8776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be shaken by arguments of mine, a miserable _Yahoo_; and therefore,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8777"></td>
        <td id="LC8777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after presenting him with my humble thanks for the offer of his servants’</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8778"></td>
        <td id="LC8778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assistance in making a vessel, and desiring a reasonable time for so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8779"></td>
        <td id="LC8779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">difficult a work, I told him I would endeavour to preserve a wretched</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8780"></td>
        <td id="LC8780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being; and if ever I returned to England, was not without hopes of being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8781"></td>
        <td id="LC8781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">useful to my own species, by celebrating the praises of the renowned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8782"></td>
        <td id="LC8782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Houyhnhnms_, and proposing their virtues to the imitation of mankind.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8783"></td>
        <td id="LC8783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8784"></td>
        <td id="LC8784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My master, in a few words, made me a very gracious reply; allowed me the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8785"></td>
        <td id="LC8785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">space of two months to finish my boat; and ordered the sorrel nag, my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8786"></td>
        <td id="LC8786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fellow-servant (for so, at this distance, I may presume to call him), to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8787"></td>
        <td id="LC8787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">follow my instruction; because I told my master, “that his help would be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8788"></td>
        <td id="LC8788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sufficient, and I knew he had a tenderness for me.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8789"></td>
        <td id="LC8789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8790"></td>
        <td id="LC8790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In his company, my first business was to go to that part of the coast</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8791"></td>
        <td id="LC8791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where my rebellious crew had ordered me to be set on shore.  I got upon a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8792"></td>
        <td id="LC8792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">height, and looking on every side into the sea; fancied I saw a small</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8793"></td>
        <td id="LC8793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">island toward the north-east.  I took out my pocket glass, and could then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8794"></td>
        <td id="LC8794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clearly distinguish it above five leagues off, as I computed; but it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8795"></td>
        <td id="LC8795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appeared to the sorrel nag to be only a blue cloud: for as he had no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8796"></td>
        <td id="LC8796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conception of any country beside his own, so he could not be as expert in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8797"></td>
        <td id="LC8797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distinguishing remote objects at sea, as we who so much converse in that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8798"></td>
        <td id="LC8798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">element.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8799"></td>
        <td id="LC8799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8800"></td>
        <td id="LC8800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After I had discovered this island, I considered no further; but resolved</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8801"></td>
        <td id="LC8801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it should if possible, be the first place of my banishment, leaving the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8802"></td>
        <td id="LC8802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consequence to fortune.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8803"></td>
        <td id="LC8803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8804"></td>
        <td id="LC8804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I returned home, and consulting with the sorrel nag, we went into a copse</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8805"></td>
        <td id="LC8805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at some distance, where I with my knife, and he with a sharp flint,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8806"></td>
        <td id="LC8806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fastened very artificially after their manner, to a wooden handle, cut</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8807"></td>
        <td id="LC8807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down several oak wattles, about the thickness of a walking-staff, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8808"></td>
        <td id="LC8808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some larger pieces.  But I shall not trouble the reader with a particular</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8809"></td>
        <td id="LC8809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">description of my own mechanics; let it suffice to say, that in six weeks</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8810"></td>
        <td id="LC8810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time with the help of the sorrel nag, who performed the parts that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8811"></td>
        <td id="LC8811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">required most labour, I finished a sort of Indian canoe, but much larger,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8812"></td>
        <td id="LC8812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">covering it with the skins of _Yahoos_, well stitched together with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8813"></td>
        <td id="LC8813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hempen threads of my own making.  My sail was likewise composed of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8814"></td>
        <td id="LC8814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">skins of the same animal; but I made use of the youngest I could get, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8815"></td>
        <td id="LC8815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">older being too tough and thick; and I likewise provided myself with four</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8816"></td>
        <td id="LC8816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">paddles.  I laid in a stock of boiled flesh, of rabbits and fowls, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8817"></td>
        <td id="LC8817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">took with me two vessels, one filled with milk and the other with water.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8818"></td>
        <td id="LC8818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8819"></td>
        <td id="LC8819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I tried my canoe in a large pond, near my master’s house, and then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8820"></td>
        <td id="LC8820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">corrected in it what was amiss; stopping all the chinks with _Yahoos’_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8821"></td>
        <td id="LC8821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tallow, till I found it staunch, and able to bear me and my freight; and,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8822"></td>
        <td id="LC8822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when it was as complete as I could possibly make it, I had it drawn on a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8823"></td>
        <td id="LC8823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carriage very gently by _Yahoos_ to the sea-side, under the conduct of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8824"></td>
        <td id="LC8824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sorrel nag and another servant.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8825"></td>
        <td id="LC8825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8826"></td>
        <td id="LC8826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When all was ready, and the day came for my departure, I took leave of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8827"></td>
        <td id="LC8827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">master and lady and the whole family, my eyes flowing with tears, and my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8828"></td>
        <td id="LC8828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heart quite sunk with grief.  But his honour, out of curiosity, and,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8829"></td>
        <td id="LC8829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perhaps, (if I may speak without vanity,) partly out of kindness, was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8830"></td>
        <td id="LC8830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">determined to see me in my canoe, and got several of his neighbouring</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8831"></td>
        <td id="LC8831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friends to accompany him.  I was forced to wait above an hour for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8832"></td>
        <td id="LC8832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tide; and then observing the wind very fortunately bearing toward the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8833"></td>
        <td id="LC8833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">island to which I intended to steer my course, I took a second leave of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8834"></td>
        <td id="LC8834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my master: but as I was going to prostrate myself to kiss his hoof, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8835"></td>
        <td id="LC8835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did me the honour to raise it gently to my mouth.  I am not ignorant how</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8836"></td>
        <td id="LC8836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much I have been censured for mentioning this last particular.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8837"></td>
        <td id="LC8837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Detractors are pleased to think it improbable, that so illustrious a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8838"></td>
        <td id="LC8838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">person should descend to give so great a mark of distinction to a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8839"></td>
        <td id="LC8839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">creature so inferior as I.  Neither have I forgotten how apt some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8840"></td>
        <td id="LC8840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">travellers are to boast of extraordinary favours they have received.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8841"></td>
        <td id="LC8841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, if these censurers were better acquainted with the noble and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8842"></td>
        <td id="LC8842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">courteous disposition of the _Houyhnhnms_, they would soon change their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8843"></td>
        <td id="LC8843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opinion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8844"></td>
        <td id="LC8844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8845"></td>
        <td id="LC8845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I paid my respects to the rest of the _Houyhnhnms_ in his honour’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8846"></td>
        <td id="LC8846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">company; then getting into my canoe, I pushed off from shore.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8847"></td>
        <td id="LC8847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8848"></td>
        <td id="LC8848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8849"></td>
        <td id="LC8849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8850"></td>
        <td id="LC8850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XI.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8851"></td>
        <td id="LC8851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8852"></td>
        <td id="LC8852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8853"></td>
        <td id="LC8853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author’s dangerous voyage.  He arrives at New Holland, hoping to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8854"></td>
        <td id="LC8854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">settle there.  Is wounded with an arrow by one of the natives.  Is seized</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8855"></td>
        <td id="LC8855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and carried by force into a Portuguese ship.  The great civilities of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8856"></td>
        <td id="LC8856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">captain.  The author arrives at England.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8857"></td>
        <td id="LC8857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8858"></td>
        <td id="LC8858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I began this desperate voyage on February 15, 1714–15, at nine o’clock in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8859"></td>
        <td id="LC8859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the morning.  The wind was very favourable; however, I made use at first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8860"></td>
        <td id="LC8860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only of my paddles; but considering I should soon be weary, and that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8861"></td>
        <td id="LC8861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wind might chop about, I ventured to set up my little sail; and thus,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8862"></td>
        <td id="LC8862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the help of the tide, I went at the rate of a league and a half an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8863"></td>
        <td id="LC8863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hour, as near as I could guess.  My master and his friends continued on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8864"></td>
        <td id="LC8864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the shore till I was almost out of sight; and I often heard the sorrel</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8865"></td>
        <td id="LC8865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nag (who always loved me) crying out, “_Hnuy illa nyha_, _majah Yahoo_;”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8866"></td>
        <td id="LC8866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Take care of thyself, gentle _Yahoo_.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8867"></td>
        <td id="LC8867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8868"></td>
        <td id="LC8868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My design was, if possible, to discover some small island uninhabited,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8869"></td>
        <td id="LC8869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yet sufficient, by my labour, to furnish me with the necessaries of life,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8870"></td>
        <td id="LC8870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which I would have thought a greater happiness, than to be first minister</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8871"></td>
        <td id="LC8871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the politest court of Europe; so horrible was the idea I conceived of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8872"></td>
        <td id="LC8872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">returning to live in the society, and under the government of _Yahoos_.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8873"></td>
        <td id="LC8873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For in such a solitude as I desired, I could at least enjoy my own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8874"></td>
        <td id="LC8874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thoughts, and reflect with delight on the virtues of those inimitable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8875"></td>
        <td id="LC8875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Houyhnhnms_, without an opportunity of degenerating into the vices and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8876"></td>
        <td id="LC8876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">corruptions of my own species.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8877"></td>
        <td id="LC8877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8878"></td>
        <td id="LC8878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The reader may remember what I related, when my crew conspired against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8879"></td>
        <td id="LC8879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, and confined me to my cabin; how I continued there several weeks</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8880"></td>
        <td id="LC8880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without knowing what course we took; and when I was put ashore in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8881"></td>
        <td id="LC8881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long-boat, how the sailors told me, with oaths, whether true or false,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8882"></td>
        <td id="LC8882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“that they knew not in what part of the world we were.”  However, I did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8883"></td>
        <td id="LC8883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then believe us to be about 10 degrees southward of the Cape of Good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8884"></td>
        <td id="LC8884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hope, or about 45 degrees southern latitude, as I gathered from some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8885"></td>
        <td id="LC8885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">general words I overheard among them, being I supposed to the south-east</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8886"></td>
        <td id="LC8886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in their intended voyage to Madagascar.  And although this were little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8887"></td>
        <td id="LC8887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">better than conjecture, yet I resolved to steer my course eastward,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8888"></td>
        <td id="LC8888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hoping to reach the south-west coast of New Holland, and perhaps some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8889"></td>
        <td id="LC8889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such island as I desired lying westward of it.  The wind was full west,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8890"></td>
        <td id="LC8890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and by six in the evening I computed I had gone eastward at least</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8891"></td>
        <td id="LC8891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eighteen leagues; when I spied a very small island about half a league</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8892"></td>
        <td id="LC8892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off, which I soon reached.  It was nothing but a rock, with one creek</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8893"></td>
        <td id="LC8893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">naturally arched by the force of tempests.  Here I put in my canoe, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8894"></td>
        <td id="LC8894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">climbing a part of the rock, I could plainly discover land to the east,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8895"></td>
        <td id="LC8895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extending from south to north.  I lay all night in my canoe; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8896"></td>
        <td id="LC8896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">repeating my voyage early in the morning, I arrived in seven hours to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8897"></td>
        <td id="LC8897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">south-east point of New Holland.  This confirmed me in the opinion I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8898"></td>
        <td id="LC8898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long entertained, that the maps and charts place this country at least</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8899"></td>
        <td id="LC8899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">three degrees more to the east than it really is; which thought I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8900"></td>
        <td id="LC8900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">communicated many years ago to my worthy friend, Mr. Herman Moll, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8901"></td>
        <td id="LC8901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gave him my reasons for it, although he has rather chosen to follow other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8902"></td>
        <td id="LC8902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">authors.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8903"></td>
        <td id="LC8903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8904"></td>
        <td id="LC8904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I saw no inhabitants in the place where I landed, and being unarmed, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8905"></td>
        <td id="LC8905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was afraid of venturing far into the country.  I found some shellfish on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8906"></td>
        <td id="LC8906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the shore, and ate them raw, not daring to kindle a fire, for fear of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8907"></td>
        <td id="LC8907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being discovered by the natives.  I continued three days feeding on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8908"></td>
        <td id="LC8908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">oysters and limpets, to save my own provisions; and I fortunately found a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8909"></td>
        <td id="LC8909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brook of excellent water, which gave me great relief.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8910"></td>
        <td id="LC8910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8911"></td>
        <td id="LC8911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On the fourth day, venturing out early a little too far, I saw twenty or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8912"></td>
        <td id="LC8912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thirty natives upon a height not above five hundred yards from me.  They</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8913"></td>
        <td id="LC8913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were stark naked, men, women, and children, round a fire, as I could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8914"></td>
        <td id="LC8914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discover by the smoke.  One of them spied me, and gave notice to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8915"></td>
        <td id="LC8915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rest; five of them advanced toward me, leaving the women and children at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8916"></td>
        <td id="LC8916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the fire.  I made what haste I could to the shore, and, getting into my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8917"></td>
        <td id="LC8917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">canoe, shoved off: the savages, observing me retreat, ran after me: and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8918"></td>
        <td id="LC8918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before I could get far enough into the sea, discharged an arrow which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8919"></td>
        <td id="LC8919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wounded me deeply on the inside of my left knee: I shall carry the mark</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8920"></td>
        <td id="LC8920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to my grave.  I apprehended the arrow might be poisoned, and paddling out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8921"></td>
        <td id="LC8921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the reach of their darts (being a calm day), I made a shift to suck</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8922"></td>
        <td id="LC8922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the wound, and dress it as well as I could.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8923"></td>
        <td id="LC8923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8924"></td>
        <td id="LC8924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was at a loss what to do, for I durst not return to the same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8925"></td>
        <td id="LC8925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">landing-place, but stood to the north, and was forced to paddle, for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8926"></td>
        <td id="LC8926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wind, though very gentle, was against me, blowing north-west.  As I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8927"></td>
        <td id="LC8927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looking about for a secure landing-place, I saw a sail to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8928"></td>
        <td id="LC8928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">north-north-east, which appearing every minute more visible, I was in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8929"></td>
        <td id="LC8929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some doubt whether I should wait for them or not; but at last my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8930"></td>
        <td id="LC8930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">detestation of the _Yahoo_ race prevailed: and turning my canoe, I sailed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8931"></td>
        <td id="LC8931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and paddled together to the south, and got into the same creek whence I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8932"></td>
        <td id="LC8932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">set out in the morning, choosing rather to trust myself among these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8933"></td>
