        <td id="LC8933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">barbarians, than live with European _Yahoos_.  I drew up my canoe as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8934"></td>
        <td id="LC8934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">close as I could to the shore, and hid myself behind a stone by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8935"></td>
        <td id="LC8935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little brook, which, as I have already said, was excellent water.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8936"></td>
        <td id="LC8936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8937"></td>
        <td id="LC8937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The ship came within half a league of this creek, and sent her long boat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8938"></td>
        <td id="LC8938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with vessels to take in fresh water (for the place, it seems, was very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8939"></td>
        <td id="LC8939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well known); but I did not observe it, till the boat was almost on shore;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8940"></td>
        <td id="LC8940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and it was too late to seek another hiding-place.  The seamen at their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8941"></td>
        <td id="LC8941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">landing observed my canoe, and rummaging it all over, easily conjectured</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8942"></td>
        <td id="LC8942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the owner could not be far off.  Four of them, well armed, searched</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8943"></td>
        <td id="LC8943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every cranny and lurking-hole, till at last they found me flat on my face</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8944"></td>
        <td id="LC8944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behind the stone.  They gazed awhile in admiration at my strange uncouth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8945"></td>
        <td id="LC8945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dress; my coat made of skins, my wooden-soled shoes, and my furred</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8946"></td>
        <td id="LC8946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stockings; whence, however, they concluded, I was not a native of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8947"></td>
        <td id="LC8947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">place, who all go naked.  One of the seamen, in Portuguese, bid me rise,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8948"></td>
        <td id="LC8948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and asked who I was.  I understood that language very well, and getting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8949"></td>
        <td id="LC8949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon my feet, said, “I was a poor _Yahoo_ banished from the _Houyhnhnms_,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8950"></td>
        <td id="LC8950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and desired they would please to let me depart.”  They admired to hear me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8951"></td>
        <td id="LC8951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answer them in their own tongue, and saw by my complexion I must be a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8952"></td>
        <td id="LC8952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">European; but were at a loss to know what I meant by _Yahoos_ and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8953"></td>
        <td id="LC8953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Houyhnhnms_; and at the same time fell a-laughing at my strange tone in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8954"></td>
        <td id="LC8954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speaking, which resembled the neighing of a horse.  I trembled all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8955"></td>
        <td id="LC8955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">while betwixt fear and hatred.  I again desired leave to depart, and was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8956"></td>
        <td id="LC8956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gently moving to my canoe; but they laid hold of me, desiring to know,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8957"></td>
        <td id="LC8957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“what country I was of? whence I came?” with many other questions.  I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8958"></td>
        <td id="LC8958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told them “I was born in England, whence I came about five years ago, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8959"></td>
        <td id="LC8959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then their country and ours were at peace.  I therefore hoped they would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8960"></td>
        <td id="LC8960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not treat me as an enemy, since I meant them no harm, but was a poor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8961"></td>
        <td id="LC8961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Yahoo_ seeking some desolate place where to pass the remainder of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8962"></td>
        <td id="LC8962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unfortunate life.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8963"></td>
        <td id="LC8963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8964"></td>
        <td id="LC8964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When they began to talk, I thought I never heard or saw any thing more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8965"></td>
        <td id="LC8965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unnatural; for it appeared to me as monstrous as if a dog or a cow should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8966"></td>
        <td id="LC8966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speak in England, or a _Yahoo_ in _Houyhnhnmland_.  The honest Portuguese</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8967"></td>
        <td id="LC8967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were equally amazed at my strange dress, and the odd manner of delivering</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8968"></td>
        <td id="LC8968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my words, which, however, they understood very well.  They spoke to me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8969"></td>
        <td id="LC8969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with great humanity, and said, “they were sure the captain would carry me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8970"></td>
        <td id="LC8970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_gratis_ to Lisbon, whence I might return to my own country; that two of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8971"></td>
        <td id="LC8971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the seamen would go back to the ship, inform the captain of what they had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8972"></td>
        <td id="LC8972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seen, and receive his orders; in the mean time, unless I would give my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8973"></td>
        <td id="LC8973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">solemn oath not to fly, they would secure me by force.  I thought it best</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8974"></td>
        <td id="LC8974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to comply with their proposal.  They were very curious to know my story,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8975"></td>
        <td id="LC8975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but I gave them very little satisfaction, and they all conjectured that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8976"></td>
        <td id="LC8976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my misfortunes had impaired my reason.  In two hours the boat, which went</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8977"></td>
        <td id="LC8977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laden with vessels of water, returned, with the captain’s command to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8978"></td>
        <td id="LC8978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fetch me on board.  I fell on my knees to preserve my liberty; but all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8979"></td>
        <td id="LC8979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was in vain; and the men, having tied me with cords, heaved me into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8980"></td>
        <td id="LC8980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boat, whence I was taken into the ship, and thence into the captain’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8981"></td>
        <td id="LC8981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cabin.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8982"></td>
        <td id="LC8982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8983"></td>
        <td id="LC8983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His name was Pedro de Mendez; he was a very courteous and generous</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8984"></td>
        <td id="LC8984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">person.  He entreated me to give some account of myself, and desired to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8985"></td>
        <td id="LC8985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know what I would eat or drink; said, “I should be used as well as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8986"></td>
        <td id="LC8986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself;” and spoke so many obliging things, that I wondered to find such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8987"></td>
        <td id="LC8987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">civilities from a _Yahoo_.  However, I remained silent and sullen; I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8988"></td>
        <td id="LC8988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ready to faint at the very smell of him and his men.  At last I desired</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8989"></td>
        <td id="LC8989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something to eat out of my own canoe; but he ordered me a chicken, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8990"></td>
        <td id="LC8990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some excellent wine, and then directed that I should be put to bed in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8991"></td>
        <td id="LC8991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very clean cabin.  I would not undress myself, but lay on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8992"></td>
        <td id="LC8992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bed-clothes, and in half an hour stole out, when I thought the crew was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8993"></td>
        <td id="LC8993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at dinner, and getting to the side of the ship, was going to leap into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8994"></td>
        <td id="LC8994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sea, and swim for my life, rather than continue among _Yahoos_.  But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8995"></td>
        <td id="LC8995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one of the seamen prevented me, and having informed the captain, I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8996"></td>
        <td id="LC8996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chained to my cabin.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8997"></td>
        <td id="LC8997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8998"></td>
        <td id="LC8998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After dinner, Don Pedro came to me, and desired to know my reason for so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8999"></td>
        <td id="LC8999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desperate an attempt; assured me, “he only meant to do me all the service</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9000"></td>
        <td id="LC9000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was able;” and spoke so very movingly, that at last I descended to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9001"></td>
        <td id="LC9001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">treat him like an animal which had some little portion of reason.  I gave</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9002"></td>
        <td id="LC9002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him a very short relation of my voyage; of the conspiracy against me by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9003"></td>
        <td id="LC9003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my own men; of the country where they set me on shore, and of my five</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9004"></td>
        <td id="LC9004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">years residence there.  All which he looked upon as if it were a dream or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9005"></td>
        <td id="LC9005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a vision; whereat I took great offence; for I had quite forgot the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9006"></td>
        <td id="LC9006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">faculty of lying, so peculiar to _Yahoos_, in all countries where they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9007"></td>
        <td id="LC9007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">preside, and, consequently, their disposition of suspecting truth in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9008"></td>
        <td id="LC9008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">others of their own species.  I asked him, “whether it were the custom in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9009"></td>
        <td id="LC9009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his country to say the thing which was not?”  I assured him, “I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9010"></td>
        <td id="LC9010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">almost forgot what he meant by falsehood, and if I had lived a thousand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9011"></td>
        <td id="LC9011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">years in _Houyhnhnmland_, I should never have heard a lie from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9012"></td>
        <td id="LC9012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meanest servant; that I was altogether indifferent whether he believed me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9013"></td>
        <td id="LC9013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or not; but, however, in return for his favours, I would give so much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9014"></td>
        <td id="LC9014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">allowance to the corruption of his nature, as to answer any objection he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9015"></td>
        <td id="LC9015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would please to make, and then he might easily discover the truth.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9016"></td>
        <td id="LC9016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9017"></td>
        <td id="LC9017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The captain, a wise man, after many endeavours to catch me tripping in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9018"></td>
        <td id="LC9018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some part of my story, at last began to have a better opinion of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9019"></td>
        <td id="LC9019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">veracity.  But he added, “that since I professed so inviolable an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9020"></td>
        <td id="LC9020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attachment to truth, I must give him my word and honour to bear him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9021"></td>
        <td id="LC9021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">company in this voyage, without attempting any thing against my life; or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9022"></td>
        <td id="LC9022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">else he would continue me a prisoner till we arrived at Lisbon.”  I gave</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9023"></td>
        <td id="LC9023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him the promise he required; but at the same time protested, “that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9024"></td>
        <td id="LC9024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would suffer the greatest hardships, rather than return to live among</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9025"></td>
        <td id="LC9025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_Yahoos_.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9026"></td>
        <td id="LC9026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9027"></td>
        <td id="LC9027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Our voyage passed without any considerable accident.  In gratitude to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9028"></td>
        <td id="LC9028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">captain, I sometimes sat with him, at his earnest request, and strove to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9029"></td>
        <td id="LC9029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conceal my antipathy against human kind, although it often broke out;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9030"></td>
        <td id="LC9030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which he suffered to pass without observation.  But the greatest part of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9031"></td>
        <td id="LC9031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the day I confined myself to my cabin, to avoid seeing any of the crew.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9032"></td>
        <td id="LC9032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The captain had often entreated me to strip myself of my savage dress,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9033"></td>
        <td id="LC9033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and offered to lend me the best suit of clothes he had.  This I would not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9034"></td>
        <td id="LC9034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be prevailed on to accept, abhorring to cover myself with any thing that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9035"></td>
        <td id="LC9035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been on the back of a _Yahoo_.  I only desired he would lend me two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9036"></td>
        <td id="LC9036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clean shirts, which, having been washed since he wore them, I believed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9037"></td>
        <td id="LC9037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would not so much defile me.  These I changed every second day, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9038"></td>
        <td id="LC9038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">washed them myself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9039"></td>
        <td id="LC9039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9040"></td>
        <td id="LC9040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We arrived at Lisbon, Nov. 5, 1715.  At our landing, the captain forced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9041"></td>
        <td id="LC9041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me to cover myself with his cloak, to prevent the rabble from crowding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9042"></td>
        <td id="LC9042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about me.  I was conveyed to his own house; and at my earnest request he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9043"></td>
        <td id="LC9043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">led me up to the highest room backwards.  I conjured him “to conceal from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9044"></td>
        <td id="LC9044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all persons what I had told him of the _Houyhnhnms_; because the least</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9045"></td>
        <td id="LC9045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hint of such a story would not only draw numbers of people to see me, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9046"></td>
        <td id="LC9046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">probably put me in danger of being imprisoned, or burnt by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9047"></td>
        <td id="LC9047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Inquisition.”  The captain persuaded me to accept a suit of clothes newly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9048"></td>
        <td id="LC9048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made; but I would not suffer the tailor to take my measure; however, Don</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9049"></td>
        <td id="LC9049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Pedro being almost of my size, they fitted me well enough.  He accoutred</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9050"></td>
        <td id="LC9050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me with other necessaries, all new, which I aired for twenty-four hours</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9051"></td>
        <td id="LC9051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before I would use them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9052"></td>
        <td id="LC9052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9053"></td>
        <td id="LC9053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The captain had no wife, nor above three servants, none of which were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9054"></td>
        <td id="LC9054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suffered to attend at meals; and his whole deportment was so obliging,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9055"></td>
        <td id="LC9055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">added to very good human understanding, that I really began to tolerate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9056"></td>
        <td id="LC9056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his company.  He gained so far upon me, that I ventured to look out of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9057"></td>
        <td id="LC9057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the back window.  By degrees I was brought into another room, whence I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9058"></td>
        <td id="LC9058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">peeped into the street, but drew my head back in a fright.  In a week’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9059"></td>
        <td id="LC9059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time he seduced me down to the door.  I found my terror gradually</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9060"></td>
        <td id="LC9060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lessened, but my hatred and contempt seemed to increase.  I was at last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9061"></td>
        <td id="LC9061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bold enough to walk the street in his company, but kept my nose well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9062"></td>
        <td id="LC9062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stopped with rue, or sometimes with tobacco.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9063"></td>
        <td id="LC9063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9064"></td>
        <td id="LC9064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In ten days, Don Pedro, to whom I had given some account of my domestic</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9065"></td>
        <td id="LC9065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">affairs, put it upon me, as a matter of honour and conscience, “that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9066"></td>
        <td id="LC9066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ought to return to my native country, and live at home with my wife and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9067"></td>
        <td id="LC9067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">children.”  He told me, “there was an English ship in the port just ready</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9068"></td>
        <td id="LC9068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to sail, and he would furnish me with all things necessary.”  It would be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9069"></td>
        <td id="LC9069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tedious to repeat his arguments, and my contradictions.  He said, “it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9070"></td>
        <td id="LC9070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">altogether impossible to find such a solitary island as I desired to live</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9071"></td>
        <td id="LC9071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in; but I might command in my own house, and pass my time in a manner as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9072"></td>
        <td id="LC9072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recluse as I pleased.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9073"></td>
        <td id="LC9073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9074"></td>
        <td id="LC9074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I complied at last, finding I could not do better.  I left Lisbon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9075"></td>
        <td id="LC9075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">24th day of November, in an English merchantman, but who was the master I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9076"></td>
        <td id="LC9076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never inquired.  Don Pedro accompanied me to the ship, and lent me twenty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9077"></td>
        <td id="LC9077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pounds.  He took kind leave of me, and embraced me at parting, which I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9078"></td>
        <td id="LC9078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bore as well as I could.  During this last voyage I had no commerce with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9079"></td>
        <td id="LC9079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the master or any of his men; but, pretending I was sick, kept close in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9080"></td>
        <td id="LC9080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my cabin.  On the fifth of December, 1715, we cast anchor in the Downs,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9081"></td>
        <td id="LC9081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about nine in the morning, and at three in the afternoon I got safe to my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9082"></td>
        <td id="LC9082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house at Rotherhith. {546}</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9083"></td>
        <td id="LC9083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9084"></td>
        <td id="LC9084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My wife and family received me with great surprise and joy, because they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9085"></td>
        <td id="LC9085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">concluded me certainly dead; but I must freely confess the sight of them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9086"></td>
        <td id="LC9086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">filled me only with hatred, disgust, and contempt; and the more, by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9087"></td>
        <td id="LC9087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reflecting on the near alliance I had to them.  For although, since my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9088"></td>
        <td id="LC9088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unfortunate exile from the _Houyhnhnm_ country, I had compelled myself to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9089"></td>
        <td id="LC9089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tolerate the sight of _Yahoos_, and to converse with Don Pedro de Mendez,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9090"></td>
        <td id="LC9090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yet my memory and imagination were perpetually filled with the virtues</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9091"></td>
        <td id="LC9091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and ideas of those exalted _Houyhnhnms_.  And when I began to consider</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9092"></td>
        <td id="LC9092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that, by copulating with one of the _Yahoo_ species I had become a parent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9093"></td>
        <td id="LC9093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of more, it struck me with the utmost shame, confusion, and horror.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9094"></td>
        <td id="LC9094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9095"></td>
        <td id="LC9095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As soon as I entered the house, my wife took me in her arms, and kissed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9096"></td>
        <td id="LC9096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me; at which, having not been used to the touch of that odious animal for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9097"></td>
        <td id="LC9097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so many years, I fell into a swoon for almost an hour.  At the time I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9098"></td>
        <td id="LC9098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">writing, it is five years since my last return to England.  During the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9099"></td>
        <td id="LC9099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first year, I could not endure my wife or children in my presence; the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9100"></td>
        <td id="LC9100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very smell of them was intolerable; much less could I suffer them to eat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9101"></td>
        <td id="LC9101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the same room.  To this hour they dare not presume to touch my bread,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9102"></td>
        <td id="LC9102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or drink out of the same cup, neither was I ever able to let one of them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9103"></td>
        <td id="LC9103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">take me by the hand.  The first money I laid out was to buy two young</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9104"></td>
        <td id="LC9104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stone-horses, which I keep in a good stable; and next to them, the groom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9105"></td>
        <td id="LC9105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is my greatest favourite, for I feel my spirits revived by the smell he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9106"></td>
        <td id="LC9106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contracts in the stable.  My horses understand me tolerably well; I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9107"></td>
        <td id="LC9107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">converse with them at least four hours every day.  They are strangers to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9108"></td>
        <td id="LC9108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bridle or saddle; they live in great amity with me and friendship to each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9109"></td>
        <td id="LC9109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9110"></td>
        <td id="LC9110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9111"></td>
        <td id="LC9111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9112"></td>
        <td id="LC9112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9113"></td>
        <td id="LC9113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XII.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9114"></td>
        <td id="LC9114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9115"></td>
        <td id="LC9115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9116"></td>
        <td id="LC9116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The author’s veracity.  His design in publishing this work.  His censure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9117"></td>
        <td id="LC9117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of those travellers who swerve from the truth.  The author clears himself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9118"></td>
        <td id="LC9118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from any sinister ends in writing.  An objection answered.  The method of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9119"></td>
        <td id="LC9119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">planting colonies.  His native country commended.  The right of the crown</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9120"></td>
        <td id="LC9120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to those countries described by the author is justified.  The difficulty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9121"></td>
        <td id="LC9121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of conquering them.  The author takes his last leave of the reader;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9122"></td>
        <td id="LC9122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proposes his manner of living for the future; gives good advice, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9123"></td>
        <td id="LC9123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">concludes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9124"></td>
        <td id="LC9124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9125"></td>
        <td id="LC9125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thus, gentle reader, I have given thee a faithful history of my travels</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9126"></td>
        <td id="LC9126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for sixteen years and above seven months: wherein I have not been so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9127"></td>
        <td id="LC9127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">studious of ornament as of truth.  I could, perhaps, like others, have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9128"></td>
        <td id="LC9128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">astonished thee with strange improbable tales; but I rather chose to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9129"></td>
        <td id="LC9129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">relate plain matter of fact, in the simplest manner and style; because my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9130"></td>
        <td id="LC9130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">principal design was to inform, and not to amuse thee.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9131"></td>
        <td id="LC9131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9132"></td>
        <td id="LC9132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is easy for us who travel into remote countries, which are seldom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9133"></td>
        <td id="LC9133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">visited by Englishmen or other Europeans, to form descriptions of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9134"></td>
        <td id="LC9134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wonderful animals both at sea and land.  Whereas a traveller’s chief aim</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9135"></td>
        <td id="LC9135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should be to make men wiser and better, and to improve their minds by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9136"></td>
        <td id="LC9136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bad, as well as good, example of what they deliver concerning foreign</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9137"></td>
        <td id="LC9137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">places.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9138"></td>
        <td id="LC9138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9139"></td>
        <td id="LC9139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I could heartily wish a law was enacted, that every traveller, before he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9140"></td>
        <td id="LC9140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were permitted to publish his voyages, should be obliged to make oath</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9141"></td>
        <td id="LC9141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before the Lord High Chancellor, that all he intended to print was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9142"></td>
        <td id="LC9142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">absolutely true to the best of his knowledge; for then the world would no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9143"></td>
        <td id="LC9143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">longer be deceived, as it usually is, while some writers, to make their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9144"></td>
        <td id="LC9144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">works pass the better upon the public, impose the grossest falsities on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9145"></td>
        <td id="LC9145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the unwary reader.  I have perused several books of travels with great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9146"></td>
        <td id="LC9146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">delight in my younger days; but having since gone over most parts of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9147"></td>
        <td id="LC9147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">globe, and been able to contradict many fabulous accounts from my own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9148"></td>
        <td id="LC9148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">observation, it has given me a great disgust against this part of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9149"></td>
        <td id="LC9149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reading, and some indignation to see the credulity of mankind so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9150"></td>
        <td id="LC9150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impudently abused.  Therefore, since my acquaintance were pleased to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9151"></td>
        <td id="LC9151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">think my poor endeavours might not be unacceptable to my country, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9152"></td>
        <td id="LC9152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imposed on myself, as a maxim never to be swerved from, that I would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9153"></td>
        <td id="LC9153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strictly adhere to truth; neither indeed can I be ever under the least</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9154"></td>
        <td id="LC9154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">temptation to vary from it, while I retain in my mind the lectures and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9155"></td>
        <td id="LC9155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">example of my noble master and the other illustrious _Houyhnhnms_ of whom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9156"></td>
        <td id="LC9156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had so long the honour to be an humble hearer.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9157"></td>
        <td id="LC9157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9158"></td>
        <td id="LC9158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    _—Nec si miserum Fortuna Sinonem_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9159"></td>
        <td id="LC9159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    _Finxit_, _vanum etiam_, _mendacemque improba finget_.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9160"></td>
        <td id="LC9160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9161"></td>
        <td id="LC9161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I know very well, how little reputation is to be got by writings which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9162"></td>
        <td id="LC9162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">require neither genius nor learning, nor indeed any other talent, except</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9163"></td>
        <td id="LC9163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a good memory, or an exact journal.  I know likewise, that writers of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9164"></td>
        <td id="LC9164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">travels, like dictionary-makers, are sunk into oblivion by the weight and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9165"></td>
        <td id="LC9165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bulk of those who come last, and therefore lie uppermost.  And it is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9166"></td>
        <td id="LC9166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">highly probable, that such travellers, who shall hereafter visit the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9167"></td>
        <td id="LC9167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">countries described in this work of mine, may, by detecting my errors (if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9168"></td>
        <td id="LC9168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there be any), and adding many new discoveries of their own, justle me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9169"></td>
        <td id="LC9169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out of vogue, and stand in my place, making the world forget that ever I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9170"></td>
        <td id="LC9170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was an author.  This indeed would be too great a mortification, if I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9171"></td>
        <td id="LC9171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrote for fame: but as my sole intention was the public good, I cannot be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9172"></td>
        <td id="LC9172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">altogether disappointed.  For who can read of the virtues I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9173"></td>
        <td id="LC9173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mentioned in the glorious _Houyhnhnms_, without being ashamed of his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9174"></td>
        <td id="LC9174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vices, when he considers himself as the reasoning, governing animal of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9175"></td>
        <td id="LC9175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his country?  I shall say nothing of those remote nations where _Yahoos_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9176"></td>
        <td id="LC9176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">preside; among which the least corrupted are the _Brobdingnagians_; whose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9177"></td>
        <td id="LC9177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wise maxims in morality and government it would be our happiness to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9178"></td>
        <td id="LC9178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">observe.  But I forbear descanting further, and rather leave the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9179"></td>
        <td id="LC9179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">judicious reader to his own remarks and application.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9180"></td>
        <td id="LC9180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9181"></td>
        <td id="LC9181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am not a little pleased that this work of mine can possibly meet with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9182"></td>
        <td id="LC9182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no censurers: for what objections can be made against a writer, who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9183"></td>
        <td id="LC9183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">relates only plain facts, that happened in such distant countries, where</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9184"></td>
        <td id="LC9184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we have not the least interest, with respect either to trade or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9185"></td>
        <td id="LC9185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">negotiations?  I have carefully avoided every fault with which common</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9186"></td>
        <td id="LC9186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">writers of travels are often too justly charged.  Besides, I meddle not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9187"></td>
        <td id="LC9187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the least with any party, but write without passion, prejudice, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9188"></td>
        <td id="LC9188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ill-will against any man, or number of men, whatsoever.  I write for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9189"></td>
        <td id="LC9189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">noblest end, to inform and instruct mankind; over whom I may, without</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9190"></td>
        <td id="LC9190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breach of modesty, pretend to some superiority, from the advantages I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9191"></td>
        <td id="LC9191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">received by conversing so long among the most accomplished _Houyhnhnms_.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9192"></td>
        <td id="LC9192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I write without any view to profit or praise.  I never suffer a word to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9193"></td>
        <td id="LC9193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pass that may look like reflection, or possibly give the least offence,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9194"></td>
        <td id="LC9194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even to those who are most ready to take it.  So that I hope I may with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9195"></td>
        <td id="LC9195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice pronounce myself an author perfectly blameless; against whom the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9196"></td>
        <td id="LC9196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tribes of Answerers, Considerers, Observers, Reflectors, Detectors,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9197"></td>
        <td id="LC9197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Remarkers, will never be able to find matter for exercising their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9198"></td>
        <td id="LC9198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">talents.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9199"></td>
        <td id="LC9199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9200"></td>
        <td id="LC9200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I confess, it was whispered to me, “that I was bound in duty, as a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9201"></td>
        <td id="LC9201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subject of England, to have given in a memorial to a secretary of state</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9202"></td>
        <td id="LC9202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at my first coming over; because, whatever lands are discovered by a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9203"></td>
        <td id="LC9203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subject belong to the crown.”  But I doubt whether our conquests in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9204"></td>
        <td id="LC9204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">countries I treat of would be as easy as those of Ferdinando Cortez over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9205"></td>
        <td id="LC9205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the naked Americans.  The _Lilliputians_, I think, are hardly worth the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9206"></td>
        <td id="LC9206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">charge of a fleet and army to reduce them; and I question whether it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9207"></td>
        <td id="LC9207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might be prudent or safe to attempt the _Brobdingnagians_; or whether an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9208"></td>
        <td id="LC9208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">English army would be much at their ease with the Flying Island over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9209"></td>
        <td id="LC9209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their heads.  The _Houyhnhnms_ indeed appear not to be so well prepared</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9210"></td>
        <td id="LC9210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for war, a science to which they are perfect strangers, and especially</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9211"></td>
        <td id="LC9211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against missive weapons.  However, supposing myself to be a minister of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9212"></td>
        <td id="LC9212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">state, I could never give my advice for invading them.  Their prudence,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9213"></td>
        <td id="LC9213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unanimity, unacquaintedness with fear, and their love of their country,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9214"></td>
        <td id="LC9214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would amply supply all defects in the military art.  Imagine twenty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9215"></td>
        <td id="LC9215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thousand of them breaking into the midst of an European army, confounding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9216"></td>
        <td id="LC9216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the ranks, overturning the carriages, battering the warriors’ faces into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9217"></td>
        <td id="LC9217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mummy by terrible yerks from their hinder hoofs; for they would well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9218"></td>
        <td id="LC9218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deserve the character given to Augustus, _Recalcitrat undique tutus_.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9219"></td>
        <td id="LC9219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, instead of proposals for conquering that magnanimous nation, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9220"></td>
        <td id="LC9220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rather wish they were in a capacity, or disposition, to send a sufficient</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9221"></td>
        <td id="LC9221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">number of their inhabitants for civilizing Europe, by teaching us the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9222"></td>
        <td id="LC9222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first principles of honour, justice, truth, temperance, public spirit,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9223"></td>
        <td id="LC9223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fortitude, chastity, friendship, benevolence, and fidelity.  The names of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9224"></td>
        <td id="LC9224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all which virtues are still retained among us in most languages, and are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9315"></td>
        <td id="LC9315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9316"></td>
        <td id="LC9316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But the _Houyhnhnms_, who live under the government of reason, are no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9317"></td>
        <td id="LC9317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more proud of the good qualities they possess, than I should be for not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9318"></td>
        <td id="LC9318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wanting a leg or an arm; which no man in his wits would boast of,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9319"></td>
        <td id="LC9319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">although he must be miserable without them.  I dwell the longer upon this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9320"></td>
        <td id="LC9320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subject from the desire I have to make the society of an English _Yahoo_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9321"></td>
        <td id="LC9321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by any means not insupportable; and therefore I here entreat those who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9322"></td>
        <td id="LC9322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have any tincture of this absurd vice, that they will not presume to come</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9323"></td>
        <td id="LC9323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in my sight.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9324"></td>
        <td id="LC9324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC9593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9594"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9595"></td>
        <td id="LC9595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warranties or the exclusion or limitation of certain types of damages.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9596"></td>
        <td id="LC9596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If any disclaimer or limitation set forth in this agreement violates the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9597"></td>

        <td id="L9598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9598"></td>
        <td id="LC9598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interpreted to make the maximum disclaimer or limitation permitted by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9599"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9600"></td>
        <td id="LC9600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">provision of this agreement shall not void the remaining provisions.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC9659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9660"></td>
        <td id="LC9660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Project Gutenberg-tm depends upon and cannot survive without wide</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9661"></td>
        <td id="LC9661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spread public support and donations to carry out its mission of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9662"></td>
        <td id="LC9662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">increasing the number of public domain and licensed works that can be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9663"></td>
        <td id="LC9663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">freely distributed in machine readable form accessible by the widest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9664"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9665"></td>
