      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9666"></td>
        <td id="LC9666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">status with the IRS.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9667"></td>
        <td id="LC9667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9668"></td>
        <td id="LC9668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Foundation is committed to complying with the laws regulating</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9669"></td>
        <td id="LC9669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">charities and charitable donations in all 50 states of the United</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9670"></td>
        <td id="LC9670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">States.  Compliance requirements are not uniform and it takes a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9671"></td>
        <td id="LC9671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">considerable effort, much paperwork and many fees to meet and keep up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9672"></td>
        <td id="LC9672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with these requirements.  We do not solicit donations in locations</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9673"></td>
        <td id="LC9673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where we have not received written confirmation of compliance.  To</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9674"></td>
        <td id="LC9674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">SEND DONATIONS or determine the status of compliance for any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9675"></td>
        <td id="LC9675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">particular state visit http://www.gutenberg.org/fundraising/donate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9676"></td>
        <td id="LC9676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9677"></td>
        <td id="LC9677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">While we cannot and do not solicit contributions from states where we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9678"></td>
        <td id="LC9678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have not met the solicitation requirements, we know of no prohibition</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9679"></td>
        <td id="LC9679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against accepting unsolicited donations from donors in such states who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9680"></td>
        <td id="LC9680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">approach us with offers to donate.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9681"></td>
        <td id="LC9681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9682"></td>
        <td id="LC9682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">International donations are gratefully accepted, but we cannot make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9683"></td>
        <td id="LC9683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any statements concerning tax treatment of donations received from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9684"></td>
        <td id="LC9684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">outside the United States.  U.S. laws alone swamp our small staff.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9685"></td>
        <td id="LC9685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9686"></td>
        <td id="LC9686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Please check the Project Gutenberg Web pages for current donation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9687"></td>
        <td id="LC9687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">methods and addresses.  Donations are accepted in a number of other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9688"></td>
        <td id="LC9688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ways including checks, online payments and credit card donations.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9689"></td>

        <td id="L9691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9691"></td>

        <td id="L9692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9692"></td>

        <td id="L9693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9693"></td>
        <td id="LC9693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Section 5.  General Information About Project Gutenberg-tm electronic</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9694"></td>
        <td id="LC9694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">works.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9695"></td>
        <td id="LC9695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9696"></td>
        <td id="LC9696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor Michael S. Hart is the originator of the Project Gutenberg-tm</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9697"></td>
        <td id="LC9697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">concept of a library of electronic works that could be freely shared</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9698"></td>
        <td id="LC9698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with anyone.  For thirty years, he produced and distributed Project</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9699"></td>
        <td id="LC9699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gutenberg-tm eBooks with only a loose network of volunteer support.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9700"></td>
        <td id="LC9700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9701"></td>
        <td id="LC9701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Project Gutenberg-tm eBooks are often created from several printed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9702"></td>
        <td id="LC9702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">editions, all of which are confirmed as Public Domain in the U.S.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9703"></td>
        <td id="LC9703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unless a copyright notice is included.  Thus, we do not necessarily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9704"></td>
        <td id="LC9704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">keep eBooks in compliance with any particular paper edition.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
